column1: Bunny Rabbit. The kids wanted a bunny rabbit. Their parents decided to buy a bunny. The kids ran all around the house. Their parents realized that their rabbits were dead. They told them to go back inside.

Good Terms. Tom was in a new city. He wanted to meet new friends. Tom looked online for a few places to meet. Tom went to a place called Red Robin. Tom got along well with the other patrons and made many new friends.

What And Itch. One day, the cat scratched a spot on my arm. The scratch was bad, so I went to the hospital. The doctor said it might be an infection. The vet prescribed antibiotics. The medication helped the scratch.

Empty Club. Amy and her friends went to the local club for some girls. There was only one seat available and the girls were not happy. Amy decided she would give the bouncer a chance to find them a seat. As the bouncer was moving the girls were unhappy. Amy sat with the empty seat and the girls were impressed.

Wrestling. Kevin and his brothers were always wrestling. His brother was better and they decided to fight. The boys argued back and forth. Eventually the fight broke out into a big one. Kevin and his brothers had a great time.
Magical Fruit. Timmy was very thirsty. But he didn't have any juice. So he went to the store to buy some juice. But he ended up buying apple juice. And it tasted delicious.

Schedule. I used to always stay up late to watch tv. I had a lot of shows I had never seen on Netflix. I started to miss shows I used to binge watch. I ended up staying up more than usual to catch up on shows. After a while I was no longer late for work and was less tired.

Candy in the dirt. Cathy and her brother wanted to find candy. They both wanted different types of candy. Cathy picked up a handful of dirt. She and her brother dug through the dirt to find some candy. Cathy and her brother found some candy in the dirt.

Robins cruel exit. Robins fiance left her on bad terms with him. Robins had to take the long way to the other side of town. She was very tired, and tried to sleep. Her sister woke her up and told her she couldn't leave now. She left and never returned to robins home.
Good Fences. Sam was out in his yard. He wanted some good privacy. He decided to put some good looking fences. He thought it looked great. Unfortunately it was very ugly.

Carnival Games. John had never gone to a carnival before. When he arrived, he was so bored that he began to play some games. He made lots of friends there and had a lot of fun. As it got closer to closing time, John's friends stopped going to the carnival. They told him that the carnival was too much for them to handle.
New Neighbors. Tim lived alone. He didn't have many friends. He often wondered why he wasn't popular. He decided to take out a reservation. His new neighbors welcomed him very well.

The Face Wash. The kids were playing in the kitchen. They were trying to wash off their germs. Sam ran out of napkins. He had to throw some in the washing machine. The kids were not able to clean off afterwards.

Bill started a company. Bill was an accountant. One day, a client asked him to start his own company. Bill decided to give it a shot. He was so excited about his new venture. Bill ended up building his company into a huge success!
Pool. My wife and I went swimming at the pool one day. We both got a bit sunburned. After an hour the water was too cold for us. We decided to swim at a nearby pond. My wife had a good time.

Megan sees a ghost. Megan is walking home. She is really enjoying her day. Suddenly, she hears a loud noise coming from the bushes. She rushes over to investigate. Megan sees a ghost and calls the police.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine is very upset that her ears have grown very large. She decides to get her ears pierced to look less big. Francine gets her ears pierced to match her dress and hair. Finally the earrings are placed into her ears. Francine feels that her ears are no longer as big as they used to be.

Penn. Tom went to visit his friend in Pennsylvania. He was having fun at first. Then he got very bored. He decided to drive around to see what was going on. His friend turned out to be very eccentric!

Flower Shop. Jill wanted a new flower. She decided to go to the flower shop. The worker showed her some different types. Jill chose some red and white roses. Jill loved the way the worker colored the roses.

Shoes. Jim bought a new pair of shoes. He didn't like the way they looked on him. He wore them to school. His friends told him that he looked ridiculous in them. He got some advice from a friend that helped him a lot.
Spare Change. Tom wanted to save some money. He decided to look for spare change at the gas station. He wasn't able to find any. Eventually he ran out of money. Tom had to go to the store to buy it.

Balloon Fight. Our neighbors had a birthday party last Saturday. They put balloons up all over the neighborhood. We decided to get in their way. We popped a few of the balloons at them. The balloons flew away.
Stripley. I am a total stripley! I'm short, I like big things, I like boys, I like to sing. I sing all the time. I sing to myself and to my friends. I love my voice.

Milkshake. Kathy and her friends decided to go out for milkshakes. They got a bucket of ice cream and some drinks. The girls started getting a little too carried away. The girls accidentally spilled it all over each other. Kathy was humiliated and the girls made it up to each other.

Vintage toy. Lucy was looking at some old toys in her grandpa's attic. Her grandpa had bought her some for her birthday. Lucy's grandpa wanted to take them out of the attic. Her grandpa told Lucy they were antique. Lucy was disappointed but knew grandpa was good at what he did.

New Underwear. John needed a new pair of underwear. John went to the nearest department store to buy new underwear. John saw a pair of underwear that he really liked. John bought the underwear at the store. John loved the new underwear.

The Psychology of Grades. Timmy was in fourth grade. He was always good at everything. His teacher put him in a group with the bad ones. Timmy became so good he was chosen to make a new group. They were going to get good grades but Timmy hated math.

New Dog. The new puppy ran through the room barking and jumping. It's owner took the puppy to the vet for an examination. The vet gave the puppy a shot and it seemed to be ok. The new puppy ran back into the room again barking and jumping. The new puppy was very happy.

Music Band. Dee wanted to start a music band. She looked at the band name, but it was too long. She decided to change it to The New Beginning. She got a name change as well, because she felt it sounded better. Now she is a pop icon, because she just wrote a song.

The Concert. Jenny was a really popular girl at school. She was chosen to perform in a concert. Jenny was nervous but excited. The crowd went wild when she stepped on stage. Jenny ended up having a great time.

Dinosaurs. The cave explorers got excited. They found lots of dinosaur bones! They had found a lot of bones from the same animal. They called it the Dinosaur Monster. They were so excited to share it with all of their friends!

Pickles. Tom wanted to try something new. He was visiting a local farm. The farm offered pickles as a special treat. Tom agreed to try them. They tasted very good and he found they were very good too.

Raking Leaves. Jody hated to rake leaves. Her mom told her to rake the leaves herself. Jody hated to rake leaves, but she had to do it. She used a rake with a large leaf blade. She was tired after a few minutes, but she enjoyed her time outdoors.

Dangerous Campfire. I was hiking in the woods with my family. My Dad lit a campfire. After setting up the fire, he warned us not to go near it. We got close to it and accidentally stepped on a fire beetle. We burned ourselves all very badly.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca has always loved how her dark hair looked. She decides to dye her hair pink to be more like her friends. At first she is disappointed to see that her hair is darker. Still, as she continues to dye, she loves the way it looks. Bianca is happy that she has a darker dark hair now.

Dancing. Anna was a ballerina who dreamed of performing in the Nutcracker. She spent years perfecting her ballet techniques. But then one day she contracted a fatal illness. Her health became even more dire as months passed. Then suddenly Anna recovered - and was back to performing ballet!

Buying a New TV. Jeff was shopping at the electronics store. He decided to pick out a new TV for his living room. Jeff couldn't decide between three sets. After looking at all the TVs, he went to the electronics store to choose. Finally, Jeff bought a bright blue 60 inch TV for his living room.

Deaf Kid. A deaf child named Jake walked into a department store. He heard a boy playing with a toy gun. He pointed it right at him and pulled the trigger. The kid screamed, and ran away. Jake was very happy that he had not killed anyone.

Race. Jim wanted to run a race. He decided to run an early one to get a lot of miles in. When the race started, he was worried that he was going to be behind. He worked his way up the chain until it was his turn. Once Jim won, he celebrated with everyone else.

The Puppet Show. Dan was having a birthday party. Dan loved doing arts and crafts. Dan's friend suggested that Dan throw a puppet show. Dan's friend took him to see a puppet show. Dan was so happy that he decided to throw a puppet show.

New Hobby. Liza really wanted to get in shape. She decided to get in shape by doing cartwheels. She bought herself a set of rollerblades and went outside. She then got into a cartwheel on the sidewalk. Liza is now in shape and very proud of herself.
No Jumping. I had a stroke in 2011. It made me lose my use of my right side. I could barely walk. I had to use crutches after the stroke. However, I refused to use them and walked to school.

Comparison. Amy wanted to buy a house in Minnesota. She searched real estate ads and found a good house near her work. She met with the agent and they both thought the house was good. After meeting with the realtor they both agreed on a price. Amy was happy to find a house in Minnesota.
seafood. Tim wanted to try some seafood. He had never tried fish before. Tim went to a seafood restaurant. They did not have any fish he wanted. Tim had to be disappointed in them.

Burritos. Dan decided to make burritos. He fried up the ingredients and added cheese. However, he forgot the cheese. Dan's burrito didn't taste very good. He realized he should have let the cheese finish.

Spinach. Anna went to the grocery store for some spinach. She bought a small container of spinach and then went home. After a while, she grew tired of spinach. So she got a salad and spinach for dinner instead. Anna was glad she didn't have to cook.
Exercising. Ronda worked out everyday. She went to the gym every day. She also exercised when she went to the park. Her muscles developed. Ronda was able to look like a bodybuilder.

New Year's Resolution. Mark wanted to make a new resolution this year. He decided to just eat healthy and live a healthier lifestyle. He signed up for a website and joined a local gym. He began lifting weights at the gym every day. A few months later, he noticed that his weight had dropped off significantly.

John Buys An Umbrella. John realizes that he will soon be walking across the city. He needs to find an umbrella to keep him dry. He decides to go to the store to buy an umbrella. He buys an excellent orange umbrella. John is glad that he will not be wet during his walk.

Embarrassing Mistake. My friend brought over two boxes of bottled water. I was very confused as to why it was there. As I opened the box, I realized it was pink. I immediately told her. She explained that the pink bottles must be expired.

Greenery. I was at the park and came across some green grass. I decided to go home and begin painting it. When I was done, I decided to go home and get some paint. After I got home, I noticed the grass was brown and dirty. I decided to go outside and mow the grass.

The Weight Loss Expert. Troy wanted to be healthier. He signed up for a weight loss program. He began eating healthier food and working out. Soon he was noticeably losing weight. He was so proud of himself!
Library Book. I went to the library. The librarian asked for my library book. I told her that I don't have it. She asked where I got it from. I gave her the book, and she gave me a $5 back.

Low Blood Sugar. Jane was watching a documentary. The documentary was on sugar in food. Jane got really annoyed with all the sugar in the documentary. Jane felt very ill. Jane had to throw up and felt like she got lucky.
Broken Nose. Kate was on the couch watching TV. Her nose started to bleed. She didn't notice until she sat down. It was too late to stop the bleeding. She broke her nose.

Eternal love. Tara and James had been dating for three Year's. They were both attracted to each other but did not enjoy each other's company. Their mutual friend asked if they could meet in person. Tara and James agreed, and met in a cafe for coffee. They fell in love immediately and remained friends ever since.
Lost Phone. James took his girlfriend on a date. They went to the movies. She was trying to call him. She could not find him. He had to call her back later.

Eviction. Bob's mom said he had to clean the house by tomorrow. So Bob went on a walk in the woods with his axe. He chopped off a tree branch from an old tree. But the police found the branch's owner at Bob's feet! Bob's mom was very upset at him.

Thunder. My girlfriend and I were playing football. We started passing the ball to each other. However, the football ended up breaking a lamp. I told her to run away. Unfortunately, she decided to go chase after it.

Lost poncho. Tom got dressed up for a fancy party. He forgot his poncho at home. Tom had to walk all the way to the party. At the party, Tom saw a homeless man wearing a poncho. Tom realized how much he loved ponchos.
Swim. I was at the pool with my friends. The waves were very high. Everyone was afraid of them. But I was very excited. Eventually, I got to the top.
Sticky. Tom bought a new car. It had big tires. One day he was going off-roading. He accidentally hit a rock. Tom got a huge gash.
Mother. I used to have a sister named Anna. She was a very pretty blonde woman. I liked her, but we never really talked. My mom died of cancer last year. Now I have to go the funeral alone.

ID. Joe had a girlfriend named Jane. They would go on dates and do drugs together. Joe asked Jane to be careful. One day Joe was driving and Jane was texting. Joe caught Jane using his phone and she got in trouble.

The Inheritance. Joe had always been good to his parents. He was getting older and they had to pass his fortune to him. They told him they would take care of his affairs. They took him to a casino and let him win some money. Joe ended up with enough money and his parents left him.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike has always loved drinking white wine. One day he finds that his white wine is very cheap. Now Mike begins drinking white wine every evening. Mike is glad that he no longer loves drinking white wine. Mike is very happy that white wine is not so expensive.
Broken Bike. John was riding his bicycle. The bike began to wobble. The front wheel fell off. John put his arm around the wheel. He put the wheel back together.

The Blind Date. Jane really liked this guy in her dorm. She didn't really know if he was interested in her. One day, she met him at the library. She was very nervous, but she ended up liking him. He asked her to marry him, and she said yes.
The Stormy Day. It was a terrible winter morning. The kids were grumpy. They wanted to go to the yard to play in the snow. They made a huge mess. The parents made them change clothes.

White Cast Christmas. My mom made white cast Christmas trees for my siblings and me. My brothers wanted a pink tree, my sister wanted a pink tree. They refused to play with the tree and demanded a different one. As hard as I tried, I could not convince them that it was pink. My dad took the scissors from them and made them cut the tree anyway.

The volleyball accident. The girls were playing soccer. They were playing in the end zone. Suddenly, one of the girls fell and hit her head. She felt dizzy and fell to the ground. Luckily, she was just a head concussion.
Turtle Fears. Amy was afraid of turtles. She didn't like when people would touch her. In class a turtle jumped up and bit her. Amy's friends all laughed. Amy didn't feel so bad after that.
Shoelaces. Tommy and his sister were playing basketball. She tripped over some shoelaces. Tommy offered to help her out. His sister accepted the help. They finished the game together.

Easy mac disappointment. When I decided to make Easy Macs last week I made macaroni and cheese. The cheese stuck to the pan and I needed a way to remove it. I put it in a bowl and started stirring. My first batch had the cheese on top, I didn't notice. I then ate the first one and was disappointed it had no cheese on top.

Puppy Litter. It's been a week since we got the puppy. We are going through all our boxes. My son and I are taking turns throwing things out. I got so much stuff we just put all of it in one pile. Now it looks just like a big, messy puppy litter.
Old Friend. Ben was an old friend of mine. When Ben was at college, I visited him. We went to see a play at the college. I told him how much I liked him. He said he was sorry and went home.

The Easter Parade. Logan wanted to go to the Easter parade with his family. His parents did not want him to go so he did not go. He was so disappointed. They were very hurt that he couldn't come. Logan decided not to go to the Easter parade ever again.

No Littering. John and Mary lived next door to a house with a very big yard. Mary noticed that her neighbor wasn't paying attention to the yard. She got together with John and organized a meeting. John and Mary talked about the yard and gave them the option to move. Mary was upset that she had to move the yard.
Ham Sandwich. Jack was hungry after work. He decided to make a sandwich. He didn't have any ham so he searched for some. He found some hard boiled eggs. He decided to make his own ham sandwich.

Confession. Tom wanted to be a famous singer. He spent years practicing his songs. Tom was never satisfied with the results. He wrote his own songs and played them on the radio. Tom's songs became popular and he became famous.

Janet. Janet went shopping at the grocery store. While walking to the store she saw someone in her path. Janet looked to see if the person was okay. Janet's eyes fell on the woman's purse. Janet snatched the purse up and kept walking.

The fishing trip. The two brothers went fishing in the lake. They caught many fish. They took their fillets to the local town. The fishermen loved their fish. They decided to take their fillets to sell.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex realizes that he has gained some weight over the last few months. He decides that he needs to start consuming more tea. Finally Rex starts drinking tea every day. After several weeks Rex notices that he is less hungry. Rex is happy to be able to start consuming more tea.

Scared Teddy. Teddy was going on a camping trip. Teddy was not a big fan of nature. His dad told him it was going to be a fun day. Teddy was scared because he thought he wouldn't see any animals. Teddy made friends at the camp and had a great time.
Power Outage. Tom was at work. It was a really hot day. A lot of people were complaining about the heat. It started to get dark. Tom had to work late that night.
A new hobby. Tim was bored. He wanted to have a new hobby. He decided to become a carpenter. He saved up his money for many years. After a few Years, he was able to open his own shop.
Photo. Amy's phone was not working. She had a picture taken of her at school. She accidentally took the wrong one. Her teacher noticed and sent an email to everyone. Amy had her phone back.
The Deadline. Jill worked on her novel for 2 years. The day was the last day of editing. She started the last page. All the lights went out. She was so excited when she finally finished.

Wine tasting. I decided to go wine tasting. First I went to a small restaurant. I asked for a cabaret white, followed by a cuvée. After that, I went to a small cafe. Finally, I went to a fine wine store and bought five bottles.

The bed. We have a cat that we do not like to sleep in. I bought a soft and fluffy kitten bed for him. My husband told me he would sleep better in it than a ball. I tried to buy a soft bed for him. He said he would sleep with a ball.
The saxophone. The saxophonist was up on stage. He was going to play a song. He began to play his song. The audience rose to their feet. They loved it.
The Farm. The man bought a farm. He started to build a barn. The barn had no barn animals. He had to call an animal control agency. The man had to hire an animal control agency.

Outside the Window. I always want to be outside playing video games. I'm not very good at sports. My friends and I decided to try out for the school football team. I spent all summer practicing my sports skills. The next time the tryouts came around, I was a solid wide receiver.

Making it gluten free. Kelsi was not a big fan of wheat. She didn't eat wheat products. Then one day she ate something that she thought was wheat. It was actually gluten free. Kelsi made a change in her life.

The plane trip. Randy was flying a plane. He was nervous and the flight was longer than expected. Once the plane landed he sat down and enjoyed the ride. Suddenly, a hurricane hit the island. Randy was forced to go back home.

Jen's Game. Jen was playing a game with her family. She told everyone the rules of the game. Then she read the rules to everyone. Jen realized that she had misunderstood a couple of the rules. Jen had to readjust her strategy.

More Alone. Kim was having a problem with the bathroom. She had to ask for help every day. Kim wasn't being very good at keeping private. Kim's mom tried to get her to use the bathroom alone a few times. After a few weeks of this, Kim used the bathroom alone no more.
Theme park excitement. We decided to go to the theme park for the day. When we went we got scared. We went over to the big slide. We were so scared. I told her it wasn't a giant spider.

Futsal. Sam played with his friend Jim. The two went to play soccer in the park. Sam tried to score a goal but missed. Jim told him that Futsal was a better sport. Sam agreed and joined the team anyway.

Bluebirds. Benny and his parents love watching bluebirds. They decided to make a campfire. They made a big bonfire. They also lit a fire for the birds. When they had finished they were tired and had to sleep.

The Trip. Tommy and Eric decided they would go for a trip. They packed their bags and drove a long time. They finally arrived at the lake. The first thing they did was swim in the cold water. It was so relaxing and fun!

Carnival Ride. John and Sara took their son to the carnival. They took him to the midway to go on a roller coaster. He was scared but excited as the ride started. Soon he was flying high above the audience. He rode as fast as he could for three more minutes before stopping.

Lost Throughout the Process. The doctor took Xrays and scans of his body. The results were disappointing, as his kidneys looked normal. He decided to have his kidney taken more thoroughly. After the procedure, he waited anxiously to see the results. Unfortunately, he had to be taken home early because he had kidney damage.
The Murderer. The police found the body. They had the suspect in custody. The suspect confessed to the crime. The jury was still out. They didn't believe the defendant.
Home Run. Troy hit a home run. Everyone in the stadium cheered. He was so proud. Troy took out his souvenir. His new ball had a diamond in it.

Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg has always wanted to visit the zoo. His parents take him to the zoo for a visit. They see many animals including tigers. Afterwards Greg feels very happy. Greg is very happy that he has visited the zoo.
New Shoes. Janet wanted a new pair of shoes. She didn't have enough money for them. Luckily her mom lent her money to buy them. Janet loved her new shoes. She thanked her mom.

Cole. Cole wanted to learn to play the piano. She signed up for lessons. At first the classes were very difficult. But soon Cole's hands grew strong and strong! Soon Cole was playing the piano like a professional!

Shirley Temple Doll. My daughter had a Shirley Temple doll for several years. She was always very playful with her doll. Last week her daughter spilled grape juice on her doll. Her daughter cried and she got upset. Shirley Temple's are not allowed to be stained.

Patty's Sleepover. Patty had a sleepover. She didn't like it because the boys were all so loud. One day, the loud boys were being loud again. Patty was angry that she couldn't sleep. When she went back to sleep, the loud boys were still there.

New Shears. Jenna was going to a concert. She couldn't find her scissors anywhere. She searched everywhere for them. When she got to the concert they handed her some new shears. Jenna was able to use the new shears to get a straight razor.

As I Sit Here. The weather report showed a high temperature of ninety degrees. The students began to leave the classroom and walked to the office. The office was hot and the students drank water from a bottle. The professor announced the temperature would be raised one degree. The students cheered and drank soda and drank their lunches.
Going to School. I was running late for school. I had to hurry. I ran into my class. Everyone was staring at me. I realized it wasn't my fault that I was late.

Hit. I sat at my computer one day. I noticed the power was off. I called the power company and asked them what was wrong. They told me that I had a battery issue. I was able to have it fixed in a half hour.

The dog. The boy liked to play outside with his dog. The dog wanted to go in a certain room. The boy couldn't get his dog in the room. The dog fought the boy. The boy was disappointed his dog didn't go in the room.
Fears. I had a fear of spiders. I heard noises in my closet. I was scared of spiders. I tried to avoid them. I did not survive my spiders.

Driver. Tia was really interested in learning to drive. She went to a lot of classes and took many quizzes. One day, Tia got her driver's license! She was really proud of herself for getting her driver's license. Tia went to the DMV and got her driver's license.

Man's best friend. John really liked a girl in high school named Jill. John and Jill dated for a long time. John and Jill got married and had one daughter. Jill was a wonderful mother to her new baby. After her baby was born, John and Jill took good care of her.

The First Birthday. Candy's little brother had his first birthday. She was sad because she didn't get a present. She spent all day doing the chores. However, she was happy when she got a huge bouquet of flowers. At home, Candy was so happy she almost cried.

The fair. Ida went to the fair with her mom. She couldn't wait to feed the bears! But when she got there, they were gone. She found their home buried in the sand! She cried when she remembered the bears weren't there.
The Bison. I saw a bison by my house. It had two horns. It looked bigger than it looked. I took it home. I named him John.

A Good Samaritan. Janet and Beth were having a terrible day. Janet had fallen and broken her wrist. Janet was sad, but there was a glimmer of hope. A nice man with a dog stopped to help her. The dog and Janet were able to go home that day.
Pictures. The boy took pictures of his teacher. She was smiling. He put the picture in a frame in his room. His teacher found the picture in the frame. He was sad when he saw it.

Appendicitis. The pain began to abate as she was driving home from work. Her husband pulled over to give her a ride home. She didn't recognize him but didn't want to look awkward. He took her to the hospital where he explained the situation. She was fine and was treated for appendicitis.

Money. Gina's mother offered her $5 to help her clean. Gina decided to accept the money. But she felt guilty for taking the money. She returned the money she got back. Now she had to clean the rest of her room again.

Genre Disagreement. I tried to avoid discussing politics with the girl. She insisted that I was too polite, and I remained angry. In the end, she broke up with me, and I was heartbroken. I felt sad that I had to abandon my crush. I realized that I had no choice but to avoid political discussions.
For a Five. Karen was eating at an Italian restaurant. She ordered a spaghetti dish. The bill came out to $5. Karen didn't want to tip the wait staff. Instead she just paid with her credit card.

Sardines. Nita loved eating her sardines. When they were at the beach they were even better. One day she couldn't get the taste of them out of her mouth. So she ordered some crackers instead. Now she's a fan of salty crackers instead.

Too Curious. Sam thought he could do tricks by touching his leg with his toe. He practiced hard and made his teacher laugh. At the next game, Sam showed off his new trick. The other boys were impressed and dared him to do it. Sam did and did, until the next game, when they made fun.

The School Fight. Jenny and May had been fighting all day. They finally realized it was best to call a truce. They went to the principal's office. They explained what happened and apologized. Now their fight never gets so heated.
Video Game. I have to take my niece to a video game convention. We went to a local convention on the other coast. She was happy to play the game. I played the online games. I won a few games.
Milkshakes. It was a hot day. Jim decided to drink a milkshake. Jim gulped it down. He didn't know how it tasted. He told the waitress about the milkshake.
Bad Haircut. Ike wanted a new haircut. His barber didn't understand why. He cut Ike's hair badly. It made Ike's hair look awful. Ike never returned to his barber for another haircut.

The New Airplane. The man looked at the weather and saw it would be a perfect day. He bought a plane and prepared to take off. The plane took off and landed in the man's backyard. It was amazing to see the house from high up in the sky. The man was very proud and happy to have his own plane.

Bruised Knees. Kate was going to the beach. She was carrying lots of water bottles. One was slightly damaged and she didn't know what to do. She tried to gently scrape it off. Unfortunately she got a lot of blood.

Heavy Belly. Tom always struggled with belly fat. After a lot of dieting he started to feel bad. It got so bad that he had to eat less and not eat at all. Eventually he was able to eat just enough to stay satisfied. After that he was fine with his weight and was proud.

The STained Glass. Tom was walking down the sidewalk. He walked past a store that had some beautiful windows. Tom's friend took a picture of the window. Tom felt disgusted with the picture. Tom yelled at his friend about the stain.

The pregnancy prank. Jessica was watching her son's soccer game. Suddenly he kicked a ball to her son. She was so angry she threw a bottle at him. Then, she cursed at him and told him to give her the ball. Luckily, he apologized and let her keep the ball.

Special Treat. The kids had been up late. They were all tired. Their mom told them to take a break. They gathered their things in the living room. They laid in the puddle and played until the sun came up.

A Ship Without Direction. Annie was on a cruise ship bound for New York City. The ship was so old and crowded it was difficult to find a seat. One day a man gave her a lift in the rear of the ship. The man explained the ship's directions and Annie followed them. She was able to find a seat in the rear of the ship.

Bad decision. I decided to eat at McDonald's yesterday. I really had a craving for some food. After about 30 minutes, I decided to eat some food. While eating the food, I got a terrible stomach ache. I was so upset that I threw up.
Unicorn. The little pony got up. He hopped and hopped. His mother laughed and picked him up. They were going to go to the barn for their first day. They had a lot of fun in that barn.
Egypt. My friend bought a new car last year. It was the same as my old one. My old car broke down last summer. I had to get it towed to the shop. I hope my friend likes his new car.

Office job. Kylie was a very busy woman. Her boss decided to give her an office job. Kylie hated having the boss's attention. She did her best to hide her anger. She ended up losing the job in a very public manner.

Wrong Number. Tim's mom sent him to pick up her groceries. When she got to the car, she noticed a package she thought was empty. Tim realized there was an old box he hadn't gotten and panicked. He took it to get looked at. Unfortunately, it was a gift and the wrong number was sent.

Summer. The girl was bored at summer camp. She kept wanting to see other kids. Her counselor suggested she try to go to the library. She was hesitant but decided it was worth a shot. The library wasn't the best place to be bored, but it was good.

Ants in the Keurig. Maggie was having a bad day. So she decided to pour some Keurig. As she sipped her coffee she noticed that the inside was still fresh. And there were several ant hills in the top. So she had to clean them all up.

New Pet Toys. Nathan was excited to get his new puppy some toys. His brother gave him the most expensive one. He was excited, but soon his puppy started whining. He yelled, tried to swat the toy away, but it got stuck. Nathan was sad that his puppy had destroyed his new toy.

Baby Girl. Alicia was finally having her first baby. She was so excited and nervous. She was going to have lots of family around her. She decided to just have a c-section. It was a close call but her baby was perfectly healthy.

Party. Last night the house was quite empty. I decided to go out. When I went out I saw a pretty girl in the crowd. I got her number and we exchanged phone numbers. We're going to see each other tonight!

Fear of Flight. The pilot felt scared of flying. He was scheduled to fly a big plane over a major city. The plane had a big window and he was afraid it would hit a building. The pilot was too nervous to approach the runway. He landed the plane safely and he felt more calm.

Expensive Chocolate. Joe's wife went to the store to buy chocolate for him. Joe decided to buy some chocolate. The price of chocolate was $9 a bar. Joe didn't mind the price and went to the cash register. The cashier said they were sold out of cocoa!

Forgetful Roll. Janet was trying to remember how to tie her shoelaces. She'd forgotten to do it yesterday. When she got to work, the shoelaces were dangling to much. She tied them together but that didn't work. After thinking about it, she had to throw them on the ground.

A Second Job. Sarah was really out of work. She looked in her car for work but found nothing. She decided to start babysitting instead. Her parents didn't like the job but they let her do it. At the end of the month she had saved up nearly half of what she needed.
kittens. Tommy loved kittens. He always wanted one. His parents decided to get him one. They brought him home. Tommy loved his new kitten.

Power Steering. My car was running fine when the steering wheel stopped. I looked under the seat and saw that the battery was dead. I tried to start it again but it would not start. The car was out of gas so I called a tow truck. The tow truck had my car towed to the junkyard.

Getting The Pointe. Bart loved playing baseball with his friends. He practiced with them everyday after school. He tried out for the team. He was very nervous about his try outs. When he got up to the plate he hit the ball with all his might!
Hot air balloon fire. Kelly was a hot air balloon pilot. Her latest balloon landed in a field. It had a fire going on. Kelly had to evacuate. She had to take her fire out with fire extinguisher.

The Perfect Steak. Ken bought a new filet mignon steak. He ate the first bite of it and loved it! Ken knew he had to cook the rest of the steak. He called the steakhouse and ordered some steaks. It took him ten hours to make the steak and it was great.

Trouble. Eve went out for a nice walk through the park. She got to a bridge and started crossing it. Suddenly, a group of teenagers tried to stop her. She fought them off and kept walking. She continued to cross the bridge.
New Lipstick. Cayla wanted a new lipstick. She couldn't afford much. Her sister offered to help. They tried on a few shades. The color didn't quite work.

Grouping. Kelsi was in a long line at the mall. All of the sudden a new girl walked in. The girl was standing right next to Kelsi. They quickly made eye contact and exchanged glances. They decided to start a group of their own.
Hot Summer Day. It was a hot summer day. Sam was standing outside in the hot sun. He started to feel uncomfortable. Sam looked in the mirror. He noticed that he had a sunburn on his face.

The Science Fair. Kia and her science teacher were competing in a science fair. She wanted to make ice cream, but she didn't have any. Then she thought of a great way to make ice cream. She got some yogurt and stirred it in a blender. Soon, her ice cream was delicious!

Etsy Business. Becky wanted to make some extra cash for her college. She wanted to create a business by making and selling homemade jewelry. She began by making bracelets but quickly found she did not sell well. Becky took a break and tried selling necklaces. Becky was happy to see she made some money but couldn't afford college.

New shirt. I was shopping for a new shirt. I saw a shirt that fit me very well. It was a large size, so I ordered it. The shirt was shipped by overnight delivery. When I got home, I was very pleased with the shirt.

Bad Traffic. Amy was sitting on the bench in front of her apartment building. She noticed a woman had her ear pressed against her window. A car came to a sudden stop and began to drive away. Amy was on her phone, waiting for the car to move. She waited and waited, but the car left without her.

Help paying. Dan had a lot of bills to pay. His wife told him to get a second job. So Dan put some of his bills on Mturk. Then, Dan worked full time on Mturk. Dan finally had enough money to pay all his bills!

Charles and the Rose. Charles had a rose bush. It was full of lovely roses. But one day, the roses were gone. Charles went out and found the rose bush. Now Charles is sad because his rose bush is gone.
Broken ipod. I went on vacation. I brought my iPod everywhere. One day it stopped working. I looked everywhere for it. It had a busted headphone jack.

Gas Money. My son is 18 months old. One evening his mom let him stay awake and play with his Nintendo. He had three different games and wanted to play one more. She said he could have one minute to use the remote. I had no time to sleep since I was trying to get him to play.

Shot Put. Dina wanted to be on the school's basketball team. She trained every day and tried out for the team. Her hard work paid off when she made the team. Her coach told her she should try out for the team. Dina tried out and made the team!

Ice cream. We went to get ice cream. The ice cream truck stopped right by our house. We ordered some chocolate cones. We paid with cash and drove home. When we got home we ordered some chocolate milk.

Stuck Kite. Joe loved to fly kites. He could make any shape and had fun doing it. One day he went to the park and landed the biggest one he could find. Then he went to the park with his kite. Joe couldn't believe how large his kite was.
Rosie. I saw Rosie at the hospital. She had a cut on her cheek. She was crying and had to sit by me. I told her I would take care of her. She ended up having a great time at home with me.

Miranda fights a cold. Miranda notices that she feels very sick and sluggish one day. Her husband asks her to go to the doctor so they can see a doctor. The doctor sees Miranda and tells her that she has a cold. The doctor gives her medicine to take to help her feel better. Miranda feels much better after taking her medicine.

The Movie. Rita decided to take her daughter to see a movie. She put her daughter in a car and drove there. The two women sat down to watch the movie. They did not like the movie, and wanted to see something else. They decided to watch a comedy instead.

Snowdrifts. The snow fell really hard in April. The roads were all covered in ice. There was a lot of melting snow. My friend and I decided to take a stroll through the streets. It was a good idea because the roads were covered in snow.
Rain. Tim went fishing. He caught many fish. Then the storm came. The sky turned dark red and rain poured on Tim. He had to go home to change.

Jack. Jack had always been good at sports. He was captain of his school's basketball team. When his team was losing by a lot, he got up on the court. He went right up to the net and shot. The ball went in and won the game for his team.

Mugry. I had a great time at Mugry last summer. I got a new car and a new roommate. I had a lot of fun at the casino. I had a great time that evening. I'm glad I went to Mugry, I couldn't go back home.

Bad Hike. Tom and his friends went on a hike. They hiked up a steep hill. Tom's friends were getting tired. They pulled Tom aside and asked him to keep going. Tom obliged and they all went on the hike in peace.

Rapper. Mike really enjoyed rap music. He began writing rap songs for a living. Mike performed his music at concerts every week. Mike began a record label that would give him millions of dollars. Mike finally had the fame and fortune he always wanted.

Getting a Haircut. I decided to get a haircut the other day. I went to the barbershop and picked out a good looking pair. When I got there I sat down and waited to be called to the chair. When I was called I went to get my haircut. I looked great and I decided to buy a few more pairs!

Favorite Game. When we were younger we used to always play Nintendo. We would get so mad that our parents would get upset. They would always yell at us to stop playing and go outside. I would hide under the bed and wait to play Nintendo. It was my favorite game because it made me go outside.
The free brownies. I was hungry. I decided to go to a candy store. I ended up eating a bunch of cookies. I paid for it and decided to leave. The cookie store didn't have brownies anymore.

War Times. The Army went to war with the South. The Army's division won the battle. The South wanted to keep the Army's division. The South did not keep the Army's division. The Army made the South pay the money it owed.

Orange Zest Water. We lived in Chinatown during the sixties. One day the city announced a ban on the import of orange zest. We had no choice but to buy orange zest bottled water. We drank the filtered water every day. One year my wife had kidney failure.
Lightbulb. Ivan's room was very dark. He wanted to turn on a light. But the room was dark. Ivan went online to order a lightbulb. He got the right bulb for his room.

The Decorations. Minnie had just been given a new home. She bought some new decorations for the house. Minnie's friend gave her some extra candy. Minnie put the extra candy on the table. Minnie's friend didn't want to come over after work.
Socks. I lost my socks. I put them in the washing machine. I went to get them out. They were dirty. I returned them to the dryer.

Sneak Attack. The kids tried to sneak into a neighbor's house. They got caught. They got hit by a large rock. The rocks had been thrown from the neighbor's garden. The kids ran home and their parents were worried.

Filling the Post. I wrote a report for my boss about my experience in management. I thought my boss would like to read the report. I went to the front desk to talk to the supervisor. He asked to read it. I turned it in and got the job done!

The Snowball Fight. One day, my family was sitting outside of our front yard. My brother had brought a snowball and placed it on the sidewalk. A large snowball then hit my father. We were shocked and covered in snow. After our dad took us inside, we got our snow suits on.

Clyde gets into a fight. Clyde is walking home from school. He sees a group of boys on the street. One boy challenges him to a fight. Clyde accepts the challenge. They fight and Clyde gets beaten badly.

The Vaccine. Shay was feeling very sick. She went to the doctor for a checkup. The doctor told her she had a very important vaccination. She had to go home that day. The next day, she felt much better.
The Rap. The boy liked to sing. He decided to be a rapper. He signed up for a rap battle. He practiced his routine. At the battle he got knocked out cold.

Lights. Bill put on his favorite pair of shorts. He walked down the road towards the store. He was so excited to get some new ones. He was walking to the store when a cop pulled him over. They caught Bill for the dangerous night he was in.

Boat Trip. The Lewis Family went on a boat trip. The kids all played on the boat. They swam around and found some sea shells. The Lewis Family had a great time on the boat trip. They made plans to go again soon.
Dan goes to jail. Dan is in his early thirties. He is arrested for shoplifting. He goes to jail. He loses his job. He gets out of jail but loses his friends.

Football. I love to play football, but my team isn't very good. We decided to study what it takes to win the championship. I practiced hard for a few days. When the big game came, I was ready. I won the game by a long shot.

Sprained Ankle. Tom was in a bad car accident. The accident left him with a broken ankle. Tom went to the doctor. The doctor gave him some pain meds. The meds helped Tom recover from his ankle injury.

The USS Hornet. The Hornet was one of the most advanced ships in the navy. She had a great reputation for fighting enemies on the battlefield. She fought her last battle as a captain when she was shot down. She was found and saved. She was never heard from again.

Vision Changes. Sally got a new boyfriend. She noticed that his vision was changing. She tried taking glasses to help him see. The glasses gave her headache. Sally decided to stop wearing the glasses.

Confession. I was drunk on a college campus with friends. I tried to sell marijuana to a friend of mine. I decided to tell my friend about it. The friend came to me, drunk and crying. We tried to talk, but we couldn't.
Lice. I thought my cat licked my hands. I called him Fluffy. Fluffy would not stop lapping me. I yelled at Fluffy. I told him he needs to get a lice pill.

concert. John saw an ad for an upcoming concert at a local bar. He went to the concert with his friend. While there John met a lot of friends. He had a great time at the concert. He was happy he went to the concert.

Career Opportunities. Dan's high school was in the city's financial crisis. The district was having trouble in hiring. Dan applied to be a guidance counselor. A school district hired him. Dan's guidance counselor position helped them to find a better source of revenue.

Gross teeth. Yesterday my girlfriend came home from the store. She noticed that she had really gross teeth. She thought she would need to brush them. Thankfully when she got home it was not as bad. Still she had to clean her teeth.
steak throw. Tina decided to throw a steak. It landed in the kitchen sink. Her husband tried to clean it up. He was too lazy to do it. He had to buy steak seasoning instead.
No Fish. Sandy didn't have any fish. She had asked her friend who has fish for a job. Her friend said he would give her one fish. He brought her some goldfish. She hated it when he brought them home.
Greens. Kate's apartment was really hot and humid. But there was no air conditioning. She decided to buy some fans. And it wasn't as hot as it used to be. She was glad she had a cool place to stay.
dress. Karen had a beautiful dress. She decided to wear it to the school dance. Unfortunately it was too short. She had to go to the hospital. Luckily she was able to go back to school.

Marriages. Tim and Jenny were in a long term relationship. They both wanted to get married. They decided to plan the wedding. They visited many places and picked out a nice location. The day before the wedding, the bride and groom exchanged vows.

Racoons for Dinner. The Smiths had a large farm. There were lots of raccoons at the farm. They put out poison bait for the raccoons. No raccoons showed up at the bait. The Smiths had to spend an extra two hundred dollars to clean the property.
Rattle and shake. Tina had a lot of dog hair. She was getting rattle and shake. Tina didn't know what to do. So she went to the store to buy a roll. So Tina went home and was happy.

A Dog's Life. I found a dog on the street. He had no collar, and looked hurt. I took him to the vet to make sure he was ok. He had a broken leg and had to be rushed to the hospital. I named him Dottie and made him a part of our family.

Octopi. I wanted some octopus for dinner. I had to boil the water to make it tasty. Then I had to peel the tentacles. I put them on paper towels and then put them in the fridge. I finally tasted the octopus.

The Car Mechanic. A car came in to be repaired at Bob's mechanic's shop. Bob was a very careful mechanic and it was his turn to start it. He opened the trunk and found a very strange box. Inside was a car key and an expensive watch. He used the watch to start the car and it started up.

Jake's Dog Chases A Squirrel. Jake's dog was always looking for something to chase. Last Saturday he left his dog at the house while he went to work. His dog ran up the stairs, down the hall, and into the wall. Jake's dog chased him out of the house. Jake never went back to that house again.

The Hatching. It was Easter day and Lisa's mother was trying to find eggs for her. Her mother was going in and out of the barn. Then a farmer handed her an egg and told her she'd find more. Lisa was so excited that she forgot about the eggs. Her mother was confused about the eggs.

Computer Day. Tim hated his computer. He knew his friends would ask him about it. However they never asked him about it. Eventually Tim went to his friend's house. There, his friends all had the same problem as him.
Example Essay. Beth wrote a example essay. She wrote about the importance of kindness. The teacher read it aloud from memory. She explained that her example was good. Beth was happy with the grade.
Balding. Kim was looking through her hair. It was very long. She wanted a short haircut. She decided to do something about it. She went to a salon and got her hair cut.

Weight Troubles. Mary was trying to lose some weight. One day she went on a diet to be more active. Mary ate a lot of fatty foods while on her diet. Mary gained 15 pounds from the fatty foods she ate. Mary realized she needed to watch her fat intake better.

Birds. Cecil loved to read books. She especially loved bird books, and wanted to learn more. After reading several bird books, she bought a book about them. Cecil got books on bird watching and learned about their nests. She enjoyed spending time watching birds on her own!
Lunch time. Today was lunch time at my house. It was almost time for me to go to work. I decided I would go to the gym instead. I got to work and then ate my lunch. It was such a great workout.
Moon Shine. Toby was walking through the park. Suddenly he heard a strange noise and looked up. A big yellow ball was flying down at him! Toby ran for cover. He had seen a big meteor shower!

Silent Movie. Jake went to the movies with his girlfriend. He loved the quiet experience. Unfortunately she had to stay in the lobby all night. Jake didn't want to let her go and he got a chair. The girls had a great time and Jake decided to make it a weekly event.

Designing Women. Abby had a new job at an ice cream parlor. Her job was to design a new ice cream flavor. One day, Abby noticed that the flavor was missing some key ingredients. Abby went to her boss and told him that she was getting fired. Abby's boss was very upset, and fired Abby.

Neti Pot. Linda bought a new neti pot for her boyfriend. She made him the same dish he always ate. He thought she got away with something. She asked her boyfriend to taste the dish. He said it was good.

The Courthouse. Lara had always loved seeing the courthouse. She was so excited to see her father's case. It was her first time there and she loved it. As she was leaving she saw a tear roll down her cheek. She realized her dad had been in trouble and cried too.

Don't Pull Me. Tina's mom told her not to pull on the backboard. Tina decided to try and pull it. However, she got caught. Her mom had to put tape on her forehead to stop her. She learned not to pull her toys.

Mean girl. Natalie was mean to everyone. She thought she was the coolest person in the whole class. She would always make fun of others. One day, Natalie's teacher made her apologize to everyone. She was sad she couldn't make her teacher happy.

Shopping Dilemma. My mother and I were looking through the jewelry section. My favorite was a bracelet with a diamond clasp. I bought it but my mom told me it was not a diamond. I tried to buy it anyway. My mom told me that's not a diamond.

Healthy Sleep. I had trouble falling asleep last night. My mom told me to go to sleep on the couch. I rolled over to the couch and slept for about an hour. My mom then told me to go back to bed. I rolled back over and fell asleep instantly.

New Car. Drew bought a new car on Tuesday. He loved his old car but the price tag was too much. Drew decided to trade the car for a sports car. Drew met his new partner for the first time in person. They became best friends.

Runaway dumpster. We live in a small apartment. One day there was a big fire in our building. We had to evacuate and had to take our garbage out. The dumpsters did not look full. We had to pay a lot of money for it.

Francisco's Feeling Sick. Francisco is feeling sick and not feeling good. He goes to the doctor to get an examination done. He learns he has food poisoning. Francisco quits his job to go home and rest. Francisco feels much better after a week.

Too Long, Didn't Read. I asked a question in a forum I frequent. Somehow, the person who answered my question got suspended. I had been doing research into internet communities a few days. My curiosity drove me to read about the situation. The answer I learned was that he had been accused of sexual harassment.

Baby Changes. My son's name is Isaiah, but people call him Burt. My wife calls him By the time he was born, he was not a boy. One day his doctor took him to the hospital. He was not a boy, but he was a boy baby. My son has three sisters.
Truck. Sue loved her truck. She was going out to a local lake. Sue got a flat tire and it wouldn't start. She called the tow truck and asked to stay. She was relieved to get the flat fixed!
Foot the Bill. Bill was a homeless man. Bill wanted to buy a computer. Bill went to a store and looked around. Bill looked in the store window. Bill found the perfect computer and bought it.
basement. We lived in a run down house. It was filled with trash. Our parents got tired of the trash in the basement. So we had to buy a garbage disposal. Now we have a garage full of trash.
Couch and Chair. I was sitting on the couch. I felt my legs get tired. I decided to get a new comforter. I bought a new comforter. I can now sleep.

The Loft. Amy needed a place to put her books. She decided on a huge loft. She bought some antiques and nailed them together. When the books were on top, they looked amazing! The shelves in the loft were beautiful!

Electric Shock. I was taking a test on the bench. It was very difficult to do since the floor was slippery. However, I kept up and completed the test. I felt an electrical shock when I turned on the electricity. I had to go to the hospital to receive treatment.
Lost Hat. Sam was at the park. He couldn't find his hat. He looked everywhere. His friends pointed it out. He looked and looked but couldn't find it.

Drunk Driver. A drunk driver stopped at a stop sign. The drunk driver hit the car next to him. The driver fled the scene of the accident. The police asked the driver for identification. The driver handed over his driver's license.

It Leaked!. Ralph and his wife were out to dinner one night. They were walking to the door when Ralph tripped on a bottle of wine. The wine went everywhere, soaking Ralph's white shirt. Ralph had to buy a new white shirt for the next game. He was able to play the game with a dirty shirt.

nurse. Dottie was a nurse. She was going to be in the operating room. She was nervous and didn't know how she was going to do. The nurse came in and explained the procedure. Dottie felt less nervous after seeing the procedure.

Johnny Goes Swimming. Johnny had always wanted to learn how to swim. He decided to ask his friends to join him at the pool. They all got into their bathing suits and Johnny swam. It was difficult for Johnny to keep up but he kept trying. Johnny finally made it to the edge of the pool and jumped in.

The Nightmare. A little girl was laying in her bed. Her mother tried to take her to her bedroom. However, the girl couldn't go. She was frightened and wouldn't go. Her mother finally got a clown from the closet.

Sweet and Spicy. When I went to a sushi restaurant, I wanted to eat more food than I could eat. I ordered several rolls with both sweet and spicy ingredients. When I received my food, I found out the rolls contained several different ingredients. I tried to decide what I wanted to eat next. I decided to order some food from the other restaurant.

New Phone. The family decided they would get a new phone. They picked out the newest one. It was pink and had big buttons. They all loved their new phone. They decided to get a lot more expensive one.
Henry's Shower. Henry was very hot. He decided to take a shower. The hot water didn't help him much. He ran to the bathroom and filled a bottle of water. He took the hot water and drank it.

Last Minute. Bobby asked his parents for a hover scooter. They told him he would have to wait a few more days. He waited eagerly for the day to come, but no one showed. His parents told him they had packed the scooter. His joy faded quickly when he realized it was packed in bags.

Mike Olsen. Mike Olsen liked to play football. He had a huge rivalry with a local rival team. On Friday the game was very close. It all came down to the final play. Mike Olsen's team won and they were named the champs!
Ice Skating Gone Wrong. Jody was skating with her friends. They were skating in a rink. Jody slipped and fell. Her friends helped her up. Jody had to pay a small fee to have her skates fixed.

Familiar Face. Tim was at the library. And he saw someone with an unfamiliar name. He couldn't remember who he was looking at. And he was late for work. He decided to leave early to avoid that problem.

A Mess in the Kitchen. Sara was trying to cook dinner. She was making mashed potatoes. Suddenly, a piece of cheese fell on her stove top. It caught the bottom of the pot and went everywhere. Sara cleaned up the cheese, but she didn't know how to cook another one.

The dog parade. Kara's kids were playing outside. They were playing on the sidewalk. Suddenly, there was a parade of dogs. Kara chased them all around, chasing them to the end of the street. Finally, they made it to the end of the street!

Bat Mitzvah. Sally had never participated in a Bat Mitzvah. She felt it was a waste of time to learn the details. She decided to attend one this summer. She was surprised to find that there was a lot of work involved. When she arrived at the Jewish school, she felt proud to be Jewish.
Tea tasting. Diana was at a tea tasting. She picked up several different teas. As a result, she felt sick. She eventually passed out. She decided not to go any further.

Baby Boom. After the birth of their second child, Amy and Joe were more and more excited. After a lot of hard work, they opened their very own nursery. The nursery became an overnight success, with sales in the thousands. Soon, they were so busy that they could hardly sleep. In just a few weeks they had everything they needed to get a second baby.

A Little Elbow Grease. I used to pour paint into a small spray can. I dropped the can into a bucket to pour on the sidewalk. The paint wouldn't spray out the lid. I had to take the lid off the bucket and pour it. The paint splashed out everywhere.

Eclipse. Natalie and her sister decided to see the solar eclipse. They got their camping chairs and blankets ready. Then, they laid out their tents to sleep in. Finally, the sun came out and they watched the eclipse. It was a great sight to behold!
Birthday Pie. I woke up this morning to get my birthday pie. I looked at my kitchen and there it was. There was a box of chocolate pie. I ate the chocolate pie first. It was delicious.
Cat and Mouse. My cat is a male cat. My friend and I got a cat mouse in our house. We tried to take it out but it scratched our dog. It scratched our cat too. We gave up trying to keep it out.

Winter Vacation. I went to see my friend and her family at her mother's. We took a week long vacation to the north. We went to Cape Cod and visited the Cape. We took a lot of pictures at the water. We had a great time.

Problems. A man got out of work early for the weekend. He left work early on Sunday. He was about to go out drinking on Friday night. He got back to work an hour late. His boss told him that he has to work more on his night shift.

Bobert. Bobert and his friend walked to the mall to meet friends. As they were walking to the mall Bobert got really nervous. He saw an old lady being followed by a man in a mask. Bobert and his friend turned around to face the man in the mask. They ran as quickly as they could to keep from being caught.
Spanish test. Alex had to take a Spanish test. He was scared that he would fail. His mom bought him a tutor to help him. Alex practiced the test for weeks. When the test came he felt he made a pass.
Scaffolding. The house was being torn down. The kids asked to stay in it. The parents said no. They offered to help out. They had to accept.
The older man. Tim and his wife had a son. His wife wasn't happy. She thought the child was a burden. Tim talked to his boss. His boss told Tim the kid was a great asset to the family.

Bad dream. The other night I dreamed about my ex-boyfriend. He was trying to get into my bed at night. I woke up in a panic. My ex-boyfriend was in my bed. He got out of bed and tried to get into my bed.

Prisons not all bad. When I was younger I got in a lot of trouble. I went to prison at age 16 for burglary and theft. I didn't want to go to prison so I pretended to get robbed. I put on the uniforms and wore the handcuffs to court. The judge laughed and told me I got robbed and I did not need to go to jail.
knock. Anna heard someone calling her name. She ran to her dad and screamed. Her dad quickly realized it wasn't her voice. He apologized and told her to go away. Anna got up, and walked home.

Christmas Vacation. Bev and Tim are traveling through Europe on a ski trip. During their vacation they run into many family and friends. When they arrive home they all help put up lights. After dinner they spend time in the house making cookies and presents. It's a fun, yet exhausting experience that they will not forget.

Sandwiches. The family sat down to eat lunch. They were all hungry and wanted a hot meal. The mom was going to get a hot dog. They all were excited when the mom came back with a sandwich. They all sat down to eat the sandwich together.
Meat. I wanted to eat meat for dinner. I bought a bag of ground beef. I had trouble getting it home from the store. I had to drive down to the store to buy it. Now I can eat meat for dinner.
The Soda Can. One day I was shopping at the grocery store. I noticed a small, ugly can of soda. I decided to steal it. I climbed inside and went shopping. When I got home, I put the can in my pocket.
Water. John went to the store. He needed to buy water. When he got home he put the water in the car. John drove to his favorite restaurant. John ordered a drink from the bar and enjoyed the ride.

Night Ruined. My mom called me from the bathroom. Since I was sleeping, I couldn't answer. When she finished, she told me that my hair looks good. Since it was my turn, I ended up yelling at her. I also told her that she can't come back inside.
Painful Frisbee. The boys were on a team. They were playing Frisbee outside. The boy threw the Frisbee too hard. It flew through the air. It landed on the driveway.

Seller. Dan and his wife were at a garage sale. Dan saw a vintage TV and brought it to the car sale. Dan's wife, having seen the TV, offered to buy the TV. Dan offered to take the TV home as a gift, which his wife accepted. Dan and his wife became best friends, and their home is filled with memories.
Coffee Place. I bought a coffee at the store. I left it in the car. I went back to get it. The driver accidentally hit the gas instead. I apologized to the worker.

Blues. Jack and Joe were a couple. Joe got married for the third time. He had been married to Jack for 20 Years. Jack had finally found someone to love. After his third marriage, Jack and Joe had 3 kids together.

Hypocrite?. Tina liked working with people. She was in a relationship with a man she met online. But after months of dating, she wasn't satisfied with him. He didn't treat her like a person. Tina decided to break up with him.

Date Ditch. Drew had been meeting women at the bar every night. One day he met a new girl named Jenny. The two talked for an hour before Drew asked her to dinner. Jenny told Drew she only wanted to go out on dates. Drew drove to a nearby restaurant where Jenny was working.
Soldier. Ava was a girl scout. She was sent on a mission. They found a lot of evil stuff. They turned it around and saved the day! Ava was a great soldier.

Applying for a Job. My friend asked if I would apply for a job as an instructor. He had no experience in medicine, and I was scared. I went to the company, filled out an application and mailed it. The next day I received an email from the company. They offered me the job as an instructor!

The New Fish. Sasha and her sister went to the pet store. They were curious about all of the different fish. Sasha found the smallest fish and picked it up. Her sister wanted to play but they didn't want to hurt the fish. They decided to give the new fish a good home.
Service Dog. The Jones family always had service dogs. They all wanted to start their own. The Jones family went to the shelter. They adopted a dog. Now the family has a service dog.
Pie. Anna made a pie. She dropped the pie in the sink. She tried to rinse it out with cold water. But it wouldn't come up! Finally Anna decided to let it sit in the sink while she cleaned it.

Bow and Arrow. Randy was practicing shooting arrows. He went to the forest and got an axe. He swung the ax at the targets. He was great at the arrows he shot. He won a contest and became a professional archer.
Delicious ice cream. Yesterday I went out to get ice cream. I found the best ice cream place in town. I waited in line. I tried a sample. It was the best ice cream ever.
Noise. Our friend's son came over with some music. His wife said they needed to put it away. I helped him put it away. He made a mess. His wife said she would not sleep if the music kept up.

Worthless. A person bought a computer. It was cheap and made for a beginner. He installed many games and tried to learn programming. The game became very complex and he became bored. He stopped playing after an hour and decided he wasn't going to learn.
The melted balloon. It was a hot day outside. It had been raining all day. There was some ice on the ground. Suddenly, a balloon popped. It landed in the grass, melting instantly.

The Renovation. The woman had worked hard on her house for over 30 Years. She had it repainted to a new look. It took months but she was finally proud of the work. Her family came over to see the beautiful house. They all commented on the beautiful work ethic.

Special Assessment. Joey came to class feeling like his report card was in order. When it came time to turn in the report card, Joey was worried. He thought he had made a mistake with all of the extra grades. Joey showed up with the report card anyway and turned it in. Everyone told him that he did great on the report card.
Matt's Keys. Matt found his keys on his floor. He found them in his pockets. Matt opened the door to his house. Matt was unable to find his keys. He searched for an hour before he finally found them.
Cell Phones. Bill was talking on the phone with his wife. His wife started getting irritated. She told Bill to put the phone down. He ignored her and kept talking. Finally Bill's wife hung up on him.

ET. Tom's mom had an argument with his dad. Tom had to go to the ER and his mom said he was okay. When Tom came home his dad asked if he was ok. Tom told him he had a bad hangover. He had to stay in the ER for days until his hangover was better.

Bullies get served. Tim was the star basketball player on his team. The team was very good and everyone was very popular. The local news had a story on Tim and all of the drama. Tim's coach took him out of the game for being disrespectful. Tim learned his lesson about being a bully.

Grandmother's Cookies. Lilly was visiting her grandma's house. She came to the house for the first time. Her grandma made cookies to share with the family. Lilly ate two of them while they waited. They all loved the cookies.

Regret. John was invited to a family reunion by a lot of his friends. But he had no family nearby to go with. So, John decided to go alone. He went to the reunion but had a lot of fun. So, John never regret not going with his friends.

One dollar. I went to the gas station to fill up my car. I looked around but I couldn't find my dollar. After a while I realized I didn't have it in my car. I had to go back to the gas station. Luckily I found a dollar on the ground outside.

Tim's Band. Tim's friends wanted to play guitar. Tim didn't know how to play guitar. Tim asked his friends to play with him. Tim's friends were not very good. Tim's friends never played with him again.

New Minivan. Bill just bought a new minivan. He brought it to work with him. Bill's co workers did not like it. They told Bill that he needs to move somewhere else. Bill agreed to move somewhere else and he became happier.

Shark. One day while swimming at the beach a shark attacked me. I was pulled underwater and held by a life guard. He called the coast guard and a boat came to save me. They put me in a boat and we drove back to shore. I was never seen again.

Germany. Kate was very excited for her trip to Germany. She had planned the whole trip with ease. She had just booked a ticket for the long trip. She had never been there before. But to her surprise she actually loved it.

Armando burns the tacos. Armando is the head chef of a Mexican restaurant. He decides to make a big batch of tacos. He gets some of the ingredients ready. He puts everything in the pan and begins to cook. Finally he burns the tacos and everyone is happy.
The Bank Teller. John went to the bank. He wanted to deposit a check. John asked the teller for the check he wanted. The teller told him no. John left the bank with no check.

Scary Customer. Bill was a very loud man. He never paid attention to anyone or anything. He would constantly yell or curse. Bill was told by the manager of the store to quiet down or get fired. Bill decided to just ignore him as the store owner had already given him a warning.
The Termination. The man called customer service. They told him to get rid of the phone. He kept making calls. They told him to disconnect it. He refused and they told him to disconnect it.
sweet tooth. Tina had a sweet tooth. Tina decided to eat a few slices of cake. Tina was horrified when she saw her teeth were stained. Tina went to the dentist. Tina got braces.

Short Cut to BC. Joe was looking for a shortcut to his favorite college. Joe wanted to go to the gym but it was a short walk. He decided to walk to the BC dorms instead. Joe was not happy to go to the BC gym. Joe ended up finding a shorter way to the gym.

Window Seat. Gina's parents were at a restaurant. She wanted to sit in the living room. Her mother wanted her to stay at the car. Gina sat in the living room on the swing. Her mother laughed when she sat on the swing.

Bunny's Toes. The bunny hopped up onto the bed and hopped down to the floor. He looked up at his furry feet and hopped onto them. He pulled his feet under him and sat down on the floor. He jumped onto the bunny's head and it gave a funny squeak. He hopped on its neck, and the bunny laughed at him.

Showing Online. Tom was feeling lonely. He wanted to find something to do. He decided to get on social media. Tom started getting likes and attention online. He then went on a date with a nice girl to make up for it.

Hurricane. My family and I moved to Texas during the summer. Our friend asked if we wanted to see a hurricane. After he left, a large hurricane formed in the sky. My parents and I got soaked. The hurricane was intense and left a lot of damage.

Driving. Drew is a student studying for his driver's test. He wants to impress his parents to get his license. He goes on his first drive after passing the test. His parents were impressed by how well he drove. They give him their driver's license.
Way too hot. It was hot outside. Kelly's mom had a good idea. They went outside and had a cup of hot chocolate. It was so delicious. Kelly loved it.

Switch Plates. Tom bought new dishwasher. He found out his dishwasher didn't have switch plates. Tom drove to the store to buy some plates. He had to order more than he needed. Tom switched the dishes at home with the plates.

Paint Bar. It was a hot and sticky summer day. I painted the back yard with yellow paint. There were lots of insects in the yard. I sprayed insect spray all over the yard. After the day was over, the yard was clear.
Big Waves. We decided to go surfing in Hawaii. While we were surfing a big wave hit. We were all pushed back into the surf. Luckily, the wave dropped us safely. It was fun but we had to swim out.

Baseball cards. Jim needed to buy some baseball cards. He went to the store to buy a few. He found some he liked. He put them in his wallet and went home. After he got home, he played a game with his friends.

Cat Rescue. Meredith was walking on the sidewalk. Suddenly, she tripped over a trash can. She fell on top of a kitten. Meredith's cat ran up and licked her face. Meredith was so relieved and grateful!
Cleaner. Tom had an old fridge. Tom did not know how to clean it. One day his friends offered to help him. Tom had never cleaned one before. Tom did very well cleaning the fridge.

abusive. Sasha was always fighting. She got into fights with her parents. Her mom started to get tired of her fighting. She told her that they were out of time. Sasha learned that fighting was bad for her.

Cooking. Lori wanted to make food for her family. She decided to go to the store to buy the ingredients. She bought all the ingredients and followed the recipe. When she was done she cooked her meal. It was delicious and her family enjoyed it.
Roger the Dog. Roger's owner died last year. Roger and his owner were both sad. Roger wanted a new dog. Roger's owner surprised him with a puppy. Roger was so happy he cried.

Sally Likes Pie. Sally really wanted to learn how to bake. She asked her mother to teach her how to bake. Her mother showed her how to make a delicious pie. Her mother showed Sally how to bake a pie to the family. Sally was happy that she learned how to bake.

Second Date. Jake had just had a terrible first date with a girl he met at a bar. Jake knew he was in trouble and decided to ask for a second. Jake talked to the girl on the phone for three hours that night. The girl called him three days after the first date to say she liked him. Jake decided to ask her out on a third date.
umbrella. I bought an umbrella for a wedding. But the weather was terrible! I had to walk across the street. But when I put the umbrella on, it felt great! I went home with a very nice umbrella.

Accident. Ben got into a bad car accident last week. His friend was also in a bad accident. Ben felt very guilty when he drove his friend to the hospital. Ben promised to keep his promises. They made a full recovery together.

Track. We had to go to the track one afternoon. The track was very crowded with people. It was a long day so we were exhausted. We tried to find our way back home. Eventually we figured out the next way home.
garden. The man planted some seeds. He worked for a few weeks. The seeds grew. They grew up into a garden. He sold it to a farmer.

Weekends. Briana loved going to the beach. Her favorite thing to do was lay on the sand. One day she decided to get out of the sand. She went to the shore, and felt the sand was too rough. So she decided to stay on the beach and sleep in the sand.

The forgotten cereal. It was a cold day outside. Sara went to put her cereal in the car. When she walked back outside she realized she forgot something. She went back inside and put the cereal in the car. She had to drive the rest of the way.

The Bar. I have never been to a bar. One day my friend invited me to go with him. When we went there, we had a great time. He asked me for advice on how to do a good job. I told him to never be too hard on himself.

Triumphant Return. Abe wanted to play baseball, but he was too small to play. He thought he would never be able to catch or throw a ball. Then his dad gave him a set of ball and a baseball glove. Abe started practicing at home, and soon he was catching and throwing. Now he's one of the top players on his baseball team.

Delivery. Ava was supposed to deliver a package to the office, but she forgot. She looked everywhere and in every direction. Suddenly she saw her little dog barking excitedly. He had found the package! She hurried to tell her boss the happy news.

Repaired Laptop. Tom bought a laptop online. The website stated it would be sent to him within 30 minutes. When he received his laptop it had a small crack on the bottom. He contacted support. They fixed it within the hour.

Flat Tires. Tim bought a new car. He didn't realize how fast it would go. His new car was going up and down the freeway in no time. Tim's tires were always flat when he drove it. Tim got very angry and sued the car dealership.
Free Pizza. I got my paycheck and went to the bank. I asked for money to buy pizza. They told me I couldn't get any money unless I paid my rent. I paid my rent. I got my money and got pizza.

Easter Bunny. Anna bought a gold-colored Easter bunny for her son for Easter. He was so excited about the Easter bunny. On Easter, the boys ran around the yard in the bunny suit. They jumped and laughed all day. Anna's son thought he was the coolest Easter bunny ever.
