Henry. Henry wanted to play football. His dad said he would take him out on Saturdays. On Saturday, Henry played football with his friends. He hit his head on a car door and had a concussion. His dad said he will take Henry out for more fun games next week.

Going to the Mall. Katelyn and her parents went shopping. Katelyn's aunt was working and she got to go to the mall. Her aunt let her take a nap in the car. When her aunt came out, she said she was too tired. She took a nap at home instead.
Roll Over. Drew fell on his face. His face rolled onto the ground. He began crying and shaking. He felt better after he got up. The doctor cleaned up the blood.

Ben's First Time at the Beach. Ben went to the beach with his friends. They played in the sand. After playing, they laid on the beach. Ben felt very relaxed by the end of the day. He had a fun time at the beach with his friends.
Cane Tips. Bob had just bought a cane to replace his broken one. He was very proud of his cane. It was a nice looking cane. He could not find any laces anywhere. Bob's cane did not work anymore.

Hot Air Balloon. I was driving down the road one day. I noticed a hot air balloon in the sky. It was so bright it hurt my eyes. I decided I should not be afraid of hot air balloons. I decided to always be safe with them.
The first guitar. Kelly got a guitar for her birthday. She was very excited about it. When she got it, she was shocked. The guitar was really loud. Kelly decided to tone it down.

Bonus Round. The last two days of work we had to do were bonus rounds. My boss told me it was okay since it was just the last few. On the first bonus round we did a few more interviews. On the second round we did a bunch more interviews. The third round we did a final batch and it was more stressful.
Dead Battery. Tom was doing a test on his phone. It was in an airplane. Tom was trying to get out of the plane. He dropped it by accident. His battery died.

Goofing around. Amber was bored and wanted to goof around. She got some toys out of the garage. She tried to use them in the house but they broke. She went to the garage and got more toys. She went back outside and started goofing around.

Jarvis Takes a Nap. Jarvis decided to take a nap. He drifted off to sleep. The next morning he woke up and felt very tired. Jarvis tried to fall back asleep. He fell asleep again, but he fell fast asleep.
Playing in the Bathroom. Jody's mom told her to clean the bathroom. Jody didn't want to. She decided to play in the bath. She climbed into the bathtub. When she was done, her mom scolded her.

Harassment. My coworker Jenny once sat on me. I wasn't sure why she wasn't sitting with her. I thought she was a co-worker. Later, we found out it was because she was gay. She's no longer with me because she had a boyfriend there.

In the store. Allison went to the store for a new toy. She found a toy that looked like her favorite. When she got home, she started to play with it. Allison ended up losing the toy. She realized she shouldn't play with toys at the store.

Pool Party. Diana decided to throw a party. She gathered up her friends and invited them over. At the party, everyone brought in several food and drinks. After the party, everyone got together and played pool. Everyone enjoyed the party and left satisfied with it.

Birthday Girl. Tommy was the youngest of ten children. He had a very big birthday coming up. His parents bought him his present and made him a big wish. They also sent him a lovely card and said that they were happy to be his parents. The gift made him really happy and his birthday was wonderful.

Old Pipes. One day Tim decided to fix up his old water pipes. He went online and found some cheap pipes. Tim used the cheap pipes to start a garden in his yard. The garden blossomed into a large, healthy garden. Tim's neighbors were very happy with his work ethic.

Sound off. We have an antique tv in our house. Our grandson, Jim, found it in a garage sale. He brought it back to our house. He turned it on and the television blared some music. Jim was disappointed, but satisfied with the sound.

Steve's Tattoo. Steve wanted a new tattoo. He decided to get one on his back. Steve went to the tattoo parlor to get his tattoo. The tattoo parlor told him the tattoo would take weeks to make. Steve ended up having his tattoo removed the next day.

Ant Bites. Gina's parents weren't allowed to play in the yard. Gina was playing with ants when they started biting her. The ants started biting her and she began to cry. She decided to take them outside to play in peace. Gina's parents were angry they had to clean the mess but happy Gina cleaned it up.

Blank mind. Rita was feeling extremely anxious. She kept on thinking about her grandpa. She kept worrying about him. But Rita soon became tired and had a headache. She realized she was too busy thinking about her grandpa.

Make Up. Anna was a model student. But she was not allowed to wear makeup. She went to school with perfect makeup. But she was accused of dressing up in a man's dress. Anna vowed never to wear makeup again.

Bubbles. One day, my mom told us to make bubbles for her birthday. We went to the store to get them. Then we made a bunch of the items. My mom liked the bubbles she made. She was happy she got bubbles for her birthday.

New Doll. Cora was a young girl who wanted a new doll. Her mother told her it was too expensive. However, Cora's father saved up the money for the doll. The doll arrived at the local toy store. Cora was very excited to finally have a new doll.
The broken ice machine. The ice machine was broken. Sam had just brought it home. He put it away in the garage. Sam went to get it. It had broken into three pieces.

The New Car. Sam and his wife wanted a new car. They went to the car dealership. They looked at all the models and styles. Sam finally decided on a sports car. They bought the sports car they wanted and loved it.

Fire Drill. I went to the park to do some jumping jacks. As soon as the jacks started to land I felt my chest expand. As soon as I landed on my chest it felt like I was in heaven. I felt like I was going to explode. It was an amazing feeling.

Learning to Surf. It was Kelly's first trip to the beach. She was scared but excited. As soon as she stepped off the sand she felt like surfing. She immediately caught a fish and watched it swim. Now Kelly could not wait to go back.

Museum. My wife is visiting Boston this weekend. She took me to the New England Aquarium. She was trying to do a good deed, but she wanted to go on an exhibit. I offered to pay her, as I think it is a good cause. She got her money and I left with her a nice souvenir.

Spilled wine on table. Lisa was dining at a restaurant. She was eating a big meal. She poured a glass of wine and took a sip. She spilled the wine on the table. Her family had to help her clean up the spilled wine.

Selena. Selena was born a healthy baby. One day her parents took her to the doctor. He said that she needed a special bone marrow donor. They were really worried about her not knowing if she'd get the donor. But luckily, Selena had a matching kidney donor, and she was fine!

The Birds. Aya was walking in the woods one day. Suddenly she heard a loud noise. A swarm of ravens was coming towards her! She ran through the woods trying to escape them. Luckily, they didn't seem to notice her and she barely made it home.
A Broken Mug. Jill was drinking a glass of milk. It spilled all over her mug. It had a big hole in it. She went to the store and bought a new one. Jill was able to drink it without ruining it.

Gym Rats. We were always fascinated by the rat races at the circus. We would watch them take off and run fast. Sometimes they would drop and roll and get injured. The rats often had their ears pricked to prevent injury. It was always a great time watching these funny races.
Food fight. We had a birthday party last night. I invited all my friends and they were not happy. They decided to start a food fight. Everyone got a hotdog for their food. It was not fun for them.
Flour. Tommy bought flour from the store. He tried to mix it together. He had too much flour. Tommy realized he needed to buy more flour. He bought more flour.

Daddy. Tom wanted a new playhouse for his new baby brother. He asked his mother to build him one. After the baby was born, he got really sick and died. Tom's mom told him that she couldn't build him one. Tom's brother ended up with a new playhouse.

Pamper trouble. Karen wanted to get a puppy. She looked in the paper for places to buy one. Karen saw one ad that was for a pamper in the paper. She went to the pet store to look at it. She ended up buying a pamper.

Cat with no Meow. Cathy saw a cat running across the street. She wondered if it had kittens. She decided to bring the cat to her home. When she got home, she named the cat Marley. Cathy realized that she had named a cat that meant something bad.
The New Couch. I saw a cute couch at the thrift store. It was so soft and leathery! It was pink with gold highlights. I brought it home and got it painted. It looks beautiful now.
New Car. The man looked at the car. He loved it. He decided to buy it. He called for financing. The dealer helped him buy the car.

Online Rant. Tom was a young internet nerd. He posted rants on many different websites. He insulted women and people with mental disabilities. He got a lot of attention online. He was eventually banned from reddit.

Dirty Carpet. Sam needed to clean his bedroom. He went to the store to buy carpet cleaning supplies. He drove home and began to clean his bedroom. Sam began by wiping down all of the furniture and then mopping. After that Sam put on a towel to finish the job.

Morning Jog. Tim didn't get much exercise. He was always tired and wanted to be fit. He decided to try a more strenuous exercise. He started jogging for 30 minutes at a time. After that, Tim never felt tired or weak.

The Animal Report. Gina's mom asked Gina to watch the news for her. It was an animal report showing animals in the neighborhood. She found it hilarious. She laughed out loud. It was a perfect way to pass the time in the day.

Loose Tooth. Jake went to the dentist to get some x-rays. The dentist wanted to see what had been bothering his gums. He pulled out his loose tooth. He was horrified that he'd just broken it! Jake was not amused by his joke.

Scholarship. Beth was determined to become an advocate for the arts. She had attended a local college and had a stellar job. Her husband, an artist, was distraught over losing his scholarship. Beth had to find new work but knew she could not do that alone. So, Beth began to pursue a part-time job as an artist.

Sofa Cover. Lilly's mom's new apartment had a beautiful balcony. Sofas were the life of the apartment. Lilly had always wanted to live in such a beautiful place. Her parents got a job selling the apartments. Lilly's dream of owning a condo came true.

No more rules!. Bill got home after a long day of work. He noticed a huge mess in his house. He went to the bathroom to clean it up. He realized he left a sticky note in the bathroom. Bill immediately had the police come to arrest him.

Buying a new computer. Logan was trying to buy a new computer. He went to the electronics store and looked at all of the options. He noticed that most computers were on the expensive side. He thought about buying a high end desktop instead. Logan purchased the high end desktop.

Balding Head. I went to the store to buy a new hat. I found one that had large black stripes down the brim. I loved the way that it looked on my head. When I was wearing it I felt like my face was covered in stripes. But I realized it looked like a bald head.

First Job. Tyson was unemployed. He applied at a soup kitchen. When he arrived, he found that it was very crowded. Tyson was embarrassed and did not want to speak to the worker. The worker became friendly and they had a conversation.

Flowers. Cathy got flowers from her mother's garden. She carried them home to put in her porch. She looked at them every day. At first, she was not sure what they were. They were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen!
Drunk. Drunk!. I was in a new neighborhood. And I tried to get drunk. I tried so hard to get someone's attention. And it didn't work. Eventually I just gave up.
James needs glasses. James is a poor man. He needs to buy new glasses. He goes to a local eye doctor. His doctor recommends he gets contacts. James gets contacts and loves them.

Government. My uncle works at a local prison. I asked my uncle if he could teach me how to run the prison. I bought him a book on prison management. I followed his instructions exactly. My uncle was proud that I learned how to run the prison.

Speed dating. My wife just started speed dating. She did not know who her potential dates were. She read a book on online dating. She was able to find a few to talk to. She went on one date and was pleasantly surprised.
Going Pro. Dan was a soccer player. He had the best season ever. A team scout watched him play. They decided to sign him. Dan became a pro player.

Being Bold. Gina had to go out of the house and pick her friends up. Her mother insisted she go with only three of her friends. Gina knew this would mean that she would not make any new friends. But she was determined to be brave and do the right thing. She walked through the house looking forward to being out and being herself.

No More Leaves!. Eli was helping his mother rake leaves in their yard. He was trying to cut the large thorny ones. Eli dropped the rake and the thorn began to spread. It began to pull at Eli's arms and legs. Eli was left scratching and itching for hours!

Children's books. I am a big fan of children's books. One time I decided to read a book for the first time. I spent three hours reading the book and was happy. However, I was soon bored. The book was so long I read it five times in one sitting.
Lori's Date. Lori had a date with her best friend. She waited in line for two hours. Then she met her date. He took her to dinner and a movie. After dinner, she and her date had dinner and a movie.

Sleeping Over. Cayla's mother always put her to bed earlier than her. It never made her feel better to sleep late at night. But one day Cayla decided she was going to take matters into her own hands. She snuck out at midnight, and snuck back in at five-thirty. Cayla slept over at her friends house, and felt better.

Cooked Too Much. Brett wanted to impress his girlfriend. He wanted to cook her a special meal. Brett went to the store to buy all the ingredients. He bought the best vegetables and meats he could find. Brett cooked his girlfriend a fantastic meal!

Shattered Dreams. Jane was a little girl with a very dark past. Jane never felt like she was worthy of love. When she turned 13 she moved away to escape a family member's abuse. Jane stayed in a different state and was able to start over. Jane felt like she had found love again after so many years.

The Glasses. Kate went to the eye doctor for her first eye exam. The doctor told her she needed new glasses. Kate was afraid she wouldn't like them. But when she got them, they were beautiful. Kate was glad she hadn't been afraid!

Used Item. Randy is an avid motorcyclist. One day, Randy was riding his motorcycle home. While he was riding, his tire popped. Randy tried to ride away, but his bike wobbled and fell. Randy was upset that he had to use his bike as a life preservers.

Quarterback Keeper. Sam wanted to be the quarterback in his school's football team. During the scrimmage the coach was running a play. Sam tried to run as fast as he can toward the goal. However, he ended up slipping on the football. He ended up being tackled before he even could finish his dance.

The Sleepover. The kids had a sleepover. They didn't know each other. They decided to play hide and seek. When they found each other, they were so excited. They decided to spend the night at the park.

Plane Tickets. Tom was excited to fly to Las Vegas for his birthday. His wife took him to get his tickets in time. They took off and Tom got a great deal. He got so much money off of it. His wife is going to use the money to take him on a trip next week.
The Flood. The Smiths lived in a house that was flooded. A flood hit the house. They did not know what to do. They called a plumber. The plumber came and fixed everything.
Boat day!. My friend took my son to the harbor yesterday. We rented a small boat. It was a great way to relax with my son. The waves crashed and the boat rocked. It was a great day.
New Puppy. We got a new puppy for our anniversary. Our granddaughter is coming over to see it. It is very cute. She likes to play with it. She thinks it is very smart.
Wedding. Today is the wedding of Jon's friend Steve. Jon is not a religious man. Jon wants to marry Steve. Steve says yes. Jon and Steve get married that night.

Avoiding the In Laws. Fred was in a bad mood. He didn't want to be out of a relationship. Fred had a bad feeling about his girlfriend not wanting to be friends. Fred felt he needed to avoid her in case he got hurt. So he hid from her while he sneaked out.

The New Kitten. Cathy wanted a kitten. Cathy's friend suggested that she buy a kitten from a local pet store. Cathy decided that she would buy a kitten from the pet store. Cathy brought her kitten home and named it Spot. Spot and Cathy are now best friends.
Saturday Night Live. Tim loved to watch SNL. They played some funny skits everyday. He watched it everyday. They played some more. He loved seeing his favorite skit in person.
Spoiling niece. Jane was having a niece. She wanted to get rid of her niece. Jane told her niece that she was wasting her time. She had other plans. Jane's niece then started to fight her.

Broken Eggs. Nancy had just made a delicious egg sandwich. She took a bite and spit it back out. The eggs were not at the right temperature. She had to throw the sandwich out. Her parents offered to buy her another.

Basketball Practice. The boys loved to play basketball. They practiced hard every day. They were very good at shooting and passing the ball. One day, the coach said they would play in a championship game. They practiced hard until they were the best team in school.

Huge Debt. Sandra was about to move to a new town. She had to move and was nervous about her finances. Her family was struggling and she wanted to help out. She took out a loan to move. By the time she got paid it was too late and Sandra lost her job.

Diplomat. Sam was always a bit quiet, even in class. He would often hide his opinions. His classmates always asked him what they should do. One day, his teacher made him explain what he thought. His classmates applauded and asked for more examples.

Phone call. I was waiting for a call from a customer. He asked me why my phone didn't work. I had to go to the store to purchase a new phone. I returned home and told him my phone wasn't working. He gave me a bad review for not fixing it.
Hit. Tom was playing dodge ball. He was trying to hit the ball. His ball got stuck. He threw his arm up. Tom was able to get the ball.
Go. Bob liked to work out. He would go jogging every morning. One day while jogging a man fell on Bob. Bob laughed and helped him up. The man thanked him and Bob never jogged alone again.

Companion Physical. The woman gave me a card, asking for my name. I had a strange feeling, reading the card. I told her I had no name, but she kept calling. I told her I wasn't going to give her a card. She never returned my phone calls.
Lost Sandwich. Tom was hungry. He ate a sandwich. He didn't notice the smell. Tom didn't realize the smell. He ate too many more sandwiches.

A Lion King Christmas. Charles decided that he wanted to get his children something special for Christmas. His daughter wanted a locket. Charles decided that he would get his children the locket. Christmas came, and Charles' children opened their locket. In it was a golden apple!

Cable TV. My wife was watching a news program. The station was airing a breaking news update. The news program mentioned cable TV and said prices would go up. My wife complained to the cable company. They lowered prices and she was very happy.

Broken collectible. Kelley was on a scavenger hunt. She was searching the streets for the perfect find. Suddenly she ran across some old glass bottles. As she dug through them, she broke one. She was so upset but luckily it was only a small dent.

Uncle Freddy. Freddy always came home and everyone looked happy. He always got along with everyone in the family except for his uncle. Freddy never spoke to his uncle for almost a year. His uncle eventually told him he was not welcome back. He felt sad but decided to become a better person for it.

Hooray for vacations. Tim was always a hard worker. He loved his job more than anything in the world. Tim decided he was going to take a vacation. Tim decided he would go on a cruise to exotic locations. Tim couldn't wait to explore the ocean with his family.

Wallet. Sam went out with his friends. He went to a diner and ordered a hamburger. The worker scanned Sam's ID and gave him his money. Sam asked if he could pay with his debit card. The worker laughed and said Sam didn't have enough money.
Incognito Mode. Brad logged into his computer. He noticed a search bar appeared. He tried to log out of the computer. His browser didn't allow him to. He left the computer in an incognito mode.

Road Trip. It was time for a road trip. The kids were bored and had nothing to do. They asked Dad if they could do chores instead. Dad agreed and they got to work right away. The kids were so happy to finally be able to go to their friends house!

Acting lessons. Linda really wanted to become a famous actress. She signed up for acting lessons. She learned how to dance and sing. Her teacher even taught her how to lip-synch. When she was finished, she was a great acting actress.

Roommate to the Rescue. Gina needed to move to the attic. But the apartment was too small to reach. She had been sleeping on the floor all the way up there. She could no longer climb up the steps. She called her brother up and told him to go help her up.

Robert formed a band. Robert and his friends went to the music store to buy guitars. At the music store there were so many guitars to choose from. Robert thought hard about what kind of music he should play. He ended up playing a lot of different music types. The band ended up being a big success and they were happy.
Kim the Waitress. Kim was a waitress at a diner. One day a man came in. He had a problem and needed help. Kim worked very hard for him. The man got a very good tip and was very grateful!

Tree. The Smith's were very proud of their house. They always had large pine trees in front of their house. One day, the Smith's saw a huge pine tree in their front yard. They decided to cut the tree down. Now the Smith's can plant their own trees in their yard.

Family History Banquet. We usually have a family history banquet for the annual spring meeting. We usually invite around 10 family members. The children usually bring something for themselves. Today I brought a small plate of cookies and brownies. They brought cake, too.

Washing Hair. I just noticed that my hair has become very dry and tangled. I decided to wash my hair today. I bought some conditioner, shampoo, and conditioner. I washed my hair into the washer with conditioner. I finally washed my hair.

The Hearing. One day the teacher was taking a test. There was a boy in the class who seemed distracted. The teacher heard a noise in his ear and looked. It was just his earbuds and the test was not on. The boy got in trouble.
Gap Tooth. My friend told me I needed a tooth pulled. I decided to go to the dentist and get one. The dentist pulled it out. My gums hurt all night. Now I only have a gap in one tooth.

Homework Hater. Benjamin hated to do his homework. He always forgot to complete his homework. Benjamin's parents took away his homework hanger. Benjamin started to look for a new homework hanger. Benjamin found one that was much more durable.
Colorado Cold. The temperature outside was dropping. The Smith family was cold. They went inside to get more clothes. When they got out the kids were freezing. The Smiths had to go buy more clothes.
Comedy. Tina made a new tv show. She filmed it and went to set. Tina walked out onto set to meet her cast. The director was very impressed. He let Tina do a few more jokes.

Exam Grade. My teacher gave us an exam yesterday. I didn't study as much as I thought I would. I got into trouble for not studying. I made sure to retake my study materials. Luckily my grade was a B, and not a C.
Cd. My niece just got a new TV. It has a big screen and blu ray player. I was hoping it would work on her computer. But it said the player didn't support the cd. I wonder if she needs a new computer.

The Space Station. The kids had always wanted to be astronauts. They were excited to finally be living in space. They were nervous and excited all at once. The astronaut class was very helpful. They had a great time.

Chase. Amy and Beth were playing in their new room. Beth wanted to go get a drink from the fridge. Amy wanted to play with her books. A small dog chased them. After a few minutes Amy stopped her book.

Molly and Devin. Molly and Devin loved to bake. They decided to make cookies. They spent a long time making them but they burned! They then decided to just give up and buy cookies instead. The cookies were better and they bought more!

The New Girl. My sister-in-law has a three-year old boy. One day, she took her to the playground. A bunch of boys surrounded her and said mean things. When she went home, they made fun of her again. She is afraid to go to the playground now.

Missed Alarm. Linda was supposed to meet up with her boss at nine. However, Linda missed her alarm. She was not able to make it in time. Linda was forced to pay for missed work. She did not make her boss's presentation that day.

The melted colander. Tina was eating some chips. She decided to put some in her colander. As she was flipping it open, the colander fell on the floor. She was shocked because it was already hot. She had to quickly clean it up.
Interrupted. The man heard a noise. He ran into the house. His neighbor was in the living room with a flashlight. He pointed it at the man and asked him to move. The man ignored him.
Dirty Cat. Karen's cat was dirty. She put cat shampoo in her bathroom. Karen's cat went to the bathroom. She had cat shampoo on her face and neck. Karen's cat was now clean.

Too Long Ago To Remember. Heather had been talking to a man for years. The man asked her a few questions and offered some of his knowledge. She remembered when she first met him because she was fourteen. He said he was an artist who had died ten years before this. The two suddenly realized their memories couldn't be that long ago.
Skating too fast. Cindy was at the skating rink. She was skating slowly with her friends. Then her friends all tried to outrun her. She lost her balance and fell over. Cindy was embarrassed.

Spicy Chicken. Mia was feeling adventurous. She decided to order some spicy chicken wings. She was excited to taste the chicken. Mia ordered her favorite sauce. Unfortunately, the chicken didn't taste very good.

Whisper. She was always whispering to me. I never knew why she always whispered. When I was little, she told me about how she wanted to be a star. I told her I wanted to be the lead actress of my own movie. She never replied, so I never asked her again.

Bunny Surprise. Harrison wanted to surprise his son for his birthday. He bought a bunny in the kitchen. He put it on the mantle. His son got up to look at the bunny. He accidentally hit the bunny with a hammer.

Dirty Room. Ida's mom was on her way home from work. When she passed the hallway, she saw a huge hole. Ida had accidentally left her dad's car door open. Ida's dad had forgotten to close the door, so the kids would be free. They ran out the door just as Mom came home.

The Song Cover. James wanted to write a song about a famous singer. He looked for the lyrics online to write his song. He did not find anything he liked. James asked his friends for help with finding lyrics online. They were able to write his song.

A new PC Mouse. Tina bought a new computer mouse. It was blue with a shiny finish. The mouse did not have any buttons or a back button. She decided to back up and use the up button. Tina accidentally pressed the down button when she clicked it.

Squash. Sara was a great squash farmer. She grew all of her own and grew all the vegetables. One day she got bad news. There was a massive squash infestation in her town. Sara had to get help from the surrounding communities.
Skiing. I tried skiing this year. I practiced every single day for a month. On the day of the tryouts, I had a good time. I skied down to a few feet. Then I decided that I wasn't good enough.

Lost Sight. My brother got out of work at around midnight. I couldn't find him for a couple of hours. I called his phone to see if he was ok. I was upset when he didn't answer the phone. I spent the rest of the day looking for him.
Spider Jump. Rita was playing in the backyard. She saw a big spider in the corner. She grabbed a rock and threw it in the air. The rock flew and hit the spider. The spider jumped and bit Rita.

End of speech. When my sister and I went to the speech, we were quite disappointed. We couldn't believe how boring it was. We wanted to leave, but we didn't want to miss her. We asked if we could come back a month later to see if she liked it. She said yes and we enjoyed our time together.

Burger To Go. Kate's mother wanted her to eat dinner for dinner. Kate decided to have her mother get her a burger. She didn't feel like cooking but figured it would do. She put the burger in the toaster and turned it off. After a minute she smelled smoke coming out of the toaster.
Sharing Bread. We shared a piece of bread at lunch. He asked me if I had ever had any and I said yes. He brought the bread to me. He brought some pasta. I had a slice.

Ryan Loses Weight. Ryan needed to lose weight. He bought a scale to help him track his progress. The scale is cumbersome and can take a long time to count. Ryan's friends helped him learn how to use it. Now he can lose weight as easily as he likes.
wing sauce. Edgar was a chef. Edgar had a recipe for chicken wing sauce. Edgar put the sauce in all the wings. Edgar sold the wings to a client. The client bought sauce from Edgar.
The Tiger. Mark was at the zoo with his family. He saw a tiger and fell in love with it. He wanted to go home with it. His parents said they could keep him. Mark stayed in the zoo with his tiger.

Teacher At A Party. Angie had gotten an A in chemistry class. Her teacher was having a birthday party. Angie brought home all her gifts. She went with her teacher to the party. Angie accidentally spilled red food dye in her teacher's shirt.

Lost in the air. My friend went to the store. When he got home he realized his keys were not in his pocket. He tried to walk back out of the store. His keys were nowhere to be found. My friend had to call his girlfriend to drive him back home.
Vanilla Cake. Lisa had baked a large cake. She decided to make a small cake instead. She had to use some vanilla cake mix. She poured it into a cupcake pan. The cake turned out to be delicious.

Lisa. Lisa was a little girl and wanted a new dress. Her parents did not have the extra money they needed for the dress. Lisa asked her mother for money. Her mother was unable to spare the money. Lisa had to find a new dress for school.

bank trip. Jim needed to make a deposit at the bank. Jim was too lazy to go to the bank by himself. He called his friends to ask them to go with him. They all met in a local restaurant. They made their deposits together.
Treat. Tim took a bus to the mall. He purchased a lot of candy. When he got home, he placed it in his pocket. Tim's dog jumped onto his pocket. Tim was very disappointed.

Bridal shower. Cora's bridal shower was set for Friday. She was very anxious to get her hair done. She asked her best friend to go as her maid of honor. She had a wonderful time. Everyone in the family came in to watch.
Poor Lighting. Tom had dark curtains. He didn't notice the light bulb at night. The light bulb turned off. Tom called an electrician. The electrician replaced the bulb.

CCD. My 98 year old neighbor Joe came to visit today. He had a heart attack in 2004 and is in a wheelchair. The doctors told him he was diabetic. He was shocked that he could be diabetic. He is now dialysis dependent.

The Mountain Lion. Annie was hiking through the woods. All of a sudden, she spotted a mountain lion. She didn't think much of it. Annie started slowly walking away from it. She didn't want to be seen by the mountain lion.

Drunk Story. Timmy liked to tell funny stories to people. He was trying to tell a very adult story. His friend, Tom, tried to tell him a silly story. Timmy couldn't keep up with them. He had to stop telling the story.

Two Years. I met a young couple for a date last year. I ended up going with them two years later. They are a year older and live in the same state. I was happy that I took a chance on them. I hope we meet again soon.

Bad Visitor. Tim's neighbors had cats. One day a person came by and broke into Tim's apartment. Tim called the police. The police showed up in the afternoon. The police told Tim that he could have a neighbor watch program.

Doctor Visit. Bob hated having to go to the doctor. One day his doctor called him in for a physical. Bob had a doctor's appointment in the morning. He waited in the waiting room for ten minutes. When Bob finally arrived at the doctor's he was shocked at his wait.

New kitten. When I got a new kitten I was so excited. But then the kitten got sick. I had to take it to the vet and they said it had fleas. The vet said I needed to change my bedding. Now the kitten is more healthy.

Too small for playing piano. Suzy bought a piano and it was not very big for her. She began to play it but it was too small. She was disappointed and asked the person to fix it. Luckily they did so she could play better. Suzy played it well and she felt much better afterwards.

Fender Bender. Tom and his girlfriend were driving around late at night. Suddenly Tom hit someone's car on the side. He got out to confront the other driver. They exchanged words before the other driver got out and drove off. Tom and his girlfriend went home empty-handed.

Bad CLothes wash. My clothes were all washed in a cheap clothing store. I was supposed to get a new shirt for my boyfriend. I ended up just buying a shirt I liked. The next day, I had to wear it to work. It was too big and I had to throw it away.

Terry the Police Officer. Terry was a police officer. Terry was patrolling the streets one night. Terry noticed a suspicious vehicle parked by a store. Terry investigated the vehicle. Terry quickly found out the person driving the vehicle was not supposed to be there.

The New Toy. Tom was at the grocery store. He noticed a new toy that he really liked. He asked the cashier to get it for him. The cashier gave him the toy. Tom played with the new toy for a long time after that.

Not Good News. Sara's husband had a big test coming up. She hoped he would do well on it. When he got the test back, his score was not good. Sara was devastated. She hoped he would do better on the next test.

Bad Exertion. Gina's family was going on vacation. Gina didn't want to go. She had to stay home from school with her grandma. Her grandma asked Gina to play ball with her. Gina grumbled about it and went back to her room.

The Sad Birthday. Jake's grandfather died last week. His birthday was coming up and he was not looking forward to it. His mother put him in a good mood and encouraged him to have fun. He made an appointment with a psychic to try his luck. He was nervous and was able to talk to his grandfather that day.

The bad audition. Kelly was an actress in a movie. Her audition was for lead role in the next movie. She went in with confidence in her abilities. When she got the part, she felt terrible. She did not want to try anymore.

The Tyrant. Tyrone was a good man who loved everyone. He loved his job at the police station, but hated working for his boss. One day he got the courage to quit. He quit his job, and his friends and family, too. Tyrone never let anyone tell him he wasn't a good man.

Sam The Video Game Addict. Sam wanted to do something fun. He started playing video games non stop. He was losing at them. He decided to quit video games for awhile. He found video games fun and he's much happier.

Pizzeria. Anna decided to open a pizza parlor. She called her best friend and set up an appointment. On the day of the appointment, she did not have enough food. The restaurant closed early because she could not afford food. She went to the mall instead.

The tattoo removal. John's daughter was getting a new tattoo. John tried to remove it himself, but couldn't. He decided to try and talk to his daughter. He explained his situation to his daughter, and explained what he was doing. His daughter was very understanding, and quickly let him help.

Work. She wanted to be able to cook dinner at home. Her husband suggested she start with the meat. He worked out a recipe and sent her a grocery list. She went to the meat section and bought everything she needed. She cooked dinner and loved it!

Dog. Sasha's dog died. She felt like nothing could be done to fix it. Sasha decided to go through with the funeral. After the funeral, the dog seemed happy again. Sasha felt much better about death and mourning.
Soccer. I went to a soccer match today. The match was intense. My team played well, and I scored a goal. After the match, I was offered a player on the team. I accepted the player on the team.
Rice Milk. The mom was making a cake. She poured rice milk in a container. The rice milk came out curdled. The mom found out it was a bad batch. She cleaned up the mess.
Party. I went to a party last night. I had a lot of fun. Unfortunately, my roommate didn't. He was drunk. We got in trouble for being so loud.

The Chicken. Amy went to the market to buy her mom some chicken. The line to buy the chicken was long. Amy waited in line for over twenty minutes. When Amy got to the front of the line, they said the chicken was ready. Amy could only take a few pieces because it was cold.

Karma. Kate had recently had a baby. Her boyfriend took the baby to the doctor's office. There, the doctor told Kate she'd need surgery. Kate was horrified! She had to go through with the procedure, however.

Unwanted apps. I downloaded a new game. It wouldn't let me install it without paying extra. I asked my friends for advice. They told me to uncheck the box for the game. It was only a warning, so I did as they advised.
Too heavy. Allie had a lot of makeup on. She decided to not wear it. Her friends noticed. They made fun of her. She decided to never wear that again.

A Dog on a Boat?. The weather was a bit cold as Joe waited at the dock. As the boat approached the dock a man approached Joe. The man looked at Joe as he got on the boat. Joe had a dog and the man started a conversation with Joe. Joe and the man shared a laugh and Joe enjoyed the conversation.
Smoke. I found a cigar under my bed. I asked my mom if she wanted to smoke it. My mom said no. I got up and smacked my face on the floor. I never took cigars out of my bed again.

The Bodybuilder. Matt wanted to be a bodybuilder. He did all the bench pressing and leg exercises he could. At the next big competition he got so strong he won. Matt became the new champion bodybuilder. He went on to become very famous and successful.
Malaysia. I went to the Grand Canyon last weekend. While there, I saw some strange lights. They were at night, but I thought it was a UFO. I looked out the window. It was the military!

Cracked. My parents bought me a new computer. I immediately took it out of its packaging. I opened it up and found out that it was cracked. My parents told me that it would take me a week to fix. After I cracked the computer, it worked fine.

Alpaca. She wanted something soft and fluffy. She saw some alpaca on sale at the pet store. She picked it up and tried it on. It was the softest and most fluffy alpaca she'd ever tried. She was pleased with the purchase and went home to sleep.

A night at the city. Last night was so fun. We went to the city and played basketball. We also had a great time dancing and playing music. When we were done, we went home. Now we all have so much more fun to do.

Work. Tim was an accountant. He was always busy, so he would procrastinate about his work. Tim would even sleep in at the office to stay up late. One day, he was called into his boss's office. Tim was told he had been fired for being lazy and not getting work done.

Bad Cook. Ava was at home cooking. She was really excited about a big meal for her family. Then she ran out of time and the food burnt. Her mother-in-law complained and Ava went to see her boss. Her boss said the food was okay, and Ava didn't get in trouble.
change. I bought a new dress. It was purple. On my first day of school, I tried on the purple dress. I could not fit into the dress. I did not know what to do.
The Ticket. Tim was late for work. He didn't have a ticket. His wife saw it and got angry. Tim apologized and promised to be there on time. She forgave him and they went on their way.

Toy shopping. Tim and Sam went to the store for toys. Tim wanted a new robot for his room. While they were in the store they got distracted by the robot. They ended up buying a lot of different ones. They had fun looking through them all.

Wedding Day. We arrived at the church early to take advantage of the free breakfast. Everyone there seemed nice except for one man. Everyone ignored him, even though he was seated at a table. We were visibly annoyed and asked him what was wrong. He simply said he couldn't make it to church on time and left.

The Christmas Miracle. Jill loved Christmas. She was in charge of organizing a neighborhood Christmas tree. She carefully measured, pulled out, and decorated all the trees. She had them all put on display and it was a huge success! Afterwards, Jill's neighbors gave her a big hug and pat on the back.

My drone. I bought my first drone. I brought it home and set it up in the garage. I set it up and watched a movie. I then went outside to play with it. I did not want to fly my drone so I took it back inside.

Anger management. I was told I had to take anger management classes. I had heard horrible things about anger management classes. The classes did not seem like it would be anything special. But they actually seemed to help a lot. After my first class, I never got angry again.

New friends. Alex's class went to the mall. Alex didn't like going to the mall with his classmates. The other kids teased Alex for not having any friends. One day, Alex met another boy and became friends with him. Now Alex likes going to the mall with his classmates.
Susie's favorite Doll. Susie wanted a new doll. She asked her mother for one. Her mother told her they couldn't afford one. So Susie got her a homemade doll. Susie loved her homemade doll.

Public Speaking. When he was growing up, Jim was very self-conscious about his speaking voice. He thought he had no chance of making a career out of it. One day he decided to overcome his shyness and public speak. He spoke at a small gathering of people in his neighborhood. He ended up getting an A+ on his speech and made the dean's list!
Truss. Tom had a crush on a girl in his class. He had the nerve to ask her out. He was so nervous she rejected his offer. He was devastated. They never talked again.

Brian made the baseball team. Brian had been practicing baseball all summer. He got to the tryouts of the team. Brian was nervous because he didn't play a lot of baseball. Brian made all the cuts and made the team. Brian was so happy that he practiced a lot.

Lost. Gina's parents had come back to pick her up. But she had already missed her bus! She waited a half hour as she waited to catch the next bus home. Finally the bus arrived just in time. Gina got home just as the car drove by, giving her parents a big hug.

Date Night. My girlfriend and I decided to plan a date night. We were both excited but nervous. We decided to see the new movie on opening night. The movie turned out to be very good. We decided it was a great date night.
Labor. I had to go the doctor today. I called him up and scheduled an appointment. I had my ultrasound done. The doctor looked at my baby. He told me I was having a baby girl.

My iphone. My iphone came to me last week. It was brown with black paint. I wanted a black one so I went to the store and bought one. It came in and I opened it up. When I opened it up I immediately realized it was a fake.
Holding a Parking Spot. Tom was walking home from work. He noticed a car park down a street. Tom waited in the spot for the car to move. The car moved later. Tom eventually got out of the spot.
Contest. I entered the contest at school. I thought I was better than the other kids. I entered it in second place. I didn't win. I didn't give up on my dreams.
Sandy Shoes. I bought a sandal for my birthday. It was the perfect size. I wore it everyday. The sandal started to rub my feet on the pavement. I never wore sandals again.
Dragon. Bob liked to collect dinosaurs. He decided to build a dragon out of Legos. He worked hard on it every day. Finally he finished it. He got a lot of compliments on his dragon!

Fist Fight. Jude was trying to lift a heavy box. He swung and swung but it didn't work. He tried swinging and swinging but it didn't work. He finally went to throw it but it broke in half. Then he went to the doctor to get some stitches.

Fig Tree. I love Christmas trees. This year, I decided to have a fig tree as a tree. I went to the trees lot and purchased a big variety of figs. After picking them, I decorated them with lots of lights. When it was all lit up, the tree looked like a Christmas tree.

The Beach Ball. The kids loved playing ball in the beach. They would knock down each other's houses with the ball. The kids would hide and then run when they got spotted. One day, the beach ball accidentally went into the ocean. The kids all dug it out but were sad they couldn't play ball anymore.
The Bed. My wife got a new bed this week. It is a beautiful gold color. She posted photos of her new bed on FB. We are waiting for the bed to be delivered to our house. I can't wait until it arrives.
Song. The man wrote a song. The producer liked the song. The producer asked for another song. The man refused. The producer offered him a second song.

James Drinks Iced Coffee. James is tired from work. He decides to get a cup of iced coffee to help him relax. He takes a sip of his iced coffee. James is glad he had iced coffee after work. He is glad that he doesn't feel tired any longer.
Fishing. I bought some fish. I wanted to go fishing. I rented a boat. I put my rod in the water. I caught a big fish.

Dent. Joey's parents forced him to get dental. So he took his parents' advice and didn't brush for at least a month. Joey's parents felt terrible when he was in school one day. They made him start brushing again. Joey finally got his teeth cleaned and felt better.

Translating. Tom had a Spanish class in high school. They had to translate from Spanish to English. They went over all the important words in Spanish. They practiced translating those words. They passed the class with flying colors.

Making a New Friend. Tom always wanted to have a dog. He asked his family to let him get one. They agreed and Tom took his dog to the pet store. He picked out a German Shepherd puppy and took him home. Tom now has a new dog of his very own.

Exterminator. John went to his friend's house to look for cockroaches. John spent many hours looking through the house. John was able to find the source of the roaches. He brought out traps to capture them. John successfully captured the cockroaches.
Procrastinator. Bob had trouble keeping up with his bills. He had trouble paying rent too. Eventually Bob had to move out. He lost his job. He was behind on his bills.

Bloody Nose. Beth was trying to sleep. She awoke to a bright red nose. She looked under her blankets and the floor. She couldn't find her nose. She realized it was on the floor where she had fallen asleep.
Jewish. Sally was religious. She decided to take a trip to Israel. She researched Jewish sites and read about them. She also learned many Jewish customs. Sally learned so much about her religion.

Volunteer. Tim's local gym was having a basketball game. But Tim didn't want to spend any money. So he decided to volunteer to play basketball. And he actually had a lot to do during the game. Tim was able to save money and also play basketball for a good cause.
Sugar. My wife does not like sugar. She asked my friend what to eat for breakfast. He suggested oatmeal. I decided to cook my own oatmeal. I used my own recipe and her taste came out great.

My dad is crazy. I was very upset when I found out that my dad was in prison. I felt like I needed to do something. So, I called the prison to make him free. I talked to him and explained what happened. When I left the phone rang and my mom was happy.

The Heart Attack. Tina and James were watching Netflix. They were eating ice cream. Tina started feeling sick. She told James she was having a heart attack. James went to the hospital right away to check it out.

Turn On Music. Kate was sick of her quiet apartment. She went downstairs to a music shop for inspiration. The shop was out of music! Kate found the perfect music for her. She loved it so much she bought another one.

Hide n Seek Game. Sam was playing hide n seek with his brother. He hid behind some boxes in the attic. His brother was angry but couldn't find him. Sam and his brother fought over the box and it fell on the floor. Sam won the game and he kept his sister out of the attic.

Larry Loses His Sunglasses. Larry was driving along. It was a warm day. He put on his sunglasses to read a book. As he was driving, his sunglasses fell off. Larry was very sad and put on a different pair.

Relationships. Mary has been single for a while. She knows it's best to try online dating. One day, Mary decided to go on a blind date. At first, Mary was not having much luck meeting new people. However, Mary met the best man of her life, and he agreed to marry her.

Becky's New Dad. Becky's dad had passed away. Becky didn't know her dad very well. Becky went to see a movie about his death. Becky's dad appeared in the movie. She was happy to finally meet her father.
Bad coffee. When I went to go to the coffee shop, I was shocked. The coffee was terrible. I told the barista what I wanted. She gave me the coffee. I was not impressed.

Racing Competition. Tom decided to enter a car race. He was a bit nervous to race but he did well. At the end of the race Tom's car won. Tom was happy and motivated to do better. He decided to enter another race and better his car.

Birthday. Every year my sister in law's birthday is on December 24th. This year she is turning 100. This year she wants to celebrate with me on Christmas 24th. I asked my sister in law if we can do that and she said yes. We got together and had a great day celebrating our 99th birthday.
Old House. My father's old house was on a hill. Every year we took a tour. One year we were close to the house. This year they had a slide. I was able to ride it.
Suspended!. Nancy's parents wanted her to stay in her room. But she didn't want to. She decided to play outside. But her mom caught her in her play. She took her outside and made her go to her room.
Smoker. Joe was smoking. His wife told him to quit. Joe smoked anyway. He fell asleep in the chair. He woke up and his wife was very angry.

Smelly Cat. The dog ran up to his bowl and vomited on it. His bowl was full of dog food. His bowl was full of feces. He dug his bowl out and threw out all of the food. His dog never vomited up the food again.

Chicken Soup. My mom wanted soup to be easy for my dinner tonight. We took her to a local soup shop. She got her favorite soup and some chicken noodle soup. We both had so much soup that we ate half the pot! I was glad we found a good soup.
Return to sender. Tim was sending a package. He was going to mail it to his mother. Unfortunately she never picked it up. Tim was furious. He decided to not send the package to her.
Future Engineer. Charles was interested in engineering. His degree was in Mechanical Turk. He researched the field of robotics. He worked on various projects. He received his PhD in robotics.

Growing Plants is Hard. Sam really wanted a big carrot plant. He knew he needed to grow a lot to eat at home. He planted a dozen of carrots. When he tried to pull them all out they all fell on the ground. Sam had to spend the whole weekend picking them all up.

No Patience at All. The teacher was giving us a pop quiz. I decided to stay up and take notes. The professor got mad at me for not keeping my notes. He also gave me an F on the quiz. It was very embarrassing.

New Attitude. Jane was tired of being a bad girl. So she told her best friend Sue about her problems. Sue suggested that Jane do something about it. Jane got to go off to a rehab for anger management. She realized she had learned a lot and was much less of a bad girl.

Careless Accident. Tom and his friends were drinking a little too much. His friend accidentally threw a beer in Tom's face. Tom got up from his seat and threw it back. The beer hit him right in the face. Tom got it and went to the hospital.

School Play. A man was invited to play a part in the school play. The man took a part. The teacher asked him to keep his character a secret. The man kept his character a secret. He got a standing ovation.

Champ. The coach had to pick a player for the championship game. The coach picked the player he thought would score the most points. The coach called the first play. The first play went like clockwork. The player scored 23 points, and won the championship!

new boyfriend. John's new girlfriend went out with a boy from school. John was upset because he didn't know his brother. So he called the boy's parents. He confronted the parents about the boy's new girlfriend. The parents told John they had no clue about his brother.

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee loved to write songs and wanted to share them with the world. She wrote many of them and released them under her own name. Many people loved her work and many of them shared them with others. Sydnee began working as a professional musician. She now has her own music studio with her own songs and live shows.

Novel. My friend has a novel coming out. He told me he was writing it before his friends saw it. I was skeptical but I gave him a chance to finish it. When I asked him about it, he told me he did. I was glad I gave him the chance.
Water bottle. The man bought a water bottle. He went to put it in the sink. He put the bottle down to wash it. He went to get his wife. His wife said he could not have a water bottle.

Bad Joke. I walked into a joke club with my friends. When the host introduced me, he asked me my opinion about the jokes. I told him that I did not like any of them. He told me that that was okay and laughed anyway. I was furious and ran away.

The Speaker. Ava's school was having a speaker competition. She wanted to win, so she worked hard to memorize a speech. When she won, the principal announced she had won. Ava got to hold her own microphone, and it was exciting! She took a bow and was very proud of her accomplishment.

Visit. Jenny loved going to the zoo. One day Jenny's parents took her to the zoo. Jenny got to see lots of different animals. Jenny really enjoyed seeing the lions. Jenny came home with a stuffed panda bear.

Sleeping Early. Tom was going through a tough time in his life. He was getting into more and more debt. He knew he needed to get up early and start his day. Tom decided to go to bed early. He was able to get up early and get a much better job.
The Noisemaker. The man threw an eraser at a girl. She threw the eraser back at him. The man went outside and caught it. The eraser was dirty. He took the eraser to the store and bought a new one.

Banana Peel. I love the banana taste. But one day, I got very sick and had to throw up. I could not eat anything. I went to the doctor to see what could be the problem. The doctor told me that I had food poisoning.

Soggy. Joe had a bowl of cereal and milk for breakfast. The cereal was soggy. He didn't know what to do. Joe's mom showed him to put milk and cereal in a bowl. Joe decided to eat the cereal that was leftovers instead.
Fencing. Sally practiced fencing every day. She had one goal in mind when she started. She wanted to be the best. She worked hard at her skills. Sally won the championship.

Raul's Cat Costume. Raul's cat had become too big and fat. Raul put him in a tiny little box. Raul put a small box for his cat inside of the box. He gave him a bath to help him get in shape. Raul's cat finally lost some weight and got his new box.

Pool trip. The family went on a trip to the pool. The father did not have a life jacket. The family jumped in the water. The father did not remember his parachute. They went out by the end of the day.

New Kittens!. The family got up to go to the grocery store. When they got there, they were thrilled to see new kittens! The kittens were hungry and squirming. The family ran out and purchased three. The kittens became part of their family.

Black Friday. My family went on a shopping trip in the middle of the holiday season. We were trying to find a certain type of video game. The price of the game was going up. My family was very upset at the increase in price. We had to wait an additional day before we could purchase the game.

Puppy. Lenny had always wanted a puppy. His mom agreed that he could have one as long as he kept his room clean. Lenny went to his room and grabbed his vacuum. Lenny filled his vacuum with toys, sheets, and pillows. Lenny vacuumed his room clean and his puppy was happy.
A dog. Sally wanted a dog for a pet. She did research to find a breed and personality. She found the perfect dog for her. She bought the dog. Sally loves her dog and is glad to have a dog.

Ready Supper. When I went to my local grocery store the check out lane was full. I waited in line to pay for my food and got my items. I paid for my items and went to my car and picked my ingredients. I brought my food to my house and cooked it for supper. I am glad I have the ready to go supper ready to eat meal.

The Dress. Jenny bought a dress to be worn at the wedding. At the wedding, Jenny's dress tore. Jenny was very sad and picked a new dress. The wedding went well with the new dress. Jenny decided to keep her old dress.

Teased. Ava asked her teacher to play her favorite song. She was hoping to be cool and popular! But her teacher said she couldn't because the song was covered. Ava was disappointed. But she realized it was just for fun.
Paws. My wife asked me to help her get a cat. I said no because I don't know cats well. She found the cat's mother in the corner. She showed her the mother. I asked my wife how she liked the cat.
No makeup allowed. Allie was out on a date. She needed to make sure she looked good. She was rather nervous about it. When she stepped out she was shocked. Her date thought she looked horrible.
Super Mario. My nephew bought me a set of Super Mario Bros. It was so cute. I played with it all day. I was finally able to beat the final level. It was a fun game.

False Alarm. I set the alarm for 5:00am but it went off at 5:06am. I walked into my office, but the alarm wasn't going off. I waited for my boss to call me back. When she did, she told me that I forgot to turn it off. So, I decided to stay in and drink coffee instead.

The Card Collection. The family went on vacation. The first thing they did was buy some cards. They went to a big city and found the perfect place to shop. They saw all sorts of interesting designs and collectibles. By the time they left, they'd spent over $300 on new cards.

Migraine again!. Gina woke up feeling nauseous. She felt like she was going to throw up. After some time passed she tried taking her pills. This time they helped. Gina was able to relax for the remainder of the day.
Snake in the grass. A little puppy ran into the grass. The dog chewed the grass up and ran away. The puppy did not look for his puppy. The puppy's owner found the puppy. His owner re-homed the puppy.

Too Much of a Wait. Tim was waiting to pick up his daughter from school. There were about five other kids in line. Tim hoped he wouldn't wait much longer. The bus started to move slow. Eventually, Tim gave up waiting for the bus.

Erin and the dog. Erin is a dog. Erin likes to bark at the neighbors dog. One day Erin barked so loud that the dog came outside to pee. Erin and the dog are now best friends. Erin keeps barking at the dog but also at itself.

Statistics. Brett was a sophomore in college. He had never studied statistics. One day his professor told him to practice a statistic. Brett was not very good at it. The professor told him he would pass if he practiced enough.

Comeback. Gabby was a fighter. She was always outsmarted by her opponent. Her best hope was a rematch with Liz. But Liz was too experienced for Gina and she lost the fight. Gabby learned a lot and now trains to become a doctor.
Tadpoles. The boy dug a hole. He dug in his backyard. He found a bunch of tadpoles. He put them in a jar. He filled it with water.
Big Test. Tim was nervous about his biology test. He was afraid he would do poorly. Tim studied as hard as he could. He made sure to take notes throughout the test. Tim got a great score on his test.

Space Heater. Sam was tired of his apartment temperature remaining too high. He decided to buy a space heater. At first, it was hard to adjust the thermostat. Eventually, though, he got it just right. Sam was happy to have the temperature at a cool 68 degrees.
Perfect polish. Susie was painting her nails. She was painting them perfectly. But she was forgetting one nail. It was so bad she had to paint two. But finally she finished.
Free Food. The store was having a sale. They had a deal on cookies. I went in and bought a dozen. I felt bad afterward. I felt better after eating the cookies.
Family Strife. The Smiths are a tight family. They love spending time together. They are very protective of their children. They can't stand divorce. They work hard to maintain a good life.

Reader. My son in law is eighty and in poor health. He does not read newspapers and only watches TV. Last week he complained about having no food in his house. I asked him if he could read a newspaper and he read it. I was pleased.

The Bank Robber. Frank was walking down the street one night. He noticed a man with a mask on yelling at everyone. Frank confronted the man. The man got angry and pointed a gun at Frank. Frank was shocked and called the police.

Roadtrip. John and Sue were excited for their roadtrip. They had driven all day and were exhausted! But then they remembered what an adventure it was! They stopped and got some rest before driving home. They enjoyed the rest of their trip very much!
Stinky Feet. I hate getting stinky feet. Yesterday I tried a pair of socks. I wore the socks outside to cool off. I stepped on a bug. I had to go home and change.
Awkward Shave. Tom was shaving. He accidentally shaved his sides. It didn't feel right. Tom tried again without an edge. It still looked weird.

The Free Burgers. A group of children were playing in the yard. A man was out there smoking a cigarette. The kids started throwing rocks at the man. The man got upset and pulled out a gun. The kids all ran away.
Cookies. Karen and her brother decided to make cookies. They mixed all the ingredients together. They then put them in the oven. When they were done, they were delicious. They were delicious.
Runaway Dog. Tom's neighbor was walking his dog down the street. The dog got loose from his leash and ran off. Tom chased him. Eventually he caught the dog. Tom put the dog in the back yard.
Small Box. The man put the box away. He came back later with a few pieces. He took the smaller box. He used it as a toolbox. He got many things done.

Gas Station Blues. A friend and I used to drive to our friends house. This way, she could see us out on weekends. One day we got to the station and found out the gas was shut off. We couldn't figure out why the station was shut off. After a few minutes, we found out it was due to a leak.

Gus the Zombie. Gus had lived in an old trailer house for two years. He was sick of being so alone. One day a woman came by and offered him some old newspapers. Gus got a hold of a gun and started chasing the woman. Gus died a bloody murder because he couldn't shoot anyone.
Clean Numbers. My niece works in a supermarket in MA. She has to keep track of the inventory daily. She uses an old typewriter. Today her typewriter broke. She had to buy a new typewriter.
Cold Shower. The man went into his cold shower. He smelled a little funny. He got up to rinse it out. The water was very cold. He walked out of the cold shower in his underwear.

Runner. Tom loved to run on the trails in his neighborhood. He would take long walks down the trails often. Tom began to lose his running spirit when his mom died. Tom began to seek solace in religion. Eventually he could run again and lead his family again.

Slippery Situation. Jane and her boyfriend went on a date. He decided to take her to a nearby amusement park. They got there and it started to rain. They got home and Jane soaked her pants. The next day they didn't see each other at all.

Making Dinner. My wife's stomach growled. She needed to make dinner for her kids. She mixed up all the ingredients and put it in the oven. She forgot about it and walked to the bathroom. When she came out she had forgotten the oven!
Trial. Tom was in a murder trial. His lawyer wasn't the best. Tom was always losing. After a while he lost hope. He decided to quit in order to have hope again.
New Crush. I found a girl online who had a cat. We met up and spent the night talking. I felt like a king with her. But she started acting weird all night. She ended up moving away the next day.

Poetic Success. Charles loved to tell stories. In fact, he enjoyed telling them the most. He would try and tell them everyday and make them better. One day, his friend told him about a story contest. Charles won the contest and was awarded $10,000.

The big storm. Fred and his family lived in the mountains. One day, a big storm came in. It was stronger than the last one. Luckily, it only lasted a couple hours. After that, Fred was able to go home.

Searched. I saw a guy in the mall yesterday. He was looking at the same things as me. I thought it would be funny to look at his shirt. I picked one on sale and bought it. I looked at it in the mirror and laughed at the irony.
The quick move. Sean was moving to a new town. It was very hard for him to get to work. He had to run to a store. Luckily he had a car. Sean got to work quickly.

Pool closing. Irene had waited for months for the pool to be cleaned. She had her friends come over to her house and stay. When the pool was closed, they had a great time swimming. It was a long day but Irene was happy that it was finally over. They cleaned and enjoyed their vacation.

A Neighbor's Passing. Today my neighbor is going to a nursing home. I got a phone call this morning and she was coming. She was an old woman, and was frail. I was very worried and contacted her daughter. She said she did not know and would not be visiting.

Game-Winner. Joe had a basketball game on Friday. He played the whole game and scored twenty points. Afterwards, he went to the locker room and got his uniform. He won the game for his team and received a gift certificate. The gift certificate gave him three extra tickets to the game.

The movie. Benny wanted to see the new Batman movie. Benny called his friends and invited them to the movie. They decided to go at midnight. They all met at a local theater. They watched the movie and enjoyed the special effects.

Eyesight. Bob had vision problems. His vision worsened as he aged. He started seeing things in black and white. Bob's doctor suggested wearing contact lenses. He was able to see perfectly fine with the glasses.

Lifting Weights. Tom had been gaining a lot of weight. He decided to get in shape. He was trying to lift more weight. He lifted weights for a few months. He was able to maintain a healthy weight after a while.
Plaque. I was standing at the podium for the Olympics. I took out a plaque. It said 'Olympic Spirit'. I read the words to the plaque. They were motivational and meaningful.

Free Haircut. Tim was getting a haircut. He had just bought a new haircutting machine. The machine was very loud and annoying. Tim complained to his manager. The manager gave Tim a free haircut for complaining.

Cookies. Tom made cookies for his sister for Christmas. They were sugar and butter and chocolate. Tom was nervous he wouldn't like them. He took them out of the oven and sat them down. His sister ate half and Tom ate the rest.

The Grand Slam. A little girl was playing baseball outside. She threw the ball and it went up in the air. A fly came right towards the little girl. It ended up hitting her in the face and knocking her out. The kid ran inside and took a nap.
Sam. Sam was a homeless man in a ditch. He got a newspaper and started to beg for money. A stranger stopped to give him the newspaper. Sam felt very appreciated. Sam felt better about himself.
Rain OUt. Beverly didn't want to go to work. She asked her boss to go with her to a bar instead. Her boss said no. She decided to go anyway. When she got there it started to rain.

Dessert. Theresa's mom wanted to surprise her. She decided to bring her a dessert. She got a chocolate cake and a cherry pie. Theresa was amazed with the treat! She was thankful for her mom's kindness.
Box of Candy. Jane and her husband were hungry. They went to the corner store. They bought some candy. They were both very happy about the candy. They ate the candy in the car.

Spy. Maurice was an officer of the KGB in Hungary. He had infiltrated the country to infiltrate the embassy. Once inside he was surprised to see his superiors had no clue. They handed him a list of questions that they would like him to know. Maurice didn't know them but guessed they must be spies.

Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine wore her diamond engagement ring every day. One day, she decided to change her habits. She decided not to wear her diamond ring at all. Jasmine found a great ring store, and she bought a ring. Now, Jasmine does not wear her diamond ring at all.

Mistake. Sam went to the local store to buy a new dress. While in the store, she was distracted by a pretty girl. The girl walked around all day wearing nothing but the dress. The store manager didn't notice the dress was on display. Sam left the store without buying anything.

Late night Snack. Jane was running late for work. She decided to get some cookies to eat while she was at work. Jane got her cookies and went to work. Unfortunately her co workers laughed at her. She did not get any work done because of it.

5 Years. Tara and Tom were best friends. Tom went to Japan to visit family. He stayed for 5 Years in a small hotel. He loved the experience of being away from home. Tara decided to leave the country after 5 Years.
hostage. The man grabbed the girl. He held her hostage. A man came to the rescue. The man and the girl exchanged information. The man was taken out by the police.

Caldwells. Darrell was tired of not being able to sleep. He was so tired that he had to go to sleep early. He decided to go to sleep in his bedroom. It was too dark in the room and he fell asleep. He woke up in pain when he saw the daylight in his eyes.

Bad aloe gel. Maggie got a burn on her hand from a bad burn. She was not sure what to do. So she went to the store and picked up a bottle of aloe. When she got home she put it on. But to her dismay it did not help.

Zoe for President. Zoe wanted to be the class president for her school. She tried very hard but could not win the votes. Finally, her friend threw her a surprise party. Zoe ended up winning the votes. Now, she is the class president.
New guitar. Allie loved music. She wanted a new guitar. But her parents were against buying it. They thought she would hate it. But when she got it she liked it right away.

Cheesy. Nolan didn't like cheese. So when he went out to eat, he didn't order anything. But his waiter asked if Nolan wanted anything on his plate. And Nolan realized that it was cheese that he didn't want! Nolan then quickly decided that he actually wanted cheese.

Jay at the concert. Jay went to a concert with his friend. His friend was on a karaoke machine. Jay loved the karaoke machine. However, Jay's ears were ringing all day. He had a great time at the concert and vowed to sing more.

Gun range. John went to the shooting range with his friends. John realized he was out of ammunition. John went to the store and bought more ammunition. John went home and used the ammunition. John shot his first bullseye.

Stylist. Annie loved the arts. She was a great stylist. She began selling her work in local bars. Her style was so popular she started to write songs. She wrote and recorded a hit single and it became a big hit.
The Garden. The woman planted a garden. She watered it every day. One day she noticed a flower had bloomed. She picked it. She kept the flower.
piano lessons. My friend is a pianist. She has a piano recital next month. I signed up for piano lessons. She is not ready for the recital. I had to let her practice for a year before she could play.

Special Ingredient. Amy was making dinner for her family. She was using the least expensive ingredients possible. After it was done cooking she noticed it wasn't cooking. Her special ingredient was in the wrong place. Amy's family did not like the meal she made.

Too Busy. Tim worked for the same company for many Year's. The company was growing and hiring more people. Tim's workload was very heavy. He found it harder to do his work. Eventually Tim's boss told him he needed to hire more people.

The bus ride. Sue and her family took the bus to their next house. They got off of the bus and headed towards their house. When they got there, they were greeted by the front desk. They were told they would be staying at a friend's house. They all thanked their friend and walked in.

Best Formula. Sandra always bought the cheapest formula available to her. It was supposed to help her lose weight, but Sandra didn't want to lose weight. Her husband and son begged her to change, but Sandra didn't want to. Finally, Sandra's husband came over and convinced her to change. She started seeing her doctor and lost over ten pounds!

Card Games. Barry was playing cards with his friend at the bar. Barry felt a strong draw on his card. He did not know how to check it. He decided to pull it and tried to play. Unfortunately, he lost the game on that card.
Questioned. Tim got drunk at school. He got questioned by the principal. Tim denied everything. Tim lost his job. He went to rehab to help himself.
The Race. The kids were riding bikes. There was a race going on. They were trying to pass as many houses as they could. They kept going and going. They all passed.
Dunkirk. Dunkirk is a town in Northern Spain. It is famous for its carnival attractions. Dunkirk was the home town of the BSO. It was a popular tourist attraction. Dunkirk is now a museum.

Pimple Face. Kim really hates acne. She went to the dentist to have her face looked at. The dentist noticed that Kim had pimples on her face. The dentist decided to pull the pimples out. Kim looks so much better now.

A Lap of Coffee. Ned wanted to start a new tradition. He thought it would be nice to have a relaxing afternoon coffee. He went to his local coffee shop and ordered his usual. But when he came back, the coffee was cold! Ned was disappointed that he wasted money on coffee.

Rated R. Dan liked to watch scary movies. Dan would put on any movie he could find at the library. Dan noticed a new horror movie opening at the library that night. Dan asked the librarian if he could see the film. Dan was pleased that the librarian allowed him to see a horror movie.
Pizza. Tom was at a football game. They had pizza on the field. Tom decided to sneak in and eat. He wound up eating half of the pizza. He never told anyone about it.
Gossip. The woman talked to her friend. She heard that the friend's husband had a big problem. She wanted to help him. So she told the man's wife about the trouble. The man's wife told the gossip.

Ikea Store. My friend Dave decided he wanted to buy a new couch. Dave was going to a new store to see for himself. Dave found a great couch and saw he could get the same price at Ikea. Dave asked Ikea manager if he could get the couch. Dave bought the couch and is very happy with it.

Breakup. We went to a movie with my wife last night. The movie was a romantic comedy. We had a really good time at the movies. But at one point in the movie we got into an argument. We decided to take a break to let it pass.

The Blood Drive. The family decided to get food for the holiday. They decided to have a blood drive. They drove to their local hospital. They donated blood to make the holidays more special. The family had a wonderful time at the hospital.

Spree. The little girl walked to the candy store. She found a very long stick of mint. She put it in her pocket and walked back home. Her mom asked her if she wanted to buy her a candy bar. The little girl said she could and her mom brought her to the store.
The Missing Pie. The woman ran to the store. She bought some pie. She forgot about it at home. She looked everywhere. It was not at the store.

Deep-fried. Ida went to eat some deep-fried Oreos. She ate them, but they were too hard. The texture was so bad that she threw the Oreos in the garbage. She left the house and went to the mall. Ida ate a box of Oreos for dinner instead.

Burger. Dan and Tim were going to get a burger. The only issue was that the burgers were too hard. They both looked up videos to learn how to get them right. They practiced and practiced but they couldn't get the burgers right. So they ate a hamburger for lunch and both felt relieved.

Gratitude. I received a medal for my service. The medal was for being the first member to complete a marathon. I thanked everyone for the medal and showed it to my friends. They told me to give it back to the man who gave it to me. The man was never happy to receive the medal.
Annie's Test. Annie had a test coming up. She studied all week for the test. She felt prepared. When she went to take the test, she felt confident. Annie got a good grade on her test.

Little League, Big Dreams. When Dan was a child, his dreams were of playing baseball. His dad was a great player who went to college, but Dan had a hard time. He did not have enough talent, or size, to play baseball. Dan's dad got him a little league baseball glove. He got to play baseball with his Dad, and the little league team won.
