Soccer. Tina was in the 4th grade. Her class had a soccer game today. Tina really wanted to play. Unfortunately Tina sprained her ankle. Tina had to sit out the entire game.
Breakfast. I was in a hurry, so I got fast food. I got a burrito. I was really hungry. Afterwards, I felt sick. I had to go home and sleep.

Messy Studio. Kelsi was in a messy studio apartment. She hated the way the people worked. Her mother bought her a spray cleaner. Kelsi used it on all the surfaces. She was very happy about her clean apartment.

Trying To Stop A Thief. John was at his local fast food restaurant. A random patron walked in. John offered to get him a hamburger. The customer thanked John. John decided he wasn't going to steal after all.
Icy Roads. Jane was on a road trip. She was in a convertible. She started sliding. Jane's feet were soaked. She was barely able to drive home.

Pool and ice cream. I had been craving some ice cream. So, I called my friend Joe. He said he could make some ice cream for me. Joe arrived with ice cream at my house. Joe made some delicious ice cream for me.

Too Old To Trick Or Treat. I went to the store for candy. I bought some candy that looked like apples. I went home and sat on my couch. My parents came over and saw that the candy looked too old. They told me that I was not allowed to sell them any candy.

Tough Test. Sally had to take a tough test on the state level. She had been studying all week. She decided to study even harder. When she got to the test, she was very nervous. Luckily, she passed and made the highest grade.
Messy theater. There was a theater that my mom used to go to. The theater was a mess. They didn't clean it. It was very messy. I don't know what she did with it.

Between the pages. Bill bought a book from the library. He was excited and started to read. He accidentally flipped over the page. He ripped the book. The librarian said that the book could not be returned.
Nick Goes to England. Nick wanted to go to England. He told his friend about it. His friend thought that was a good idea. Nick flew to England to go on a trip. Now Nick has his first plane ride.

Breakfast Noodle. My wife and I both like fast food. We often take a break from our normal routines. We decided to try something different this time. We both ended up liking the breakfast noodle we made. We took a nap and ate the rest the same day.

No Self-Service. Kate was eating at a buffet. She was enjoying her meal when she noticed a line. The line kept getting longer. Eventually it stretched all the way to the door. Kate wasn't able to eat.
Car Keys. Beth needed to buy new car keys. Her car key ring was starting to lose key pieces. She went to the store. Beth purchased new car keys from the store. Now Beth can drive home.

Jake Takes A Test. Jake has always wanted to take a test. He decides to ask his friend John to take a test with him. John agrees and they both take the test. John mistakes Jake's name in the test. Jake was very disappointed with the results.

Wide Feet. Janice was running in the street. She tripped on a crack in the sidewalk. She ended up spraining her ankle. Janice's feet were too big for her to stand on. Janice had to walk the rest of the way to her home.
College. I had a terrible first semester of college. I was sick for two weeks. My mother hired a tutor to help me out. At first the tutor was terrible. But then she got better and we made friends.

Summer Reading. Nina was reading a book for her summer reading program. She was a big fan of one of the main characters. Nina felt like she was being taken advantage of. She went to the bookstore and complained about her treatment. The manager gave her a copy of the book as an apology.

The Lottery Win. It was Sam's last week of school. All his friends were going out of town. They had all forgotten to buy Sam any gifts. When his friend got out of town Sam had $5 to play the lottery with. Sam won $5,000!
Ben starts a food fight. Ben is in a food fight. Ben is starting to lose Ben throws food at the person that he is fighting. Ben is not paying attention. He spills his food all over the food.

Too Much Rain. It had rained for a couple hours and a little rain was forecast. John decided to get a rain coat and shoes out. He headed to the nearest store and bought some rain boots and a coat. Once he got home, the storm clouds had moved away from him. He was happy to see it wasn't as bad as it looked like it was going to be.

The Drums. Jane decided to learn to play the drums. She went to her local gym. There she practiced every day until she was a great drummer. Jane went to a local bar. Jane performed in front of her friends.

The Basketball Team. The school team had just come from the state championships. They had practiced hard the week before and would be ready. The team showed up to play and played with energy and passion. They won the game by twenty points. The boys were proud of their team and were very happy.

Salvation Army. Ida and her family were homeless. They had no money but felt very lucky. Then they found a local church that offered food to them. Then they joined the army, and soon felt very welcome! They got to live a very fulfilling and happy life!
Rainy steph. Steph went for a walk. She stepped into a puddle. She looked for a place to dry off. Steph was soaking wet. Steph decided to just take a hot bath instead.

Quitting. Bryan was a manager of a local business. He was a tough employee and loved his job. One day his boss called him into his office. Bryan was not happy and demanded a promotion. Bryan's boss refused and Bryan quit his job.
Missing Cake. Tom wanted to make a cake. He couldn't find a recipe anywhere. He decided to make his own cake instead. It turned out perfect. Tom felt silly for using so many other people's work.
Disco Dance. Tim and his friends were bored. Tim suggested they dance disco. Tim's friends all thought it would be funny. They all went out to the dance floor. They all loved disco dancing.
The Bunny. The man put the bunny down. He walked towards the house. There was a knock on the door. The man heard the knock. He went back to get the bunny.
Mango. Ana went to the local market. She saw a mango plant in the corner. She picked some mangoes from it. She bought some mangoes from the store. Ana felt very happy with the mangoes she had.

Stuck in the mud. I went for a walk in the woods today. I came across a small creek in the middle of nowhere. I walked into the creek and immediately started to sink into it. I didn't notice any movement at first, but then I did. I didn't get out until my parents saw the mud and came running.

Gerald. Gerald was riding his bike with his family. They were going on the sidewalk. Gerald got distracted by a dog in the street. His bike went over the dog and he fell off. His family helped him up and he was alright.
The Puppy. My friends took me to a pet store. I bought a puppy. It was orange with black spots. It came very soft. I took him home and named him Blue.

Entertainment. My husband and I are retiring from work this week. I'm doing more reading and watching television than I was. The only thing I really miss is music. I went to an audiobook store to find some audiobooks. I discovered a whole new world of literature there.

Bitter exes. Tom was married for 20 years. He had one daughter and one son. One day his daughter got pregnant. Tom and his daughter had an argument. Tom dumped her and his daughter is now bitter towards him.

Pictures. Cara was looking at her photos on her computer. Cara accidentally erased all of her photos. Cara tried to find her old photos on her computer. Cara could not find them. Finally, Cara decided to get her old pictures off her computer.

Eye Infection. One of her eyes started to swell. She was afraid of the doctor since it was in a different location. When she was admitted to the hospital, she got her eyes examined. The doctor told her that her eye was healthy but dry. The doctor told her that it was a dry cornea and gave her antibiotics.
Broken heel. I went to the fair. I was looking forward to it. Then all of the sudden my heel broke. I was so disappointed. I had to go home.

Driver. Beth's mother told her to get a license but she didn't listen. Her mother told her she could drive if she took driver's ed. So Beth took the test and passed! Beth drove her mother's car and felt better. Beth's mother was proud of her.

The Spider. Rita found a large spider on her couch. She took it to the trash. It crawled all over the place. Rita wondered if she was going to get a big one! She thought about taking the spider out but it was too late.

Too expensive muffins. Allie was excited about baking muffins. She had a dozen of them in her cupboard. But when she got home she saw that they were too expensive. She couldn't afford it. So she decided to not eat them.

Jeff and his house. Jeff is a realtor and he is going to sell his house. Jeff has been looking at many houses. He has been working hard to find the right one. Finally he finds a home that he loves. Jeff is excited that he is finally selling his home.

The Sushi Chef. Dan wanted to be a sushi chef. He enrolled in culinary school. He studied the art and science of making sushi. Dan learned he could cook his own sushi. Now, Dan owns his own sushi restaurant!

Long Hair. Sara wanted to get a new hairstyle. She had long hair but no way to wear it. She was sad because no one would let her cut it herself. Her friend came over with scissors and told her to try it. Sara loved her new long hair.
The Amusement Park. The family was very excited. They were going to the amusement park! They went inside the park. They rode the rides. It was an amazing family outing!

Baked apples. Sally wanted some apples for a snack. She grabbed the apples from the refrigerator. She got out the apples and began to peel them. Once they were peeled, Sally put them in the bowl. She then put the apples in the oven.
Sand. Tom loved his neighbor. They always played with each other. One day his neighbor offered to play with him in a sandbox. Tom accepted the offer. They spent the day together in the sandbox.
The teacher at the store. Sarah was a great teacher. She loved helping people. She saw a man in trouble and helped him. He was very grateful. They both got very good grades!

Leaky Roof. Tom lived in a house with a wooden deck. He always thought the deck was very strong. One day it rained really hard and it was very dry. The deck under the deck gave out under the weight of the rain. The deck beneath collapsed and it flooded.

New transportation. Tom wanted to buy a new car. He had a friend who owned a truck. He was able to get the truck used for free. Tom was very thankful. He was able to buy the truck with the free truck.

Exam. Kai's teacher was giving an exam tomorrow. Kai hoped he would do well. However, he knew he had studied over the weekend. He decided to cram for the exam instead. Kai ended up doing well on his exam.

Dan the candy man. Dan was known as the world's best candy man. He would make sure that his candy was the best. He spent a lot of time looking for new flavors to put in his bottles. One day a customer came in asking him about a new flavor. Dan didn't tell her the truth but it wound up being true.

Goldfish. Ida found a goldfish in the water. She took it inside and cleaned it. Then she put it in a bowl and put some food in it. After a while, she set it on the edge and let it go! It jumped into the air, and it landed on a rock!

Can't Come In Today. Tim's girlfriend wasn't feeling well. He had her stay home from school. He made her eat her vegetables. She called her parents and asked if she could come in. Tim was surprised and apologized.

Disastrous Diana. Diana was a very bad driver. Her car broke down at an intersection. A police officer gave her a sobriety test. Diana passed the test and was given a ticket for $150. Disappointed, she drove to the nearest store to pay it.
Fussy Cat. Our cat is fussy. She wants to sleep. She also wants to eat. Sometimes she does both at once. We try to give her treats when she is calm.

Boating. Sasha went out for her first boating trip. She had never boated before. She decided to get on one and had a great time. The boat was moving and Sasha could see a lot. She ended up having a lot of fun and will be doing it again soon.

Fashion. Marnie loved fashion. She was a designer for a big brand. She was invited to attend a designer conference. Marnie attended, and she got a great idea for a product. She created her very own fashion line and it became very successful!

Marie. Marie needed a new dress for her sister's wedding. She went shopping and tried on dresses on her own. She did not find anything she liked. Marie realized she did not have enough money to buy her dress. Marie was glad to have found a good quality dress for the wedding.

Popsicle drip. I put drops of water on a popsicle to make it easier to drink. I poured in the popsicle mix, stirring it a bit. After a minute or so, it started to thicken. I tasted it and it was good, so I continued to let it thicken. I put a little more on top of it and then drank it.

Whistling Tea Kettle. Gina's grandma asked her to take out the tea kettle to make some tea. She agreed and began to walk up and down the stairs. Gina had been in a lot of trouble with her grandpa. Now she was in a good mood and was playing along. The kettle whistled and Gina was relieved to have done something nice.

Peapod. I used Peapod for my internet. I had trouble getting the site to load. I asked an employee to look at my settings. She said Peapod wasn't using my router's max connection. I was able to get the site to load.

Garrett's Baseball Game. Garrett loved watching baseball. His favorite team was playing their home opener. Garrett went to the stadium to meet his favorite player. Garrett got autographs from the player and his wife. Garrett went home to tell his family about his great time at the game.

Star Quarterback. One of my favorite football teams has been losing for weeks. They lost the starting quarterback to injury. They have also lost their starting running back to injury. The team needs to find a quarterback to help them win the remaining games. Luckily they drafted a star quarterback in the second round.
School Dance. Sara was nervous for the school dance. Her friends assured her she would be okay. She did her best at the dance. Her friends gave her good advice. Sara had a great time at the dance.

Body Transformation. John was concerned about his body image. He decided to make a change in his eating habits. John began cutting carbohydrates. He also began exercising his upper body. John ended up losing 40 pounds in six months.
Charging my phone. I tried to get into my car. I realized my phone was not charged. I looked all over for it. I did not see it anywhere. I was upset but I was relieved.
Bike Ride. Sam took his bike on a ride. Sam felt really exhilarated by the speed. Sam took a wrong turn. Sam crashed his bike. Sam's mother made him walk his bike home.
The Nail. She broke her favorite nail. She went to the store. She found a nail clump. She used it to make a mitten. She bought a mitten for her kitten.
The Whale Problem. Timmy loved whales. He wanted to see a big one. He planned on going with his family to Alaska. On his way there he ran into trouble. A whale attacked him and he almost died.

The Model. Kate wanted to be a model. She knew that she was short but she wanted to be tall. So she decided to scale up her measurements to become a model. She worked out every day. By the time she was 18, she was tall and thin enough to model!
That Star. Bob watched the sky. He saw a bright star. He followed it to its location. Bob discovered a new planet. Bob named it after the star.

Fairy-tale. My brother and I used to read books together. We were both little. Our favorite was to read about the adventures of fairies. We read about them every day, even in the middle of the night. This is what we used to call a fairy-tale.

Sick from fajitas. Lisa was feeling sick. Her mom was making her chicken fajitas for dinner. Lisa tried to eat a few pieces but it was hard. Then her mom said they could take a break for a bit. Lisa ended up eating one piece and felt better in no time.

Excitement. Kim's dad was a big football fan. But he was too proud to attend a professional football game. So Kim secretly watched a few games on television at home. Kim was excited to see her team beat the rival team. Kim hoped the experience would teach her to appreciate football.

Hot weather. Tim went on vacation. It was 95 degrees outside. He decided to stay in and have fun. Unfortunately Tim noticed it was getting hotter. He stayed in and tried to take advantage of the weather.

Walden. My family and I were driving through Walden Pond one day. It was a beautiful day for picnics in the country. We stopped at a campground and ate lunch and walked around. My cousin told me he was going home and asked if I could stay. It was a nice gesture and he was very grateful.

Visual Genome. Cathy was interested in visual genomes. She decided to have her DNA sequenced. She was able to obtain a large amount of data. Her data showed that she had a unique genetic profile. Cathy was able to obtain an image of her visual genotype.
Diet Soda. Tim loved diet soda. He went to the store to get some. He didn't have any money for it though. He had to sneak it in and steal it. Tim's mom found out and was mad at him.

Cactus in the Window. Jenna needed to find a way to pass the time. She decided to get out of her house. She went outside and climbed a tree to go outside. Jenna was amazed at the beautiful color of the leaves outside. She decided to go back inside and relax.

All work all play. I was working on my computer. Suddenly, my friend asked me to play a game with him. After the game was over, he said he was bored. I told him I would go to the park next time. I was disappointed that he didn't go with me.

Gymnastics Flips. Sarah loved gymnastics and dreamed of being a professional. She went to gymnastics camp every summer. Sarah also joined a team that competed at state meets. Sarah didn't make the team, but she learned many valuable skills. Sarah started training harder and finally made the team!

Prank calls. Joe was playing Pokemon Go all day. He found a bunch of calls he didn't recognize. He checked the phonebook to see who the numbers were. He called all of the unknown numbers. He finally found them and called them back.

Prank. John wanted to prank his girlfriend on their vacation. So John went to her hotel room. John entered her room and began to yell at her. John screamed and screamed. John was arrested for criminal threats.
Slow down. The car was going pretty fast. John decided to slow it down a bit. It started to rain. John decided to pull over. He had to walk around a little bit.

The Bus Driver. Barry was very hungry. Barry decided he would order a sub from a fast food restaurant. Barry sat down at the restaurant and ordered the sub. After eating the sub, Barry ordered some fries from the restaurant. After eating the fries, Barry enjoyed his sandwich.

Duran Duran. My friend Joe lives in NYC. He was going to visit the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2015. He asked his daughter, Jane, if she would go with him. Jane reluctantly agreed. They drove up to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

Fresh lemonade. When my girlfriend and I went to the store we were going to get lemonade. We decided to buy a bottle of lemonade. She did not have any. I went to the store to buy some. I ended up buying some more than she did.

Marcus Makes a Sandwich. Marcus decides that he needs a sandwich. He begins to make a sandwich. He makes it without buying any bread. When it is all done he eats it. He decides that he needs to eat more sandwiches.
Lost love. Tim had been dating Laura for three months. One day they couldn't agree on a movie. Tim insisted on one with another actress. She cried and left Tim. Tim never talked to Laura again.
Smelly Cat. Alicia's cat is always dirty. The cat stays in the kitchen. Alicia decided to wash the cat every day. The cat always stayed clean. Alicia now feels less stressed out about her cat.
Start your fight!. I saw him walk to the table. He started to attack the man. The man turned around. A policeman came and told him to stop. He was arrested.

Toothpaste. Tasha wanted to stop biting her nails. But she didn't know how. She asked her mom to give her a bottle of toothpaste. She put toothpaste in her mouth. Then she spit it out and tried to stop biting.
Talent. Jane wanted to be a singer. She auditioned for a local talent show. She sang a song for a lot of people. At the show, a lot of people liked her singing. Jane got the part in the talent show!
Ingredients. He went to the store. He bought a few ingredients. He forgot about it. He brought it back home. He made lasagna.

Wild Rosebush. Bob wanted to grow a wild rosebush. Bob bought lots of rose seeds. He planted the seeds in his backyard. After a few days, he had a small rosebush in the backyard. Bob loved having a wild rosebush in his backyard.

Swimming. Lulu and her family went swimming in the ocean. Her mom noticed that they had missed their exit. Instead of going home, they swam further out into the ocean. They made it to the other side and swam as far as they could. Luckily they made it back home before the sun went down.

The first kiss. Sara had just moved into a new house. She was nervous about making new friends. She had never had a kiss before but she had heard nice things about it. On her first day she went out on the porch. To her shock she actually really liked it.

Melvin's Dog. Melvin loved to take walks around his neighborhood. One evening, he went on a walk that had a dog tag. He didn't realize there was a dog on his walk, so he turned around. The dog ran up to him and bit his leg. Melvin realized he should have recognized the dog and taken the dog off.

Jason's decision. Jason wants to go to the movie theatre. However, he doesn't have enough money to buy tickets. Jason's mother tells him he can earn money if he mows lawns. Jason mows lawns for all of his neighbors. Jason earns enough money to buy tickets for the movie theatre.
Stunt. Beth wanted to be a stuntwoman. She practiced everyday. She had a huge stunt. It took forever. But finally she did it!
Huge. I took my toddler to see the new Star Wars movie. She didn't like it. She cried and cried. Finally she calmed down. We laughed about it later.

Lost Car. Dan was going on vacation. He took his family with him. When they stopped at a gas station, Dan realized his car was gone. They asked the gas attendant for help. He paid him $50 to help them find his car.
Frozen Ice. Kim's car had ice on it when she got home. It was very cold out. She tried to melt the ice. Unfortunately it was not working. Kim's car wouldn't move.

Close call. Ana was taking a test in biology. She was looking forward to the next one. But on the way to the classroom she got a phone call. The test was postponed due to snow. Ana was devastated to not get to take her test.

The Alamo. The family took a trip to San Antonio. They took a tour of the Alamo. They read the history of the Alamo. They also got to see the Alamo in person. The family had a great time on their trip.

How Shelly Broke Her Toe. One day I ran into my friend on the stairs. She was on a ladder. She was holding onto the ladder while I walked up to her. I tripped and I fell on my toe. I had to go to the hospital to get it repaired.

Jelly Shoes. Tara loved to wear high heels. She purchased a pair of pink high heels. At first her feet hurt from walking so fast. However, Tara loved them and continued wearing them. After a month, Tara noticed a blister on her feet.

Astronaut. Derek is an astronaut in his early 20's. Derek was chosen by NASA to become an astronaut. Derek has been training and practicing for decades. Last summer he became the first person to ever walk on the moon. Derek is now the chief executive officer of a space company.

The Move. I wanted to move across the country. The costs would be huge, but I wanted to live in California. I found a cheap apartment in a suburban area. I moved there, and immediately fell in love with the area. Now I go to California almost every day!

A Kingdom Betrayal. A little baby named Henry is being bullied by a boy named Charles. The police don't believe Henry's claims, and they send him to a lawyer. After months of waiting, the lawyer finally sees the evidence. He finds Charles' confession, and sends Henry to his parents. Now Henry and Charles are married and Henry is no longer a bully.
Breakfast. Tom had the same job for years. He decided to start his own business. He decided to make a bagel breakfast. Everyone loved it and it became popular. He was able to make a lot more money.

Biggest Fan. Jim went to a baseball game with his wife. Jim's favorite player scored a home run and was cheering for him. But Jim's wife, who had never been to a game, was not a fan. She simply hoped it was just a home run. She wanted Jim to tell her that she was the biggest fan.

Stretching. Irene was doing some work on her laptop. Her desk was a little cramped. It was making it harder for her to type. Irene decided to purchase a larger size of desk chair. She was able to fit it much better.

How I sprained my ankle. My father told me that if I sprained my ankle, I would never grow up. I would be confined to a room all my life. I went to a basketball game and tried to score the game winning shot. I fell to the ground and felt a huge pain in my ankle. I had to rest it the rest of the game, and it never got better.
Gym. John wanted to try out for the team. He knew he had to work hard. He hired a trainer. He worked out every day. He tried out for the team.

Stolen Jewelry. Tim wanted to steal something. He saw a cute necklace in the store window. Tim decided to try to steal it. He took it into the back room. The store manager caught him and gave him a warning.

Michael's Collection. Michael always loved comic books. He would collect a lot of them from different comic book stores. One day Michael's mother passed away. She left all of Michael's comic books to her son. Michael was sad that he lost all of his comic books.

Two Fans and Their Favorite Show. Two fans of different teams were about to have a heated argument. They decided to have a small talk before the game. One fan said the other fan's team was terrible. He wanted to prove it and yelled at the other fan. He was promptly escorted out of the stadium and banned.
Racing Cars. Sammy wanted to go to the car show. He invited his friend to go. They ended up racing cars. They did the fastest lap they could. They won first place.

Fishing. I love to fish for several hours at a time. I always end up getting very sick. I go to the doctor to see what the problem is. The doctor told me I am going to be sick all week. It has been a stressful week so far.
Paint Cover Up. Tim was having a house fire. It started off small but quickly grew larger. Tim had no idea what to do about it. He decided to paint over the whole thing. He hoped no one would notice.

Kitten Friends. Sally's cat got out and knocked the television down. Sally had to get her cat to come inside. Her cat liked to go outside. She thought she'd find her cat outside. But her cat brought the television back inside.

Cross country. Sam was in college. One day he decided he wanted to cross country run. So he joined a cross country team and trained hard. He went on to be a cross country champion. Sam won many awards for his accomplishment.
Great birthday. Jillian had a birthday party. The party was outdoors with lots of family and friends. There was a lot of music. Unfortunately the rain ended up canceling the party. It ruined her day.

Josh. Josh liked to make his friends laugh. He thought it was funny to cut his finger while making his friends laugh. So he made a video of him doing it and posted it online. Josh's friends made fun of him in the video. Josh was very sad.

Drive-thru. Cathy loved to go to drive-thrus. Cathy often ordered her food by the hour. Cathy was tired of ordering her food at drive-thru. Cathy decided to try a new restaurant. Cathy could not believe how wonderful the new restaurant was.

Best Trip Ever. Jane was traveling across the country with her boyfriend. They decided they would take a trip to San Diego. While there they both had a great time. Jane couldn't believe how fun it was. They both planned their next trip.

Lovers and Flowers. John and Sara decided to visit their friend Mark. Mark was a sweet old man and they both wanted to get close to him. Mark surprised John with a beautiful bouquet of roses. John and Sara smiled as they ate their lovely meal. After eating dinner, they decided to plan a second date for Mark.

Steve's Award. Steve worked on a construction crew. He got a construction crew to do a very important job for him. Steve wanted to do something nice for them. Steve gave them the money he would make in tips. The crew thanked Steve for his generosity.

No Biting Please. Gina's mother had made her a bowl of cereal. She couldn't take the cereal and threw it away. After dinner, she wanted to eat her cereal. She decided to eat her cereal without chewing. She was disgusted as she spit out the milk and cereal.

Calling In Sick. Cindy decided to call in sick to work. It was her first time being off of work for so long. She felt nervous and thought about dropping out. Her boss understood and encouraged her. She was relieved to get back to work.

The Surprise in the Creek. The girl was walking through the woods. She saw some rustling around in the branches. She peeked around a corner. A squirrel was crouching by the creek. The squirrel had a baby in his arms.

Fell in the lake. I was hiking in the woods one day. I decided to walk back home. However, I got stuck in a large mud puddle. I fell into the lake and I floated for quite some time. Thankfully, my mom and I made it home safely.

For Victory. Gina's teacher had the class vote on a new project. She was mad the project was a tie. Everyone stood in line to vote. The teacher read the votes. Gina and her friends were sent home for being late.

New Horizons. The Smith family planned to take a trip. They had always planned on going to Yellowstone. The kids wanted to go there. They finally booked their tickets. They are very excited to go there.
Instant Exit. Tom got into a fight with his girlfriend. He pulled her out of the car. She slammed her head into the window. The door broke. Tom got into a fight again the next day.
Bad haircut. Lucy was upset with her hair. She had had it chopped off for months. Finally she had enough. She went to the salon. She got her hair chopped off.

Old Prison. The old prison was the scene of many riots. It was built back in the 1800's and was deteriorating. The state decided it was time to tear it down. They hired an engineer to tear down the old prison. The old prison was torn down after it was finished.

Vegetable Garden. One day the Roberts planted some seeds. The seeds grew into vegetables. They grew up into healthy, tasty vegetables. The next year the Roberts had a garden again. They used the vegetables that grew up in the garden.
The Cracked Cup. Tina was at the store. She was buying soda for a party. She was carrying a cup of soda when her cup slipped. The cup cracked open. Tina cleaned up the mess and paid for her soda.

Big Money. John always wanted to be rich and famous. He always dreamed of being an actor. He decided to start a Youtube channel and make money. After many years of hard work, he now has a successful channel. Now he is a living example of what hard work can bring.

Pet a Fish. Lacy decided she wanted a fish as a pet. Lacy asked her parents for a fish tank. Her parents said they would buy her one if she took care of it. Lacy's parents bought her a fish tank. Lacy took good care of her fish tank and it grew.

Cookies. Today we went out to buy cookies. We were not sure where the store was located. So we ended up driving around the block to find one. The line was so long it took us an hour to find the store. By the time we got there, they had sold out.

The Freezer. Ginny was hungry so she went to the kitchen. She grabbed a frozen pizza and a bag of chips. She put the food in the freezer and froze it. She couldn't wait to eat it! She was happy to be finished with it all.

Ooh That Smell. The house across the street from me has this really bad smell. I don't think it's due to the dog, but it's definitely coming from it. There is just one odorant in my apartment that I can't put out. The only thing I can do is move all of the carpets and carpet coverings. I hope my friends don't notice.

Hair. The woman cleaned her hair. The man took a picture of her hair. He sent the picture to her friends. Her friends told her about how awful her hair looked. The woman began to cut her hair herself.
Louvre. In 1995, my wife and I went to the Louvre. We went there in a small bus. It was a great way to see the artwork. She is a bit apprehensive. I think she will be fine.

Wedding Video. Alicia wanted to film her wedding. She called a few friends and asked if they would do the video. Soon enough they had a team of extras ready. The day of the event she filmed the video. It was so great she got so many compliments on it!
The Pet Trial. Timmy had been kicked out of his house. His pet fish, Spot, had gotten loose. Timmy called the pet police. The police came to Timmy's house. Timmy was able to get Spot back.

Marco Jumps Rope. Marco realizes that he has gained weight in his belly. He decides that he needs to start exercising more. Finally he decides to start jumping rope. Marco jumps rope for the first time. Marco is very happy to have lost a lot of weight.

Early Dismissal. Dan's job had a strict no late policy. Dan decided to take an early lunch to escape the rule. When he arrived at work, everyone was sitting at their tables waiting. No one was allowed in the building and he had to take a seat. Dan left early and felt happy that he was not late.

New friends. Alicia was excited to get her ears pierced. She got her mother to take her to the parlor. She sat in the chair while her mother put the earrings in. She felt happy for the first time in a long time. When the artist finished she gave her a hug and said goodbye.

Linda starts a garden. Linda had wanted a garden since she was a little girl. Linda decided that she would plant a garden in her backyard. Linda went to the local nursery to get the supplies she needed. At home, Linda spent the next few weeks planting the garden. Now Linda has a lovely garden in her backyard.

Lost Tools. I was trying to fix up a bicycle. It was my first time using tools, so I was shaky. When I was finished, I was about to go outside. I couldn't find the tool I needed and almost walked off the bike. Then, I realized I left it behind in the car.
The steak. Sally wanted steak for dinner. She decided to cook it. She tried it out. It was perfect. Sally was happy she made it.

Erik's First Kiss. Erick had never kissed anyone before. He was nervous about his first kiss. He nervously kissed the girl next to him. She smiled and said he should try again. The next day at school he had another kiss.

Round Food. Sara had a very hard time finding food in her house. She did her best to have a few sandwiches every night. Unfortunately, she just couldn't keep up with demand. She decided to get a second job. With this second job, she managed to keep up with demand for food.

Envious. Tim was jealous of his friends who had fancy cars. And he would always make fun of them whenever they drove. One day, he decided to go out for a drive. He realized how fast they were going and was happy. But later, he heard that his friends had bought new cars.
The Scientists. The scientists looked for the cure for cancer. They found a promising drug. They began testing it. Soon, it was FDA approved. The drug cured cancer.

Going Blind. I once had a hard time seeing. I was so out of touch with reality that it effected my relationships. I could never see my girlfriend. Eventually she got married and I lost my sight. I ended up living with my blind mother for four years.

dinner in the woods. Kelly was invited to dinner by her cousin. Her cousin asked her to go camping. Kelly accepted the invitation. She packed all her supplies for a wilderness trip. When she got to the campsite she got lost and was upset.
Cancer. Cheryl had cancer. She went through chemo and radiation. After years of therapy her cancer had grown. She went to the doctor. She was told she had stage 4 cancer.

Good Job, Little Buddy. Amy's crush had invited her over for drinks. She was excited about getting to know him. She sat down to eat her dinner and relax. He sat at the table waiting for her to finish. Amy realized it was her best friend Beth.
Water Damage. Tom was in the car with friends. They were drinking water. It started to rain. Tom's water got dirty. Tom wound up breaking his windshield.

Fish Tank Maintenance. I tried to clean my fish tank last night. I got all of the fish except for one. I could not see the fish so I used a flashlight. The flashlight was out of batteries and was out of my sight. I ended up having to buy a new battery operated flashlight.

Joey. Joey had a baby girl last year. He has been taking care of the baby ever since. He wants to give her a great life. But he knows she needs to breastfeed for months. He is giving her one month of bottle feeding.

Keys. Eddie loved to play hockey with his hockey sticks. However, the keys to his house were always lost. One day he was playing with his dad and they played a game of hide and seek. He could not find the keys anywhere. Eddie's father laughed and said he had already lost them.
Cat kisses. Cayla is walking home one day. She spots a cat by a tree. Cayla decides to pet the cat. The cat runs up and gives her a kiss. Cayla is so happy she pet the cat.

Baby Bird. Timothy took his new kitten to the park. He was playing with him when he heard a squawking sound. The kitten hopped away and into a tree. Timothy and his kitten searched but couldn't find it. They looked and searched until they found the kitten in the branches.
starfish. Joe had never eaten starfish before. He bought some off the internet. He went to his local supermarket. He picked up several starfish. Joe decided not to eat starfish ever again.

Long Distance. Dan had an idea for a new product. Dan decided to use an invisible ink pen on his notebook. Dan's friend decided to buy a pen for Dan's notebook. Dan's friend accidentally used Dan's invisible ink pen. Dan was upset with his friend for not thinking of the consequences.
Friends. I have a secret crush on my friend. I have been trying to meet up with her for weeks. She has never responded. I decided to try and meet her. Today, she finally responded!

The Baby. Ruth went into labor at 12 weeks pregnant. She had been at the hospital for only 24 hours. They thought they had a girl, and she was just growing bigger. Her baby was born 4lbs 7oz at 4 weeks old. Luckily, Ruth delivered a boy.

Let It Go. Linda was walking around with her kitten. She noticed one kitten was crying. She took the kitten from the kitten and threw it in the bushes. Linda later found the cat eating leaves from the bushes. Linda had no idea why she had to throw the kitten away.

John's Idea. John was working on a new car. He was going to build it out of his old Toyota pickup truck. However, John's dad suggested that he build a van. John's dad bought him a van to build his new truck. John liked the idea and began working on his car.

Saving For The Future. Bob had lived at the same apartment for twenty years. He was determined to retire by the time he was 50. He bought a large house and bought a Ferrari. He saved enough money for college and a nice car. Bob is now 60 and enjoys retirement.

The game payment. Sean was playing in a football game. The home team was losing. Sean felt that his team should concede so that they could win. Sean's coach told him that conceding would make them lose. Sean was shocked but he accepted and their team won.

Peanuts. I ate peanuts when I was a child. They were very spicy and delicious! I started to develop a rash. After a week of being out in the sun my skin became very red. I had to go to the doctor who gave me allergy medicine.
Treatment. Sophie was upset. She didn't want to be a part of the therapy. So she decided to go. She found out she needed stitches. She ended up getting them removed.

A Break. Eli needed to get out of the house to talk to his mother. But, Eli did not want to go to the store. He searched online for a bus stop with good public transportation. Finally, he found the stop with an open spot. He boarded the bus to his meeting with his mother.

Monster Truck Show. I went to a monster truck show. The crowd loved to stare at the trucks. The trucks were really awesome. They also were very loud. I went back home because the truck show was too loud.
lost boy. The man looked around for his lost son. He could not find him. He asked his son what was going on. The boy said his name was Charles. The man looked him in the eye.
The awful truth. Tommy was drinking wine. And he decided to eat a piece of cake. His mom tried to take the cake away. And she threw a tantrum. Tommy had to tell his mom the truth.
The meal. The family was starving. They went to the store to buy food. After they got home, they started to cook. They had fresh fruit and veggies for dinner. They enjoyed their home cooked meal.

Babysitter. Rita had just come home from babysitting a lot of kids. The children were unruly and loud. Her mother brought the kids to her house. Rita gave the kids some ice cream. The kids quieted down for a few minutes and then left.

Amber's Weekend. Amber was having her weekend off. She wanted to go out to dinner with friends. She called her friend May's and asked to hang out. May said okay and Amber came over to dinner. May said they could go out again next weekend.

Return Policy. John had bought a new TV. He bought it at the store. He brought it home and realized the TV was no longer working. John called the store's return policy. He was able to exchange his TV.
Dancing. I went to my friend's house. We danced all night. It was the best birthday party I ever had. We even went to a play. We stayed there dancing the rest of the night.
Refusal. My son had been smoking since he was three. He had tried different methods of quitting. I had tried hard to help him. He refused to even try another. He said he would just try one more time.

The Bank Job. My mom and I went to the bank one day. The teller gave us a $100 bill. My mom and I went to the bank to deposit the money. The teller gave us our money and said we can't spend it. She was very confused and left me to do chores that night.

Christmas Tree. Tim wanted a tree for his home. His wife said they could not afford one. Tim asked his neighbor for help. Tim's neighbor had a lot of extra tree boxes. Tim got his tree for free with his neighbor's help.

Ceramics Class. Sasha was a great artist when she was young. She started a family of her own. Her dad helped her start her first career as a professional. Eventually she was able to earn her own place as an artist. Now she has her own studio and sells her own work all the time.
Missed Bus. John was on his way to work. He didn't notice when the bus came. It was already too late to catch. John got to work twenty minutes late. He was fired from his job.

Baseball game. The baseball game is tomorrow night. I hope I can get an autograph. I drove all the way there to get a spot. After the game, they let me sit in the bleachers. I can't wait for the game to start!
Senator. Tom worked for the senator. They were both corrupt. Tom decided to do something about it. He ran for office. He was never re-elected.

Always late. Barry always oversleeps in the morning. He has trouble getting up the nerve to leave for work. His boss knows how frustrated he is about his  sleep patterns. So Barry is never late for work even if he has to be up. Barry is glad he doesn't have to leave for work.
Death. I was talking to my friend yesterday. He said he found his grandfather's body. My heart sunk to the bottom of my gut. I looked for a week. Finally someone called to say they found it.

Trouble Cats. There once was a cat that didn't have a collar. The owner didn't know what to do or where to look for it. She asked her neighbors if they had seen the cat. They informed her that they had seen the cat roaming around. Now the cat lives with the elderly couple in their home.

Crying. John and Jane were fighting. They would yell and scream and cry all night. Finally John's mom had enough. She took them to see a psychologist. It helped both of them to calm down and stop fighting.

Cautious Taxi. Liz always drives very carefully during taxi rides. She always looks out for other drivers and passengers. Yesterday she noticed someone following her. She was so scared, she pulled over. She was relieved when the driver got out and explained.
The Van. Cameron had a van. His friends would always throw rocks at it. Finally, he put the van out on the curb. A lot of people stopped to play with it. A local store gave him a ton of money for it!

Gold digger. Tom was a good looking guy. His friends would always try to talk him into doing something. Tom always turned them down. But one day someone convinced him to go to a pool party. Tom ended up having a lot of fun at the party.

Parasailing. We went parasailing on our vacation. We rented a small raft that was too small for a large boat. The waves were really big on the small raft. The large boat was more stable and helped us get around better. I was more comfortable on the larger boat after that.

Hockey Fight. Jim was always picked on at school. He felt he deserved more. So he started fighting people. But he wound up breaking one kid's nose. Jim's parents got so upset they grounded him for a week.

Snow Storm. I woke up in the middle of the night with a cold chill. It was snowing, but I thought it was going to stop soon. But it continued all night and I had to shovel snow. The next day I was so tired I couldn't keep up my work. I was very disappointed to have missed my school bus.

Expert Boxer. John's family wanted to have an outdoor Christmas tradition. They looked up boxing as a family tradition for a day. They got tickets to a boxing match. The match lasted over two hours. They were very disappointed the match did not go as planned.
Book. Jane found a book in the library. She liked it so much she picked it up. She brought it home and read it. Jane fell asleep with the book. The next day she forgot it was in the library.

Hound Control. Our hounds were running in the house when I heard the front door open. The hounds ran under the couch, and hid in the closet. I heard a small scream and a thud as they ran out of the house. I looked under the couch and saw the hounds eating a mouse. The hounds ran back under the couch.

Loud Party. My house is so quiet it makes me nervous. Sometimes I want to scream to wake up people. My friend gave me a mixtape of different noises. I tried putting them all in the mix. It worked so well, my neighbors were not bothered.

The First Pay. Diane was pregnant and working hard to have her first baby. Diane was very excited about her first paycheck and couldn't wait. The next day, Diane learned that she was going to get a check for it. She was very surprised that she would be getting paid before her due date. Diane decided that she was going to work hard to make it big.

Free Samples. Tom's girlfriend liked ice cream. He noticed she only had ice cream on special days. They decided to buy a bunch of free samples. Tom's girlfriend was grateful. She thanked him for the treat.
Fun day at the Carnival. Today was the day for the annual Carnival. The parade came to town. My son picked up some of his friends. The carnival was full of fun activities. The day was a blast!
Drinking. The bartender got a very hot drink. She had put ice in it. The customer got drunk. The bartender got fired. She got a second job.

STAR TESTING. The man filled out a medical history. He asked if they knew what the reason was. They said they had cancer. He was nervous about going. The next day they told him he had the exact same problem.
Friend. Ava's family was very poor. They tried to buy her a toy but she refused. When she was ten, Ava and her cousin became friends. They traveled the world together. They had a lot of fun that way.

Dead end job. Dana always wanted to work as a waitress. She wanted to do it for a living. However, she was having so many problems with her new job. She went to quit and talked to a manager. The manager gave her the job anyway and she was very happy.

Movies. The Smith family was going to watch a movie. The mom told her kids to be quiet. They were playing video games the whole time. They decided to get fast food. They were sad when they had to get out of the movie.
Pool Party. It was a hot summer day in Buffalo. We wanted to have a pool party. We rented a few floatboats and hired a clown. A lot of people showed up. The party was a hit.

Try It Now. Kim tried different things when she was a little girl. Her favorite one was trying lemonade. She had never had the idea to drink it from a pitcher. As she aged her thirst grew and thirst would not leave. Kim ended up drinking a gallon of lemonade on her own at age 15.

Misery. Tom was a horrible father. One day his children decided to play a prank on him. They painted him pink and tied him up in the basement. Tom's children laughed at him and called him mama. Tom had a heart attack and died after that.

Valentine's Surprise. I was in junior high when my best friend was turning 18. My father bought her a valentine card. It was pink with hearts on the card. When she opened it, I saw a dozen hearts and a bow. She loved it and gave me a hug, too.
Lost Girl. The little girl walked around outside. She went down the street. She walked to the park. She was lost. She had to ask someone for help.

Vivian Cuts her Hair. Vivian had long straight brown hair. One day, she decided to cut her long hair very short. At first, she hated her new short hair. But soon, she became attached to her long hair. Vivian was glad that she had cut her hair short.
Bar. Sally was having a barbeque. She had never been to a bar before. She decided to buy some supplies. She bought some meats and vegetables. Her barbeque went great!

Facebook Drama. Tom's parents divorced and he didn't like his new neighbor. Tom's new neighbor would post offensive Facebook comments. Tom confronted him about it. The neighbor apologized and said it was ok. Tom felt better about being friends with him.

Steak Sandwich. Jane bought a steak sandwich at the store. It was made with ham, potatoes, and cheese. Jane ate her sandwich on the couch. She forgot about the steak. Jane decided to put the steak in the refrigerator so she wouldn't get hungry.
Goog. I had a stroke in October of 2011. I had trouble walking. I had to use a cane. I asked a friend to help me move around. She let me use her computer.

calming nerves. It was time for Kayla to leave her new school. She had never left her home state before. It was so foreign to her, she was getting nervous. When she got on the bus, she felt at ease. The ride was no big deal, all she needed was a change of scenery.

Lucretia Packs A Lunch. Lucretia is out of lunch and hasn't had time to eat all day. She decides to pack a lunch to eat with her friends at work. She puts her favorite sandwich in a bowl with water. Her friends love Lucretia's lunch. She is happy to be able to eat lunch with her friends.
Turning Point. Gina's car wasn't turning in a straight line. She pulled the car to the side of the road. She changed the tire. She pushed her car in reverse. She turned in the same direction.

UUA. My niece works for the Unitarian-Universalist church in Boston. She is the spiritual director. Yesterday she had an ordination ceremony. She gave an inspiring talk. I think she will be a great minister.

Ants. Dina was at the playground when she noticed an angry looking ant. She screamed and ran away from the area, not wanting the insect to bite her. Suddenly, the angry ant bit her on the arm. Dina began to cry, but her parents quickly stopped her. They told Dina that they had to go home to clean up the mess.
Reverse Psychology. Tom was very competitive. His friends told him he couldn't be competitive. Tom never really listened. Tom became the best in his school at it. Now Tom is the best in his school.

You'd Think They'd Require a Commercial License. After purchasing a new car, Dave thought it would be wise to get a commercial license. Dave decided to go through the process of obtaining one. After paying his fee, Dave was required to take the written exam. Dave was very proud of himself when he passed with flying colors. Now Dave has his commercial driving permit.
Tyler gets hacked. Tyler was using his computer. He noticed his computer was slow. Tyler decided to play some online games. He was playing games with his friends. The friend's computer was hacked.

Financial Issues. Tom had a lot of financial obligations. Unfortunately, he had been short on his bills. Tom tried his best to do everything on time but everything broke. He asked for some help but was ignored. Tom wound up just missing bills and had more money problems.

Hide and Seek. We have a big backyard. There is a big pond that sits under our house. I like to hide in the pond. One day, I saw a family of four children playing in the pond. They were hiding from a neighbor boy.

Fault. Bob's car would not start one morning. He had to call his mechanic to get it checked out. He had to wait an hour because his car needed to be towed. He called the auto club, and made an appointment. His mechanic came in and fixed his car, and Bob was happy.
Torn Jeans. Tom bought new jeans. They fit him poorly. Tom wore them to school. They tore right out of his hands. Tom was upset at the store for not taking them back.
Horror Movies. I love to watch scary movies. When I saw The Ring I was so scared. I couldn't stop watching it. My friends and I stayed up all night. We watched it all over again in the morning.
Stray Cat. Ana found a stray cat in her backyard. She took it inside. She put a cat carrier in it's mouth. Ana called the number on the carrier. Soon, the cat was on its way home.

No Vacation. Sue decided to take a week of vacation. Her husband reminded her that he had other plans. Sue was annoyed and decided to give him a week of vacation as well. The next week of vacation she regretted her decision to go elsewhere. She was so upset that she decided not to vacation in the future.

Cherry Pie. Rita wanted to bake a cherry pie. She didn't have any cherries and needed to find some. At a grocery store, she bought apples. The cherries came out very hard. Rita decided she didn't have to make a cherry pie.

Follower. Kate was riding her bike to work. The bike had a broken chain. Kate rode her bike with no problems. Then she noticed her chain had sprung a small leak. Kate decided she was a better rider without a chain.

Zoe Speaks. Zoe is a girl scout. She loves telling her friends about being a girl scout. Zoe has to stop speaking in front of boys because she gets too scared. Zoe decides to speak to a counselor about her fears. The counselor is very understanding and helps Zoe overcome her fears.
Baby. I found a pregnant woman on the side of the road. I decided to give her the baby. I drove to her house and took it to her. We decided on adoption. I brought the baby home with me.

The Lake. The couple was in the lake for a day on a fishing trip. They caught lots of fish but it was late before the boat left. They were getting ready to leave when it started raining. Their boat was ruined by the heavy rain. They were able to get back on the lake the next day.

Porch Swing. I love to go to the beach every summer. It's my favorite time of the year. When it starts to snow though I stop going. I don't want to waste a week of my time in the winter. But when it starts snowing and I go anyway I feel very happy.
first beer. Sophie went to the store. She was looking for the perfect beer. She could not find a beer she liked. So she tried one. Sophie ended up loving it.

The Box. Sally wanted a new doll for her birthday. Her parents told her they could only afford one. Sally cried and cried. Her parents decided to buy her the box instead. Sally was disappointed, but she was surprised.

Losing Streak. Tim was at the park with friends. He saw a man trying to get across a bridge. It seemed like he couldn't stop crossing. Tim didn't want to be the one to do so. He tried to stop him but it didn't work.

Sad On Easter. It was Easter and all the kids were lined up. The little boy in the car looked at the basket and frowned. He wanted an Easter Bunny. He was told they would get one for him on Easter. The basket was empty so they went home without a bunny.

Football Fever. Dan loved football. He loved the excitement of the game. He also loved the players and their team spirit. Dan decided to learn how to play the sport. He became the best football player in his town.
Flowers. Sheila loved flowers. She decided to start a garden. She put her favorite flowers in pots. Her garden grew all year. Then the neighbor gave her flowers.
Fast and too Furious. Ned's car ran out of gas. He was driving fast through town. His car cut someone off. The police were on their way. Ned was arrested.

Not Tired. It was 10:45 PM and Susie was still not tired. She was sitting around her desk waiting for her friends. Finally, it was her turn. She decided to take a nap. She fell asleep instantly and was finally done for the night.

red dress. I tried on my new red dress. I was too excited to wait in line. When I tried it on, it fit perfectly. I walked to the front of the store in my new dress. The clerk gave me a coupon for ten dollars and I felt good.

Stale Cereal. Tom was really hungry. He got out his wallet and looked for something to eat. He went to the grocery store and bought cereal. He took it home and ate it for breakfast. Tom was no longer hungry.

Cookie Sale. Kelly wanted to sell cookies to her friends. But she did not have enough money. So she decided to sell cookies to her neighbors. When she arrived at her cookie sale, there were no customers. Kelly was disappointed and left the cookies alone.

New Show. Sam's favorite show on tv was on. He checked the website to see the episode times. He found that they were sold out of the season. Sam did some research and found an online streaming platform. Sam could now watch the show whenever he wanted.

Workout. It was Dan's first day of gym class. As he walked in he saw all of his friends there. They were all working out. Dan got invited to join them. Dan went to the gym to see how his friends felt.

Valentine's Brownies. Kate's girlfriend wanted to surprise her with homemade brownies. Kate had never made them before but knew how to bake. She got out all the ingredients she needed and baked them. Kate's girlfriend opened the brownies in the oven and they were perfect. Kate was so glad that her girlfriend was able to surprise her.

A Dozen Roses. Hanna was planning on buying her mother a bouquet of roses. She went to the flower store. They were all sold out! Hanna drove to a neighboring farm to get some. She bought a dozen roses at the neighbor's house.
Expected Delivery. We ordered an item off the internet for delivery. It had already been made. I called and they said they made it last week. We got it today, no issue. It looks good so far.

Driving Lessons. Cindy wanted to learn to drive. Her father offered to take her to get lessons. After an hour of lessons Cindy was driving her dad's car. She drove to school with her dad. Cindy passed her first test and got her driver's license!
Pokemon. My friend and I were playing Pokemon Go. We noticed we had a bunch of gyms. We were both excited. We both decided to try some. When we finally had a good one we were both so happy.

Peanuts. Sara was allergic to peanuts. So her mom gave her a peanut butter sandwich. She wasn't sure what happened, but it tasted bad. Sara ran around screaming that she was allergic. But luckily, she calmed down quickly and ate it anyway.

Lunch. Today was our last day of school. I was so hungry, I had no lunch. When I got home, I realized I had nothing to make. I decided to go to McDonald's and order a sandwich. The food was delicious and I was so full I was full for the rest of the day.

Moving Day. I wanted to move to the south. The nearest big city was 20 miles away. The only problem was I had to move the furniture. Moving the furniture took several hours. I finally decided to move to the city I wanted to live in.

Cheer. Amy was very excited about her senior year of high school. She was looking forward to being a cheerleader. She had been practicing at home all summer long. On the day of tryouts, she had a perfect performance! Amy made the squad!
Bay. My sister in law's son died. She went to the funeral. She got very emotional about it. She began crying and shouting at the top of her lungs. She cried until I told her it was time to go home.

The Brother. The kids were sitting in the living room when their mother called them downstairs. She gave them candy and asked them to bring her some more milk. They waited until their mom had left the room. Then she came back with a cup of cereal in each hand. They ate and enjoyed the treat together, laughing and smiling.
Too short. Susie was wearing a tight dress. But it kept getting caught in her hair. She couldn't figure out how to fix it. She went to her hairdresser. He fixed it for her.

Sam Catches a Fish. Sam wanted to show off at the lake. He climbed up on his sailboat and threw his arms out. Suddenly, a fish jumped out of the water and chased him. Sam was able to reel the fish in and release it in the water. Now Sam can't show off at the lake.

street ball. John went out to play street ball with some friends. They would run down the street and throw the ball. He would then try to catch it. He made it so that he couldn't lose. It was a great game of street ball.
Music Software. Tom wanted to make music. Tom tried to learn the software. Tom wrote a simple melody. Tom recorded his recording. Tom played the recorded melody.

The list. Lucy had a shopping list. She was determined to eat the things on it. She had five things to buy but couldn't choose. She finally decided on some ice cream. Finally she had enough food and she was able to shop.

Desktop Christmas Trees. Jared's wife, Mary, and son, Josh, wanted to decorate their tree this year. Jared suggested they try a desktop Christmas tree. Mary loved the idea and purchased a great looking one. Jared's son, Josh, thought they looked silly. They ended up putting it in the garage and decorating it in a drawer.

Garrett's Basketball Journey. Garrett played basketball every day for many Years. Garrett would play many times a day. Garrett began to be hurt after playing basketball too much. He decided to stop playing basketball and take a vacation. Garrett decided to go on vacation and have fun.

Family dinner. I invited a bunch of my relatives to my house for dinner. After waiting for the table, we finally got seated. After we started eating, we all enjoyed dessert. After dessert, I asked everyone to leave. We finished dinner in peace.

River Bank. Tom went fishing with friends. They went down the river to try and catch some fish. Tom was about halfway to go when they all spotted some frogs. The frogs were too big for their little frogs so they had to stop. They went back home to let their parents know what they had caught.
Knife Safety. I was working on my motorcycle. I was carving off a rock with my knife. My wrist got injured. I had to go to the hospital. The doctor said I will not use my knife again.

The Rally. Randy and his friends took a trip. They were going to a rally in one of their favorite cities. They drove to the rally and ate some BBQ. There were many people there. They had fun and decided to come back the next day.
Too Big. Sam was shopping with her mom. She wanted a sweater for herself. She thought it would be small. It ended up being a lot of sweater. Sam still liked it and thanked her mom.

The Olives. Sue saw some grapes on the vine. She went to pick them but they were very hard. They were bright yellow and almost black. She picked them and took them home with her. She made homemade olives and everyone thought they were great.
Santa. The man went to the mall. He saw Santa Claus. Santa looked kind of creepy. The man ran home to cry. He went to a mall and never went back.
The camping trip. The couple was planning on going camping. They wanted to build a fire. They picked the perfect spot. Then they had fun lighting it. Then they went to sleep for the night.

Bad food. Today I went to lunch at the restaurant. I ate a sandwich with meat, lettuce, and tomato. However, my mouth felt very funny afterwards. My stomach felt like it was ready to explode. So, I never ate a sandwich with meat again.

Too Old To Go. She didn't like going to the beach. She wanted to stay at home and read books all day. Her mom bought her a surfboard when she was six and she was happy. She rode the board to the beach every day. She was so glad she didn't have to go.

Fried Chicken. Cathy decided to make fried chicken for dinner. She bought all the ingredients. As Cathy was frying the chicken, her chicken broke. Cathy tried to fry the fried chicken again but the chicken was burnt. Cathy decided she would buy all the ingredients for another fried chicken.

Steve and His Cats. Steve lived next to a cat named Twinkles. Steve had cats since he was very young. He loved all of his cats, even though Twinkles was sad. Steve decided he would adopt Twinkles so that he could keep him. Now Steve is happily married with 3 cats.
Retirement fund. Jim wanted to retire. So he looked online. He found a retirement fund he liked. He enrolled in the fund and got a payout. Jim was able to retire after 12 years.

Trash in the Closet. Tom's closet smelled really bad. He was starting to get fed up. One night he went into his closet. He found some old pictures from when he was a kid. Tom decided to throw them out.

The Lollipop. Cathy was sitting in class one day. She was talking on the phone with her friend. Suddenly, she heard a loud sound. A giant lollipop fell out of her backpack! She took it back and promised to never eat another one.

afloat. I was sleeping on the sofa when the electricity went out. I became extremely afraid because I did not know how to read the signal. I looked at the time and saw it was midnight. I called my insurance and they came to fix it. It turned out I had the wrong time and I went back to sleep.
Home Run. Jared was the pitcher of his team. He had a long way to go to get home run. He worked as hard as he could. He gave it all he had. He hit the ball out of the park and won the game!

Bend To My Metal Will. I wrote my own music in 1999. I decided to put an old mix tape into an mp3 player. I played a few songs for my friend. He really liked it. I played the rest of the tape for him at a party later.
Taco Tuesday. It was taco Tuesday at my house. We had fresh ingredients for tacos. My brother and I ate them. We had so much left over. My parents got home early and made tacos for dinner.

Dishes. Jane had a hard time with the dishes. She was always washing them and putting them away. One day her husband suggested she learn to do it on her own. Jane bought herself an after-school chore book to practice. After a month of practice Jane felt better about doing dishes.

Delivering the baby. A mom was out of town for the week. She had to deliver her baby on the way back. She wanted to get back to her baby, but had no time to. She used her cellphone to call for help. She was able to get help and deliver the baby on the way back.

Band. Kate was a part of a school band. She was in the band since she was a little girl. After awhile Kate became better at playing instruments. Kate now plays piano, violin, cello, tambourine, and tuba. Kate is glad to be a part of the school band.
The Bar. Bob walked to the bar and sat down. He was talking to a man across the room. The man thought Bob was attractive. The man introduced himself to Bob. Bob agreed to a date.

Hail Mary. Remy and his team had to face the defending champions. Their goal was to get first place in the state. He and his team practiced and practiced for hours. The day of the game they were all very nervous. When the whistle blew Remy scored and won the game!
Beauty and The Beast. I love The Beauty and the Beast. It was the first movie I ever saw. I went to the theatre and I went out of my way to see it. I was so thrilled. I got a t-shirt for it.

Child support. Sue was in trouble with child support. She was not allowed to have a boyfriend. Sue decided to break up with her boyfriend. She didn't want him to get in trouble. She told her mother so they could split up.

The Baseball Game. Lana and her father took their son to a baseball game. They both pitched in the game. Lana's dad won the game. They had so much fun playing the game. The next day they went to the game again.

It Was Supposed To Be Their Apartment, Not Just His. When Greg moved out on his own, he found a new place to live. But he had no clue how to tell his parents where his new place was. After a few weeks of confusion, Greg realized it was the apartment. It was Greg's, and he was very confused about where it was. After some negotiation, he decided to share it with his parents.
Winter Storm. My friend and I decided to watch a movie. We found a cheap VCR online. We got a big screen to watch our movie. We were having a great time. It started to snow after the movie was over.

Into the abyss. Mike and John decided they wanted to be astronauts. They went to college and got all their training. They went to college for three years before college. They were accepted into NASA. They spent the next five years training and preparing for their mission.

Christmas Problems. Tom's parents refused to buy him a gift. He decided to use a trick to get them to buy him one. He waited and waited for them to buy him one. One evening he hid some chocolate under the tree. When the tree was empty, his parents finally bought him a gift.

Putting the Cat Down. Gina's parents were going to get a divorce. She wanted to go with her siblings to their parent's house. Gina would not go with her siblings. It would be too embarrassing. Gina didn't go with her siblings to their parent's house.

The Brown Bag. Cindy didn't like the color of the brown bag she was given as a gift. The brown bag was a boring color, and she hated it. Cindy found a lighter, more creative bag to wear. She didn't realize she would like it so much, until she wore it. To Cindy, the brown bag was an obsession.

Pig Eye. Amy decided to change her hairstyle for the summer. She wanted a short pixie cut. The only problem was the price tag was nearly $100. Her mom was hesitant but offered to pay if she got an A. She studied her math and ended up with an A+ on the project.
Baking. Jill wanted to make homemade cookies. She got the ingredients ready and made them. They tasted awful. She realized she forgot the butter. Jill decided to buy the butter.

Tacos. I love tacos. I decided to make them at home one day. I went to the grocery store and bought all the ingredients. When I got home I realized I had no taco shells. So I had to improvise and made chicken tacos instead.

Lorraine Makes her Bed. Lorraine is tired of waking up feeling like a zombie. She decides to make her bed every morning. She lays down at the edge of her bed. She gets comfortable under her blanket. Lorraine is happy that she does not feel like a zombie.

Timmy Loves to Dance. Timmy wanted to learn to dance. Timmy asked his parents for money for lessons. His parents told him that he could not learn to dance. However, Timmy did his best to learn how to dance. Timmy's parents let him learn to dance for his birthday.
Over Sleepy. Sandra had to take the bus to work. She overslept one morning. She overslept ten minutes in her car. Sandra was very tired at work. Sandra decided to just stay in and sleep.

The Cheeseburger addict. Shane was always hungry. He had a craving for cheeseburgers. One day he decided to make one. He made it himself and ate it for lunch. When he was done he couldn't stop eating it.
Grapes. Tom loved grapes a lot. Tom bought them at the store. Tom would eat them every day. Tom went to the market and bought a large bag. Tom was happy to have a large supply of grapes.

The Work Event. Jared was working for an event planner. His job was to make sure people were able to reach their goals. His first event was a fundraiser. The organizers set up a huge bonfire. It was a very successful event.

Food network star. Rory always dreamed of being on the famous show. He was on the show for months but never really got to go. His dream of being on the show finally came true. The show called him and told him to come in for an interview. Rory ended up being the new face of the food network.
Sleazy. Jim was at the park. He was playing frisbee with his friends. His friends went to go grab a bite. He had to stay and play. Jim then proceeded to be lazy for the remainder of the day.
The new show. Samantha had never seen a new show before. She decided to give it a try. The show was great. Afterwards she was hooked. She couldn't wait to see what would happen next.

Sue's Trip. Sue went to the beach to swim. She had fun for hours. Afterwards she bought snacks and took a nap. When she woke up the next day she was sunburned. Sue decided she'd stay at the beach next time.
The Broken Toy Box. Tommy was playing with a toy box. It was a moving car. One of the wheels went off and Tommy crashed it. His mom was worried about him. She brought it to the shop to get it fixed.
Pizza Place. Joe owned a pizza place. He had a good reputation but was not popular. He hired a clown. The clown was not very popular. Joe lost the business.
Missing. Kate and her friend were walking to school. The were pulled over by an officer. The officer searched her backpack. Kate found a phone and some cash. The officer let them go with a warning.

Signing up for a library card. I went to get a library card last week. I tried to go to the front desk to sign in. I did not remember my library card there. I realized I left it at home. I went back there and had my card renewed.

Stripped down. Anna was going to a party. She had forgotten to take her underwear off. She decided she didn't want to have sex. So she stripped down to her underwear and left. Anna left early without her underwear.

The Big Win. Charles and Tony decided to bet on a horse race. They put money on a strong horse named Blue Thunder. The race was won by Blue Thunder. The bet made both of them 100 dollars. They bet on the race again the next month.

A visit to Grandma. I was in the house with my Grandma. I was feeling lonely so I asked for a pet. My Grandma looked at me strangely and said I was a very special cat. I spent the rest of the day playing with my Grandma. We're going to have so much fun together this summer.

Always do Your Homework. I was doing my math homework when I got distracted. I turned the assignment in but left it on the table. When I went to check on it, I noticed that it had been turned in incorrectly. I looked through my papers to make sure my work was right. I turned in my work and learned that I was lucky I didn't forget.
Picking a Movie. I went to the theater. They had a really cool new film. It was playing for the first time. I bought the tickets online. The tickets were a big hit!

Video Games. Dan wanted to make new friends. Dan's family encouraged him to join a team. Dan joined a video game team with many new friends. Dan made many new friends with his new team. Dan made many new friends because he was playing games.
Lost remote. I lost my remote control last night. It was a really simple switch. I looked everywhere for it. I was running around for hours. Eventually I found it behind the refrigerator.

Itching. I felt something hard on my leg when I slept last night. I started scratching at my legs and my back. I ran into my sister's room to see what she had done. She had thrown some peanut butter all over my leg. I decided to go buy some new pants.

Bracketology. Abe was in charge of organizing a trivia tournament. He challenged his friend to a game of trivia. His friend accepted. The game was tough but they finished tied. Abe felt he had done well organizing the tournament.

The Man Across the Street. The man across the street was moving too slow. He was talking on his cell phone. I walked across the street to talk to him. He waved me over and we exchanged information. After exchanging information, I walked across the street.

Catfishing. Tom wanted to meet some girls. He thought he could trick them by dressing up as a woman. Tom pretended to be a woman. He met some girls and they were really interested in him. They didn't like Tom's fake feminine looks.

Unlucky Good-Luck Charm. Tommy found a silver dollar lying on the floor. He took it to his neighbor, who was able to return it. The neighbor gave him $20 to spend at the casino. Tommy spent $20 on a slot machine. Unfortunately, Tommy ended up losing his lucky-gift.
Lion. The cat stared at me. I was scared. He was trying to play with me. I became very scared. I ran away and never went near him again.

Homeless Heart. The man walked to a soup kitchen. The kitchen was filled with people begging for food. The man told them he was hungry but didn't have any food. One of the men offered the man food and a place to stay. The man accepted and lived in a homeless shelter for months.
Moving Up. The family was moving to a new house. Tia was so excited. She thought she could make some friends there. But it took a year to find some new neighbors. Tia was sad when she realized it.

Comedian Carrie. Carrie was really funny and kind of likeable. She wanted to go into the stand up world but didn't have any money. A friend told her that she could have a lot of money if she just practiced. Carrie went to a comedy show and practiced her jokes all week. She did well and made over half a million dollars.

Big Day. Amy was excited for her upcoming big day at work. She had her schedule and some great ideas. She had been training for months so now it was time to show them. She had a great first day of work on Tuesday. Her boss gave her a great reception and the team celebrated.

Carlos Meets a Girl. Carlos had always felt alone in his small town. He decided to go to a bar to meet someone. At the bar, Carlos met a girl named Amy. They hit it off and began dating. Carlos and Amy got married last year.

Olson Opposes Octopus. Olson wanted to eat sushi. But his friends made him wait until his date arrived. Olson was impatient and wanted to eat more. So he decided to just eat a small piece of octopus. But he realized he was no longer hungry after eating it.
