Used Music Store. Kim was walking down the aisles at the used music store. She found some great stuff, like a turntable and a microphone. Kim purchased the things at low prices. She brought the cashier's check to pay. The cashier counted the money and gave Kim the money.

Fred. Fred was a very kind boy, even though he was a bully. When the bully was gone, Fred decided to be the kinder. After a while he was the nicest kid in the school. One day, Fred got a new bully. Fred learned his lesson and became the meanest kid in school.

The Bad Attitude. Tom was a bit of a loser. He was a college graduate and hadn't worked a job in years. One day he decided to ask out a girl he liked. Unfortunately she wasn't interested. Tom was extremely depressed for a week.
Sad story. I was a teenager. My mother had just passed away. She left all her possessions to me. I wanted to do something but I was sad. Then, I found my childhood photo and was happy.
Repaying the Pastor. I went to church. My father was in the pulpit. His pastor was angry at me. He told me he couldn't forgive me. I was forced to leave church.

Writer. Eve wanted to be a writer. She read lots of books about worldbuilding. Then she decided to try her hand at writing novels. She made a lot of characters and stories and characters she liked. She made a lot of money from her work and she was happy.
The Lost Dog. Garry's dog ran away. Garry went looking for his dog. Garry never found his dog. Garry went to the humane society. Garry found his dog and gave him a home.
Birds. Tim was at the park with his family. There were birds in the park. One of them pooped on Tim's shirt. Tim was so embarrassed. He never wore that shirt to the park again.

The Bridge. I was trying to drive across the river. I decided to drive across it on the bridge. I felt the tiniest tremble of the river below me. The river began to move faster and I got nervous. I decided not to cross it on the bridge again.

Sam Walks the Dog. Sam walked his dog. The dog saw something in the distance. The dog ran after the object. Sam realized he forgot to put on his shoes. The dog ran into the grass to go back to being able to walk.
Bad sale. Lily was shopping at the mall. She saw a shirt that she really liked. When she tried it on, it fit too tight. She was so disappointed. So she threw it out and returned the shirt.

theater. I was in the backseat when i was driving my family to an auditorium. While driving i saw a woman sitting in the back seat. The woman looked out her window and smiled at us. She also wanted us to see what movie she was going to see with us. We drove to the theater and she was not in there.

Sandy's Allergies. Sandy was eating lunch with her family. She wasn't paying attention to what she was eating. She began to sneeze and it made her sneeze a lot. Her mother yelled for her to get up since it was time to leave. Sandy took out the piece of chicken she was allergic to and ate it.

Hospital Visit. Cathy has been feeling sick all week. Her husband doesn't know what is wrong with her. The doctor gave her some medicine at work. The next day she went to the hospital to see her husband. The doctor found a tumor on Cathy's bladder.
Fear Returns. He decided to take his dog for a walk. The dog didn't like to walk by himself. He went into the woods. The dog was scared. He wasn't able to walk back to the car.

Drawing Class. Amy always wanted to learn to draw. She was told it was too hard and not worth it. She decided to go to a drawing class anyways. It wasn't like she expected it to be. Amy decided drawing wasn't for her after all.

Carmen Plays Softball. Carmen wanted to play softball for her school's team. She and her teammates practiced playing baseball every day. After a few days, Carmen felt she was ready to play. Carmen and her teammates practiced hard for the big game. Carmen and her teammates played very well during the big game.
Jersey. Tom bought a new jersey from a local store. It had a name and number on it. Tom wore it out with friends. Tom lost a few friends over it. He never wore it again.
The Blog. Joan decided to start a blog. She wrote a really interesting post about her husband. Her husband liked the blog. His boss saw the post. His boss promoted Joan to full time blogger.

Retiring from Teaching. I once taught English in a large city high school. After I retired, I decided to stay home and relax. My home life was boring so I began to write short stories. I used the stories to help me get over my retirement. I found a new job as a freelance writer that paid more and made me happy.

Getting Dressed. Kim was excited to attend the dance. She knew she needed to get ready in a hurry. She went to the mall and went to a store for makeup. Kim applied the foundation, eyeliner, and lipstick. The party was fun without Kim looking terrible.
Tom's Drink. Tom was at a party. Someone offered him a beer. Tom declined. The host threatened to have someone else steal his beer. Tom took his own beer home and forgot the host's threat.
Gertrude Slips. Gertrude was at the park. She was playing at the slide. Her ankle slipped. She fell on the bottom of the slide. Gertrude sprained her ankle.
Lost Job. Tom had been laid off of his job. He had not been able to find a new job. Tom searched for months. Finally he was able to find a new job. Tom was able to get back to work on his new resume.

No Spare. Rita left her purse on the train in a crowded city. She needed to go back to the train station. But the train had been delayed several minutes. And she had to board another train. When she got on the first one, her purse was gone.
John Runs Errands. John needed to do some work at home. He looked for something to do. He went to the hardware store. John bought a hammer. John then went home and finished his work.

Catching Burglars. In the city, Joe was a police detective. The criminals he investigated were usually bad guys. He was able to identify one or two of them from their tattoos. Joe was then able to apprehend them. He was thankful he was able to help the community.
Arra. My niece took my niece to Arra, Arizona, in December. We had to take a bus back to Boston. My niece wanted to see Santa. We stayed in an old cabin. It was quiet and warm.

job interview. It was time to have my very first job interview. I spent my time studying for my test as much as I could. The day of the interview arrived and I was nervous about it. The boss came to my interview and was very nice. I got the job and was very happy about it.

The chicken baby. Maggie was at the grocery store. She saw a chick inside of the chicken section. The chick was laying on the counter and looked up. She took the chick to a lady at the counter. The lady picked up the chick and took it home to her mom.

Lary's Lasagna. Lary loved to eat lasagna. His girlfriend thought he was crazy to eat it. She told him he was a bad cook. Lary's girlfriend never let him make lasagna again. Lary's girlfriend still doesn't make lasagna.

First day of classes. I am nervous to start my first day of high school. I am a little scared that I will not make friends. I walked to the classroom and sat down. The teacher introduced herself to me. I smiled and made new friends with her.

Bankrupt. Charles was not having a good day. His bank was not lending him any money. He decided to get out his rage by walking across the street. A car had almost hit him as he was walking. Charles got arrested and spent the night in jail.

Home Away. I've always wanted to see my cousin live in a new home. I have a lot of financial issues that are not easy to fix. I'm hoping that my cousin can get into a better home soon. I'm hoping we'll be moving soon. I am so excited that I'm planning on moving to a new place.

Fixing the Sink. Mary woke up one morning and checked the sink. She noticed that her cat was peeking under the counter. She grabbed a ladder and climbed on top of the counter. She opened the drawer and saw that her cat was chewing on a piece of aluminum. She unscrewed the door and replaced the metal.
Too Close. Jim threw a football to Joe. Joe was able to catch the ball. Joe was able to run after Jim. The teacher caught Jim. The teacher was suspended.

The Fire. Jake was trying to sleep. All of a sudden, he heard a loud noise. He jumped out of bed and ran downstairs. He saw smoke coming out of his kitchen. He quickly shut the door and called the fire department.
Biographies. I went to the library. I looked through the bibliography. I found a lot of interesting biographies. I decided to buy one. I read them all.

The busy day. Jenny was waiting for a train on the way to work. It was late but there was still lots of traffic. Soon it was 4 in the morning. Jenny was starting to feel sleepy. She took a few extra snoozes, and got to work on time.

Knife. There was a thief in the store. He stole a small bottle of nail polish. He tried to run the store from the security guards. However, he ended up tripped and fell. The thief took off running from the store.

Last to the party. Toni was the last one to the party. She got too drunk to remember how to do it. After the party, she called her friends. They went out to get the liquor for her. Toni had a few drinks and had fun.

Bill's Bar. Bill works at a bar. Bill has always wanted to make the bar a destination. He takes out some of the old regulars from the past. They decide to put on a happy hour. They get beer and dancing to some local bands.
Dead Mouse. Tom moved into a new house. He kept hearing dead mice. Tom bought a cage to trap the mice. Tom was able to catch the mice. Tom was able to return the mice to their cage.
The Fishing Pole. Sam went fishing. He cast his line into the water. It felt like his line was stuck. Sam was unable to get his line out. Sam had to re-fish.

sick day. My wife and I had to go to a doctor's appointment. She had a sore throat and was not feeling well. I had to stay home with her. I was very frustrated that I had to stay home and nurse her. I went to the doctor's office and he prescribed her some medicine.
The Race. Jackie was running the marathon. She was in the lead for most of the race. However, her friend's were finishing up. They all ran their laps together. Finally, Jackie came in second place.

In The Mitt. Gina and her friend Lisa had lunch on their school bus. The girls were getting very hungry. The girls stopped at the front of the school for a snack. The girls ate a bag of chips, a can of soda, and an apple. They sat down, and looked up to watch the show.

Coffee. I was sitting in class today. The teacher was using the bathroom. I was told to stay until the class finished. I didn't want to be late, so I took a sip of my coffee. It was too hot and burned my tongue.
The bird flies. A bird was flying down the street. It saw a branch break. The bird began to fly towards the broken branch. It flew out of sight. The bird flew straight into the street.
Knee. Shelly was driving to work one day. She was texting on her phone. She felt a knee jerk. She then had to call her husband to come get her. Shelly had a very painful knee.
Sandwich. Kate's friend had a hot dog. But Kate had none left. She walked to her dad's house and looked there. The hot dog had run off and was gone. Kate decided to have a sandwich instead.

Rapper. Jack was a rapper living in New York. He wrote a new song and posted it on the Internet. People liked it so he began selling it. He was amazed that it sold so much. Now he makes all his own money from singing and making records!
On set. I was getting ready for a big movie. The crew was nervous. They thought I might be sick. But they invited me anyway. It felt great.

Gusty Winds. Billy was driving to work on the highway. He noticed the traffic was really bad. He slowed down. Then he noticed a gust of wind. The wind blew Billy off the road and he landed in a ditch.
Ted buys a car. Ted was tired of living with his parents. He decided to buy a car. He found a good used car for sale. He took the car to the dealership. The salesman negotiated a price for the car.

Kids Chair. Kate wanted a new chair for her living room. Kate looked everywhere for the perfect one. She finally decided to visit the local furniture store. There were three chairs in the selection she wanted. She picked the smallest of the three.

The Bowling Match. James was the best bowler in his bowling league. His friends challenged him to a match of blackjack. He won the first game. His friends challenged him again to a rematch of the previous game. James won the rematch.

The Park at Night. I once took a walk along a popular path at night. While I was there I saw a woman crying. She told me that her dog had passed away. I told her that I loved dogs as much as I loved my own. She said it wasn't the same but maybe I could make her feel better.
Fireworks. Jim had fireworks for his birthday. His friends went to the lake with him. Jim lit all of the fireworks on fire. His friends fought with the fire. Jim's family had a big barbecue.

Magic Kingdom. The Smith family went to Magic Kingdom. They had tickets for two adults. The kids were too little for the two adults. The family had to sit in the front. They waited for four hours for the adults to get home.

Gym Rats. Amber loved working out at the gym. She would often practice gymnastics in her free time. When she moved to college, she realized she had no friends. She started hanging out with the gym rats she had met. Now, Amber has a group of gym rats to hang out with all day!

McDonalds. Karyn and her friends were at McDonald's. They were having fun when a man offered to give them a ride home. The boys accepted the ride. Then they found out he had a flat tire. Their parents had to pick them up.

The Twins. Kate's dad thought they were twins. Kate was afraid they would be very competitive. But as they grew older, they became best friends. They laughed and laughed. Kate always knew they'd become twins!

A lost day. My friend John was on his way to Boston last week. He was driving with his wife. They drove through three states. In the middle of the trip he hit a deer. He got out to see it and it was a huge hassle.
My phone plan. I love my phone plan. I only use my cell phone for calls. I called to change my phone plan. I was not able to. I had to cancel my plan.
Southie. Tommy was the new kid in town. He was very scared. He went to see a scary movie. It was a lot better than the one before that. Now Tommy is very friendly and outgoing.

Fleas. Sally hated having fleas. She didn't like how they came into contact with her skin. One day she had an accident. Her sheets were wet and she got a horrible rash. Sally no longer hides her sheets and loves her clean sheets!

Good Signs. Robby had never been to a casino before. He went to an official for instruction. The official showed him how to play poker. Robby had a great time. He had a great time even though he had no money!

Nick. Nick hated his new neighbors. They didn't want to play golf with him. He got angry at them. Nick ran out of his driveway to get a broom. They played golf with Nick and were no longer his neighbors.

The Puppy. Amy's parents always wanted a puppy. One day they were driving and a new car pulled up in front. The puppy was waiting there, and Amy's parents got out to look at it. They couldn't agree on a name so they decided to go with a funny name. When they were done Amy was so happy and excited!
Baseball. John was at the park. He noticed some people playing baseball. He asked them if he could join them. They told him he was too small to join them. John joined them anyway.

Sandals. Gina bought a pair of sandals from the store. She put them on and went outside. The sandals were sandals her sister made. Gina stepped on a hole in the bottom. Gina decided to wear shoes from now on.
Waffles. I found a recipe for waffles. I followed it exactly. The waffles came out perfect. They were also extra spicy. I gave them to my friends.
Rockstar. Will was going on vacation to the mountains. He was very excited to climb a mountain. Will hiked for many days. Will reached the peak. Will had a lot of fun there.

Frozen in Place. Gina had to go to a store to get groceries. But she was stuck in traffic on the main roads. Finally her friend Mary suggested they call a tow truck. Gina was so angry she refused to go. She waited until the tow truck arrived and left angrily.

Lost Bird. A stray bird wandered into the window of Jim's house. He tried to catch the bird with a broom. The bird kept flying higher and higher up. Jim was almost out of breath when he realized the bird was lost. Jim put up signs and got the bird back.

Facebook isn't for everyone. I had trouble using Facebook when I was younger. I liked it at first, but then I found out about privacy. I was sad that my information would be shared so easily. I deleted my account, but decided to get another one. Now, I can use Facebook with no problems at all.

Let's Party!. It was our anniversary. It was an expensive anniversary. We decided to have a party. Everyone got to eat some cake and drink lots of champagne. At the end of the night everyone said they'd have another one.

A Robbery. Manny was walking home from school. A man approached him and demanded his money. Manny pretended he didn't have any money and held the man. The robber ran off with the money. Manny and the police tracked him down.
Sandals. Tom went to a new beach. There was a sandal shop right next to him. Tom bought some sandals. He wore them everywhere. He made a lot of new friends from it.
Chain. Tom was at the grocery store. He picked up some meat and got some fries. They asked Tom for his payment. Tom realized he had forgotten his debit card at home. Tom decided to pay them cash.

Great lunch. It was a nice day and I wanted to have a lunch. I decided I would go out to lunch. After waiting for an hour I finally got my lunch. I got my friend to come with me. We ate and laughed and had a great time.

Green Hair. I woke up in the morning to see my hair green. I thought the hair dye I used on it would be gone. The hair dye was not brown enough. I needed a different color. I picked out a dark purple color.

Parting Ways. Cathy was very sad. Her mother told her they were divorcing. Cathy decided to write a letter to her mom to say goodbye. Cathy mailed the letter and her mother opened it. Cathy felt happier and decided not to write a letter to her mom.

Slip and Slide. I loved going down the slide at the park. One day I slipped on the slide and broke my ankle. I decided to go to the doctor for a physical examination. I was told I had fractured my ankle. I went back to the slide and was happy that I wasn't injured.

The Tumor. Kelli had just learned she had a tumor. She was told the tumors would grow slowly. One day she woke up with a painful pain in her neck. She had never experienced such pain before. Luckily, she was okay and felt better by the daycare.

Tom Gets A Dog. Tom's friend, Tom, told him about an adoption event that was happening at a nearby animal shelter. Tom invited Tom to come along and adopt a dog. Tom walked up to the adoption event, and saw a dog in a carrier that looked hungry. He picked up the dog and took it home. Tom is so happy to have a dog like this.
The Home. Bobby went to his new house. He played with all his friends. They had a great time. Bobby decided to stay forever. Bobby was happy to be living in the home he had built.

Kicked Out. Jim and his girlfriend weren't getting along. So they decided to have a fight. Jim thought he was going to get kicked out. But his girlfriend showed up at his house with a big surprise. Jim was welcome back in a week with flowers and candy!

Philly Cheese Steak Sub. Yesterday my brother and I went to eat some Philly cheese steak subs. We were so excited to get some. We were not expecting much, but I enjoyed them. When we got home we ate a large bowl. We did not go to the drive thru again.

Havoc. My class went out into the yard. We were supposed to play football. I was getting frustrated so I threw a paper ball. Several kids were throwing rocks at me. I tried to run home but was tackled and fell.
The Interview. It was time for her to interview for a job. She had to do it in front of her family. She was shaking as she spoke. Finally she got the news. She had gotten the job.

Firework. Jim went to the bar one night. He was drinking a beer with his friends. A cop pulled them over and they all had beer and shots. Jim got the first shot and the cop thought it was too much. He gave Jim a warning and Jim did not drink anymore.

The Perfect Haircut. Sally needed a new haircut. Her hair had been growing out of control for a few months. She looked at several different ones and narrowed it down. She went to the salon to get her cut. Afterwards, Sally felt so much better about her appearance.

Doug cleans house. Doug has been cleaning his house for a long time. He notices that his house is starting to smell bad. He decides to take a shower. Once he is showering his house is finally clean. Doug is glad that he finally cleaned his house.
Corey Deals with his Stress. Corey has to go to work. He puts on his suit. Corey drives to work. Corey is nervous on his job. Corey works as hard as he can.

Car Buying. My old car was running really rough. I bought a car and it started to run smoothly. After a few weeks of being on my bike I had the car working perfectly. I drove the car around the neighborhood for a few weeks. Then I took the car back to the dealership to get it repaired.
Fishing trip. Mark went fishing. He went alone and didn't realize it. He got a bite but realized it was a mistake. Mark decided to try again. That night he had a great bite.

Pharmacy. My friend was shopping in the pharmacy today. She brought me a bag of groceries. When I got home, I told my mom about the groceries. My mom did not believe me, as she didn't think I was serious. The next time I asked her about the groceries, she denied having them.

Pickpocket. Teddy had a terrible habit of being the go-to pickpocket in school. He'd walk into an abandoned store and stand on his tip toes. Once he was very close, he'd put his finger down and make a loud noise. No one knew why he was doing it until someone pointed out his earring. His habit had finally gotten him in trouble!

The Move Out. My father took his family out of their home in September. The house was to be sold so I helped clean it up. It was really dirty and my father helped with all of the work. A week later we had a party to celebrate the sale. It was sad that the house had to go, but it was the first step.

Angela. Angela started college in a new town. She was worried about making friends. Her family was very welcoming. But on her first day, she saw how much she didn't know! Now Angela and her family have fun!
Bull Ride. Bob and Ted went to the local park. Bob and Ted loved to ride the roller coaster. Bob and Ted rode the coaster for an hour. The ride was very scary and loud. Bob and Ted got very sick.

Declined. Kia's parents told her to go to her room when they were alone. But Kia was always sneaking out, and had to listen. She sneaked out of her bedroom and saw the family. They were sitting at the dinner table, enjoying their meal. Kia thought they looked at her strangely, and went back in to wait.

Ride Along. A new mom is trying to find the right time to have a baby. She tries to plan her own time around the baby and the house. Sometimes it's more convenient to take a baby when the house is empty. She finds that the baby is much more active when the house is full. She finds it much more enjoyable to be in the house with the baby.
Stainless. My wife bought a stainless steel coffee maker. It was supposed to be stainless. After a few weeks it began to smell funny. I replaced the entire coffee maker. We will be returning it.

The Nickname. Tom hated the nickname he was given at work. He told everyone it was an insult. His coworkers thought he was being silly. But Tom's boss decided to give it back. Tom was able to work at his old job without being ridiculed.

John's Social Life. John went to work everyday at his office job. However, his coworkers were really rude and disrespectful to John. One day, John got so upset that he told his boss. His boss told him that he needed to take better care of himself. John started going out and having more social outings with his friends.
Jailbird. I wanted to fly a kite. I had never flown one before. I bought a nice one. I took it to the park. My kite took off and I went flying in the sky.

Swap Shop. The Smith family went to the local swap shop for some new furniture. There was a large selection of things they could not afford. The children picked out some items they wanted and offered to do chores. The shop owner agreed and gave the kids a small amount of cash. The kids helped clean and mow the lawn and the rest paid later.
Stuck in traffic. Kylie was trying to get to work. She was stuck in traffic. Her car was stuck in a ditch. She needed help. Luckily, her friend pulled over and helped her.

Chicken and Waffles. Kasey and her friend were in a diner. They were hungry but the restaurant was closed. Kasey tried to get a chicken and waffle for breakfast. Unfortunately the chicken was undercooked. Kasey and her friend had to eat in the parking lot.

Pizza. The pizzeria was open late at night. One night they were very busy and couldn't open their door. So they left their keys in the front door. A large storm came and knocked down the pizzeria. They were very sad because they loved their pizza.

The lake storm. The Johnson family went fishing. They decided to go to a lake to see a storm. They were not sure what the weather was going to be like. They decided it would be a calm day so they went home. Unfortunately, they got caught in a lake storm.

99. Sandra was a single mom to a son named Don. She wanted a baby, but Don was only two years old. Sandra decided to adopt Don as a baby. She gave Don to Sandra who was able to raise him well. Sandra was very happy that she was able to have a new baby.
Caught stealing. Susie wanted a new car. She decided to steal a car. As soon as she got her hands on it, the cops came. Susie was caught and taken away. Susie learned her lesson.

The Phone Call. Janice got a phone call on her way to work. It was her boyfriend's cousin asking her to meet up. She decided to meet up at her place. They had a nice chat about school and movies. Janice was excited for her cousin to call her.

Interview. Sam wanted to get a new job. He went to the local company's office to fill out an interview. His manager told him he needed more experience. Sam got a free, brief online training on coding. He got the job.

Retirement. Jody is about to retire. He has been with the same company for a year. He hopes to spend all his time playing golf. His boss says he will ask to talk when he is on vacation. He is going to retire a week early.

Across the Alley. Sam was playing video games with his friends. He was looking for a place to hide from the police. He was going too fast down the alley. A cop noticed him and yelled at him. He had to stop playing games and go back home.
Dishonest. Tom was at the bar one night. He was drunk. Someone offered him a drink. He accepted and got drunk. Tom wound up stealing the drink.
The Shoes. Cathy loved shoes. She decided to get new ones. She found the perfect pair. They fit perfectly. Cathy could not be happier.
Dehydrated. Kim was out swimming with friends. It was hot outside and her legs were feeling weak. Kim was dehydrated. She decided to stay home and rest. When she got home she felt much better.

Building the shed. I wanted to build a shed with my yard. I went to Home Depot to buy a shed. After buying the shed I brought it home. When I put the shed together it looked perfect. I put the shed up for sale the next day.
Handing out candy. Susie had to hand out candy. She was nervous. Finally she handed it out. She forgot to put it back. Her parents scolded her.

The Pasta Dinner. Today, the Zimmy family was hosting a special event. Their favorite part was making pasta for a family dinner. Their favorite pasta dish was the cherry red sauce. Unfortunately, the sauce was undercooked. Luckily, everyone enjoyed their delicious meal anyway.
Music. Anna was listening to some music. But she was not a good listener. She kept skipping songs. Her mom found out and grounded her for a month. She had to learn how to listen better.
Tutoring Help. Tom was struggling in school. He wasn't getting much help. His teachers recommended tutoring. Tom got help through tutoring. His grades improved greatly.

Dave needs a new car. Dave wanted a new car. He went to the dealership to buy one. He picked out a car that was fun to drive. The dealer told him they were sold out. Dave was upset because he needed one immediately.

Local Ad. Bob was running for mayor. He went to his local newspaper and printed a campaign advertisement. When he got it, he showed it to everyone in town. His opponents complained that the ad was racist. Bob didn't care and continued to run the ad.

Too Much Soda. My husband and I decided to drink soda on our honeymoon. We drank eight glasses of soda one night. That night he couldn't sleep and I called the cops. The cops came and said to let him sleep it off. They said we would be in big trouble if he did it again.
Dog. Linda's dog died. She didn't know what to do with it. She didn't want to go to the humane society. She put up signs with a picture of the dog and fliers. Soon, people stopped dying her dog.
Doves cry. Aunt Marie bought some pet ducks. She had them keep in her house all summer. They all got very fat. Then all the sudden one died. The duckies all starved to death.
The Earthquake. John was scared. A big earthquake was coming his way. John went to a friend's house. They were both scared. They decided to go outside and have fun.

The musical student. Mary was a very good music teacher. She took very seriously the art form. She was very passionate and loved to teach. A local boy came into her class and asked her to play for him. Mary was so excited she told him yes!
Rita chokes. Rita is at a fancy party. Rita orders a salad. She tries to eat it. Rita cannot swallow the whole salad. She passes out in front of everyone.

Large Ego. Kim was a socialite. She had many fans who adored her. They would often talk to her in the hall. One day they threw a party for her. Kim went and saw the damage that she had done to the crowd.

Beer run. Mike and his friends wanted to run a charity. They started to make donations. They didn't think it through and left money over. Then Mike and his friends realized it was for someone else. So they decided to donate it to charity of their own.
Tom the Drunk. Tom loved to drink beer and drive. He would often go to the bar after work. One day, Tom was drinking too much. He decided to drive home drunk. Tom crashed the car and was arrested.
Tim gets in Shape. Tim was feeling really skinny. He decided to get in shape. Tim went to the gym. He worked out a lot. Tim then saw how much he lost.

Criticized. Tom was always a great kid. Tom attended the same high school as his friends. Tom's friends would constantly make fun of Tom for not being taller. Tom eventually grew tired of being so often made fun. Tom eventually made his high school friends move to different towns.

Stale Dale. My friend Joe has a brown lab named Dale. Dale is a very fat dog. Dale had a heart condition that is very serious. Dale had a bad accident that could have been avoided. I hope that Joe is ok and that Dale gets better soon.
Bathrobe. Cathy needed a new work wardrobe. She didn't own any new clothes. She went to a local clothing store. She bought a new white work robe. It fit Cathy perfectly.

Teaching Lesson. Karen and Joe were neighbors. They both had been working hard at their job for a long time. It was time to learn something new. They went to the library and looked up books to teach. When they were done, the students had learned a lot.

seeing eye dog. Sue went to the animal shelter to get a new dog. She was having a hard time deciding which dog to get. After 20 minutes of thinking she couldn't decide. She finally decided to get the seeing eye dog instead. Sue loves her new dog.
Fire. Kelsey was sitting on a chair. The chair caught on fire. She called her husband to come get her. He found her and helped her get out of the chair. Luckily, Kelsey's husband was not hurt.

Veteran's Day. It was Veteran's Day. Ava wanted to get the word out about the men and women who have served. She decided to hold a bake sale. She bought cookies and homemade decorations. She loved seeing the many faces that came out to the event.

Hitting the curb. Tom was riding his bike down the street. He saw a car and pulled over. Tom waited while the car drove slowly. After a minute Tom decided to go fast. The car sped up and Tom was almost hit.

Travel to Hawaii. My friends and I are going on vacation to Hawaii. First we will fly into Honolulu. After that we will visit the local beaches. After we are there, we will stay for a week. Finally we will go back home.

Married. Tina was recently divorced. She decided to get married. She went to the courthouse and took her marriage license. She drove to the courthouse and gave the license. She went home and now was a married woman.

Turtle Violation. Sally's family owned a small farm. They decided to have a turtle named Sippy. Sippy got out of the pen and ran around the paddock. Sally chased him until her mom told her to stop. Sippy got in trouble for climbing over the fence to escape.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. My best friend Andy and Larry lived together in Hawaii. Andy and I grew up together playing all types of sports. One day I asked my parents to send me a copy of their favorite game, hockey. They sent me a hockey pucks calendar that had a photo of both of us. They called it their Best friends calendar.
Bad purchase. Sally went to the store. She went to the clothes department. Sally tried on some clothes. The shirts were too small. She returned home.

Sisters Fighting. Diana was at the store, trying on clothes. Suddenly, a furious yell erupted from the bathroom. Diana was about to yell again, when her sister barged in. The argument turned physical when Diana's sister held the door. Diana and her sister decided it was best to separate.

Stomach. My stomach hurt. I had a feeling I was going to explode. My mom called the ambulance and told them I was pregnant. The ambulance came and took me to the hospital. I was happy to find out I was having a baby.

Spot the Dog. When I was a kid, my dog Spot ran into the street. I was driving my car, and Spot was in the driver's seat. I pulled off of the road, and Spot fell into the street. I brought Spot to a vet, and he was okay. I was sad that Spot wasn't with me forever.

Nasty Attitude. I tried to leave work and go home. When I left I was on my way to the bus station. A woman came up to me with a mean grin. She asked me if I have a cigarette. Since I was confused, I ignored her.

Lake. Loraine was on a vacation. She went to the lake with her friends. They had fun swimming and playing in the water. At the end of the day, they got into their car to go home. When they got home, they got in their beds.

Bagpipe. I really enjoy bagpipes. I have several of my own and have a number of songs I like to play. Today I tried to teach my bagpipe to my neighbor, Joe. I really enjoyed my bagpipes, but my neighbor did not. I will play my bagpipes from now on.
NYC. I moved to New York from California in 1982. First, I had to learn to drive. I got my license in a few months. After that I could drive anywhere. Now, I drive to work every day.
Italian Food. One day, I went to the local Italian restaurant. The place was very crowded. I waited a long time for my order. Eventually, it came to my table. I enjoyed my Italian food very much.
Skydiver. Dan wanted to be a skydiver. He applied for a job in California. He was rejected. He went back to school. He became a lifeguard.

Trapped Dog. Roxy was in a house with her parents. A dog ran out and scared her. Roxy screamed and started crying. Her parents let her get her phone and video camera out. She took a video and showed it to her mom.

Broken Television. Sam was watching television. Suddenly, the television screen went black. Sam called his cable company. They sent someone to fix the television. Sam was able to watch television again after the repair.

Hamsters for All. I love eating hamster food. I ate the biggest ones the other day. Then I got a stomach ache from it. I wasn't able to eat again for several days. My hamster now eats smaller meals in my house.

Not what expected. Susie was in the store. She was surprised to see a brand new bag of makeup. She didn't know what to expect. She tried it on and loved the results. She then purchased five more of the items.
Friend. Tom wanted to spend time with his friend, Jack. They decided to watch a movie together. Tom forgot about Jack. Jack had been talking to his crush. Tom's friend ended up finding him.

Shane goes to a play. Shane loves to watch plays. He watches them at home all the time. One day he decides to go to see one. He arrives at the play and waits for it to start. When the play starts, Shane is the lead.

Chalky. Sasha hated her white shoes. They were always chalky and stinging her feet. She tried to buy more colorful shoes, but they didn't fit. Then Sasha noticed that her feet were starting to itch. She bought new shoes - and they were perfect!

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge had always wanted to learn to cook. He decides to try to cook beans. Jorge tries his best to cook the beans. Jorge loves cooking beans. He is happy that he learned to cook beans.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack needs some new car accessories. He goes to the car dealership. Jack looks for the perfect new car accessories. He finds the perfect set of accessories. Jack is happy with his purchase.
Not Mad. Tim was making a new song. He went to the studio to record it. He was having a lot of trouble. He didn't know what to do. He finally got the recording and went back to work.

Pool. We found a pool by the highway on our way home. We went to look at the pool in our new home. We filled a bucket with warm water. We put our feet under the pool. It felt so much better to be safe in the pool.
Cheap Move. Tom had a new neighbor. The neighbor moved into a new apartment. The neighbor would throw things everyday. Tom tried to politely ask him to stop. He didn't have much luck.

Safe and Sound. Betsy's car was making a loud noise. It was coming from a pipe. Betsy didn't know what to do so she called the auto club. They came out to inspect her car and said she needed a tune-up. Betsy had the tune-up and now her car is quiet and safe.

News. My brother and I liked the news. We decided to watch a couple of hours of news. Afterwards we discussed the news with each other. We both decided we liked a different news program. We both decided to watch our own news.
Broken Arm. Sam was riding his bike. He lost control. He fell from his bike. His arm was broken. His mom took him to the hospital.

Mary's Kitten. Mary had a kitten. The kitten was very cute. One day, the kitten got stuck on the roof. Mary climbed the roof to get the kitten. Then, she climbed up to get the kitten to come down safely.

The Mattress. The family was shopping for a new mattress. They ended up deciding on a fluffy pink cushion. They tried to lift it to the top of their bed. But the mattress slipped from their hands. They cleaned it up but decided not to buy it again.
Tooth. The child had a toothache. The dentist found that the tooth was too large. He took a look at the tooth. The tooth looked normal. He gave the tooth to the child.

Migraine. Samantha was about to drive to visit her sick boyfriend. She woke up feeling very sick. Her boyfriend had to take her to the hospital. She was allowed to rest and recover. Afterwards she planned on being home by Friday.
RMV. I was at the DMV. I had a learner's permit. I couldn't wait to go on my test. Unfortunately I fell asleep while taking it. I was arrested and spent four hours in jail.

Basketball Rim. The kids were playing basketball. One kid accidentally hit the rim with the basketball. It broke the rim. The kids all laughed at him. They apologized and gave him some quarters to fix it.
To much of a good thing. Kim was hungry. She checked her kitchen. She found out she had no food in the fridge. She looked for something good to eat. She found some canned tuna in the fridge.

Rotten Luck. Tom was walking home from school one night. He noticed a bunch of coins laying around. He picked them all up and tossed them in a river. Tom and his friends had a great time playing with them. Tom had a lot of fun at school and the coins were worth it.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly is going through a hard time. She has to spend 3 weeks in the hospital. At first she thinks she will make it. After three weeks she goes home. Lilly is over the moon and is now resting at home.
The Gym. Mary had never been to a gym. Her boyfriend was new to it. She was unsure she wanted to go. He decided to take her to the gym for her first time. She loved it and now goes every day.

Reading. Bryan and his friend decided to read a book. He decided to read Moby Dick. The book was dark and violent. Bryan ended up getting really scared. His mom didn't let him read the book out loud anymore.

An unexpected accident. Riley was driving to his job in a new town. He was trying to get a flat tire. Suddenly a car in front of him swerved. The car hit a tree. Everyone was alright but Riley had to get a new tire.

Selfish People. Tom loved shopping. Unfortunately the store closed around noon. He decided to walk to the store at 11:00pm. Unfortunately he fell asleep in the store. He was in trouble with the store manager for it.
Ruined Mailbox. Tina was at the mall. She was on a mission. She needed to throw away her mail. Unfortunately she dropped it. It fell onto the floor and ruined the mailbox.

Bleach Cap Search. Bob wanted to get bleach for his bathroom, but he could not find bleach. He drove to the store to find a bleach cap, but he could not find it. He found a store that sells bleach caps online. When he got home, he bought bleach cap, but he could not find it. Bob had to go back to the store and get more bleach.
grocery. Tori got into a fight with her mom. She was grounded. Tori had to go to the store. She got in an accident. Tori was grounded for life.

Padding. My wife called the plumber. She wanted to know the type of padding on her shower curtain. The plumber quoted her a very high price. She asked him how much he would charge for the plumber to replace it. He quoted her $10,000 for the work.
mike walker. Aiden bought a new walker for his birthday. He started to play around. Aiden fell into a hole. His mom picked him up. He could not walk.

Movie rip off. I went to the movies with my boyfriend today. We took the same movie theatre we saw the last time we saw it. It was a remake of a very bad 1980's movie. We sat down to watch the movie and I saw a girl in a bikini. I decided I do not like that movie.
Tyler saves the baby. Tyler is at home. His wife is trying to cook. Her baby is crying. Tyler hears the baby crying. He rushes over and saves the baby.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. My mom was laid off from her job. She worked for the same company for Years. She came back to work on Monday. She found a new job at the same company. Now she works at the same job for 8 hours every day.
Wedding Party. Joe was invited to a wedding party. He didn't feel like going. He was afraid he would get caught. Joe decided not to go. The day of the wedding, he was glad he didn't go.

Lost Deal. Mike couldn't get the deal on a car he wanted. He decided to tell his boss. He got the boss's attention and asked for a new one. His boss was happy that he was asking. Mike got the new car without needing to try to sell it.

Lansing Trip. When I was a little girl I always went to Lansing. This week, I wanted to see the Capitol building. I looked up some things to see if I could see it. I got to the state capitol and it was great. I wanted to go back soon.
Easter Bunny. I always hated Easter. This year it was even worse. The bunny was orange. I told my mom that I would not eat a bunny this year. My mom made me eat a marshmallow bunny instead.
Bad Dessert. Jane wanted to surprise her husband. She decided to make him a dessert. It took a few hours. When it was done Jane looked at the dessert. She accidentally burned it.

Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike's computer had been overheating for days. He didn't know how to fix it. Mike called up a local computer repairman. The computer was repaired at the price he quoted. Mike was happy to have a working computer again.

Loud music. Tom was in his room. All of the sudden he heard loud music. He tried to ignore it, but it kept going on. Eventually his ears started ringing and ringing. Tom had to turn the music off immediately.
Tax Evasion. Tom was very wealthy. He worked hard to save his money. Tom found a way to avoid taxes. He started hiding his money in an offshore account. Tom took advantage of this and evaded taxes.

New York Vacation. I took a trip to New York City during college. There was so much to do that I wanted to do. I walked around Manhattan, visited many museums, and ate a lot of pizza. On my last day, I went to Central Park to see the Empire State Building. I returned home exhausted and happy with my vacation.

College Applications. I was applying to college and had just heard back from two of my schools. I was rather nervous about the rejection letters I would receive. I waited over a week for the rejection letters. I opened the letters and was very happy to find my acceptance. I sent the acceptance letter in and was very excited.

Generations. When we were young, we were brought to live with relatives. As we grew up, we met our grandparents. After years together, we traveled back and forth for a year. When our time together ended, we had some free time to create. We went back to our childhood home, hung out, and ate.

Vegas. A woman had always wanted to go to Las Vegas. She worked a job to support herself. One day, she heard about a job fair in Las Vegas. She attended the fair, and was able to look around. The fair was a success, and she was able to go to Las Vegas.

No Hesitation. Dan wanted to learn how to drive. Dan asked his parents for help. His parents took him out for a drive. They spent many hours on the road learning how to drive. Dan was happy he was able to finally drive.

Car in Parking Garage. A car pulled into a parking garage on a busy street. A person in the car asked the person in front of it to move. The person in the car responded by yelling at the person in front of him. The car moved, but it was in the wrong parking space. The person in the car then honked at the people in front of him.
the song. Kenny had been singing for hours. The crowd loved it. They wanted to hear more. Kenny played more. He got more applause.
The move. Tim needed to move. He decided to move to his friends house. He asked his friends if they want to live with him. His friends told him no. Tim got a new apartment.

Coupon Clipping. Jane was grocery shopping. She ran across a coupon for a good deal. She had to clip it but the coupon was very old. Jane did not have the money to clip it. She gave the cashier a big tip anyway.

Online Shopping. I ordered a ton of items from Amazon. I decided to put the items on amazon prime. However, when I went to check out I got a $90 charge. This made me angry and frustrated. So I decided to never go to Amazon prime again.
New Router. Jane bought a new router. She was trying to get it installed. The installer would not let her hook it up. She called customer service. They were able to get it installed.

Firebug. Briana was a firebug. She would light candles and blow smoke away. One day her friends were playing with fire, and one fell on her foot. It lit up and burned her toe badly. Now she is too afraid to light candles.
New handbag. Kate needed a new bag for school. But she couldn't afford one. She was afraid it would be boring. So she got creative. She used the fabric from her old bag.

Space Mountain. Tom was on vacation in California. He took a bus to the top of Space Mountain. Tom was scared but wanted to try it. He stood on a platform and strapped in his seat. Tom screamed and swore as he flew through the air.

Movies. Tom and his friends went to a movie. They got a bunch of popcorn and drank some soda. They ate popcorn and drank soda. After a while Tom noticed his friends were hungry. He ate and drank until he felt very full.

amnesia. I woke up one morning and couldn't remember what I ate last night. I remembered eating cheese. I also remembered having a hard time falling back asleep. I decided to read a book while I was in the bathroom. I was able to get my memory back afterwards.

Getting Ears Pierced. Jenna loved to get her ears pierced. She went to the mall with her friends. Jenna got a friend to do her ears. They both waited nervously for her to get her ear pierced. Jenna's friend pierced her ears.

Total heat stroke. Lola loved to walk the streets of New York City. She walked every day. One day, Lola was walking along the shores of a nearby lake. She walked too close to the water and started to feel heatstroke. Lola decided to walk back home.

To the Beach. Billy loves to go to the beach. He always wants to go to the Ocean. This year, Billy and his friend went to the beach. Billy fell in love with the ocean. Now, Billy and his friend go to the beach every year.

The Hair Band. I had to get a haircut. The hairdresser gave me a cute, short haircut. Then, she braided my hair. I sat in my chair in front of the mirror for a while. When she was done, I loved my new haircut.

Army Recruit. Greta had just finished high school. She wanted to go to the army. She applied but she couldn't get a response back. She waited for weeks and weeks. Finally, she got a letter back and was accepted.

Graphing Calculator. A boy was learning how to use a graphing calculator. His teacher asked him to imagine how the calculator worked. He imagined a car crash. He had the calculator stop working. He was able to fix it by just adding a stop sign.

Tail. Natalie wanted to go to the beach. But she didn't have enough money to buy a beach chair. She got a pair of long beach towels. And her feet were covered in sand. But her tummy hurt badly at the same time.

Road Trip. Dan wanted to take his wife on a road trip. Dan researched all the nearest interstate highways for his wife. Dan found a freeway that he could drive from Michigan to Indiana. Dan decided to take his wife to this freeway. Dan and his wife enjoyed their road trip in the middle of the desert.

The Paper. A boy sat down at his desk and started to write. The boy got up to go to the bathroom. The boy wrote that the bathroom was locked. His teacher noticed that the paper was wet. The teacher told the boy that his paper was not dry.

The old town visit. Susie had always wanted to see the old town. She decided to make plans to go one day. She bought a ticket and packed her bags. She was excited to see the old town. However unfortunately her trip did not go as planned.

In Trouble. Rita was working in the basement of her house when she heard a scream. It was coming from the attic! She frantically ran up to investigate. She was relieved that the noise was coming from the attic. Just then, an intruder burst through the door and began to attack her.
The Goat. John was at the park. He saw a man feeding a goat. He wondered why the goat had been acting strange. He realized that the man was selling cookies. John bought a cookie and was very excited.

Ferns. Anna's garden had always produced healthy plants. But then one year she noticed that all of the plants were bare. She looked around but found nothing in her field. Then she noticed that all the plants had grown tall and strong! The beautiful herbs had given birth to tall, healthy plants!

Siblings. Kate's sister wanted to take her to the movies. But Kate wanted to go home. She was excited, but she also had a crush on her friend Tom. So she reluctantly let her sister take her. Her sister was ecstatic when she realized she was in love.

Rex Can't Sleep. Rex is very restless and cannot sleep. His eyes are open all the time and he does not sleep well. Rex starts a bowl of cereal. His eyes close for a brief moment and he falls asleep. Rex is glad he ate his cereal so he can sleep.
Camping. When I was five years old, we went camping. We slept on the warm camper bed. I played with my brother. I wanted to stay in the warm bed. But my dad and I made a campfire in the night.
The Game. Linda and her friends loved playing outside. They played hide and seek. The game had lasted all day. Linda was tired, but her friends were not. They played a game on a rainy night instead.

The Pistol. I found a new pistol in the trash. It was old and black and looked very cool. I picked it up and took it home. I went to the shooting range and practiced shooting. I didn't have any luck at first, but I got the hang of it.

Leaf Collector. Sue had a huge collection of yellow leafs. She had almost every type of leaf imaginable. She wanted to sell them but she did not have any money. One day her dad bought all of her yellow leafs. She was so happy and she finally had money to buy something.

Frank Finds a Friend. Frank is lonely. Frank calls his friend to see if he can meet up. Frank meets up with his friend. Frank and his friend go to a bar. Frank and his friend hang out until it is time to leave.
Driving School. Jim wanted to become a car mechanic. He knew he wanted to learn how to drive. Jim started taking driving classes. He became a very good driver. Jim became a successful car mechanic.

Summer 1987. This summer, a friend of mine got her first job. It was summertime and she needed money. She applied at a clothing store and was approved. She had to get an outfit together. It was a very long process, but she finally got her job.

The Expensive Bill. Tom had been sick all week. His bills were piling up so high. He called his insurance company to file a claim. They told him he was one hundred dollars too much. Tom decided to pay some bills with cash instead.
Sanitary. I found a stray cat today. I put it under my bed. I also gave it catnip. I think the cat will like me. I hope it likes me.

Wednesday Dinner. Dori wants to make some Italian food for her husband. She went to the store and picked out a recipe. The meat was not what she wanted so she substituted chicken. Dori cooked the pasta and they both liked it. They went home and had a great time.

The Letter. One day a kid was writing letters to Santa. He wrote a letter to Santa asking Santa to make him a new toy. His mom wrote back saying it was too early to do anything. The next day, the kid received a letter from his dad saying it was already done. He was disappointed that his dream had been ruined.
Fast Cars. Jim went to the racetrack. He bought a lot of expensive fast cars. Jim raced his friend. Jim lost the race. He went back home without ever buying another fast car.

Wedding Disaster. Tom had recently moved to North Carolina. He was invited to a wedding in another state. Tom felt awkward about it and did not want to go. He stayed home instead. It turned out he was the one getting married.
The Rug. Sammy hated her bedroom. She had so many stains. She finally decided to change it up. She bought a new rug. It looked great.

Hair Spray. Tara needed to spray her hair to get rid of frizz. She went to the store and bought some hair spray. She took it home and sprayed her hair. Then, she put it in the bathtub. Then she let her hair dry.

Jake Finds a Friend. Jake had been lonely since moving away. He saw a woman with an infant and asked her for help. She agreed to meet him at the park. The woman brought her baby and they had a great time together. Jake was very happy that he was no longer lonely.

Writing a Song. James was bored. He decided to try to write a song. He tried writing a catchy tune. Unfortunately he fell into a rut and forgot a lot of the lyrics. James was left with no lyrics for his song and became a failure.

Sandwich Thief. Tod's mother warned him to eat sandwiches only on special days. He ate them anyway. His mother confronted him about it. Tod admitted he didn't listen. His mother kicked him out of the house.

A bear spotted. It was dark and gloomy in Dan's house. He was reading his newspaper when he heard a noise. When he looked closer he realized it was a bear. Dan ran out the door and hid. The bear was too far away to see and couldn't hurt Dan.

Fun at the Park. Karen and I were outside at the park. We were playing tag when I saw a duck. It came toward us so I got the duck to follow me. It ran up and down a hill with me in it's mouth. Then the duck just kept coming and we never ran back.
David goes fishing. David went fishing with his dad He had never fished before His dad got him a new rod He cast his first fish He caught his first fish

The New Drone. John was having trouble with his house drone. He tried everything to get it to work. Finally, he gave up and bought a new one. He set it up and began to fly it. John couldn't believe how much fun it was.

Answered Prayer. I went to my Sunday School class to receive my morning class prayer. My teacher explained that the class prayed for peace and goodwill. I took a seat as she told me about the blessing. I found out that she was not the teacher so I didn't know what to do. Luckily, the teacher came into my line of sight and she said grace.

One Store School Supplies. Gina and her friend Liz were at the mall. Gina wanted to buy her mother a new outfit for a party. But she had no money and no sense of style. So she decided to pick up a few supplies at the store. She was able to afford the outfit she wanted without much effort.

Clean Towels. Sam got a really dirty towel. He threw it in the wash. The washing machine wouldn't let him put it back in. Sam realized he was out of shampoo. He had to use the special shampooing method.

piercing. Carrie was getting her ears pierced. She got them stuck and couldn't get out. Her dad had to help her cut the earrings off. He had to go to the hospital. She had to be held overnight in order to get it out.

No experience. Jenna was applying to college. She did not have much experience with college yet. She was told it would take a lot of studying. Jenna took up that task eagerly. She was able to get through the first semester with little difficulty.

The costume party. Cindy decided to throw a costume party. She invited her closest friends. The day of the party, there were so many costumes. Cindy's friends spent hours creating new costumes. At the end of the day, they all had a great time.

The Test. Liz was doing poorly on her math test. She tried to pull an all-nighter. The next day, she decided to pull an all-nighter too. She did not get any sleep that night. When she got to class, she was sure she had studied enough.

Daughter to Work. Sally had a crush on her neighbor Rob. She worked on a research paper for her college. She went to his house to research some of his personal life. She discovered Rob had an affair with his neighbor's daughter. Sally's research paper was published and Rob was heartbroken.

Greedy Child. Mavis was eating a sandwich on the playground. She was going to pass it to her sister. When her sister noticed, she tried to steal Mavis' sandwich. Mavis kicked her sister in the stomach. Luckily, Mavis' sister was not seriously injured.

After Hours Capers. Evan came home one night to see his wife, Lila, being followed. She had been drinking at a friend's house. Evan snuck into the house to find her. He quickly realized she wasn't there and called 911. Luckily, they caught her before they could do anything else.

Ruined Pants. Tim was at the club. He was really drunk. He decided to leave his pants on while he drank. The next morning he was in such a bad mood that he didn't care. He had to get rid of his pants that night.

New Underwear. Jane needed new underwear. She checked the store's website for new ones. Unfortunately, there were none in her size. Luckily, she found a pair on sale for $12. Jane was able to purchase the new underwear.

Mildred Tries Out For Soccer. Mildred had always dreamed of playing professional soccer. Her family tried to encourage her to try out for a team. Mildred's coach tried to encourage her to keep at it. However, she was reluctant. Mildred still ended up making it on the team.
Flossing Pain. Dana had a big toothache. She couldn't find anything that would help. Then her friend suggested flossing. Dana followed her friend's advice. She felt better in no time at all!

Dominick's Birthday. Dominick is turning 40 today. He has an important birthday party to go to. He asks his friends to go with him to a bar and grill. The party is a hit with everyone. Dominick is so happy he turns 40!

Ice Cream. Billy always loved ice cream. He asked his mother to buy him a small ice cream cone. His mother said no. Billy begged and pleaded, but he was always denied. When Billy asked for the ice cream he got a small cone instead.

A Wall of Burning Books. I took my Kindle out to check out books one day. I got to the checkout counter and scanned the list. While the cashier scanned the items, I scanned the book catalog. I noticed that the bookstore was out of my favorite book. I returned to the counter and bought the book in the back of the line.

Biking Through a Puddle. Tom was out on a bike ride. He decided to ride down a puddle. Tom went a little too fast through the puddle. He crashed into a tree and broke his arm. Tom had to get a cast on his arm for a few weeks.
US Invades Iraq. The United States invades Iraq. It is going badly. The country is going to collapse. They get rescued by air force. It is a huge success.
Story. I decided to write a story. I told a story about my childhood. The story was so good that my friend told me that it was true. I tried to write a sequel. But I decided to give up.

Blankets. Cindy hated how hot it was in her house. She decided to find a way to stay cool. She bought blankets from the store. They were warm and soft but had holes. Cindy now slept warmly every night.

Envy. Amy was at a music show. She wanted to be a part of the show, but it was so popular. She didn't want to give up her spot. She played very well and gained many fans. Amy was so happy and wanted to go back again.

Old Bear. When I was a child, I loved to collect old photographs. When I was ten, I found an old photograph of my grandpa. The photo was of him with my grandfather. I went to the store and purchased a camera to send the photo to him. Later I found out the photo was in my grandpa's will.

The Pool. John loved going to the pool. He would swim laps every day. John was sad when his family moved to another town. John decided to go back to the pool. John now loved going to the pool and his family.

Swinging. Tom went with his girlfriend to a park. There, they sat and swung on the swings. Tom saw some pretty girls there, too! Then they got into a fight, and the park was shut down. Tom decided never to go there again.
A skiing accident. A friend of mine was on the slopes with her friends. She was skiing on a steep hill. Suddenly, she slipped and fell. Her ski legs broke! Luckily, her friend picked her up.

The Swan. One day on the river, I was sitting on the deck. I noticed a large creature swimming in the water. I went into the water to see what it was. I saw a large white swan that was very calm. I watched the swan swim back to shore.

A Difficult Reading. Nate started his new book on a cliff edge. He walked around for a little while. He looked up and started walking away. A guard was waiting for him. They took him back to the edge and he read a book from the top.

Recital. I was excited for the first recital I was going to play in. I walked in and realized I did not have my instrument ready. I went and found my friend and practiced with him. We all walked out and performed. I got so nervous I forgot about my nerves, and performed very well.

The Grand Escape. Cathy was in the kitchen when she heard a noise outside. Cathy then saw a large dog running down the street towards the house. Cathy got a broom and opened the door to the house. The dog was in the kitchen and was trying to get out of the house. After an hour, Cathy found the dog was nowhere to be found.

Lost purse. Maggie was looking for her wallet. She could not find it anywhere. Then, she remembered her purse had fallen off the table. She checked it out, and realized she'd left it in the pocket. Now, she knew where her wallet was.
Lying. The man told a lie. His friend got caught. The friend called his bluff. The man called back his bluff. The man's friend told the truth.

Overgrowth. Bob is a forest worker in a remote forest. One day a beetle appeared in a bush and looked nervous. Bob got a big net and took it away. He watched the beetle swim back to its hole. The beetle then ran out of the bush.
The Driver's Test. Timmy was taking his driver's test. He was nervous. He pulled his hand out in the window. He took his eyes off the road. He made a perfect parallel.
Green Thumb. My grandfather has a green thumb. He took his daughter to the doctor. She found out she had diabetes. He refused to take her to the doctor. They left her at home and my grandpa's house.

Snake Escape. John found a snake in his yard. He picked it up and held it tight. John kept the snake in the house for a few days. One morning John heard a crackling noise. He looked up and realized the snake had escaped from its tank!
Mandarin Chinese. I was in college in Boston. My friends and I decided to meet up for Chinese. It took three hours to get there and back. I took a cab home. When I got home I fell asleep in my bed.

Devil's Paradise. Sandra loved her family's farmhouse. One day, a horse ran out of milk. She got the horse to drink out the cow's milk. The horse got sick and died. Sandra's family was upset, but the townspeople laughed.
Broken Axle. John was driving with his truck. His truck axle fell off the car. John noticed he had a flat tire. John called a tow truck. John had to walk back home.
Near Drowning. Sophie was on a cruise. She was having a great time. Unfortunately she started to feel sick. Sophie was dragged under the water by the boat. She had to be rescued.
Too fast. The driver was going too fast. He drove through an intersection. He didn't stop. A cop caught him. He got a ticket for going too fast.

Boo!. Bob was a freshman in college and did not know what to eat for dinner. He walked to a restaurant and asked the waitress what she thought. The waitress thought it was not a bad idea. She suggested he order pizza. Bob loved pizza after that!

time capsule. Benjamin and his family always visited the Florida Keys each summer. After Benjamin got old, he wanted to get a vacation. He spent all his time at his house in the Keys. One night he found a time capsule full of photos and memorabilia. He had a great time reliving his childhood memories.

Berry's Trick. Berry loved to make his own money by selling his lemonade. Berry wanted to start a lemonade stand but couldn't afford an opener. Berry's wife came up with a plan. She took him to the grocery store to buy the equipment. Berry made a small stand and his wife's generosity made his day.

Car accident. One time I was drinking and driving on a highway. A car was hitting another car. I was stuck and I had to call for help. They finally came and towed the car away. I was so grateful they saved me that day!

Falling tree. I was sitting on my deck. My brother came down to tell me. As soon as he walked over to me, I fell off of my deck. I was so scared. Luckily, I was uninjured and had a good laugh about it.

Special Delivery. I sent my dog out the door one evening. He went into the house, and stood there until my husband came home. When I came home, I found him in his crate, laying on the floor. My husband had been sick, so he decided to send him back. The dog came back in a few days, much later.

The Pie. Kim's daughter was going to be a bridesmaid this year. She found a box of white sugar cookies. She baked her daughter a slice. Her daughter loved the taste. She could not wait to taste her delicious daughter's pie!
Clean Room. Sam decided to clean his room. His mom told him to put everything away. He put things in his closet and closet. Then he put his toys in his room. Sam was able to relax on the couch now.

The Race. The two cars were lined up against each other. The driver from each team jumped out on the track. The race began. The driver from each team took off on the race track. He took first in his race.

Lifetime Puppy. When my son turned four he asked me for a puppy. I went to the pound and bought him a poodle puppy. I was so happy he named him Poodle. My son loved him for years. He gave him a name of his own and he is now my best friend.

Bicycle Racing. Joey was riding his bicycle across town. He saw a guy across the street who was speeding. The guy wasn't paying attention and Joey was going too fast. Joey hit the guy and both Joey and the guy were hurt. The guy was mad he couldn't race Joey and he never sped on his bike again.

Free Samples. Gina's mom wanted to give her a gift. She was going to pick her up at six for lunch. But she had to pick the kids up before eleven. Gina still had an hour before lunch. She was annoyed to go home without a gift.
Bike. Joe bought a new bicycle. Joe took his bike to his friends house. Joe forgot to lock his bike. Joe's bike got stolen. Joe had to replace the bike with a new bike.

Don't make false promises. Ralph and his family had just bought a new house. His father was going to sell it when he found a mistake. He said he would help the family if they sold the house. They said it would be a small down payment. The next day he broke the promise and said he wouldn't help.

Wheeled. Ruth and her brother Jim were riding bikes on the street. The bike wheel came off the ground. Ruth tried to get it back on but it would not stay. Jim called Ruth's parents to come help him. His parents came and repaired the wheel.
Secure System. The power went out in a small town. Tina's house had no power. Tina called a company to come check it out. The power company came and shut the house down. Tina felt bad.
Distracted. Tom was listening to a song on the radio. The song was boring. He kept listening to the radio. When the song ended, Tom was still listening. He fell asleep in his car and hit a car.

Morbid reality. Sandy was a young mom with two young girls. She went for a run and decided to play with her two girls. While she was playing, the kids found her body. Her kids were in tears and screamed at her. Luckily, the paramedics came to take Sandy away.

Chemistry. Tim had a chemistry test in the morning. He decided to skip it and study. He stayed up all night studying for the test. When Tim got to class, he knew he was ready. He made a perfect score and received a good grade.

The Football Star. Jude was a football star. He played in all the games in his school's football championship. He was the quarterback and led his team to victory. He scored a touchdown against the undefeated team and won the game. He won the award and was a living legend in his school.

Flat. Sheila was driving her car one day. She saw something very shiny and clean on the side of the road. She checked it out and saw it was a diamond ring. She called the jeweler right away. The jeweler said he would give it to her.

Lost Money. I was at the movie theater one evening. I was looking for my wallet and I couldn't find it. I looked around everywhere for an hour. I finally looked in my pockets. I had hidden $5 from the movie theater.

Bad Start. Kate was very sleepy at her first class of the day. She tried to stay up as long as she could. However, she ended up falling asleep halfway through class. Her teacher was waiting for her and was tired. Kate woke up and was so late to class.

Mountain Trip. My friends and I decided to go on a hike in the mountains. We hiked for several miles and saw many beautiful sights. I told my friends we should go to a park nearby to have lunch. We hiked all night and arrived at the park early the next morning. We had a nice lunch and a nice time on the hike!
Bad Grades. Tommy had a bad reputation. Everyone at his school thought he was lazy. So one day, Tommy stole an entire lunch. He ate the entire lunch in one sitting. Tommy's parents punished him.

Cute Awakening. A little girl went to her parent's for a sleepover. Her mom brought her to a large room with two beds. The little girl climbed into bed with the girl's mom. Her mom kissed her on the forehead. The little girl went back to sleep.

Paul's Change of Address and Change of Heart. Paul is going to move to a new town. He is going to be moving for several hours. While walking to the bus stop, a man yells at Paul. Paul's friend calls the police and tells them that Paul is a hate crime. Paul is very sad but appreciative that the man was so nice.

Angry Feelings. Briana was at a friend's house. A few minutes ago, her mom called her. She asked if she has been watching her kids. Briana told her that she has. The friend had to apologize for her asking.

College Troubles. Dan was really stressed out and needed a break from work. Dan decided to take some time to relax at home by watching TV. Dan's girlfriend thought it would be funny to text him while he was watching TV. Dan did not answer her text message. Dan's girlfriend broke up with him after reading the text messages.
Alan's Big Break. Alan was a struggling actor. Alan read a press release for a play. The play company contacted Alan. Alan auditioned for the lead role. Alan won the role and was so happy!

Reaching the peak. Jack was an avid mountain climber. He had climbed all the way up to the top of the mountain. He was now near the summit and ready to push on. Jack spent the whole day training for the ultimate climb. On the summit Jack realized that his preparation had paid off.

Lip Gloss. She wanted a shiny new color for her lips. She went to the store and picked up a tube of lipstick. She took the lipstick home and applied it to her lips. She was surprised at how well it looked. She decided to buy two more!
Stray Cat. I had a stray cat in my apartment. I put up with it for a while. One day I had to take him to the vet. I brought him to the vet and got him a microchip. Now he is my pet and I love him.
New pasta sauce. Suzy made some pasta sauce. When she was done, she tasted it. She loved it. But she also hated it. So she put it in the garbage.
The broken wick. Eli was making a wick. He was about to put a candle into it. Then, the wick went out. Eli looked everywhere for it. Eventually, he realized it had been wet.

Bookworm. Beth loved books. She would check books out from the library every day. Beth was sick of the check-outs of the books. Beth searched for a new way to get books. Beth purchased a subscription to her local book store.
Spongebob. Dan loved playing with Spongebob. He would try to go on it more often. His dad said he would take a nap after. His dad never took him out. Dan was sad to have to play alone all day.

Going Back to School. My first day of school was rough. I came home from school on the first day with a headache and a sore throat. I didn't want to miss the first day of school so I went to the doctor. I had an infection from my classmates pencils. I had to go home early from school.

Sarah gets lucky. Sarah is driving down the road one night. She hears a noise coming from her car. She pulls over and gets out of the car. She looks under the hood and see's nothing. She calls for help and waits.

All Nighter. The man stayed up all night working. He felt very tired at the end of the day. The next day he felt tired all the time. He decided to stay up all night to get a good night's sleep. The next day he felt very tired all day.

Hiding the Gift. Jake wanted to give his girlfriend a special gift. He bought the gift for her but kept it hidden. She didn't know he bought it. He kept hiding the gift. She discovered it on Christmas eve.

Shocked. My friend was in a hurry in the car. He ended up hitting another car on the highway. It was also in a bad way and I saw him unconscious on the ground. We took him to a hospital. After a few hours, his brain was okay.

Gig. Tom was really bored at a party. He played the guitar but he really wanted to be a singer. The people around him were enjoying themselves, however. Tom went over and joined in on the fun. Tom was eventually asked to be lead singer of the party.
Typing. My wife is a professional typist. One day she gave us an email. She sent a message to me. I responded to the email. She sent a message back later.

Beach day. I went to the beach last week with my friends. My friends brought sandwiches and chips. When we got there it started to rain. My friends brought umbrellas and drank a beer. When we got home we made another beach day.

Freshman Orientation. Samuel was about to become a freshman at his school. He had a lot to learn about himself so he asked for help. His friend told him he was ready and told him some helpful advice. He also gave him a list of books to take along when he needed them. Samuel was able to make good friends and start a good school.

Pleased. Amy saw her brother and sister were eating a cake. She got a piece of cake and asked them to share. They shared a piece and both were really pleased. Amy asked for the same cake again. The girls happily ate the cake again.

Bread. My mom wanted to have a loaf of bread for breakfast. I had never made bread and she was really excited. I made the dough by hand. She took it out of the oven and looked at it. It was not good, she realized.

Electronic music. One of the first albums I bought was a mix tape. I listened to it for hours. When I was done, I tried to write some songs. I was too drunk to write any songs. I just sat on the floor, and stared at the walls.

Saving a Life. The nurse came into the room. The man was sick and had to be taken to the hospital. After the doctor discharged the man, he collapsed. The nurse gave him some medicine. He started to feel better and was released from the hospital.

Mushroom Pizza. The other day I was in the mood to make some pizza. I decided to make some mushrooms and onions. When it was done I ate it for dinner. But the next morning I could not find the mushrooms! So now I have to start all over again.

The Job Offer. Kate was interviewing for a new job. She was interviewing with two other candidates. At one point Kate had a difficult time answering some questions. One of the other candidates offered her a job. She accepted and began to work in sales.

The Bike. Sam bought a new bike. He took the bike to school with him. He had a lot of trouble going up the hill. He asked his teacher to help him. Sam's teacher was able to give him a little more traction.

The Murder. I went to the park with my brother to play baseball. We sat on the bench and watched the game. My brother had hit a home run ball and hit it into the stands. There was a crowd gathered on the field and it started to get rowdy. It turned into a full-blown riot!
