Boredom. Nia was bored. She decided to play some music. The music was too loud. Nia turned the music down. She felt more relaxed when she was able to.

Too Much. Beth had always felt insecure in her large breasts. Her friends had told her that she must be the victim of breast cancer. Beth had never gone through chemotherapy. She had decided to take a risk and go through it anyways. After her chemotherapy she was thrilled to see that she actually was breast cancer free.

Lilly's Song. Lilly was the lead singer of a band. The band was in competition for a Grammy. She played a song for the judges that she really liked. The judges told her she'd done an amazing job. She took the award and felt so accomplished!

Money for Groceries. Tom had just gotten his paycheck for the month. He was trying to figure out how much money he had left. He thought about all of the bills that he had to pay. Tom began to get very stressed. Tom decided that he should buy all of the groceries for the month.

The Cave. When I was a kid I found a large cave in our backyard. It was full of lots of old bones. I dug deep into the ground. I found lots of old bones as well. I made a huge collection of those ancient bones.

Messed up baking. Susie wanted to try something new. So she decided to try to make banana bread. She carefully followed the recipe. Yet unfortunately she messed it up. Susie was disappointed but figured it was too late to fix it.

The Rental Car. Alicia and her boyfriend were on vacation. She had a nice ride for a few days. But she quickly got a flat tire on the way home. She had to have her boyfriend borrow a car from someone else. Luckily his car was on it's last legs.

Mystery. Ava decided to make a quilt. She gathered her supplies and went to her favorite craft store. There, she bought all the supplies for her project. Then, she went home and began to work on the quilt. In no time, she had finished it, and it turned out beautifully!

Albert's Girl Problems. Albert has a crush on a girl in his class named Julie. Julie tells Albert that she thinks he is annoying and a loser. Julie decides to ditch Albert for his boring friends. After school they begin to spend time together. Julie's mom sees that she is sad that she is no longer with Albert.

Coup d'etat. Miles wanted to run an online shop. He found a small store with cheap items that he sold. He ran a promotion for a month and people started to buy. Soon, Miles was making lots of money. He bought more and more items and the shop was a success.
Wine. I bought some wine to make my own. I put a bottle in the freezer and waited. I forgot to take it out. I heard an explosion and the freezer exploded. I took out all the wine and threw it away.

Trade Argument. Tim and his wife didn't have much luck in their relationship. They argued constantly and never worked things out. After years of fighting, Tim felt sad. He decided to end the relationship. Tim and his wife eventually found a different way to live together.

Danny moves out. Danny is 26 and in his last year of college. He starts thinking about leaving the place he grew up. He asks his parents what he should do. His parents tell him to go to a different school. Danny moves out of his dorms to go to another school.

The stolen bike. Mike was on his way home from school. All of a sudden, he noticed a bike. It was missing from his house. When he went to check it out, it was gone. Luckily, it turned out that it was unlocked.

Relaxing Weekend. Dan decided to take a relaxing weekend break from work. After some consideration, he decided to drive to a park. While there he went fishing and played some video games. He enjoyed his time relaxing and watched some sports. In the end, he felt better after taking the relaxing weekend break.

The American Dream. My father worked hard in the coal mines. After he died, he left me everything. I was a young boy and I didn't have a lot of money. I worked hard to make my father proud of me. I got the job after I did that.

Mile Club. Jenny was determined to win the race. She went on mile club daily. She trained very hard to win. When the race started she was on her feet the whole race. Jenny ended up placing second place.

The Swimming Test. Tom was at the pool with his friends. They were all supposed to be swimming. Tom didn't know how to swim. He didn't realize until it was too late. He ended up drowning and having to dive into the pool.

Elizabeth's Bedroom. Elizabeth loves decorating her bedroom. She decided to make a bed that was out of pillows. She used a big box of pillowcases and some pillows. Elizabeth put the bed up on a shelf. She decorated the room with more pillows.

Migraines Or A Career. The doctor told the boy he needed to stretch more. The boy stretched in his room to hear the doctor. The doctor told him to stretch a further inch. The boy stretched to an inch and felt better. The doctor told the boy he would call him in six months.
Deadly consequences. Tom was driving his car on the road. He was driving slowly. Another car hit him from behind. The accident was horrible. Tom died on the scene.

Acting strangely. I was trying to put away a dresser for a customer. I placed the dresser on the floor. The dresser slid out of the way. My wife said it was broken. She took the dresser to a repair place.
Digs. Mary wanted to make her teeth shine. She got some bright blue dental floss. She dipped it in a bowl of baking soda. It started shining really well. Mary was so proud of her work.

Highway. Tim was driving across the highway. He did not notice the roundabout. It caused him to veer off the road. Tim hit a large rock on the freeway. Tim got out and walked to the side of the road to get help.

Expensive Accident. I decided to use an expensive air pump. I left it in a storage room for a few hours. When I went to put my clothes in the dryer, it wouldn't start. The air pump was inoperable. I eventually replaced the pump and it worked again.

Rick and the Ball. Rick liked to play tennis with his friends. They would always pick a new game each time they visited. The one game Rick couldn't decide on was baseball. Finally Rick asked the girls to pick a new game. Rick had a new favorite game to play with his friends!
Prom. Lance had never been to a dance before. He was excited for tonight. His girlfriend asked him to go with her. They picked a cool restaurant for their date. They danced until the night was over.

First Night. The Smiths had been married for 15 years. They decided to celebrate their marriage by going on a cruise. On the way to the cruise, they got lost. They had to get in the car to find the hotel. The Smiths had to eat canned tuna for the first time.

An Amazing Woman. My first time seeing a woman on screen was thrilling. She had a beautiful body and hair. She looked so beautiful I could not believe I had the courage to talk to her. She opened her arms wide, wanting me to touch her. She grabbed me and kissed me, I'll never forget that moment.
School play jitters. Kelly and her friends wanted to get into the school play. Kelly needed the lead role. Kelly was very nervous. She auditioned and got the role. Kelly was thrilled.

Cheap candy. I went to the store to buy candy. As I went to pay for my candy I saw some of it. The price was too cheap. I immediately walked out of the store. I ended up buying ten candy bars instead of one.

Drained Battery. Jim was at home. He noticed that his battery was really low. He tried to charge his phone as fast as he could. Jim ran out of power just before dinner time. He had to go to the store to buy more power.

College Graduate. Cara had always wanted to work in the financial services field. She had applied to many places but nothing seemed right. Finally she got a callback back from an interview at a bank. She was told they loved her and that she made a good impression. Cara got the job and worked her way up the ladder.
Elephants. There once was a elephant named Tiana. She loved to dance. One day she got stuck in a tree. She decided to go and try to climb. Unfortunately she fell off the tree and died.
Bedroom. The room smelled very bad. His mom told him it was from the cats. He hated cats but agreed to get rid of them. The room smelled fine. His mom let him keep it.

Cooper and the tadpole. Cooper loved his frog very much. Cooper's father wanted to sell the frog to a pet store. Cooper searched the internet for the frogs sold in the pet store. Cooper found one frog he really liked, but the price was too much. Cooper refused to part with his frog and got the money he wanted!

Bad Bridge. Jake loved to drive across the country. It was his favorite way to see the country. He was driving across a bridge and the brakes had to stop. Jake lost control of the car. Jake crashed and was badly injured.

Work. I was a stay at home mom working online for a while. It was difficult, and I couldn't pay attention to my job. So, one day I decided to quit. It was stressful, but I decided to go back to school to learn more. I went back to school, got a degree, and now I do what I love.
All You Can Eat. I went to the local buffet. I tried eating some seafood. The fish was so delicious. The waitress brought my food to me. It was a good choice, but I could have gone home.

The Last Bus. Dan was traveling to see his girlfriend in college. They were running late. He was stuck on the last bus. Dan got off the bus and waited for the next one. They finally made it to her place.
Note. A man asked an attractive woman for a date. The woman responded by giving him a note. The man read the note. He saw that the note was very revealing. He decided to ask the woman out on a date.
Trapped Cat. Kim wanted to take her cat for a walk. But her cat kept acting odd. Kim took the cat to a vet. But the cat had a broken leg. Kim's cat never went for a walk again.
Caught in the rain. Tina decided to go to the beach. She packed her towel and sunscreen. When she got to the beach it started to rain. Tina got soaking wet. It ruined her fun time at the beach.

The Sunscreen. Sally was at the beach. She realized that her sunscreen was broken. She put on a new bottle of sunscreen. She got some good sun exposure. Sally was able to get the sunscreen for the rest of the day.
Bicycle Accident. Jim had to go to school. His bike got stolen. It hit a parked car. Jim had to walk home. Jim had to use a bicycle for the rest of the day.

Going to the Park. Jared and his family wanted to go to the park. They both agreed that it would be fun. At the park they played dodgeball. Jared hit his friend in the face. Jared and his family went home.

Lost. I got lost while hiking one day. I was very worried that I would get lost. When I went to a store to find a map, it was in another language. I tried to understand the map but it was too confusing. I didn't know how to go anywhere so I just walked home.

The Climb. Jim climbed the tallest mountain in the world. He wanted to impress his friends so he got drunk and made a climb. The view was incredible but he fell and hurt his ankle. Jim decided he would be more careful from then on. Jim didn't climb mountains again until the injury healed.

Water for Cats. My cat loves to play fetch with my hands. He likes to throw a tennis ball as far as he can. However, I have a stroke that makes it hard to use his left hand. I don't know what I'm going to do until I can use my right hand. Hopefully it will be soon!
Paycheck. Tom had to fill out some paperwork. The paychecks had to be mailed. Tom got to work on the paper. The checks arrived in the mail. He put them in the envelope and mailed them.

Gymnastics. The gymnastics team had a big competition coming up. The team practiced a lot every day. They worked very hard and got the best nutrition. The day of the competition arrived. They did great and won first place.

The Wedding. Tim was getting married. He was worried he would not get along with his family. He stayed home. He planned a surprise party for his friends. Everyone had a great time at the surprise wedding.

Internet Addiction. My sister in law's son works in marketing. He was hired by a technology company to promote their product. He was interviewed in an industry magazine. He discussed the value of his new product to them. After his article ran, he was offered a contract as a senior advisor.

Fallen Tree. Tom's family went up to the Christmas tree farm to hang the tree. Tom picked a big one, and they took it outside to the back of the house. Tom noticed the tree was falling apart near the roots. They started taking the branches out, and soon the tree was fixed. Tom looked around, but the tree looked just as good as new.

Lazy. I used to be a very lazy person. I used to not even go to the grocery store. As I got older and got better at managing money, I began to shop. I have increased my spending habits and now I make more money. I now make more money than I ever thought possible.
Break. I tried to walk down the stairs at my house. Since it was nighttime, I was tired. My leg was in pain. I decided to walk to my car. I got in my car and drove to the nearest convenience store.

Bryan and the song. Bryan had the song stuck in his head all day. It kept him up all night long. When he was finally able to sleep, he could hear the song. The lyrics were so good that he went back and wrote them. He finally finished and the song became a big hit.

Roberto's Job Search. Roberto needed a new job. He was applying at several different places. One day, a local newspaper contacted him. They offered him an interview for a job writing online. Roberto interviewed and eventually got the job!
Fast car. James had a fast car. He loved driving fast. One day he lost control of his car. He ran over a car. Now James is in the hospital.

Sabrina is crushed. Sabrina was very popular at her school. Her friends and family decided to vote her prom queen. Sabrina was upset that her friends didn't vote for her. She decided to not attend the prom. Sabrina still has the best memories of the prom.
Vacation. We used to go to Hawaii every year. We lived there for 3 years. In 2014 we rented a cabin on Maui. We took our daughter to Disney World to say goodbye. She was so happy to go.
Scary Snake. Tommy heard a strange noise in his house. He was scared and took a broom. He ran into his bedroom. He was shocked to find a snake. Tommy called an exterminator.

The candle choice. Rachel needed a new candle. She did not know which one to choose. Rachel finally decided on one. She put the candle in the house. A few hours later it started to flutter and blew out.
Lacrosse. Lance challenged Nate to a game of lacrosse. Nate accepted the challenge. They played a good game. Then Nate beat Lance. He felt so proud!
The tractor. The farmer had a tractor. He took it to the barn. There, he put some hay in it. He then took it outside and plowed. The tractor had grown!

Showing Is Believing. My mother sent me a link to a page with a cute cat drawing. I clicked the link and read the whole thing. I immediately clicked the red button on my screen. I read all of the cute cat drawings I saw in the page. I clicked the red button and went home.
Crushes. I had a crush on a boy in my class. He never met my gaze. I never mentioned it to him. I decided to tell him what I liked. He never even noticed.

Onions and Garlic. A few years ago, my husband wanted to make dinner. I suggested we add some onion and garlic to the mix. I used my favorite recipe. The result was something that was just delicious! I hope we can make that again soon!

Just Beachy. We took our daughter to the beach to play. Her older sister, Kim, had been with us since she was 8. Her dad told us that her family would be leaving soon. Just as she sat down to go to sleep I looked over her shoulder. She was asleep, so I woke her up to play with her.
Student Loans. Tim worked for the MBTA. He earned a lot of money. He could not pay his student loans. Tim had to start paying them off. It was harder than he expected.

Forgetful Daisy. Daisy had a plan to visit an old friend in another state. She went to the store and bought a plane ticket to fly to Arizona. The next day she forgot to buy her flight tickets! Daisy was stuck in an airport for three hours. Finally the flight had arrived and Daisy was able to leave.
Aaron. Aaron was a great worker. He had an interview for a job that was a week away. He worked harder than he ever had before. His interview went very well. Aaron got the job!

Cold, wet lesson. Cathy was out hiking. As soon as she got to the campsite, it started to rain. Her umbrella was soaked and had to be replaced. She walked back to her car to get another one. Cathy didn't know how she would get home in the rain so she hiked.

Tails. I have had the longest tailed dogs ever. They are very hard to find and very cute. I kept them in a small room at home. A neighbor saw my dogs and asked about them. I gave him a few of my dogs for his birthday.

William loses the game. William is playing basketball. He is up by two points with 3 seconds left. William gets the ball. He passes the ball to another teammate. William's teammate gets the ball and they win the game.

Blood Plasma. Tom was very pale. He was asked at the doctor about his ethnicity. Tom had to admit to being white first. His doctor ordered blood plasma. Tom's plasma was taken and he started the process of becoming pale.

Hummingbird Day. Bob woke up to see a hummingbird. He walked to his backyard and went outside. He saw the hummingbird in the trees. He saw the hummingbird was feeding. Bob watched the bird until it flew away.

Out. I got a call from a friend last night. I asked her if she wanted to hang out. We had planned on calling tonight, but she didn't want to. We decided to go out for dinner and see how things were. Now she loves being my girlfriend.
Question. The man asked his sister for a pencil. His sister refused. The man grabbed the scissors from the drawer. He cut the tip of the pencil in two. His sister then told him to stop asking.

Loss of Energy. John always wanted to go swimming. John decided to go to the local pool to go swimming. When John got there the water was too cold. John got out of the pool to get some of the water. He got back into the pool but had to get some ice cream.

A Car Purchase. Jack wanted to buy a new car. His current car was in bad shape. He decided to take it to the dealer. The dealer gave him a list of options. Jack decided on a Mustang and drove it home.

Trying. She tried to find the car keys. She looked all over the house for them. She checked the back door, the kitchen, and the kitchen drawer. The only keys she found were in the kitchen drawer. She opened the drawer to find them.

IHOP. One day Dan wanted to go to the IHOP. He drove down to their restaurant and asked for a table. The worker at the IHOP greeted him with a smile and ordered him a meal. Dan thought that was very nice and ordered another one. Dan got his second IHOP order from that worker.

Runaway Bride. My friend Sue's mom was unhappy about her sister's engagement. She was determined to have her sister get married. She went to her sister's bridal party. She told everyone her sister was going to get married. Her sister refused the wedding and sued her.

Colorado. We took our children to visit the Colorado Rockies last year. There is so much to see in this beautiful place. The view was absolutely breathtaking. We were impressed. We were sad to leave the mountains.

Insecurities; or How I Learned That Even Your Friends Will Hold You Back Because of Theirs. I don't think I was very talented when I was younger. It took years and a lot of practice to get good enough to become a rapper. I decided I wanted to give my new found talent a chance and try my luck. I wrote a few rap songs and a few demos. They became a huge hit and now I'm a

Driving. Natalie was nervous to take her driving test. She didn't want to be in traffic without training wheels. She had a tutor who helped her practice driving. During the test she was very comfortable driving. Natalie passed the test easily and was very proud.
Mexican Food. I love Mexican food. This was my first time eating one. I ordered a burrito. It was delicious! I wanted to eat at that place more often.

New album. Susie had been waiting for a new album for a year. She was excited for it when it was released. She immediately rushed to the store. But to her dismay there was one album that was out of stock. Susie had to drive another twenty miles just to get it.
New Car. Cayla wanted a new car. She went to a dealership and looked at all the models. Finally she decided on one she liked. She went home and got her new car. She drove her new car home!

Stampede. Our family went to a state fair for the weekend. We got a lot of food for lunch. We rode the biggest rides all weekend. The day finally came where we could go home. We decided to stay and ride the big rides all weekend.

The Tie. I decided to buy a new tie. I went to a department store and asked the clerk what the colors were. The clerk told me there was a three tie colors, red, blue, and yellow. I chose red, blue, and yellow to make a tie. I put on my new tie and left the store.

Puppy. Kathy loved dogs. She decided to buy a puppy. Kathy's parents told her that they would not buy one. Kathy did not give up on her dream. When Kathy returned home from school, she was sad that her puppy died.
The Scam. Toni wanted to open a casino. She tried to set up shop online. Unfortunately, she was scammed. She never got paid. Toni sued the scammers and lost.

The Swimming Lesson. I used to have a horrible fear of swimming. One day my sister offered to teach me to swim. I practiced swimming in the pool with her for a week. After a week I was swimming easily! Now swimming is fun and I love to swim.

Power Plant. The family decided to get a power plant. They went to an electronics store and picked a bunch of stuff. Then they went to the plant. They hooked everything up and watched tv. They had fun at their new plant.

Snake Eating. John loved eating spicy food. He ate many peppers. One day, he was eating jalapenos and accidentally bit his tongue. He was in a lot of pain. John learned to be more careful about spicy food.

New Friends. Tara was at her friend's house. Her friend was having a birthday party. Tara wanted to make a big impression. Tara decided to ask to join the party. She made lots of new friends at her friend's party.

The Orange. Evan was shopping with his mother. She told him to pick something at random. He pulled out a carton of orange juice. Then, he picked out a bunch of grapes and a crate of candy. Evan's mother explained that they would pick a few things at random.

Jake Goes Fishing. Jake decided to go fishing with his friend. They drove to a local pond. Jake fished for about an hour. Jake and his friend had a fun day fishing. Jake and his friend decided to go on a trip every weekend.

New Dog. Our neighbors have a new dog. We went over to check out the new dog. They had a new boxer dog that looked a lot like our dog. We asked how they thought they got the dog. They said a stray dog got the dog.

Jimmy's Weight. Jimmy got home from school. Jimmy put on his clothes and shoes. Jimmy went into the kitchen to make a snack. He accidentally dropped a hamburger on his foot. Jimmy's mom made him change his shoes and dress.
Boiling Corn. It was a hot day. Sam was hungry. He boiled some corn. He ate some corn with butter. Sam was sick.

Todd Helps Out. Todd notices his neighborhood has started to feel bad lately. He decides to help out. Todd volunteers at the local soup kitchen. He feeds the homeless people there. Todd is glad that his neighborhood is feeling better.
Reading Challenge. Tom had a lot of homework due. He had to go to school. After school, he took a test. He passed the test. Tom was very excited.
Bad reaction. Kelsi loved to drink soda. The problem was that she had to stop. She had a big night out last weekend. She did not want to drink the soda. So she drank it out of boredom.

Dead Plants. Jane bought plants for her apartment. She had forgotten to water them. Within a week her plants started dying. Jane did not know what happened. She eventually realized the water reservoir was low.

Skydiving. Sam wanted to jump out of the plane. He looked in the window of the plane. There was no way he could do that without his harness. He grabbed the straps. Sam jumped out the plane without the harness.

Dancing shoes. Jill was a great dancer. She spent hours a day practicing for competitions. She felt that it was time to get in better shape. Jill bought new shoes with extra cushioning. She was so happy that she got to start dancing.
New Shoes. Sam needed new shoes. He didn't have any extra money. He asked his friend if he could borrow some. His friend lent him some money. Sam borrowed some money to buy shoes.

Scary Sleepover. I got a bunch of my friends together for a sleepover. We all got into our costumes. We spent a few hours sleeping on the couch together. After we got back in bed, we had a big fight. We decided to make it a scary sleepover next time.
Phone. Gina had a crush on her neighbor Jamie. She wanted to talk to him. But she couldn't find his phone. She looked through his things and his desk. Finally she found his phone.
Ladoo. The band's bus pulled up in front of my house. I decided to give them a hug. They smiled at me. After a few minutes, they asked me to go inside. They decided to go ahead and play the song.
Spider. Cory was walking through the house. He was afraid of spiders. He jumped up to avoid them. It did not work and Cory was stung by a spider. Cory was glad he jumped up.

Classroom. Ned had to make a presentation to his class. He wasn't sure what to say. Finally, he decided to just show his PowerPoint. Everyone in the class loved the presentation. Ned was happy that he had chosen this topic for his presentation.
Katie Courier. Katie owned a motorcycle. One day, she lost her bike to a wreck. She had to take it to a mechanic. The mechanic repaired her bike. Now, Katie rides her bike everywhere.

Stamp collector. Tom bought some stamps at the post office. He decided to add them to his collection. He put stamps of all kinds on his desk at home. He decided to make a stamp book as well. Tom was very happy with his choice of hobby.

Loud Snoring. Tim had snored throughout the night. He kept waking up to the loud snoring. He finally tried to get it out of his head. Tim started falling back asleep. He finally just fell back asleep.
Tavon. Tavon's car wouldn't start. He couldn't afford to fix it himself. He went to the dealership. He found a new car he liked. Tavon's car ran just fine with the new engine.

Karate Class. Sam was about to become a black belt in karate. He signed up for an introductory class. The instructor told Sam to break each limb at his opponent. Sam didn't understand this, so he fell backwards. Sam was severely injured and decided to cancel the class.

The concert. Jenny is excited to go to a concert today. She had her ears pierced and had her hair done. She put on the stage makeup. She danced to a song for an hour. When it was time to go, Jenny was ready and the show was great.

Piano. Mary's piano teacher encouraged her to try out for the school orchestra. Mary found out she had a natural gift for the instrument. She practiced for many years before audition day. She got the part and started playing at school. She felt so proud that she decided to become a teacher.

Fundraising. The Smith family wanted to make money to buy Christmas gifts. They all decided to start a Christmas Fundraiser. The family raised all their money by selling cookies at a church. The Smiths gave out their gifts and the church gave them money. They were very happy with their Christmas gifts.

Money gambling. I was at a casino yesterday and went on a game called slots. I spent $20 on a few of the games but nothing else. As I was playing I was betting on my life. I pulled the money out of my pocket but it wasn't enough. I lost and went back to gambling.

Happy ending. I was driving down the road when my husband called me. He said he had been arrested for DUI. I sat in my car for a while trying to figure out what was going on. I finally decided to ask him what happened. He told me that his blood alcohol was three times the legal limit.
Soda. My soda broke. I tried to pour it in a cup. I got a piece of gum in it. I spilled it all over my floor. My carpet is now covered in soda!
Delivery. The woman delivered the sandwich. She took it to the table. Her husband noticed the sandwich. His wife started to yell. He quickly left the table and apologized.
Ants. Tom was playing in the woods. His friend went to help him clean up. His friend took ants with them. They didn't see an ant in their hand. Tom got ants all over his hands.

Forgetful Bob. Bob forgot to do his homework on Tuesday. The next day, his teacher told him to do it. Bob spent the entire day doing the assignment. When Bob got home, he was embarrassed. He forgot to do his homework again.
New Hair. Jill was excited about her new hair. It was brown with a cute curl. She combed it out in the mirror. Then she put some gel in it and styled it. Her friends were very impressed.
Eggs. I got an egg for my husband's birthday. I hid it in the back of the refrigerator. I asked my husband to help me remove it. We put the eggs in the microwave. Then we ate the eggs together.

Surprise at school. Lacy had to go to the bathroom to take the test at school. She was very nervous about this. When she got to school her teacher surprised her. He gave her the test and asked her to take it home. Lacy was happy that this had happened to her.

Fruit. Jane and Jim had a contest to see who could eat the most fruit. The winner was going to get $100 from the contest. They competed all afternoon. Jane and Jim got the most fruit. They had a very good contest.

Bank. Tom needed to deposit a check. He went to the bank to deposit it. They told him he could not deposit checks. Tom called his bank and was told that they were closed. He was then able to deposit the check by phone.

Desk Builder. Ben needed a new desk in his home. He decided he would build one from scratch himself. He went to his local home improvement store and purchased supplies. Ben used his free time to build a great desk. He was so pleased when it arrived in the mail.

Doctor. Jim got a doctorate degree in philosophy. Jim was then able to get a job as a philosopher. Jim began teaching ethics. Jim became very famous in his city. Now Jim owns his own philosophical university.
Arcade night. Tara loved playing arcade games. Her favorite was shooting. One day her favorite game was free to play. Her dad let her play it on her own. Tara had a great time.

Vegan. Ida went to vegan sushi restaurant for the first time in her life. She was apprehensive about making a new life change. She sat down with a glass of soy milk and ordered two rolls. Then she read that sushi is a Japanese word and read it again. Then she decided to follow her gut instinct and go with it!

Big Deal. A small town was having an election for a city manager. The candidate that ran the best campaign was challenged by an old friend. The old friend convinced so many people to vote for her. At the end of the day, the old friend lost by only a few votes. However, she won a lot of people's votes and was elected town manager.

Night Terrors. Jill was having a hard time sleeping at night. She could not get to sleep because she had so many nightmares. She finally decided to see a doctor about her insomnia. The doctor gave Jill a special drug that helped her sleep. Jill finally was able to go to sleep!
Yummy almonds. It was summertime. Mina was craving some almonds. She couldn't believe how delicious they were. She went to buy some. To her delight, she got a pack.
Deep Cut. Dan went to get a haircut at the barbershop. The barbershop was only having one cutter. Dan was not a fan of the one he had. He requested for a second cut. The barber gladly obliged.
Tow Truck. The man went to the auto shop. He bought a tow truck. He drove it home. He parked the tow truck. He drove it to the junkyard.

Hidden Keys. Dan recently got drunk at a party and decided to drive home. After getting home he tried to unlock his door. Dan's keys did not fit in his pocket and he could not get home. Dan then went to the police to report the missing keys. After an hour of paperwork, Dan was finally able to leave home.

Bills big idea. Bill wanted to build a house of cards. He went to his local hardware store. He bought all the supplies he needed. Bill bought the best house cards he could find. He played the cards with friends and was very excited.

Online Dating. Sara was an attractive and smart girl. She wanted a date for her first night of college. Sara was nervous because she had no experience in the field. She went on an online dating site. She met a nice man who she was attracted to.

The kitty finds a home. Liv's kitten was always sick. She put up with him because her parents wouldn't allow a new cat. One day she asked her parents why they weren't letting her have him. Her parents explained she wasn't allowed to have pets so he had to find a home. Liv's parents finally let her have her kitty and she felt very happy.
Lamb. Kelsi loved to eat vegetables. She decided to grow her own lamb. She bought all the supplies and started growing. To her delight she did great. Now Kelsi had lots of delicious vegetables.

Amazing sunglasses. Lisa was sitting on her bed and looking up. She wanted to purchase some sunglasses. She looked through her bags but they were too expensive. She then looked in her closet and found the perfect pair. Lisa loved her new sunglasses.

Sick Day. Bob was not feeling well one morning. He wasn't sure what was wrong with him, but he just couldn't get out of bed. He called his boss who had him take a short walk outside to feel better. After an hour he felt a lot better. Bob had to work a second job on the weekend, but he was very happy about it.
Jenny's Accident. Jenny is at the lake. She is playing in the water. Jenny trips over a stick and falls into the lake. She splashes around and tries to get up. She swims back out to shore safely.

The Genius Was The Intern. Benny worked in an office that was full of brilliant people. They hired an intern as a paid-up researcher and teller. The intern was a total genius. The genius and the intern clashed constantly. The execs decided to fire the intern and have him give up his dream.

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky loved eating fish and chips. He loved them so much that he got into the business. At first he struggled making it all work. He started to make less and less money. Finally he gave up and sold his business to a competitor.

Snitch. My brother and I were watching a movie. We were trying to decide what to watch. I thought it would be funny to snitch about the movie. My brother decided to not watch the movie. He gave me a dirty look.

Radio. My sister-in-law has been deaf for over 50 years. Her brother found her an old radio for her. It had been put out of service for years. He took it to her doctor to check the batteries. He was able to get her the radio with a few adjustments.

Teacher, Teacher. Abby always wanted to be a teacher. Her parents said she would need to go to college for her schooling. When Abby was fourteen, Abby's dad became ill and passed away. Abby went to community college in the fall of her junior year. Abby graduated with honors and is now a teacher in the city.

A piece of italy. Kelsey was travelling in the United States. She was on a cruise ship. She saw an island that looked amazing. Kelsey went on the boat and stayed on it. It was beautiful and a very unique place.

Personal space. Dee and her friends were at the airport. They were waiting in a long line. Dee began to feel queasy. She stood up to move closer to the front of the line. However, a security guard stopped her and gave her a warning.
Wild Concert. Jane was at a concert. The music was really loud. She started to get worried. She decided to leave. Jane's parents did not let her stay with her.
New Business. The man got into the new business. He advertised it. They started getting customers. He expanded his business. He ended up losing money.

Spaghetti. Lucy went to spaghetti night. She was surprised there were so many options. When she got home, she got sauce and meatballs. She loved the sauce she decided to use. Lucy was glad there was a large selection of options.
The Railing. The man was trying to hang a lamp. The lamp was very heavy. The man didn't understand how he was going to hang it. He used some rope. It held the lamp fairly well.

Boredom. Tiffany and her husband didn't know what to do with their lives. Tiffany suggested they take a vacation and spend some time with friends. They went on a trip to the mountains of Colorado. Tiffany and her husband spent two weeks alone in the mountains. Tiffany and her husband never found any friends to spend their time with.
The Shot. Troy was playing baseball outside. He was swinging hard when it hit him in the arm. Troy's arm swelled up and was swollen. Troy had to go to the hospital. He had a bruise on his arm.

Speak. Anna wanted to learn a new language. But she lacked native speakers! Then she decided to volunteer at a school. There, she learned how to speak many different languages. Anna was so glad she'd chosen to volunteer at the school!

Art To Food. Annie enjoyed eating arts and crafts. One day, she noticed her art supplies were very low. She called up her friend Tina who had art supplies. They met up at the park. Annie and Tina made artwork for the park.

The Planets. Mara wanted to learn about the stars. She decided to take astronomy classes. She decided to attend a college to study science. After graduating, Mara took a job at a laboratory. She had to learn to interact with real stars.

Lost Cause. Joe was walking on the beach one day. But he decided to play a game of beach volleyball. But he did not have a proper sandals. So he ended up getting sand in his feet. And he had to go home and change his shoes.

Wrong Guilt. I was reading a book in class. I accidentally dropped the book on the ground. However, my teacher noticed I dropped the book. She told me that the book is missing a page. Since the book is missing a page, she gave me detention.

Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim had never eaten at a taco truck. He decided to try the food at a taco truck. Jim ordered two hot dogs and one guacamole. The food was good, but he realized he didn't like it. Jim decided to stick with eating from regular taco shops.
One Flew Over The Woman's Head. Doris was sitting at home. She tried to look up at the sky. The woman behind her looked angry. She started to yell at Doris. She jumped over Doris's head to scare her.

Sparky's Homework. Sparky hates doing his homework. His friend told him that doing homework at night is easy. Sparky finally decided to try to do his homework at night. His mother told him that if he did his homework at night then he could sleep. Sparky fell asleep that night after his mother told him to do his homework.
Soaked. Gina had a lot of rain in her house. She was getting soaked. She didn't have an umbrella. But there was a girl that sat on the porch. They had to sit on the porch.
Finding God. I went to the library to check out a book. The librarian asked me if I would like to meet God. I told her no. She asked me if I was okay with God. I told her I wasn't and she left.

The nerd. Jill was the most popular girl in school. She loved all the attention that she was getting. She was also the most nerdy of the kids. She often said that it was more fun being a nerd. One day, she was found to be a girl, so that changed her life.

voting. Kya was bored at the mall. She decided to go to the voting booth. She saw a sign on the screen reading "Voting is encouraged" She went inside and registered to vote. Then she cast her vote for president!

Dad saves Son. Liam was playing in his backyard. He tripped and fell into the grass. His dad ran up to get him and took him to the park. His dad saw that Liam was badly hurt. His dad brought Liam to the hospital and Liam was healed.
The Pens. The kids loved using pens. They made a big pile. They couldn't wait to fill it with pictures! The teacher handed them out to each student. They made lots of cool pictures!

A Helper. Julian was playing in the park with his dog. All of a sudden, the dog got spooked and started barking at him. Julian tried to calm his dog down. Suddenly, he realized he didn't have a leash. He took his dog home and she is safe now.
Gary. Gary is a very kind man. Gary always gives to charities. Gary went to work this morning to donate. He noticed a boy playing with a toy that was his. Gary took the boy to play with his toy.
Pizza. I ordered pizza last night. When I got it, it was amazing. It was extra spicy. It was also frozen. I wanted to get a second order.

Being Greedy. Tanya was in a hurry to get home. She drove fast and quickly to get home. She decided to take a large amount of money from her wallet. After Tanya parked the car, she took money out of her purse. After Tanya left, she realized she didn't have enough money.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. Julia was asked to be a bridesmaid. She felt honored and happy. Then, the day of the wedding she learned she was pregnant. She was so excited she started feeling queasy. She decided she did not want to be a bridesmaid anymore.

Birthday Cake. Jane's boyfriend wanted to surprise her. He bought her a birthday cake. He got a bunch of candles for it. When she bit into it, it was soft and yummy. She knew she could eat it anytime.

Kilt King Ken. Kenneth wanted to be the best kilt master around. He trained for many years, all in preparation to meet Ken. But when the day finally came Kenneth was in last place. Ken gave him a lift with one hand, Kenneth cried. The kilt master was not the same person after all.

Staples. Tom needed to make a stack of papers. He found his usual place for staples but forgot which was. Tom went back to the store to get some. The store didn't have the staples they needed. Tom had to go to the store again to get more.
Lost Wallet. Tim was on his way to work. He was pulling into a parking lot. Tim found his wallet on the ground. Tim went back to his car and called a taxi. Tim returned to work feeling relieved.

Audio recording. Ally wanted to record some music. She walked to her friend's house. Then she asked her to come over and record it. Her friend agreed. Ally recorded her music and shared it with her friends.

Princess. Lois was the best princess in the castle. She had red hair and sparkling blue eyes. No man ever dared approach her. One day a man named John saw her and asked her if she wanted to marry. She said yes and they started to date.

Kilt wearing dad. John went to a fair with his parents. He went with his friends because he thought it would be fun. He wore his father's kilt to the fair. It was the last fair John saw wearing his father's kilt. John didn't go to the next fair.

Diet. The family had decided to lose weight. So they decided to start eating better. They started to eat a lot more vegetables. They started to eat more protein and less fat. The family was able to lose weight.

Lost Shoe. Bob was playing soccer with his friends. His foot went through the goal posts. Bob could not find his shoe. He looked all over the yard. He finally found his shoe in the neighbor's front yard.
First date. Lily had her very first date with Dan. She was nervous but excited. At dinner they ate pizza. Then Dan took her to a movie. It was the best date she has had so far.

Heart. A little girl loved to sing. She wanted to sing at her choir audition. The director suggested that she learn how to play an instrument. The little girl practiced singing for weeks. She won the audition and had to join the choir.

Going Overboard. The boat was pulled over by a strong current. The sailors were thrown out of the boat and into the water. The sailors had to climb the ladder to get back on the boat. They were able to get back onto the boat as quickly as they could. The sailors made it back to shore safely.
Long time to dry. Tina bought some fabric. She was going to make a quilt. The fabric dried a long time. She was not able to get it out. She had to have it dry cleaned.

New Wallpaper. I bought new wallpaper for my house. The wallpaper was too bright for my home. I ordered the dark color wallpaper. When the package came, it had white stripes. I immediately threw the old wallpaper out.

Jan goes to the dentist. Jan has to go to the dentist for a root canal. She tells her mom about the appointment. Her mom takes her to the dentist. Jan gets her teeth pulled. Jan is happy that the dentist fixed her problem.

Tennis Coming of Age. Julia was playing tennis. Her dad had been trying to teach her how to serve. She still wasn't good enough to serve a ball. But, she was determined to try. She ended up making her dad proud by serving.

Trumpet. Tara was going to perform at the concert. She really wanted to be the band's lead trumpet player. Her parents told her that she would need a lot of practice to be that. Tara reluctantly practiced for weeks. She became the band's lead trumpet player and loved it!

Squirrel. Maggie's favorite animal was the squirrel. One day she heard a crack and saw a shadow. She ran to the window and was startled by a big dark shadow. Maggie screamed at the top of her lungs. Maggie's dad was standing in the yard looking very angry.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard realizes that he has become increasingly unruly at work. He decides he needs a change in his appearance. Finally Richard decides that he wants to grow a beard. He grows a big, thick beard that he loves. Richard is so happy that he no longer feels so unruly at work.

Silver Coins. The local supermarket has a very old collection of coins. I went to look at them today. One of the coins was made of gold, and had a value of 500 cents. I sold it for 25 cents. The other coin was made of silver, and was worth 100 cents.

Tea Time. A man desired a cup of tea. He went to the local shop to order. The shop had a very special tea that he tried. The tea was too good to pass up for the man. The man ordered the tea regularly after that experience.

The Phone. Janice broke the law by not following the rules. She decided to buy a new cell phone. She thought she would be smart and not use it. But she lied on the paperwork. When her phone arrived, it was a burner phone, not a smart phone.

The Dog Park. The family was going to have a dog park. They were going to build a fence around it. The dog's ran out of the gate. They were afraid they'd get in trouble. It was their last day at the dog park.
Tom's Diner. Tom loved eating bacon a lot. He bought a big diner to open up. The diner was a hit with customers. Soon, Tom ran out of business. He was sad to see his dream come true.

Felix Makes a Friend. Felix was on the street one day. A friendly man stopped to introduce himself. Felix immediately went up and introduce him. The two exchanged information about each other. Now Felix and the friendly man are friends.

Mylar Balloons. The teacher showed us how to make balloon animals. I had to make my own balloon head and legs. I made balloon animals for the class. After making my balloons, I went outside and threw them. My balloon head broke and I learned how to be less noisy in class.

Normal. Jana was in a very dark neighborhood. She was afraid to walk home alone at night. She had seen people being mugged on the streets every night. She was scared she'd be next! But to her surprise, she was not mugged at all!
Fred Eats Salad. Fred wants to start eating more salads. He decides to eat one every night. At first he hates it. Finally he finds that he loves it. Fred is happy that he started eating more salads.

Riding Lessons. Amber wanted to take riding lessons for her birthday. She had a ton of fun, however. The instructor let her do several jumps and cartwheels. Amber wanted to take more trips. She took four trips that day.

The storm. Kelly decided to visit her grandparents during a storm. The weather started out nice. Then a tornado appeared. It went through the house and tore it apart. Kelly cried when she saw the damage.

The Powder Room. Lucy's grandma always had a room for her. Today it was empty. Lucy decided to take her grandma's old room out. She decorated the whole house with her grandma's things. She could finally sleep in her grandma's room again.
Lost Keys. Jim had lost his keys to work. He was looking for them everywhere. He eventually gave up. When he went to use the bathroom his keys weren't there. He had to go buy a new set.

Condo Values. I lived in an apartment that sold condo values. In my free time I kept track of my real estate investments. I found a house that was selling for more than it's appraised value. I called the seller to see if they would sell the house for more. He sold the house for a lot less than it's worth.

Sled. Kim and Beth decided to go sledding. When they got to the park, Kim wanted to go higher. So she got her friend Beth to go higher. After a short time of sledding, they both got tired. But Beth decided to keep going higher.

Engagement. Bob went out for a walk in the neighborhood. He passed an old lady in a red turtleneck. The old lady said she had no boyfriend. Bob decided to ask her to marry him. Bob got a ring from his girlfriend for his anniversary.
Shots. I went to see my cousin play a little basketball. He wasn't very good. He made a shot and it went in! I was so proud of him. We had a good time laughing together.

Poisonous Gift. Jill was taking her dog to the dog park. While her dog was playing, the sprinklers stopped working. The dog ran under a fence and was sprayed by the sprinklers. Jill's dog had to be taken to the hospital. The dog had to be put down because of poison ivy.
Carrots. She bought an apple from the store. She ate the entire apple. She had to eat the rest of the fruit. She looked at it in the fridge. She threw the apple away.

The Excuse. Kim was out on a date with a guy. They weren't having much fun at dinner. Kim told him she was sick and he wouldn't go home. The next day he felt a little better and asked to go out again. Kim was embarrassed but accepted the offer.

The Monkey Emoji. Dan wanted to be more cool. So he decided to teach his little brother a new trick. He told him to say the emoji for his name. The brother liked the joke and started using the emoji every day. Soon, his name was a byword for coolness.

The Meat. Jeb wanted to impress his new girlfriend. He bought a great grill and all the meat they had. He grilled the steaks, onions, and mushrooms. He served them with potatoes and mashed potatoes. Jeb made his girlfriend very happy with the meal!
Bald. Bald was a great student in school. He wanted to become a teacher. Bald decided to take a biology test. The test was very difficult and was difficult to memorize. Bald failed the test.
Hair Gel. Jill was feeling sick. Her mother ordered her a hair gel. She used the hair gel. The hair gel made her feel better. Jill's mother sent her home with a big hug.

The Stolen Shirt. Robby worked in a store. One of his customers brought his favorite shirt from the back room. Robby tried to give it to him, but it had a large hole. He told the owner that it was stolen. The owner gave him back the shirt.

Coney Stew. One day, Sally wanted to make a delicious stew. She looked up a recipe online. She bought all the ingredients. Then she went to work cooking the stew. She loved to have her family eat the stew.
Food order. It was dinner time at the restaurant. Mira asked her waitress for the specials. The waitress told her the specials. Mira picked up her food. The waitress helped Mira eat her food.

A Ride Home. Lydia's parents had sent her to an elementary school she didn't like. She was home alone. She had not seen her best friend in ages. When she finally did see him, it was in the movies. He was in his big brother's car.
Math Test. Tim has a math test tomorrow. He hasn't studied at all. He didn't even have time to eat lunch. Tim decided to play video games instead of study. He ended up doing terribly on his test.
Drowsy. Lucy was watching TV. Her grandma was on the couch. Lucy saw her grandmother's face. Lucy started to get angry. Her grandma was upset with her.
Holey skirt. Mia wanted to wear a new skirt. She decided to sew one of her favorite designs. She used a lot of glitter and polka dots. Then she glued and sewed. Mia was happy with her new skirt.

Lick My Walls. I was in the bathroom working on a project. I noticed a small amount of blood on my work desk. The blood was from the woman who was trying to lick her wall. I looked up the instructions to see what to do about it. I used a plunger to kill the bleeding.

The Fishing Trip. Jerry was fishing on the lake with his dad. They were fishing very hard. Jerry was getting very angry when his dad called for a bite. His dad got out of the water quickly and made Jerry take the bait. Jerry caught a huge fish!
Snacks. Bob needed to eat snacks. He looked in his fridge for snacks. There was nothing to eat. Bob decided to buy some crackers from the store. Bob ate the crackers before his workout.
The Lost Cellphone. Rena was driving her car. She was texting someone. Suddenly, the phone rang. The person on the other end picked up. He asked where she was, and she was in a police station.

Incommunicado. Cindy lived in a small house. But her mom and dad were both very abusive. The police couldn't keep them apart. So they decided to put the kids in an isolated house. Cindy and her family lived in their tiny house until their dad died.

Paintball Challenge. Kyle challenged his dad to paint a lawn in thirty seconds. Kyle's dad didn't even put a cap on the lawn. When Kyle turned the hose on he hit a big rock. He couldn't get the rock back in the hose so he started spraying paint. In the end, Kyle's dad beat him by five seconds.

Beach Day. Sasha loved to go to the beach. She packed a beach towel and sunscreen. Sasha went to the beach and laid down on the sand. Sasha was so relaxed she forgot all about her work. She laid down for hours and watched the sunset.
Pick Me Up. Tom hated his boss. He got into a big fight with him. He couldn't deal with his boss. He picked a fight with another employee. Tom lost his job and had to learn a lesson.

Video. Jane liked to watch video games. One day, Jane's cable went out. Jane was upset that she could not watch her video games. She called her friend Todd, and Todd arrived at her house with a spare cable. Todd let Jane watch her video games on the spare cable.

Related After All. Jules was working hard on a novel. She spent hours and hours working on her characters. Her writing came out great. It was turned into a movie and made millions. She decided to try even harder next time.
Bad date. It was Tim's first date. He was excited and nervous. He arrived at the restaurant and realized he forgot his wallet. Tim called his friend. His friend picked him up at his place.
Bird Attack. I was watching the news. A news segment was on a bird attack. My niece and I watched it. It was really sad. I learned to be more protective of my bird.

The Slide. Jill and Beth went for a fun afternoon of slides. The park was filled with families and children. Beth jumped off of the slide several times. She was very exhausted. Jill made her promise to go on it more often.
The dog. Lila had a dog. The dog was very small. The dog ate a lot of leaves and shrubs. Lila decided to buy a large dog. The dog did not gain weight.

The Estimate. Tom was at a house sale. He noticed they were having a low estimate for the house. Tom asked them to bump up the estimate. The agent agreed. Tom's offer was accepted more than an hour later.

Mitch's Accident. Mitch was a fast driver, and didn't pay much attention to traffic rules. He was speeding down the highway when he lost control of the car. Mitch crashed into a tree, and broke his neck. Mitch was rushed to the hospital, where he was treated and treated. He died, and the laws of karma had already taken over.
Strict Coach. Juan was playing in a soccer game. He decided to foul the ball. The coach got furious. The coach threw the ball at Juan. The coach also made Juan run to the ref.

Pet Snake. My friends and I found a pet snake on a beach. We put the snake in our yard and we brought it home. We did not know if we should keep or release the snake. I picked the snake up and put it in the bathroom. I placed the snake in the living room so we could keep it.

Picking up Trash. Joe was walking through the neighborhood. He noticed that trash was all over the ground. Joe began picking up the trash. The trash began to pile up very high. Joe was able to successfully pick up the trash.

Bad Tip. Tom ordered a pizza. It wasn't his favorite but he thought he deserved it. The pizza guy came over and took it to the back. Tom never found out what they did to make it so bad. He never tipped a waiter again.

Taking a Chance. My friend and I had a great time at our recent family reunion. After a few drinks we went to a suite. My friend's uncle came out and offered to split the bill. When we reached our room, he said that he was not a fan. I was disappointed and went home empty-handed.

Camp. Nola went to a summer camp. She went with the other girls to play sports. But her favorite activity was horseback riding. Nola rode horses for nine hours straight! She was exhausted when she got home!

Puppy. Lance wanted a new puppy. He asked his dad if he could get one. His dad said yes. Lance and his dad went to the shelter to look at puppies. Lance fell in love with a playful dog and named him Beau.

Bathing Suit Failure. Dana had just come home from the beach. She hadn't planned on getting in the water that night. When she went to put on her bathing suit she realized she'd forgotten a button. She tried to button the suit as best as she could. After all that she was still unable to get in the water.
Fire. I tried to open the front door. When I did, I walked outside and noticed a fire. I tried to put it out but it was too late. I was trapped in my house. I had to call 911 to get help.

The lockdown scare. Susie was at school. Her class was supposed to be doing some assembly. As the assembly was beginning they heard a strange sound. Susie looked outside and saw a security guard with a gun. The alarm was then lifted.

Sister, Sister!. Tom was a father of three girls and he loved them all very much. Tom's family lived in an area of the country with no schools. Tom attended one local high school and he loved the classes. Tom attended the local state college and met his love for learning. Tom moved to the city where his sisters and family lived and they became his family!

Missed Trash. Tim was out shopping. He put his trash in the can near the register. Tim went back inside and forgot about the can. He returned out and it was gone. Tim looked around and it was all the way at the back.
Broken Toe. Tim was walking through the woods. He stepped on a branch. The branch broke his toe. Tim put on a bandage. He walked home and went to bed.

On the roof. We lived in an apartment in Brighton. In 1975 our apartment was infested with cockroaches. We got a maid to come clean the unit. The cockroaches were gone within two days. We still do not have cockroaches.

Grand Canyon. My friend Jim drove down to San Antonio last week. He took us to a local scenic overlook by the grand canyon. We hiked along side the canyon all day long. At the end of the day, we sat on the banks of the river and stared. It was an amazing view.

Jan's Jilted Jawing. Jan had a bad habit of jaw-jagging her friends. She was mean to everyone in the office and the whole school. One day Jan's boss caught her doing it. She called Jan's boss into his office and asked about the issue. Jan's boss fired Jan on the spot.

Disappointment. Sasha had a plan for dinner tonight. She planned to cook a wonderful meal. Unfortunately, the spaghetti sauce did not turn out as she planned. She had to wait a few more minutes for it to thicken up a bit. When she finally tasted it, it tasted horrible.

Diary. Jill bought a beautiful new diary. She had it set up in her bedroom. She had all her pictures taken inside of it. When she was ready to start writing, she got her hand stuck. Jill had to use the bathroom, and lost a lot of pictures.

The Jury. Kurt got a call from the court. He was going to be a juror. He and five other men would be sitting in a big room. He had never done jury duty before. He didn't have any idea what to expect, but was excited.

Severe Storm. A hurricane was predicted to be heading into the region. Everyone stayed in their homes or evacuated if necessary. The hurricane was a major threat. The weather service warned of torrential rainfall. The local government was forced to evacuate.

Bad Treatment. My wife told the doctor she needed to use a special cream. The doctor was unfamiliar with this practice. He said it would be helpful to try it. When the cream didn't work, he prescribed another medication. The new medication made her very sick.
Friends. My friends live in Brighton. They all have car troubles. One day my friend called me on my cell phone. I went to see them. They said the car had started running poorly.
Jump Rope Accident. Alicia was a very jump rope expert. She could do almost anything. She was invited to the circus for a show. She decided to jump on the trapeze bar. She injured her ankle badly.
Fight Sleep. Lilly couldn't fall asleep. Her mother insisted that she take some melatonin. Her mother told her that she didn't need to. She knew her mom wasn't real. She still couldn't sleep.

perfect attendance. Jenny and Bob had a meeting at school. They were going to make a huge mistake. They both went to the meeting without checking in. They both received zero attendance. They both got written up.

The hide and seek winner. Jessica and Matt were playing hide and seek. Jessica thought she would win, but then she ran out of the woods. Matt found her and told her she wasn't there. Jessica said she didn't want to hear Matt lie about her. Matt realized he was in love, and they continued to play.

Mitch's Money. Mitch had a big problem with money. He had to save money for the future. After years of saving money, Mitch had saved enough money. Mitch had enough money to buy his family a new car. Mitch bought the family a new car, and their future was great.

Monkey See Monkey Doo. A monkey climbed out of the jungle. He decided he'd like to go for a walk. He looked around to see where he was. The monkey suddenly jumped into the air. The monkey's jump startled the dog and it ran away.
The Kite. Tara wanted a kite. She looked for one in her yard. All the kites she saw were too big. Tara found one that was very tiny. She took it home and flew it every day.

Lost Keys. Tom was going to a baseball game. He couldn't find his keys. Tom called the concierge to let him know he was lost. The concierge asked his wife if she knew where they were. His wife found his keys and they went to the game.
The New Phone. My cell phone broke. I tried to buy a new one. I could not afford it. I went online to the electronics store to check the prices. I found a nice phone for thirty dollars.

Solar Power. Kate and her family were trying to save money. They wanted a better way to do things. So they looked into solar energy. They decided to install their own solar panels. The solar panels worked great and they were able to save money.

The Leak. Sally's apartment was a mess. She had been trying to clean it all day. Finally, she decided to buy a maid. That night, the maid tried to clean the apartment. Suddenly, a bottle cap fell out and onto Sally's rug.

Rex. Rex had a huge test in a few days. He was really stressed because he was also taking chemistry. Rex stayed up all night studying for his test. During the morning of the test Rex fell asleep. Rex got a D on his test.

Emergency. Bill was on his way home from work one day. When he got home he found his wife unconscious on the floor. She had died accidentally from a broken spine. He called the police immediately. Afterwards, a detective came and questioned Bill about her death.

Quarters. Sue went to buy some quarters for the casino. She found them to be very expensive. She went home and had a look at her options. She decided to make some of her own quarters at home. She did so and it was so much cheaper than buying them at the store!

My Favorite Binky. One of my favorite binkies is a red one with tiny pink eyes. It is called the Peppa Pig binky. I have the pink one. It has a little purple button on it that shows how much candy it has. I put that button in my front window so I can remember to get candy.
Lost Puppy. Bobby and Sarah found a puppy in the woods. They took it to a friend. The puppy got lost. Bobby and Sarah put the puppy down. They brought the puppy to their mother.

Successful Mediation for Shared Child Custody. When I was in middle school, a lot of kids got into fights. We had to mediate one fight. The two parents tried to get it under control. They argued back and forth for three hours. Eventually one parent took over custody.

The Marathon. Marcy was a race runner. Marcy wanted to win her next marathon. She trained for a month. Marcy started the marathon early in the morning. Marcy was able to finish the marathon early and win.
Wordsmith. A boy was bored one day. He decided to go to a dictionary. He looked up some words. He asked a dictionary owner for some help. The boy learned some new words.

Floor. We moved into a new apartment this summer. My girlfriend and I wanted to move out in a few days. When we finally moved our stuff into the new place, we were dismayed. It was very tiny and poorly designed. I said I would try to keep an eye on it.

Pink Underwear. Gina bought new pair of pink panties. She had to put them on immediately. She didn't think they would stay in for that long. But she loved the way they made her legs look. She put them on and regretted her decision instantly.

The Almost Revolt. After the movie ended, people were yelling out their anger. They were calling for their president. The president came out of the building with a lot of crowd. People started to shout the president down. He didn't talk to them for two days after that.
Stepping on a Nail. Margo was walking home one night. She stepped on a nail. Her foot started to bleed. Margo called 911. She went to the hospital.

Cake Disaster. Katie's mom was visiting. Katie was baking a cake for her mom. Katie accidentally dropped a cupcake batter on the floor. The cake burned. Katie had to use the floor again for the rest of the day.

Gym class. Maddie was nervous about going to her new gym class. She had never been to a class before and was scared. She got up on stage and began to sweat. To her surprise, the class was very fun. Maddie went back the next day feeling less scared.

Cutting my own hair. I was feeling a bit lonely. I decided that I wanted to cut my own hair. I went to the local beauty supply store. I selected a color and put it in my hair. After it was done, I liked my new look.

Movies with girlfriend. Ally invited her friend Stacy to see a movie. Stacy didn't want to see a romantic movie. So Ally had to find something else to watch. After a few minutes Ally realized Stacy wanted to see a funny movie. Ally and Stacy ended up having a great time watching a comedy.
Orange Seed. My daughter's college roommate is in law school. She went out of town last weekend. She came back in to drop off some mail. I thought the orange seeds were poisonous. I threw them away.

Not Creepy At All. My friend and I were in a long distance relationship. We were living in the same city at the same time. She came back to town. She went to her friends apartment to get a drink. We saw her again on her way back.

Nap Time. Ida wanted to spend her afternoon relaxing. But her son was in the kitchen making pancakes! He had made them all the way from scratch! Ida took him to a nearby park for an afternoon nap. She was so happy to relax after such a long day!

Cora. Cora was a very pretty little girl. She wanted to please her parents so badly! But she really wanted to please them even more! She drew their attention with her pretty dresses and glittery jewelry! They smiled happily and thanked her profusely!
New Job. Jill needed a new job. She got an interview. It was for an internship. She thought she had done well. Jill was hired.

Modern Dating. Tom had recently broken up with his girlfriend. He didn't think much about it since it was already over. Within a month, he received an email from her. It explained her problems with dating and love. She told him that she wasn't interested in dating anymore.

The Paper. Travis was really bored. He put his head down and stared at his computer. Suddenly, a friend called him. He had an important paper to write for school. He wrote the paper quickly and got an A.

Santeria. My friend invited me to attend a party. The party was in the city of Santeria. I was very excited about attending the event. The party was held in a dark, scary place. I had a lot of fun at the event, but I didn't want to go home.
Clip. The man put a clip on his shirt. It did not stay put. He took it off. He tried again. The shirt stayed on.
Lost Dog. My dog ran away last night. I looked for him all over town. He was found by a neighbor. My neighbor called animal control to look for him. The dog was found safe and sound.

Lost Phone. Jim was out drinking one night. He decided to call a friend on the phone. After calling his friend, he realized his phone wasn't working. He looked in his backpack to see if he had his phone. He remembered that he left it in his jacket pocket the night before.

Neighborhood thief. Rita came to her house to look for her missing glasses. Her little brother had taken them from her when she returned home. Rita didn't trust him and decided to tell her parents. They gave Rita a huge hug and told her they were proud of her. Rita was so relieved to find that the man responsible was caught.

Making Lisa mad. Lisa was a very nice girl. She really liked to be liked. One day she was asked to the dance by the coolest boy in school. Lisa agreed to go with him. Lisa was the coolest girl at school.
Frisbee. The man threw the frisbee. It flew high into the air. The ball landed on a tree. The tree fell on the man. The man was not hurt.

New World. When I was a child I dreamed of living in a tropical island. I dreamed of having big palm trees and a lot of rain. After graduating college, I applied for a job in Panama. My visa was denied due to poor financial standards. I decided to make my own way in the world.

An Extra Treat. My family was out camping. We were not prepared to have our tent left on the ground. I decided to go and take my sleeping bag to my tent. When I got back my tent was soaked in rain. I had to dry off by the campfire.
c-section. Lily was feeling very sick. Her doctor was unable to find a cure. She decided to have a c-section. Her baby was born healthy. Lily was so relieved that her baby was finally safe.

Aluminum Foil Swords. Kendra wanted a new school project. She needed to build a giant aluminum foil sword. She was going to make an example of how to make one. She got out her supplies and began to work. It came out looking amazing and she ended up making dozens!

Shelby goes to new york. Shelby had just moved to new york. Shelby needed a job but no one was hiring. She went to apply for jobs in new york. She interviewed for 2 weeks. Shelby was offered a job at the mall and she accepted.

Kim's big test. Kim is having a very important exam on Friday. She has been studying all week. On Thursday night, Kim was so stressed she stayed up all late. When she got to class, she fell asleep. When she woke up, her teacher told her that she had studied the wrong book.
Meatloaf. Today I tried meatloaf. My friends made meatloaf for dinner. I decided to try to make some. It was way harder than I expected. I had to take it back to the store.
NYC. I had never been to NYC. It had just opened up. When I got there, the subway was terrible. However, I ended up having a lot of fun. I couldn't wait to go back.

The Farmer's Market. Sam went to the farmer's market. He bought some fresh vegetables and some fruit. He spent all of his money at the market. Sam had fun walking around and seeing what the farmer's market had to offer. Sam decided to go back to the market.

Camping Disaster. Tim had never gone camping before. He packed a tent, sleeping bag, and food. Tim set up camp and settled in. After a few nights, it started to rain. Tim spent the next two days without food or water.
The Boat. The kids were playing on the river. The boat started sinking. The boat crashed to the bottom. The kids were terrified. They jumped into the water and swam to the surface.
Kind Acts. Tina went to the grocery store. She was on her way to buy some bread. A woman was shopping for a sandwich. Tina gave the woman $50. They both had a great time.

Soup Kitchen. I was in France when I first went to the soup kitchen. The food there was very tasty. I tried a lot of new foods there. I tried some chicken soup. The food there was the best I had ever eaten!
book. The man wrote a book. The publisher did not like the book. The publisher wrote another book. The man bought the other book from the publisher. The man sold the other book.

New pair of louboutins. Hannah saw some new shoes. They looked like those of a royalty. They were expensive but she liked them. She was tempted to buy the shoes. She ended up giving them to a friend instead.

Conduit. I started working in the underground railroad as a railroad enthusiast. I found out that the railroad was headed south. The railroad ran through a town called Conduit. The town was so small that the train had to go through a tunnel. The tunnel was so large that I left my job and became a conductor.

The Snake. One day while jogging in the woods a snake slithered across the path. I tried to catch it as I ran past it. After about 10 minutes of running, I couldn't catch it. I realized that I had to run faster to find a place to hide. It didn't take long to get back out of the woods.

The Prescription. Annie had a very bad migraine and was really upset about it. She wrote a prescription and went to the pharmacy to get some pain medication. She filled the prescription and was waiting to pay. She was so upset she was almost done when she saw a cop pull up. Annie had to go home and get a prescription for some painkillers.

The Stand. The kid was working in the garden. She planted a huge stand. She had to rake leaves every day. It was difficult at first, but soon she was the best gardener in the neighborhood. She won the award for best gardener in the school garden.

Sleepaway Camp. Sam was going to sleepaway camp. The kids were going to be camp for four weeks. He was very excited to be away from home for four weeks. He got to be in his own cabin and was very happy. He couldn't wait to be back at home!

Presley. My friends and I were hanging out one night. All of a sudden, a neighbor's cat runs up to my house. I didn't recognize the cat. We all decided to go get her, as we didn't want the neighbor to be upset. She ran back inside to go away, but we didn't believe her.

Dog Ate My Homework. My dog was running down the hall. I tried to chase him but he ate my homework. My teacher made him clean up the rest of the papers. I had to put all of the papers in a pile in front of my teacher. My teacher made my dog eat the pile.

Wet Pants. Molly was outside in the rain. She left her pants in her car. They got soaked and muddy. She looked for a pair of pants she could get wet in. After searching for a while she found a pair of pants.

Presidential Campaign. I love listening to music while working in a public building. Recently, my boss asked me to write an email to the president. I thought about the subject and put my ideas in writing. He was not amused. He gave me a $10 gift certificate as a reward.
Taffy. Lois took a tray of taffy to the counter. She offered it to her husband. She asked him if it was delicious. He looked at it and shook his head. He told her she had put in a whole wheat braid.

Fishing Alone. Ava had never fished alone. She went fishing with her dad one afternoon. At first, Ava's dad fished without her help. Then Ava's dad taught her how to cast her line. Ava caught many fish, and it motivated her to go fishing every day.

magic mug. Kyla got a new mug for her birthday. She opened it up and put her favorite drink inside. A little bit too cold, she dropped the mug. It shattered into pieces. Kyla had to replace it with another one.
Bluebirds. I live in Florida. My friends and I went to see the bluebirds. They were all so bright blue. We were so excited to see them! We decided to have dinner and watch them again.

Street Fight. We were standing in line outside an electronics store yesterday. A man asked me to get a gift for his mother for Mother's Day. He said he was going to take me home if I gave him the money. We both argued about the amount. Then he pulled out a gun and shot me in the arm.
No Mail. I had a package waiting for a month. I kept forgetting about it and forgot about it. When it arrived, I checked it. There was no mail. I threw the package away.
GO HOME. Tom bought a house. It was in bad shape. It needed a lot of work. Tom made some repairs. It was fixed up well.
The Grapes. I bought a bunch of grapes at the store. I had them in my house before school one day. I picked them all. I ate all of them. I was very full!

Turtle Rescue. Jane was on vacation in the jungle. She heard a strange noise and came back to the car. She saw a turtle in the bushes. Jane took it into her car and rescued it. She drove it back to the car and put the turtle in a box.

Coin Return. Joe was playing a video game. The character he was playing had a special item. He kept winning every time. Eventually Joe kept throwing coins into the machine. Eventually it broke and he had to return all of the coins.

storm. A storm came through in Bill's town. He got the whole thing from his house. All the lights went out and the radio was on silent. Then a siren went off and Bill was relieved. The sirens are usually loud and annoying.

Ray Rides a Bike. Ray had always wanted to learn how to ride a bike. He had been out of the running with his dad, but was determined. He took an introductory ride with his father. Ray found his dad was not very proficient with the bike. Now Ray and his dad bike every day to work together.

Careful Driver. Jack needed a ride home from work. He stopped at a gas station and bought a ride. He didn't realize he had been using the pump for too long. Jack filled his car with gasoline before he left the station. He accidentally drove too close to a house.

Backup Receiver. Dan loved watching the Vikings on tv. The teams played on Sunday Night. However, Dan was disappointed when the Vikings lost. Dan decided to watch the Vikings at home. Dan was glad to see that his team lost on Sunday.
The Dog. The dog ran around the house. There were toys in the house. The dog liked the toys. The dog was hungry. The dog chewed up the toys.
