Bike. Jim was walking down the road. He found a bicycle for sale. He put in a call. Jim was able to talk to the seller. The bike was sold to Jim.
Chiggers. I was walking home one day. I decided to shave my chin. Alas, I stubbed my chin on a cracker. I started bleeding. A stranger helped me clean the blood from my chin.

Loose Shirt. Tom was hanging out at a club with friends. He noticed that his shirt was loose. Tom tried to tighten it but it kept going up. Eventually Tom couldn't take the shirt off. He ended up having to go home early and change.

Sounds Like The Plot To A... John was playing at the park. He was running up and down the baseball field. The ball landed in a pond. John played baseball with his friend Sam. John scored a point for his team.
Taken for granted. Sam was in a nice hotel. His friend came by and wanted to talk. They had a conversation. Sam realized they are very similar. He is shocked his friend is so similar to him.
Providence. I saw a flyer for an art class. They were painting on a beach in Provincetown. I immediately signed up for it. The painting was amazing! It was a perfect end to the summer.
Funeral. Tom's family was having a funeral. Tom was a bit scared. He stayed in the living room. The people in the family didn't speak at all. He was relieved that everyone was there to support him.
The Furry Blanket. Rachael was walking down the sidewalk. She got an animal blanket for her dog. Rachael put the blanket on her dog. It was fuzzy and gross. She threw the blanket away.

Best Present. Kate's friend was giving her a birthday present. But she only had $50. She decided to put an advertisement in her mailbox. The next day a woman knocked on her door. The woman was giving her a brand new dress.

Violence isn't the answer. Beth called her boyfriend. She was so upset that her boyfriend never responded. Beth began to cry. Her boyfriend gave her a hug and walked away. Beth stopped crying and walked away.

Pentatonix!. Neil had a dream. He dreamed that he was a member of the electronic music scene. Neil was only eighteen years old. He moved to Nashville to pursue his dream. Neil became a part of the electronic music scene!

breakfast. Theo wanted some cereal. But he didn't have any milk. He had no other option than to eat the cereal. But Theo wasn't satisfied with the cereal. So he went to the store and bought some milk.

Fostering A Dog. Timmy is a very picky dog. He stays in a small apartment all day. His new owner is very fond of Timmy. He is trained and cuddled by his new family. Timmy loves to live with his new family.

The Christmas Tree. The tree was green. It was a special Christmas tree for my family. We live in the midwest so there are not many natural Christmas Trees. I bought it for my family. It was a hard decision.

Sunglasses. Jenny's face was very red from an afternoon of summer camp. She did not own any sunglasses. Her mom bought her some bright blue ones. The sun didn't seem as bright as it was. Jenny got some red ones the next time she went to the beach.

Landon's Lakehouse. Landon's parents took him to the lake to build a boat. When they got there, Landon's parents let him try the boat out. Landon was hooked on the excitement of his new experience. He took up fishing every weekend and loved it. Landon became a better fisherman as a result of his trip to the lake.

Painting. It was the last day of school. I had to go to the store to buy supplies for the class. On the way, I got nervous. I got on my bike and began to paint my room. I spent the whole afternoon painting my room.
Cheer tryouts. Miranda was excited for tryouts. She tried out in the fall. They let her try out all the drills. Miranda was not very good at them. She kept trying until the judges called her name.
Dead Battery. Tim got a new cellphone. He had gotten it to work with a dead battery. His phone died shortly after. He threw the battery away. He used his new one without any issues.

Laura's Flowers. Laura wanted to plant a garden. She looked up the different kinds of flowers. She found a recipe for fresh roses. Laura went to the store and purchased the supplies. She planted the roses in her garden.

Snack Bars. My wife went to McDonald's for lunch. She ordered a chocolate shake. They had a snack bar that was chocolate in nature. They were large, but the shakes were yummy. My wife loves the snack bar.
The Sand Dollars. It was a rainy day outside. Sandy needed a change of scenery. She took some sand to buy some flowers. She put them on a shelf in her house. Her family loved them.

gunfire. It was a dark and stormy night. A hunter heard the sound of gunfire. He hurriedly opened his tent and fled the woods. Hours later he heard the sound again and saw a hunter chasing him. The hunter shot and killed the hunter and the two men fled.

Branching Out. Tom was a college student. He felt he was stagnating in his classes. He wanted to branch out and do something different. Tom decided to drop out of school and join a band. Tom wound up finding the band environment more challenging.

Bank Trip. I went to the bank to make a transaction. I deposited money into my savings account. When I got home, I noticed I had no more money. The teller asked where I left my money. I told her I deposited it on a Saturday and it was gone.

Tickle. Iris was playing in her room. She was tossing a toy around. All of a sudden, a huge lump appeared. Iris went to the bathroom to remove the lump. She then felt a tickle on her arm and immediately stopped.
Worst musical. Kelley had seen a musical. But she really wanted to try it. She went backstage. She was really nervous. But when she saw her dad sing, she had no problems.

Rupture. Kate had been feeling bad all day. She finally decided to go to the ER. She was prescribed a mild headache medicine. She took it for 3 days and she felt much better. Eventually she had to go back to work.

Rat Problem. A woman's husband found a rat in their basement. They hired a exterminator. It took months for the exterminator to get rid of the rat. Afterwards they decided to call in a professional to take over. The exterminator was able to eliminate the rat.

Taking the Dog for a Walk. Bob was walking his dog through the neighborhood. A car suddenly swerved in front of him. Bob tried to run after the car but it was too late. His dog ran into the street and started to hit other cars. Bob was angry and upset at the driver.

Serving Time. Gina's grandma was coming home from work. She was supposed to be home by the time the phone rang. She wasn't able to leave when the doorbell rang. Her grandma had gotten in an accident, and Gina would be late. She waited until she arrived home to leave the house.

Plan Ahead. Kia wanted to have a nice dinner at her new apartment. She didn't know which restaurant to visit so she called a restaurant. The restaurant owner was very helpful and Kia had a great time. She even met the restaurant's best chef for dinner. Kia knew she had a great time and decided to call again the next day!

Closing down the A&P. Tina and her husband were looking for something to do. They had just bought a new home and needed something else. Tina found an A&P and thought it would be fun to try it out. She went to the store and found the best deal. Tina couldn't wait to go back and buy more of their favorite stuff.

The Parrot. Dan's grandfather bought a new parrot for his grandson. Dan was excited to play with the bird every day. When he was little, Dan wished he had a pet like the bird. One day Dan found the parrot floating dead on the floor. He was so sad, he never let his grandson play with the bird.
Spray Paint. Kurt sprayed paint his shed. His shed was filthy. He put a drop of paint in the paint bucket. He then used a hose to clean the paint. Kurt finished his shed.

Football. The boys liked to play football. They practiced hard all week. They beat their rival team on Sunday. They decided to celebrate the victory by having a barbecue. They went out to the bar and had a great time!

Hair. She had long wavy hair. She always brushed her hair with a curling iron. One day she forgot to brush her hair. It got caught in the machine. When she went to brush her hair, her hair was curly again.
Putting away groceries. I needed to buy groceries. I drove to the store. I parked in the parking lot. I put away all of my groceries. I got home and unpacked my groceries.

The Piano Lesson. Mary was playing the piano. She went through a difficult piece. The teacher told her to practice more. Mary began to forget the key she was holding. Mary practiced diligently to learn to play the piece.

Foggy problems. The Smiths moved into a new house. It was far away from their usual house. They needed to find a way to clear the fog. So they looked online. They found a way to clear the fog in their car.

Space Heater. I was always fascinated by space. I wanted to be an astronaut someday. I entered into space camp and was given a space heater. I spent the whole camp learning how to operate the space heater. Now I can be an astronaut someday.
Lost. My son lost his key. He looked all over the house. I searched through the freezer and drawers. I found his key in a drawer. I returned the key and told him that it was ok.
The Field. It was a beautiful day outside. Sam decided to go for a walk in the park. Sam decided to go for a walk in the park. While walking Sam spotted a deer. He continued his walk.
Slump. I woke up in the middle of the night. I thought my car was going to go flat. I got out and looked around for the engine. It was not there. I had just been in a terrible accident.

Allergic to Cats. Jane wanted a cat as a pet. She researched different breeds and different breeds of cat. Finally Jane chose a white cat. When Jane brought the cat home she was surprised. The cat was allergic to the white hairs on her legs!

A spill in the bag. I had a bag of candy on the ground. It got stuck in the grass. I ran to try to grab it out but it was stuck. I tried to pry it free but it was stuck. I had to cut the bag open with a knife.

Cooking is Important. Gina's family wasn't very religious. She didn't think it was important to prepare her family dinner. But when her grandma and grandpa were sick, she knew it was. She wanted to make the dinner for them. The following week, the food was rotten and the family hated her.

Book. It was the day before Halloween. I needed to go to the bookstore, but I was too sick. So I went and bought a book to take to the library. I walked down the hall and grabbed the book. I took the book to the library and it was free!

Mountain. Tim was hiking in the mountains. It was extremely hot and humid out. Tim tried to bring along his water bottle with him. Unfortunately the rain was too much and Tim ran out. He did not feel much better after that.

Todd's First Bike Ride. Todd had always wanted to ride a bike without training wheels. Todd decided to go to the local park and borrow a bike. Todd rode the bike to the park and began his first lesson. At the park, Todd realized he was very nervous about riding without training wheels. Todd rode the bike back home, and felt very proud of himself.
Dress caught. Susie was about to leave for work. She was about to walk to work. She was wearing her favorite dress. The dress got caught on the door handle. She was so upset about it she ran out.
Dollar Store. I drove to the dollar store yesterday. While I was there I found a few things. They had lots of dollar items that I liked. I bought a few things. I really like this dollar store.

Losing balance. I decided to ride the rollercoaster. However, the rollercoaster tilted and fell. However, it didn't stop until I hit the bottom. I was stuck on the ground. Thankfully, the ride stopped after that.

Kujata. I went to the beach in Hawaii with my family. I wanted to go to the beach because it was hot outside. I walked up to the shore. I got lost, and went in the water. I was lucky and found my way back to the shore.

Biking. Ava loved to bike. She decided to take a class at her local park. At first, Ava had trouble learning to ride a bike. But soon she learned how to keep up with her friends. She was happy that she could learn to bike quickly.
Checker Floor. I found a checker board in the attic. It was missing a corner and was dirty. I cleaned it and turned the corner by myself. My sister did not like it. We decided to put it in the attic.

fridge. Jim wanted to make himself a drink. He got a coffee maker and made himself a coffee. He then had the coffee in a mug. He put the mug into the fridge. He opened the fridge and drank the coffee.

Pool. The other day I was at the pool. I forgot to bring any sunscreen. So I decided to try and stay under the water. However to my dismay, I had a bad sunburn. So next time I will remember to bring a sunscreen.

Wires. Heather was afraid of wires. Her boyfriend didn't know this but bought a large grounding wire. Heather was afraid it would break and electrocute her. Her boyfriend tried to explain how the grounding wire wasn't electrocuted. Heather calmed herself down and just bought a new one.

Dream Team. I was playing basketball with my friends one day. We were up against a really good team and were feeling cocky. I told everyone to be careful and not get carried by their hype. Unfortunately for me, we lost the game by twenty points. I learned that I should be a little more humble.

Sara's Big Move. Sara was nervous about moving to a new school in a new town. She thought the new school would be worse than the old one. Sara was shocked when she found out it was not. Sara met many new friends and made many new friends at her new school. Sara was relieved that her worries were over.
Not Solid. Tim was in a rush. He grabbed the scissors. As he cut himself, he cut himself on a sharp rock. He started bleeding. Tim had to wait to get a band-aid.

Metal in a Microwave. Tim was hungry and wanted some food. He decided to try microwaving some food. He used two cups of mashed potatoes. The microwave started to heat up. He was thankful for the microwave.

Operation Table. The doctor came in the room with a table to assist with the surgery. He told me that it would hurt when I put in my first clump. He helped me put my first clump into my first incision. After he finished, I sat down to wait for my pain to subside. My first incision was a painful one, but thankfully it ended up healing.
Crayons. My mom and I wanted to draw for hours. We took a long road trip to get to the park. I picked up crayons at the park. I drew in the park. My mom liked it.

Philip Got Punched. Philip went outside to play at recess. When he came back inside, someone punched him. Philip's nose started bleeding. Philip's mother tried to stop the bleeding by covering his mouth. Philip got a big bruise on his nose.
The earthquake. Tim was at home. Suddenly, a loud noise shook the house. Tim was terrified. He ran outside and stood on his roof. He didn't see anything.

The Train Delay. Amy was waiting for her train one morning. The train was coming very soon. As it was pulling into the station Amy heard a loud noise. The train had to be halted for repairs. Amy sat patiently waiting to be able to leave.

Cells. When I started eating I was not aware that I ate too many vegetables. My mom told me that I needed to eat more vegetables. I tried to eat as many vegetables as I could. However, when I was finished I felt sick. My mom gave me a small container of vegetables to take home.
Glass down. Lena bought a new dress. She wore the dress to work. She thought the dress was beautiful. However, the dress was very flimsy. Lena ended up breaking the dress.

Family Vacation. The Smith family was vacationing in Florida. They were driving to the beach one day and noticed a sign. It said free beach day. The Smith's decided to go to the beach. They had a great day on the beach.

Megan Makes A Fire. Megan wanted to make a fire. She got all the ingredients ready to make a fire. She made a small fire by putting wood on a sheet. Megan forgot to check the weather. Her small fire burned out.
Lost Game. Tom was playing in an NBA basketball game. His team was losing by 1 point. Tom had to go and make a shot. He missed and his team lost. He learned to be more careful in the future.

Thanks for the Pictures. Jim wanted to show off how much he loved his wife. He took her to the local club with a picture booth. She asked for her pictures. Jim showed off the pictures he had taken. His wife thanked him and said thank you.

David loses his wife. David is at home with his wife and daughter. David is trying to watch TV. David starts to feel sad. His wife tells him that her father has passed. David is crushed that his father has passed away.

Cheap Frames. Jane liked to hang things on the wall. She bought cheap plastic frames to use for free. One day Jane decided to hang some framed photos. Her sister found out about her cheap frames. Her sister took all the frames down.
New Job. Sandra lost her job. She applied to many places online. However, she couldn't find a job in her field. Sandra decided to become a hairdresser. Sandra now dresses the people of her community.
Chris. Chris was a mean boy. He would always be rude to everyone he met. One day he decided to be nice to everyone. He became a nice person. He started having a good life.

I'm Not A Cry Baby. Jane was out shopping for makeup. Jane was looking through the makeup aisle. Jane was distracted by a display of cute kittens. Jane looked down to check out the kittens. Jane looked up and saw she had purchased a toddler's brand makeup.
The Sunburn. Riley was out for a walk. She saw a really hot sun. It was so intense that she began to burn. She went back inside. She put lotion on it to make it last longer.
Partner. Kane is married to Tim. She has not been seeing him in months. Kane's friend tells her that Tim is sick. Kane rushes to his hospital room. She hugs and says her goodbyes.

Drive Away!. The man heard a noise and saw his window was broken. He went to his car and got his keys from the ignition. He got out and opened the car door. He ran into the house to see if his wife was there. He locked the door and waited for her to come home.

They all ditched him. Ben was on a vacation with his family. His best friend Dan and his girlfriend Dana were there. Ben's family was having a party. One of his friends told Ben he was going home with them. Ben was furious and stormed off.

Do the Right Thing. The Smith family were out shopping. They noticed a child left on the side of the road. The Smiths decided to give him a ride home. The family waited an hour and a half for the car to come. The family realized that the child was lost and called the police.

Buying a cell phone. I was browsing through the cell phone store. I saw a brand new phone that I really wanted. The phone looked absolutely gorgeous. I made the purchase and took it home. I was happy that I decided to purchase the phone.
Garden. Randi wanted to be more active. She wanted to grow vegetables. She decided to plant a garden. She planted tomato plants and lettuce. The garden turned out to be very fruitful.

Jan pays rent. Jan was watching television when her power went out. Jan didn't have money to pay rent. She was desperate and called her landlord. Jan explained that her lease was about to expire. Her landlord let Jan live with her for a few more weeks until the lease expired.

Skip has dreams. Skip lived a very boring life. He had dreams of making big changes in his life. Skip made some lifestyle changes in his life. Skip found success with his new lifestyle changes. Skip has had many more successful dreams since then.

Dad's Secret Profession. Dan's dad was a military officer. Dan's dad was proud to call himself a father's man. He liked to brag about his service and how he got out of the army. Dan asked his dad why he was such a proud man. His dad had been on the battlefield and was a hero.

The Pillow. Tara loved her new pillow. She bought it from the store. She was excited to give it to her family. When she got home, she realized it was not pillow size. Tara was devastated and never bought that size again.

First Football Game. A new sports league was playing in the state of Florida. It was very competitive. They would play football all day and night. I went to the game to cheer. The team we rooted for won the game.

Falling in the Handstand. Jane wanted to do a handstand. She couldn't believe how difficult it was. She got her hands in the air for about 30 seconds. After a while she realized it was too hard. Jane could not do the handstand.

The Flu Shot. Today I got a flu shot. I've been waiting for this for weeks. I went to see my doctor for the flu shot. My doctor said my immune system was too weak to get a shot. Now I'm feeling better.

Grass In The Bed. Gina and her brother were playing in the living room. Her brother accidentally kicked grass in the bed. They ran to the kitchen. There was a cup of milk there. They filled it and then put on clean clothes.

Nervous Mom. My mom told me not to get on the airplane. I was very nervous that I would be late to my mom's birthday party. I sat on the plane for hours and hours. Eventually the plane landed safely. My mom was not angry at me at all!

Saint Patrick's Day. Diane was very excited for Saint Patrick's Day. She went shopping with her mom. She bought candy and a t-shirt. They took pictures with the candy and drank wine. They returned home and enjoyed their day together.

Dust. Kim noticed some dust on her hands and thought it would not be a problem. When she went to wash the dishes she had a hard time. She tried wiping it but it did not work. She realized it was in her hair. She washed her hair with some baking soda and it came out great.

Popcorn. I am trying to make popcorn. I bought the cheapest bag I could find. It has three kernels. It seems to be working, but I can't seem to make the kernels pop. I am going to stick to bagged popcorn next time.

Ninety Years Old. My 99 year old friend Bob went to the doctor last week. The doctor diagnosed him with dementia. He recommended we try to get him some medicine. Bob was reluctant. I think Bob is getting a little bit older.

Hot Water. Toni put her dog outside in the yard. When she came back he had pooped on the ground. Toni told her mom about the dog poop. Her mom cleaned up the dog poop and gave the dog water. Now the dog is more careful.
Bad Donuts. I got a dozen donuts this morning. I thought they would be good. Yet when I took a bite I found out I was not good. The donuts were soggy and stale. I regret eating them.

Right Racquet. Jake tried out for the tennis team at school. Jake did well at tryouts. Jake was able to make the team. Jake was excited about being able to play tennis. Jake was happy to finally be playing tennis.

Taxes. I was on my way to the grocery store. On the way I saw a homeless person. I decided to give him some money. The next day I was asked to pay more tax. I told him it was okay and continued on my way.

Bad consequence. Yesterday I ordered a bunch of chocolate candy. I put it in a brown paper bag with my name on it. When I opened the bag I noticed a hole. The bag was ruined. I was sad that I wasted my money.
Friend of a Friend. I was going to visit a friend of mine. We met at her house. My friend and I walked around the house. My friend gave me a hug. I walked back home.

Domestic Violence. Kate and her boyfriend lived together. She was always mean and violent. But her boyfriend thought that was wrong and wanted to change. He told Kate he was going to leave her if she didn't stop. She said she'd stop if she thought about the damage she was doing.
The Cops. The police arrived at Bob's house. They were going to question Bob's friend. The friend was an illegal alien. Bob had to take them to jail. He told his friend everything and they left.
Prayer. John was praying to God. He felt a tear in his eye. John began to cry. John's mother ran to him to comfort him. He was finally comforted.

Puppy Race. I had a puppy last week. I decided to race her against another puppy for a prize. I picked her up and ran outside. I had my friends throw a Frisbee in the air. Then we all ran in a circle around her.

Movie Night. Every Friday night our house hosts a movie night. We usually watch superhero movies but sometimes a movie isn't appropriate. We always pick an action movie but don't watch comedy. This year our pick was Suicide Squad. I think we will watch Suicide Squad again next week.

Turning The Drone Against Him. Charles kept thinking his drone was a person. It moved at a slow pace and was moving slowly. Eventually it moved enough that it bumped him in the face. Charles slammed the drone against the wall in anger. The person behind the camera called his wife.

Holy Frame. When I was seven years old, I saw a pretty bird. It was flying in my garage and I caught it. It was a beautiful, blue bird. It was hanging upside down in a frame that I thought was really cool. I knew I would have a lot of fun watching it fly in my house.
Golf. The golfer took out his ball. He set it up for the next hole. He played for a few minutes. Then he started to play. He lost his ball in the water.

The Miscalculation. Kia bought a lottery ticket from the convenience store. She was sure she would win. But when she saw the ticket in person, she wasn't happy. She did not think the numbers were correct at all! Kia quickly returned the ticket to the store for a refund.
The Book. Tom wanted to get his son a book. He decided on a mystery novel. Tom wrote the book in one week. His son loved the book. Tom bought the book and used it to teach him to write.

Arranging the place cards. Tina went to visit friends. She was in charge of arranging their place cards. The friends were very messy. Tina decided to put stickers on the cards instead. The stickers made the place cards look much better.

Dog. Gina's parents had just adopted a dog. Gina and her siblings were scared they would have to sleep in a crate. Gina was excited for the new dog. She decided the parents wouldn't want her to sleep on a dog bed. She couldn't wait to have a puppy to sleep in!

Trading Lunches. Tom had just gotten home from work. He needed to find a good way to use his spare time. He looked through his cabinets and found some leftover lunches. He decided to trade his old lunches with his new lunch boxes. Tom made extra money trading lunches.
An Unexpected Rodent. Jenny was cleaning her house. She went into her bedroom. Jenny smelled something foul. She looked out her window. She saw a loose cat.
Game Night. My wife and I went to go see a movie. We went to the theater and got some snacks. We walked to our seats and watched a movie. After the movie, we talked for hours. It was a fun night.

Unsweetened. Nancy made a chocolate bar for her son. She let the candy cool down in the refrigerator. Her son wanted to have a taste. He opened the package and tasted the candy. Nancy was shocked at how bitter the candy was.
Graduation. Tom had just graduated from college. He was ready to go off to college. Tom's family wanted to celebrate. They threw a big party for Tom. Tom was very happy with the party.
Kobe's Last Game. Kobe is a big soccer fan. He had a match against the rival team. His team won. Kobe had a great time cheering for his team. Kobe was happy that his team won.

The Passports. Natalie was trying to cross the border into the US. She had forgotten her passport! Natalie had to go to the embassy. She filled out her paperwork and then was allowed to cross. Natalie had finally become a citizen!

Boston Trip. My sister in law and her husband are coming to visit. They drove out of town last week. They took a train from Boston to North Dakota. When they got to their cabin, they took pictures. They left in the evening.
Army. Abe was training for the army. He was in charge of an all-volunteer force. Abe wanted to serve his country. Abe volunteered to go to boot camp. Abe is now a member of the army.

ADHD. Tom had problems focusing in class. He wasn't sure what was wrong with him. One day, his teacher recommended he see a doctor. The doctor examined his eyes and diagnosed him with ADHD. Tom was no longer able to focus in class.

Bad Friends. Sue was always bullied by her friends. One day Sue decided to run away. One of her friends saw Sue run away and called her mother. The mother told her she was grounded for a month. Sue was able to go home from the party safely.
The Fabric. Meredith was sewing a dress. She had bought a new fabric. She worked very hard to make the dress. Then she carefully sewed it into shape. The dress looked beautiful!
New lab gig. I got a job at the new lab. They told me to make the rats drink orange juice. I made it like they like it. They gave me orange juice. After two weeks, the rats started drinking it.

Fitness Competition. Joe decided to enter a fitness competition. He started jogging after lunch everyday. After two weeks of jogging, he reached a new personal record. Joe received a medal for his accomplishment. He was very proud of himself.

Gas and Money. I had to buy gas for my car. I needed to buy some quarters for my car payment. I drove to the gas station and tried to fill up my tank. I tried to figure out how much money was in there. I realized that I have way too much gas for my car.
My new Sister. Abe had just turned three Year's old. He wanted a pet, but his parents refused. Abe was very sad, but decided to get a sister. He named his new pet Kiko. Now Abe has a little sister!

Street of 3G. My cousin worked at the local 4G network. She needed to be on the phone but could not get through. She decided to drive from her apartment to the nearest street. She stopped and walked through the street. After she made it she was able to make her call.

Peanut butter and jelly. One day, my brother made peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. I asked if he wanted some to share. He put peanut butter on his sandwich and I put jelly on my sandwich. We made a big mess and now my brother wants to take it back. I guess I'll have to do the next peanut butter and jelly sandwich.

Tickets in Texas. Lydia was at a festival. She was excited to see the country. As Lydia walked up to the main stage she looked over. She spotted her ticket for a free entry to the country. Lydia then realized her ticket was in another state.

Moses Went to Church. Moses went to church. He went to a church that looked like a circus. At the circus, he was very excited to see the big stage. Moses was so excited to see the elephants and lions. Moses had a wonderful time at the circus church.

Bathing suit. Jill was in the ocean with her friends. Her mom made her a bikini. Jill loved the way it looked. The next day when she went swimming she tripped over a rock. She ended up in the deep end of the water without a bathing suit.

The Wholesale Club. Gina was at the local wholesale club. She had no idea what they did. Gina decided she would ask the owner about it. After waiting for an hour Gina got a manager. The manager told Gina they did a lot of cleaning and stocking.
The New Kid. The new kid was going to class. He had to go to the bathroom. It was a long way there. The teacher made him wait for the line. Finally it was his turn.

Football Pals. Eli loved to play football with his friends. They would play on his lawn all day long. One day, Eli's grass got too tall, and his friends couldn't play. Eli called his friend who brought him some extra grass to play on. Eli and his friends had fun playing football on his lawn all day.

Babysitting nightmare. My nephew was very sleepy. He was being really annoying with all his nonsense. I knew it was time to sleep, so I put him down. When I woke up, he was on the floor, cuddling his head. He was so tired that he forgot to clean his room.

A Used Car. Rita was looking for a new car. She looked on Craigslist to see if a certain one was available. Rita called and found one that was in great condition. After taking it home, Rita realized how much it cost. Rita decided to look for a different used car.

Tyler's huge mistake. Tyler has the biggest crush on a girl at school. He is always talking about her to his friends. He tells them she is really cute. Tyler has forgotten all about the girl. Tyler goes home and tells his parents he has a crush on the girl.

Marco Makes His Bed. Marco has not slept well for several nights. He decides to make himself a bed. He puts on a pair of comfortable boxer shorts. Marco lays in bed all day. Finally he sleeps well after having a good night's sleep.

New Shoes. Kim got a new pair of shoes from the mall. They were the perfect fit. She wore them every day. One day she stepped in a puddle in the middle of the street. The shoes were ruined and Kim cried.

Off to the Races. I went to my local pari-mutuel club to watch the horse races. I was looking forward to the big races. As the races started, the horse with the blue coat bolted. He chased the other horses, and even chased the car in front of us. It was such a great show of emotion that I'll never forget.

Rent. Tim had money to eat, but he didn't know where to put it. He decided to sell some of his things and get a better job. He started to earn money on the side doing odd jobs. He started to make more than enough to pay rent. Now he pays the rent and is eating good food.

Celebrity sighting. I went to the beach one morning for a family reunion. I saw an old friend who looked familiar. I recognized him from childhood photos. We hugged and made plans to see each other again. We saw each other the next day and I saw him again at a party.

The Long Bike Ride. Gina was in the car with her grandma while their parents were out. She really wanted to see her cousins before they left for school. She put her earbuds in to listen to music. Finally she heard her cousins coming and she was ready to ride. She got out and gave them a hug and a ride to their school.

Ticket. Tia was riding a bus to a friend's house. She was supposed to be getting off at the next stop. The bus had been delayed for 2 hours. Tia waited over two hours for a bus to show up. Her mother said she had to get off, and she was very late.
Rent Money. Tom moved into a new apartment. He found out it was rent money. He realized how much it was. Tom was furious. He had to pay extra to keep the lease.
The Rain. My car started to rattle. I pulled over to see what the problem was. I was not sure what the issue was. My tire started to squirm. I went back in to fix it.

Fake. Bobby was really excited to meet his girlfriend. He went over to her house and knocked on the door. When the door opened, he was surprised to see a stranger! The stranger told Bobby he wasn't her real father, but she was. Bobby was disappointed, but he decided to leave, anyway.

Final Moments. Ella was playing basketball with her friend. It was her last shot at the game. She swung the ball over the net. The ball sailed through the air. Ella's friend and her team celebrated together.

Kitty Keeper. Aya was walking along the sidewalk. Suddenly, she felt a small scratching sound. The kitten had scratched herself! Aya jumped up and looked for the owner. She quickly picked up the injured kitten and brought it inside.
Sleep. Gina had stayed up late. She slept until 10 AM. She didn't sleep well the next morning. Her mom told her she had to go back to sleep. Gina decided she wasn't ready for school yet.
Mechanic. I was driving to work one day. I tried to stop for ice cream. There was no ice cream truck. I decided to walk to the gas station. That way I would be close to the truck for ice cream.

Too Many Dogs. Jared was moving to a new neighborhood. He wanted to get rid of some of his neighbors' animals. He had so many dogs that he had to have them put down. When he got to the new place, he had a lot of work to do. He decided he did not want to live there anymore.

George visits the comic book store. George wants to see the newest comic book. He asks a local comic book store clerk if he can see one. The clerk tells George that there is only one in his store. George decides to go see it. George is happy that he finally saw the comic book he wanted.

Rick Nick and the Bee. One day, Rick and his friends were out for a walk. Suddenly, Rick felt a sharp sting on his leg. The pain grew worse as he got closer to the source. After looking at the source, Rick saw a bee flying around his head. Rick jumped into the air, yelling, run, run!
Painting. I was looking through my parents closet. I saw a pretty painting. I painted it on my wall. My parents complimented me on my work. I was happy.
Food. My aunt gave me her cookbook. I looked inside the cookbook. There was not much food. I decided to not eat much food. It was difficult to resist the temptation to eat.

Climate Change. Ben's teacher recommended a class for the first day of class. Ben went along, but didn't agree with the recommendations. The teacher gave Ben a reading of the most recent climate change report. Ben felt embarrassed, because he thought his teacher was mean. Ben wasn't allowed to go into class that day.

Cancelled. Kate was supposed to be out playing with friends. She had been waiting for them for hours. When she got home she realized they were all gone. She called them all to find out what had happened. Unfortunately no one was available to play.
Parade. There was a big parade. I dressed up in a costume. I wore my costume to the parade. At the end, I got a standing ovation. My costume was the most popular in the parade.
Mexican Restaurant. Today I went to a Mexican restaurant. It was amazing! However, one of the workers was rude. I felt terrible. I never went back there again.
Lost. I walked to the other side of the park. I saw another person with a yellow hat. It turned out to be my teacher. She wasn't wearing her hat. She wasn't mad, but she was confused.

New Printers. A new printer appeared at Bill's work. Bill was hesitant to take it out of it's box. Bill read the manual first. He then decided that the printer was a good fit. Bill installed the printer at work and had no more issues.

Dress Code. It was a hot day in Boston and I needed to wear a dress. I decided to wear a skirt, but a coworker did not. When I tried to explain the rule, he insulted me. He told me to leave or he would punch me. I left the store in a hurry, feeling bruised and angry.

A baby's fall. Nancy and Mike were walking around their neighborhood. Suddenly, Mike tripped over a rock. He fell on his head and was knocked out. Nancy saw a window and ran to help. She quickly tended to his head and called the police.

Frozen Food. Tim had no food in his house. His mother got up early to make some for Tim. He was so hungry he threw up all over his mother's clothes. She got home and cleaned up the mess. Tim was so grateful that his mother made his food.

Friends of Mine. I was playing baseball with some friends last night. We had fun for awhile. Then I had a hit and my friends cheered me on. I was so shocked, I threw the ball in the air. The ball hit my friend in the eye and he couldn't see.

Affair in Storage Room. Cody has an affair with his wife. She has moved into Cody's old storage room. She moves the items around and disposes of them. The furniture has been moved but now the closet door is open. Cody is so sad that he is leaving his wife and his treasure.

Ultrasound. My daughter was having a baby. We had an ultrasound and found out she was having twins. The doctor did an ultrasound and found the baby had Down's Syndrome. The doctor sent her to a hospital in NYC to have the baby. She is having her twins this weekend.
Running out of time. Kim got up in the morning. She was already late for work. She had to rush to make it on time. She ran out of time. She got there just in time to see her boss.

Jogging at the park. I love to jog through the park. I go on a lot of different trails. I run and jog until it's time to go home. One day I was out for a long run and it started raining. I will never run through the park in the rain again.

Abandoned Home. My parents told me to be careful when driving my car. I was driving home when I saw a car that looked abandoned. I pulled over to investigate. The car was completely gone. I never saw the car again.

secret. Gina was at the store with her grandma. And they were discussing which color to get for the new lamp. The color of the lamp wasn't important to Gina. So she chose a dark red. Her grandma told her to keep the secret.

The Horse. The horse was not behaving well. He was jumping around and shaking a lot. The horse had been outside for a long time. It seemed like it was going to die. Luckily, the vet took care of the horse and it got better.
Imaginary Boat. Jane went to the beach. She took a boat ride. The ride took several minutes longer. Jane asked a boy where the boat was. He told her the boat was in the water.
Waitress. I was a waitress in a bar. I liked to take orders. One time I sat down with a customer. The man ordered a hamburger. I accidentally dropped the food on the floor.
Broken arm. Yesterday I was walking down the street. I was carrying a trash bag. All of a sudden a plastic bag fell. The bag flew through the air and broke my arm. I had to go to the hospital.
Lost Tooth. Joe had a crooked tooth. He felt like the tooth hurt. So Joe took out some chewing gum. Joe spit the gum out. The tooth grew back in.

Bad Dog. Tommy was playing with his friends. They wanted to play hide and go seek. Tommy hid in the bushes. His dog jumped out and chased him. The dog was too scared and Tommy decided not to play hide and go seek.

Flee. Gina was walking on the sidewalk. She heard a noise coming from a bush. She looked and found a stray dog in the bushes. The dog was frightened and began to whimper. Gina walked up to the dog and pet it.
Bad Skyler. Skyler wanted to be a pilot. She bought herself a plane. She flew around the neighborhood all summer. Skyler crashed the plane into the neighbor's house. Skyler's family was very upset.
Dog's Behavior. Tim got a new dog. His dog was a mess. He tried to train him. The dog would not listen. Tim had to put him down.
Too many kids. Sally was at school. There were a lot of kids in her class. Sally had to work with them. She got to spend time with them. She got to spend time with all of them.

Saving a cookie. I was on my way to the grocery store. I needed a cookie but had no money. I decided to steal a cookie from the cookie jar. I took a cookie and hid it in my jacket. The cookie ended up being returned.

The Old Man. My neighbor's 90 year old neighbor is in a nursing home. Today I found him in the hallway. He is getting kind of grumpy. I heard him curse at the children. I left the house after that and haven't seen him since.

Computer. Linda had been saving for a new computer. She finally had enough saved up to order one online. When she got to the store, she realized she didn't have enough money. She left the store with nothing but her debit card. Linda realized that it was never worth it to spend her money.

new kid. Amy had just moved to a new town. Her family was very nervous about her. They didn't know what to expect. She came to school and met many new people. Amy didn't know it was going to be a lot different.
bored. My friends and I were bored. We decided to go to our friends house. It was way too loud for the room. We ended up having to sleep in a car. It took an hour to get home.

Fire. The Smith family loved their home. One night, their entire basement was on fire. Their insurance company paid for a fireman to come and put out the fire. The Smith family was able to live a little more comfortably. They always wanted to live in a home like this again.

Dive Bar. Cami and Beth were both excited to try dive bars. They had gotten tickets and were going to dive the bar. The couple ordered and waited while they dove. They loved every second of it. Cami and Beth were happy they got to try dive bars.

Terrible Name. A man named James was playing at the park with his friends. He was wearing a blue shirt and black pants. He made a joke that had a bad meaning. The other boys thought it was funny. James was mocked and beaten by the other boys.
A Towel. Kate was waiting on the bus one day. And she was soaking wet. She tried to dry herself with her favorite towel. But it was too cold. She had to go home instead.

Dang Cat. When I was a kid, I was playing with my friends in our yard. My mom noticed that I wasn't looking where she was going. She yelled at me to look over my shoulder at my friend. I did, and she had a black cat. He had stolen my mom's car keys.

Target. I went to the store to buy an ice cream cone. While inside the store, I saw a Target. I went to Target and bought ice cream. I went to the checkout lane and paid for my ice cream. I returned to the store to make a purchase.

The Eater. My husband's cousin came to visit last week. She has always told me that she can eat three cavities a day. When we got her home, I checked her teeth. I found out that she is actually eating two and a half cavities. I don't think her cousin will like to take her out for dinner.

Walk. I took a walk down the street one day. It was very pleasant, but a little chilly. I noticed I had no shoes, so I went back home. I walked back home and went back to bed. I slept very well that night.

Performing a concert. I wanted to perform a live show. My friend asked if I would be interested in a gig. I tried to make a budget for the show. Eventually I was able to find an affordable venue. I performed a terrific show that was played well by all.

Janitor Job. I was hired as a janitor at a high school. I didn't think I was qualified for this. But, I persevered and became one of the best janitors. After awhile, I became very good at my job. I became a well known member of the community.

Jack's Dog. Jack was out with his friends one night. He saw a beautiful, playful dog in the street. Jack looked at her and fell in love. He decided to name his dog Rover. Jack and Rover became best friends.

Cleaning the yard. A few months ago, my yard was filthy. I decided to clean it and put down a towel. I scrubbed it all day and it felt like a lot of work. However, it paid off. Now the yard is sparkling clean.
He will pay. Mark is trying to sell a car. He wants the money to pay down debt. Mark has no more money. Mark decides to use a pawn shop. Mark gets the money to pay off his debt.

Swing Time. My wife and I decided to go to a baseball game. We saw a few games and the kids had a great time. There was a lot of cheering in the stadium. We were so happy, we left the ballpark. We had a great time and wish that we had met a nice woman there.

Jeff's A Lost Cause. Jeff was sad because he didn't have any real friends. He decided to start a new online forum for himself. He made lots of new friends on the forum. Soon, Jeff had lots of friends on his new forum. He was able to start a new chapter in his life.

Old diary. When I was younger I loved old diary. I could write in it for hours. It would always tell me funny stories and give me tips. I kept it in my bedroom for as long as I could. My mom found it and ruined it.

Christmas lights. It was December and I was going to decorate my house for Christmas. I decided to make my house look really fancy. After some deliberation I decided to buy all the proper lights. Then I went and purchased them all at the store. It turned out beautifully and I was so pleased with it.
The Appointment. Jim has a dentist's appointment this morning. He's not sure where he wants to go. His mom suggest he just go to the dentist. Jim tells her no. She takes him to the dentist anyway.

Pajamas. I had an hour to get ready for work. I grabbed my pajamas and went out the door. I got dressed, put on my shirt, and grabbed my shoes. I drove to work, made my coffee, and went inside. I realized I didn't have my work attire on.
The warning. The weather was really hot and humid outside. Tom wasn't used to it. He didn't like it. He put some gloves on. He was safe.

The Old Roller Coaster. A family took a vacation to Six Flags. They got on the old roller coaster and went in circles. They went so fast that it wasn't safe for them to get off. The next day, the family went back to the park and watched the video. They laughed at the funny reaction.

Big Test. Alexa studied all week long for her math test. She was very worried because she was scared she would fail. When she got the test, her anxiety turned to excitement. Alexa passed the test with flying colors! She was elated that she had gotten an A on her math test!

Bonding Time. Brett was a new student at school. He had always been shy, but was starting to get a lot of friends. He met a girl named Jillian. They ended up talking and hanging out all week. Brett felt very good about how he had bonded with Jillian.

Adler. It was the first time I had ever played golf. I didn't know how to shoot the ball well. A friend of mine showed me how to do it. He taught me how to swing a golf club and hit the ball. I had a great time playing golf with him.
The Castle. Kara went to a haunted castle. It was a scary place! She stood on a set of steps and listened to a scream. She realized it was her own daughter! Kara ran screaming out of the place!

New dog. Sally and Peter moved into a new apartment. Sally's parents wanted to get rid of their old dog. They went to the animal shelter and found the perfect puppy. They took him home and named him Spot. Sally is so happy to have her new dog.
No Donuts. Tim wanted some donuts. He had a few left. Tim noticed the line was out the door. Tim got mad but decided to keep walking. After walking ten minutes Tim was done.

Buying another car. I was in the market for a new car. I went to the dealership and looked for a few models. After talking with some guys, I decided on a red car. I went to the dealership and talked with them about it. After giving them a price quote, they decided to buy it.
Wood Wins. Tim was playing poker at his favorite bar. A man had been up against him earlier. Tim was up against a wood dealer. Tim was going all in. Tim ended up winning.

Snorkeling. I went snorkeling in the Caribbean. There were many beautiful fish and coral. The diving was fun. I ended up spending most of my time snorkeling underwater. I was glad to see many colorful fish!
Randy gets the girl. Randy was a guy in a band. He liked a girl in the band. They band needed a singer. Randy wrote her a song. He sung it to the girl and she loved it.

Steve Becomes Just Like The Others. Steve started out a small fish fry. At first he thought it was going to be really fun. But soon the other patrons began to start teasing Steve. He decided to change the name of the fry to "Fish Fries". Steve now has lots of new customers.

Frombo. Frombo was a very poor man who lived in a poor neighborhood. He decided to help out on the side. He bought an old truck, hired a kid named Tom, and a truck. Frombo helped the people of his town and they loved him. Frombo's help was the best the people had ever seen.

Responsibility. I had a habit of procrastinating. Every time I was tired I would write in my planner. In the mornings I would rush to finish my work. It slowed me down and prevented me from focusing on my work. Today I realized that I needed to change this behavior.

Major Regret. Diane was on her way to school. As she started the car, she looked at her phone to see what's up. She read that her phone was lost. She called the phone company. The company told her that she could not make it to school that day.

Deer Huntress. I went deer hunting with my uncle last weekend. We saw a lot of deer so we decided to split up. We drove for a little bit to find a spot to hunt. On the first hunt I was ready for anything, and I caught three! I was elated and now can't wait to go deer hunting with my uncle again.

Self Esteem. Gary started a new job working for himself. He felt he was a successful worker. Gary was able to buy his wife a necklace. His wife loved the necklace. She said that she enjoyed the gift and they were happy.

Ross The Gamer. Ross loves to play video games. He gets his gaming system set up for the night. At midnight, he wakes up and gets ready for the day. He leaves his house to go play a video game. At the game, he beats the other players.

Cherries Jubilee. I had a job interview and was really nervous. I had not had a job interview for two months. My friend encouraged me to apply at a local farmer's market. I went and bought a bunch of cherries for the market. They had very few cherries, so I had to go home empty-handed.
Pothole. Tom was driving home. His car began to skid and he stopped. He then heard a loud noise. He looked under the car and saw a hole. He had hit a pothole.

New Handle. Shelly's dog was acting strange. Shelly took him to the veterinarian. The vet said that the dog needed a new handle. Shelly was nervous that the new handle would mess up his chewing. Luckily, the new handle worked very well!

After School Getaway. Lucy wanted to go to the after school getaway with her grandpa. She asked him if she could come and visit him that weekend. He told her he would try to arrange a time. He made plans for her to see a movie and eat at the same time. It worked out great and she got to go to the getaway.

Candy. Amy bought a dozen bars from the candy store. She was excited to unwrap them. But she saw the label on the box was for children's toys. Amy decided to unwrap the candy bar anyway. She regret the unwrapping the candy bar.

Chemistry Lab. I worked as a chemistry lab technician in a large laboratory. I hated having to clean up chemicals. One day, I decided to clean up chemicals myself. I accidentally threw away a few items. This caused the lab to be closed for several weeks.

Condo. Devin bought a new condo. His friends were upset because they didn't want him there. Devin wanted to live there, so he made a plan. He would move in and be there every night. Eventually he moved out and lived a normal life.

The Date. John was really nervous about a girl he was going on a date with. He took his time picking her up and trying to talk to her. At one point, he made a request and she said yes! She picked him up in her car and they headed to the restaurant. He was so thrilled and elated when he saw her, he screamed!

The Early Baby. Mary was having a baby girl. She was ready to bring her daughter home. A few hours later, her baby girl started crying. She asked her parents for an hour and finally her parents told her. Mary then had to spend an hour on the floor to clean up.
Volcano. My friend's son came to visit. He was fascinated by the volcano. He had pictures taken of it. He went to the beach with them. He asked me to pose for a photo.
Crushing Like a Frog. Jim and his cousin were at a local creek. His cousin tried to push Jim down to the water. Jim stood up. He then began to stomp on his cousin's back. Jim's cousin ran away.
Crush. John always liked the girl in his science class. He asked her out. She said yes. They had dinner and watched a movie. They became good friends.

Bumping into old friends. Kelly and her friend Mary were shopping at the mall. Kelly noticed Mary looking upset as they shopped. She quickly asked Mary what was wrong. Mary told Kelly that her sister had been cheating on her. Kelly was crushed.

The paint compromise. Jenna needed to buy paint for her apartment. She needed to decide between red and blue. The paint she wanted was too expensive. Luckily she found a compromise that would let her pick two. She chose red and she would be able to paint the apartment.
Test. Brett had a big test coming up. He stayed up late studying for it. When test day came he fell asleep in class. He overslept and didn't wake up on time. Brett ended up failing his test.
Diet. Tina is overweight and unhealthy. She tries to diet but it doesn't work. So she decides to do a backflip. She does it and feels amazing. Tina now loves her back flip.

Annoying toy. I decided to buy a toy for my son. I had heard that he can be really sensitive about this. I decided to buy him a little yellow ball. It started to tickle and he cried. I realized that he does not like his new toy.
Harper Gets Lost. Harper was at the grocery store. He didn't see where he was going. He ran into the water. Harper drowned. Harper's mother saw him being dragged under the water by the store.

Cake. Tim's mom baked a cake for him. He decided to sneak into the kitchen. He couldn't get past the kitchen door because of the dog. Tim's mom caught him sneaking in the kitchen. Tim's mom grounded him for a week.

Back Breaker. Nancy was playing basketball in the yard. She got tired and started to fall down. However, she managed to get up after a few minutes. After a few seconds, she fell again. The basket fell from the hands and shattered.
Dog Bath. My dog hated to take a bath. It was hot outside. I decided to offer him a hot tub. He loved it and didn't mind taking a bath. He ended up taking a bath in the hot tub.
The Soup. Kim wanted soup. She went to the store to buy some. When she got home she realized it was all gone. Her mom had thrown it away. Kim was disappointed.

A Movie. Kate was excited for the movie to come out. She had been wanting it for years. Kate went to the theater to see it. She watched the movie and it was terrible. Kate regretted ever wanting to see it.

The Lunchtime Pizza. Benny and his family were at a family picnic. They were trying to decide what to eat. He wanted to eat his lunch, but they were having a contest. He threw a piece into the air to see who could eat it fastest. They agreed to split it evenly and he had his delicious pizza.

Hooray for Lisa. Lisa was a girl who loved to write poems. She was going to enter a competition. She spent days making beautiful poems. Lisa's poems got her first place. Lisa ended up winning the competition.
Hoop. Ella loved to sing. She decided to sing to the whole school. They loved her. They asked her to perform during a talent show. She did a great job!

Acid rainy. Allie was a good student but didn't drink. When her friends were hanging out she wasn't paying attention. All of a sudden her friends poured hot sauce all over her. Allie had to run to the bathroom to get clean up. Allie learned her lesson.

Go to the Store. I needed to buy a new television. So I went to the store to find one. I picked one out that was perfect for me. But as I was buying it I saw a small puppy. I quickly drove away from that store.

Crafting a Business. Mike wanted to get into business. He decided to start a craft store. The store opened and things were going well. Then his store had a bad winter. The winter kept the store from operating.

Costume Contest. I was invited to a costume contest at my school. I was rather excited since I was a big fan of superhero movies. I bought a bunch of costumes and entered into the contest. I did not win the contest but I thought I was going to win something. That was until I won first place and got to hang out with my costume friends.
Silverfish. I bought a small goldfish. I put it in a bowl. I put sugar in it to make it soft. The spoon got stuck in the bowl. I dropped the fish.

Renee goes Camping. Renee was excited to go camping with her friends. She packed her bag and prepared to leave. At her campsite she met some interesting people. While she was camping, she saw a bear. The bear scared Renee enough to never go camping again.

The Chairs. Gemma was walking home. She needed something to help her stand up. She reached down and grabbed a chair from the table. She sat on it and was able to stand. She was happy she had something to help her stand up.
Bus still waiting. The bus was very late. It had just arrived at the stop. It had to drive very slowly. Finally it made it. The bus finally arrived.

Picking Flowers. Gina planted a big bunch of flowers on her neighbor's porch. When they grew tall, she took them outside. She spread them out and waited. She waited for her neighbor to pick them all up. It took her an hour to have enough flowers for her neighbor.

Big Fishing Trip. My dad and I decided to go fishing. We loaded up the boat with all of our gear. We drove to the fishing pier and parked the boat. We rented the best boat fishing spot available. We fished until the boat was empty, and had a great day fishing.

peanut scare. Marge was taking out the trash. She looked all over and saw a bag of peanuts. She immediately grabbed one. She didn't know what they were, though. Marge ran outside to the trash can and freaked out.

Winter coat. Allie needed to buy a new winter coat. She drove to the mall to buy one. She found a nice leather coat but the price was too much. She found a fur coat but it was too pricey. Finally she found a sweater that was too expensive.

Inheritance. Sara's parents passed away. Sara went to a cemetery and left flowers. Then, Sara's aunt gave Sara an inheritance. She was able to use her inheritance to travel to England. Sara had a great time traveling there with her aunt.

Driving at Night. I was in the car with my grandma. We were on a trip through the city at night. My grandma was driving too fast. She almost hit another car and I had to brake really hard. My grandma was so upset, but we made it safely.
Judy's pastry. Judy made a peach pie. Her family ate the pie for dinner. Afterwards, Judy decided to make a chocolate pie. Her family was excited for the dessert. Judy's pie won the county fair.
Annual Trip. Beth's friends and family planned a trip for her. She had been saving money for two months. She and her friends went to the coast. They rented a boat. They had so much fun.

Kimmy's Cookies. Kimmy wanted to be a baker. She knew her grandmother would help her bake a dozen cookies. When grandma came in to visit, she saw everything was ready to bake. But grandma couldn't cook, because she was sick. Kimmy had to bake her cookies without her grandma's help.

Xerxes's Xenophobic Xeroxes. Xerxes had a deep passion for Xerox machines. He loved to look at the different designs. His hobby was to type out letters, or write stories on them. Xerox machines were a constant in Xerox's life. He would type out 100s of documents a day and never stop.

Bhishma. I decided to go to the bank to get some cash. I went inside, looked at the machines, and made my decision. I found the ATM, and pressed the button to withdraw money. I sat down and watched the cashier count out my money. She gave me a receipt and went back outside.

History Test. Tom was really struggling in his history class. He thought he would fail. He studied really hard, but still couldn't pass. Finally he gave up and just started over. He was able to pass his history test with a B.
My Cat Fluffy. My cat Fluffy is getting fat. She is very fat and squishy. Yesterday I found Fluffy hiding in the pantry. Fluffy had a baby kitten. She is now pregnant with her second baby.
The Joke. Bob told a story to his friends about a friend. The story was embarrassing. Bob's friends made fun of him. Bob's friend called him a cuss. Bob's friend didn't care.

Doing a good favor. Gina's brother needed to use her bathroom. She walked down the hall and dropped off her papers. Her mother had no idea she dropped them off. But her brother thanked her and returned to his room. The paper towel was worth the trouble.

Gerald. Gerald was going to his first college class. He went to the office for his first class. There were many kids there, but he was the only one. His new classmates seemed friendly, but he wasn't sure. After class, he found that they were all really mean.

The First Grade. Jenny's daughter was starting kindergarten. She told Jenny the class would be learning about horses. Jenny found a horse named Brownie that was named for her. She took Brownie to school to show him how to ride a pony. At recess, Brownie was excited to meet the other students.
Too many shampoos. Kelly went shopping for her hair. She found some great conditioner. But then she saw they were sold out. Kelly got mad. She decided to go to Target and get the conditioner.

The flat tire. I was in my car at a stop light. Suddenly, the tire popped and I had to call triple A. They were able to fix my flat tire, so I continued driving. The car started to accelerate again. I pulled over to the side of the road and put my spare tire on.
Free. The boy gave the shirt away. He told his mother. She didn't take it back. The boy took the shirt to school the next day. The next day, she took the shirt back.

Precious. One day, a cat named Precious came into the world. Her parents didn't realize the cat was tiny until it was born. The baby Precious grew up and learned to be independent. She soon left Precious's side and lived on her own. Now, Precious lives her own life without worry.

silence. Evan had his ears pierced. He had heard that pain would make him scream. He stood in the mirror and looked. Evan was not having that experience. He decided he didn't like piercings after all.
Locked out. My girlfriend tried to call me. I could not hear her voice. She was trying to ring the doorbell. I got up to open the door. I slammed the door in frustration.

home ec. Laurie was having a hard time waking up. Her house wasn't as clean as it used to be. She wanted to get her house in order. She called her husband to ask if he could help. Her husband cleaned her entire house and it looked great!
A mix up. Ricky got some flowers from his mom. He took them home and hid them. When he got home his mom didn't like it. Ricky explained what happened. The next day he gave them back.

One day of Starvation. Kim woke up in the middle of the night to find a sandwich she was craving. She made herself a delicious sandwich. She ate it very quickly. The next morning, she felt incredibly hungry. Her stomach was starving, and her mind was empty.
Getting Fired. Ken worked at an office. One day the boss called him into his office. He told Ken he was being fired. Ken asked what his reason was. The boss said Ken was rude to a coworker.

Bye Dad. Gina hadn't seen her dad in a week. She hoped he had not gotten sick from not seeing him. But his doctor said he had to leave work early to see a specialist. Gina was upset, because she liked her dad. But she was relieved to see him in person.

Sign Me Up. Jane needed money badly. She decided to sign up on craigslist. A man contacted her and offered to help. Jane went to the man's house and he paid her. Jane received a lot of positive feedback from the man.
The Cow. Bill loved to eat beef. He would eat anything. He had to go to the butcher. He bought the biggest beef he could find. He took it home and ate it all.
Sick. Cindy had to go to the doctor. Her stomach was growling. She decided to take some pills to help. Cindy felt better within a couple of hours. She felt much better after the doctor appointment.

The Trapeze. Kia had taken up trapeze dancing as a hobby. Her mother was worried she would get hurt if she fell. But Kia was determined to do well in her audition! She pulled off a terrific move! The crowd went wild when they saw it!

From Girlfriend To Landlord. Cathy moved into her first apartment. She found it to be very cramped. The people kept coming in through the dark and narrow passageways. Cathy got a landlord in her town to come inspect. They are both very pleased with the results.

Santa Claus. Tom wanted to buy a new tree for his Christmas tree. Tom went to the Christmas Tree farm and bought a small tree. Tom loved the tree and went to the tree farm again the following year. He planted the tree in his yard, and took pictures of the tree. Now, Tom proudly holds the Christmas tree that was given to him.

New Car. Tim bought a new car for his new life. He was very excited for his first trip in it. The car was fast and fun to drive. Unfortunately, it started to make a weird noise and break down. Tim took it back to the dealer and got another one.
New Boss. The new boss of my company was not the best. I felt so uncomfortable talking to him. One day, I tried to make him laugh. He laughed so hard I could hardly speak. Now I feel so much better.

Computer Programming. Bob decided to get a new computer. He decided to learn computer programming. Bob purchased all of the required software. He began learning more about computer programming. Bob was now a very skilled computer programmer.

Bubble Bubble. The girl put a lot of bubble wrap on her hair. She went outside to check the mail. The mailman stopped her. He said that a person left a package for her in the mail. The girl was excited and went to pick it up.

Soft Serve. Bob wanted to be a pitcher. He started to learn how to throw soft serve. He decided to work out in his garage. He eventually became a good pitcher. His coach noticed and gave him a tryout.
grades. Sam always got good grades. One day he did not study for a test. The teacher noticed. The teacher sent Sam to the principal. The principal told Sam he had to go to the principal.
Smart Move. John decided to go camping. He was very nervous. He couldn't wait to be outdoors. When he went camping, he was very happy. John never regretted his decision.
Son. My father wanted a cat for a long time. His girlfriend didn't have much time for him. After a lot of research, she came to the conclusion he was crazy. She told him to go home. He refused.
Grass. I grew up on a farm. I would often play in my parents' field. It was grass. One day I decided I needed a job. I went to work on a ranch.

Lace Looks Good On Everyone, Darling. Molly thought she was the prettiest girl in school. Everyone loved how pretty she was. But when she got home they made fun of her. They made fun of her for her ugly shoes. Molly didn't care because she knew she was popular now.

Carlos Weeds His Garden. Carlos was sitting at home bored one afternoon. He decided to plant a garden in his backyard. He dug a hole to put the garden in. He then planted carrots and potatoes in the hole. Now Carlos has fresh vegetables for the whole week.
New fast food. The new fast food place opened up. They put a lot of chicken on the menu. It tasted good. However they didn't know how to cook it. The employees were all very rude.
Accident. The man did not see the flashing lights. He ran over someone's foot. He did not stop. He caused an accident. The man was taken to jail.

Dream. I woke up one morning to a strange noise. It was very loud, and I could hear it for miles. I looked outside, but it was pitch black. I crept in quietly, fearing something terrible would happen. I realized it was just a passing car, and the noise was just the wind.

Building a dock. I needed a place to put my car. I found a big hole and decided to build a dock. I went to the hardware store and bought all the tools I needed. I went to the yard and used my new dock. My car looks great in my dock now.

Painted Lines. I bought my wife a new bike. I painted it to match her favorite bike. Then I rode it home from work that day. She was pleased and thanked me. I realized I should paint more carefully next time.
Clothes. Jim needed some new clothes. He went to the mall. He visited many different stores. He found a nice pair of jeans. He bought them.

Too Tired For Work. Joe was exhausted after his morning jog. He drank a large coffee. Unfortunately it was too hot to work. So Joe ordered a large milkshake. It was so good Joe drank it several times that day.

Signs of Spring. Tori was excited to get up in the morning. She decided to get up early so she could begin her spring clean. She took her umbrella and went outside. She took her shoes off and put them on. She stepped out of her house and into the beautiful morning sky.
Losing Weight. I lost forty pounds the other day. I was always afraid to go on diets. I finally decided to give it a shot. I cut out processed foods and sugar. I feel much healthier and I am proud.
Comics. Tom was really into comics. He didn't believe there were so many different kinds of comics. His friend got him a new comics. Tom tried to read it as fast as he could. He could barely keep up.

Plums. My husband had a plumber who was an expert on windows. He fixed our bathroom window in 1993. Our 2 year old granddaughter lives in NYC. I asked her what plumber she would recommend. She said the plumber recommended Plumbers.

Funny Face. Tom's dad died before he was old enough to drive. Tom always worried about his father's death. He went to the cemetery one day to see his father. He saw his father with a funny looking face. Tom smiled because his father had always been funny.

Tooth pain. When i was a child i had pain in my mouth. My mom always told me to brush my teeth. But one day she told me that's not enough. So i brush my teeth more than usual. But when she came back from the dentist, she had no pain.

Too Tall. I went to go pick my daughter up from school. She was too tall to get on the bus. I held the back of my chair to help her up. She fell to the ground in a puddle of water. I had to carry her to the school nurse's office.
Not on your Side Today. Bob worked in a call center. He got an order for ten pizzas. The order came via text. The order was incorrect. Bob's boss fired him for being late.
Zoo trip. Sally wanted to go to the zoo. She decided she would take her kids. She went to the zoo. They all went on a tour. They had a lot of fun.

quick trip to the store. Yesterday I went to the store to buy something for my sister. The first thing I bought was a new book. She was very excited to read the book. The book was about my favorite show on tv. After the book, I left the store with her book.
The Baby Shower. Today is the day of the baby shower. Everyone is bringing gifts. My husband is getting me a present. We are going to eat and play. It's a fun day.
Crust. The woman made a sandwich. The bread she used was very hard. She took it out of the refrigerator and cracked it. It gave her a hard time. The woman decided to return it.

Rich Family. The family had lots of money. They had more money than they could spend. So they pooled their money to buy a bunch of toys. They had so much money that they had to spend it. The family was poor again.

Cheating. Karen told her friends she was sick on Tuesday night. Her friends called her later in the day to say she had been cheating. Karen confessed to cheating on them as soon as she could. They stopped hanging out with her. Karen was upset but understood.

Birthday. It was my sister-in-law's fifty-first birthday. She was turning ninety-five. We drove her to an expensive, but fun birthday party. She gave a very nice birthday speech. We told her we were proud of her.
Store. I was shopping at the store. I found the perfect pair of socks. The store was out of my size. I asked for help in finding my size. Luckily, I had found the size that was in stock.

Cavities. My aunt has not been taking care of her teeth. She used to eat an apple a day. She has started to eat grapes and candy. The dentist told her she has cavities. She will start brushing and flossing now.

Walking in the rain. Joey was walking on the beach. It was a sunny day but it didn't stop raining. He started to run to the car. Joey tried to walk faster. He didn't get to the car before it started to rain again.
Best Christmas. Jill was at the mall. She saw a beautiful new red dress. She looked everywhere for the price tag. After an hour she finally saw it. She bought it for herself.

Karen. Karen loved being a mom. Karen wanted to be a doctor one day. But her family said Karen didn't have the grades to be a doctor. They sent her to a program for gifted and talented children. Karen did just fine there, and ended up being a doctor.
Fued. Tom had a pet fued. He let the dog out of the yard. He was surprised to see her chase after him. He let go of the leash. It was very funny!

The Tie Choice. Benny was about to be interviewed for a new position. He had made a great impression on the interviewer. Benny felt like his best suit was his tie. His interview went very well. Benny got the new position.
Cracked Screen. Tom was driving. He wasn't paying attention. He crashed into someone's car. It broke his car. Tom bought a screen protector.
The Chalk. Bob was cleaning out the garage. He was in a rush and didn't have time to clean up. He saw some chalk laying on the floor. He cleaned it up. Bob was able to finish the project.

The School Year. Alicia's school year began last Monday. The first thing she did was read the school year's schedule. She went to her classroom and asked if school was open that day. Alicia decided to go to the school library. Alicia started to work on her schoolwork.
The Missing Keys. Ivan got home from school. He looked everywhere for his keys. He checked in the car and the house. He checked in the car again. Ivan couldn't find his keys anywhere.
The Last Towel. Tim was on vacation. He'd packed up and wanted to go to the beach. The last place he'd gone was a strange one. There were no more towels left. Tim had to go back home.
Circus. My niece took her son to the circus. They had an acrobats. She was afraid he would fall off. She said he would get hurt. She took him home and did not see him again.

The Music Lover. I had a crush on a boy in my PE class. We sat next to each other in the hall. We made plans to meet up at lunch. We decided to start dating. We eventually went out and bought a record together.
Old Dog. Rita was leaving for a long run. When she got home, she realized she had left her dog. Her dog had passed away. She cried inconsolably. Rita decided she would never run so far again.
Ice Cream Truck. Tim loved ice cream. He drove to the ice cream truck everyday. One day he forgot his wallet. Tim went back home. He was so upset he never went back to the ice cream truck.
Skating Lessons. Tim loved to ice skate. One day his mom took him skating lessons. Tim got better and faster. He finally got his first ice skating rink. Tim loved the rink and all the fun he had.

Gambler. Logan was the best gambler ever. He would take hundreds of dollars from his friends everyday. He then would pay the losses and take the rest of his winnings. He was rich beyond belief. But one day, his friends found him and took all his money back.
The Jail. Franklin was arrested for theft. He was held in jail. He wrote a letter to his mom. He wrote it so long it fell off his desk. His mom saw it and was very happy.

Talk. Beth was bored. She decided to have a talk with her mom. She didn't want to talk about homework though. Beth's mom explained how much she hated homework. Beth decided she had enough homework and went to watch TV.

bag. Ivan was on a diet. But he realized that he needed a new bag. So he went shopping and bought the perfect one. But he couldn't find it anywhere! Ivan had to walk all the way home without his new bag.

Starbucks Wi-Fi. Sally loved to go Starbucks for coffee. She went today for coffee and decided to use their wi-fi. She did not realize that they had a lot of applications available. She was amazed at all the things that she could do. She was happy she had gone to Starbucks.

Doll Show. Dora loves to watch cartoons. Dora also loves to play with dolls. Dora decided to enter a doll show at her local fair. Dora practiced her doll juggling for weeks. Dora entered her first place doll juggling in the state fair.

Personal Dignity. When I was younger I loved to play games. The only issue was I never had any money or anything. This gave me the perfect excuse for why I played the games. I thought it was okay until someone took my stuff. Now I'm stuck with no money, no job, and no family.
