Boredom Sets In. Dan was bored during lunch at work. He decided to call in sick to work. When Dan got home he realized he'd forgotten to set his alarm clock. The next day Dan was very tired at work. Dan was glad that he set his alarm clock.

Push on the Swings. Gina wanted to go to the swings. She wanted to go to the first one. But she was not allowed to. So her friend Mary put her on the swing. And Gina tried to enjoy the swings for awhile.
Fixing my car. The car started to make a lot of noise. I decided to take it into the shop. They said it was a ticking noise. They put me in the car. They said I can fix it myself.

Yancy. Yancy asked me for a ride to the grocery store. She took me to the store. I walked into the store and saw a big man walking towards me. He grabbed my back and yanked me out of my car. He started laughing at me as I fell to the ground.
Broken mug. Allie needed some coffee. She pulled out a mug. Yet it ended up broken. Allie was upset. She had to get another one.

Doing laundry. One day the Smiths had to do laundry. When they were done they had to go and throw all their clothes away. The washing machine was too small so they folded all the clothes. Then they put all their clothes in the washing machine. The washing machine cleaned all their clothes.

Car wash. The other day, my husband and I decided to get our cars cleaned. We went to the car wash and got our dirty cars. The next day, we went to the car wash and had our clean cars. Now, we have clean cars and lots of money. Now we take good care of our cars.

Henry Bear's Park. Henry Bear's Park was an abandoned amusement park in the middle of town. In the 1980s the town decided to repurpose the park. In 2000 the park had a fire and was demolished. The old rides and equipment were replaced with modern technology. The park has been abandoned for the last few years.

Chloe gets a haircut. Chloe has been doing her hair in a curling iron her whole life. She always wanted to try something different with her hair. Finally she decides to try a different style. She goes to the hairdresser for a new haircut. Chloe is happy that she is trying something different.

The Movies. Nancy loved movies. She went to see a scary movie. Her brother told her it was too scary. Nancy didn't let him watch her watch the movie. Her brother laughed when he saw her eyes light up.

So What's With Coffee Anyway?. Joe went to his local Starbucks. They had a new latte machine that Joe tried to learn how to use. After a couple of tries, Joe had to take the machine apart. Joe started with the basic latte machine. After a few weeks of trying out different latte machines, Joe settled on one.
Faded Jeans. Tom had a favorite pair of jeans. The faded in a big way. He could barely see anything. Tom decided to buy a new pair. Tom bought the new ones and they looked great.

The Ice Cream. Gina and her sister ran to the ice cream shop. They hadn't gotten any money for ice cream, but there were cones. Gina and her sister ordered some cones. The girls gobbled them up as quickly as they could. They were full, but there was still some left over.
Nap Mistake. Tom was at home. He wanted to take a nap. He fell asleep on the couch. He woke up in the middle of the night. He had overslept.

Piano. I wanted to learn to play the piano. I began with my fingers. The piano teacher said my hands needed to be straight. I learned to bend my fingers. My fingers became straight when I played the piano.

Lucky Penny. Tod was walking home when he heard a noise. It was a quarter! Tod picked it up and tried to run after it. But he had forgotten how to throw it! So he just took a lucky penny with him home.
The Speakers. Kate's computer speakers weren't loud enough. She bought a new pair. They were much louder! Kate's computer sounded great again. Kate decided to buy the next pair.
The Garden. Julia planted a garden in her backyard. It grew tall and healthy. Julia showed it off to all her friends. They loved it. Julia was very happy with her new garden.
The Friend Fight. The friend had a problem. He wouldn't stop calling and insulting me. It was getting to be so much. Finally he got me to ask him what the problem was. He said he had to go out.

Sleepy Cat. My cat is so sleepy that he falls asleep while I'm watching TV. We have a dog, who also falls asleep. I put earplugs and a pillows on my cat. Now that she's awake, she can get up and get up! My cat is sleeping now.

bottles. There was a boy who did not like his glasses. He did not like them because they made him look silly. He bought a set of big clear plastic bottles. He then thought it over and decided that they were the best. Now he does not have to wear glasses.

Bananas. Gina's mom asked her if she wanted to make fresh fruit. She wasn't much of a fruit eater, but she would like some. She bought some bananas from the store. They had to cook them all together and heat them up. The bananas turned out really juicy.

Mother's Day Cruise. We booked our tickets to a Mother's Day cruise. The ship departed a few hours before the ceremony. The ocean was calm and blue. When the boat reached port, we disembarked. We were greeted by a maid in a Hawaiian shirt, and our suite was great.

Regrets. Gina wanted to take her siblings to the store. She wanted to take them and then go home. She waited until they were asleep and laid out all day. When she went to check on them the next morning they were gone. Gina regretted not taking them with her to the store.

Tight Shoes. Dan recently bought a new pair of shoes. He tried wearing them out with friends. However, Dan's shoes felt too tight and uncomfortable. Dan could not walk. Dan finally had to return the shoes.
Christmas time. I had Christmas morning in February. So was the whole family. I looked around and everyone was having fun. Then it was time for breakfast. Everyone was getting ready to eat.

Beads, Beads, Everywhere. My dog loves beads. Last week she decided to chase her bowl under the couch. She was chasing it when she went under it. She ended up with a huge pile of beads. She now has a big ball of beads in her mouth.

Pizza. Dan's job gave him free pizza. So he decided to make his own. Dan thought it over and decided to make it himself. However, his homemade pizza did not taste good. Dan realized he should not make his own pizza.

Good Spot. A mother was in a car accident and left her son in a car seat. His car seat was so full he was having trouble breathing. The man called a car service. They took him to a hospital. His son was ok and he is now safe in his car seat.
Cartoons. Tim wanted to watch cartoons. He asked his parents if he could. They told him he couldn't. Tim decided he didn't care what his parents said. He enjoyed watching cartoons as much as ever.

My New Puppy. I found out I was pregnant. I was so happy that I couldn't help it. I went to the shelter to look for the perfect puppy. I finally found the perfect puppy. Now we have a new member of the family!

Tennis. Tom wanted to improve his tennis skills. He decided to watch instructional videos online. He studied and watched the videos. He began improving. Tom is now able to play tennis with his friends.
Movie. Anna wanted to see the newest movie. She asked her mother to take her. Her mother agreed. They had a great time at the theater. Anna was glad she had agreed to go!

Grumpy. I sat on my computer one afternoon. There was a program on the screen that wasn't working. I could not figure out what was wrong. I decided to open the program and see what happened. The program gave me a link that I followed that brought me to the right screen.

Age Difference. Maggie didn't like her new roommate. She told her parents. They told her that her roommate's mom had died. Maggie was very sad about this news. She went back to her old apartment to feel lonely.

What to do. Liam wanted to make some pizza. He went to the store and bought all the ingredients. He bought all the ingredients to make a pizza. He put the pizza in the oven and waited. Liam was very excited when it was done.

Summer Job. Lucy needed a summer job. She went to a few different places but did not find anything. Finally she decided to try her luck at the ice skating rink. She skated around with her friends and they loved her! Lucy can not wait to go back next summer.
Mints. Jules was going on a road trip. She was going on the car for only two hours. She was running late. She didn't have enough time to buy snacks. Jules ate a lot of granola bars on the trip.
Bad ice cream. Yesterday I got a frozen treat. It was vanilla. But the ice cream did not taste good. I realized I had to throw it out. So I threw it out and bought new ice cream.

Riding a Bike Drunk. Tim was at the park. He saw an old man drinking beer. Tim told him not to drink but he didn't listen. They ended up riding around drunk. It was very embarrassing to be around drunk old men.

Kris' Kids' Christmas List. Kris didn't want her kids to know their Christmas wish list. She didn't want them to know that she had sent a lot of money away. When Kris went to the mall, she saw her kids in the toy store. Kris was about to scold them when she saw their list. They had written about their wishes, and Kris' kids were excited.

Family Picture. It was time for the Smith family picture. They were very excited for the occasion. They got their outfits together and headed out. They spent three hours taking their picture. It was a very good family picture!
Mop. Anna hated washing dishes. But when her mom insisted, she agreed. She washed all day and got all dirty! But then she had another idea. She washed the dishes again, and her mom never knew!

Dairy Diary. My mother told me I was going to have a great day. I took her to a dairy restaurant. I tried to get the girl that worked there to talk. She told me the cheese in the cheeseburger was just a warning. She had a lot of fun though.
Rain. It was a beautiful day outside. My husband and I wanted to have fun. However, it started to rain. We ran under the covers. We had fun under the covers.

The free seasonings. Allison had gone to the local grocery store. She wanted to buy some seasonings for her family. Unfortunately, Allison could not find any seasonings. She had to leave the store empty handed. Her family still appreciated the gesture.

The Circus. Tom was out with friends. He wanted to go to the circus. Tom told his friend that he didn't know any elephants. His friend told him that it was all right as long as he could stand. Tom decided to join the circus as soon as he got home.

The Trampoline. Maddy was tired of not being able to jump on trampolines as a child. Maddy's mom told her she could do anything. Maddy tried jumping on trampolines every chance she got. Unfortunately none of her tries were successful. Maddy eventually gave up after an hour.
Larry's car smokes. Larry is driving to work. He is driving very poorly. Larry gets a text message. He turns his car off. Larry has to call a taxi.
Sunk. The boat had gone to the lake. It had capsized. The man paddled to shore. He called a boat. The boat helped him to get back to shore.

Ebay Scam. I found a listing for a new phone from my cousin. He sent me the listing and the phone number. When I called the phone number, I was shocked and angry. My cousin is scam artists and I told him so. He sent me a message and I got in trouble for being skeptical.

The Drag Race. Mike and Jerry were going to have a drag race on the street. They were both ready to go. They were both running really fast. Soon, Jerry lost control of his car. He crashed into a telephone pole, destroying the car.

Car Wash. I went to the car wash with my boyfriend. I had a lot of work to do that day. He asked me to do him a favor. He went to the car wash and washed his truck. I helped him get it done and he was very grateful.

The blanket over the head. Sally was in charge of putting the Christmas blanket over the kids head. She put a big pink blanket on the kid's head. Her son was crying. She pulled the blanket back and put a book. The book was to read to the children.

The Heavy Pizza. Jane was making pizza for her friends. She got all the ingredients ready to cook. She set the oven to 350 degrees. Her friends were waiting for her when it started to smell smoke. They got up to investigate and it was a fire.

The Son. The boy's dad was in the military. He had never talked to his son before. He told the boy he was going to kill his dad one day. The boy sat in shock. The boy felt guilty about it the rest of the day.
Seth gets a girl. Seth was in the city. He heard about a new club. He decided to go. At the club he saw a very pretty girl. He asked her out and she said yes!

The Nest. One day I was sitting inside my house when I heard a strange sound. I checked the floor and I saw a nest. I opened the window to check it out. The mother bird was perched on top of it. I felt a huge sense of calm and peace when I saw her.

Zoned Out. Amy was in her room in her dorm. Her boyfriend was playing in the hallway. She ignored him as she went to her room. When she returned he was gone. She decided to go to her room and read instead.

A Cat for Mom. Teddy had a cat named Molly. He was so happy when he brought her home from the pet store. Teddy put her on a high chair. He also put a treat on her to make her happy. Her eyes lit up when he gave her a piece of his lettuce.

Basement. Tim had a leak under his basement. He had not yet fixed it. One night a bird flew into his basement and ate his food. Tim didn't think about that and called for help. His neighbors came and got him the bird so he could continue his work.

Try Hard. Gina's mom wanted to see her daughter play soccer. It was recess so she asked her sister to join her. Her sister didn't want to play soccer. Gina begged her mom to let her join. Gina's mom reluctantly let her play.
story. Anna wrote a short story. Then she sent it to the teacher. But the teacher only gave her an A! She was crushed! Then she decided to be more honest next time!
Mini golfing. It was the day of mini golf. Jim was really looking forward to it. He drove down to the course early. Jim hit the golf ball. Jim won the mini golf competition.

The Mountain Lion. One day, I woke up in the middle of the night. I heard a noise in my room. I walked slowly to my front door. I was afraid because it was dark. I opened the door and it was only a mountain lion.
Jackson is a star. Jackson is a very talented singer. He gets a contract with a record label. They put him to work. He sings many songs. He becomes very famous.

November. In November my husband proposed to me. I was so excited and we went to the wedding the next weekend. We didn't have enough money for hotel accommodations. We stayed at an old church with a big ballroom. Our wedding was a beautiful success.

Snorkeling Trip. The Zimmy family decided to go snorkeling. They packed the boat and rented a boat for the trip. They put their gear on board and set out on their boat. They spent hours on the water enjoying the scenery. When they got home they got lots of sunburns.

Puppy Training. Lena had decided to get a puppy. She got the puppy for her birthday. Lena had a hard time learning to walk. Lena was constantly getting spooked by her dog. Lena eventually adopted a dog walking trainer.

Roy's Big Move. Roy wants to move to a new house. He has his friend sell his car to a moving company. The moving company arrives at Roy's house. He is surprised to see he is moving. He is glad that he moved.

New Kid. Jane had just moved to a new town and had never met any friends. She went to the mall to meet people. At the mall she met many people that she would eventually become friends with. Eventually she became good friends with them all. Now Jane goes to the mall every week to meet new people.

Worry About Others Or Myself. I was sitting in the cafeteria with my friends. We decided to eat at a nearby diner. When it came time for the check-up, I wasn't able to get in line. Instead, I asked my friend to drive me. We ended up getting some fried chicken instead.

Looking. She took a long time looking at each one. She couldn't decide on which one to go with. She asked herself what her favorites were. She decided on some to look at first. She decided she would go with those first.

Engineer. Jill wanted to be a scientist. She decided to learn how to do that in college. Jill got a tutor for science and math. Her teacher helped her get used to the concepts of science. Jill made a good impression on her mentor.

Ship Your Car. Tim wanted to learn how to drive a ship. He bought a book on ship designs. He followed the instructions and watched YouTube videos. Tim took his boat out on the water. He crashed the boat while trying to navigate the waves.
Playing at the Beach. Kenny invited his friends to the beach. They played volleyball in the sand. Kenny fell off the sand. He broke his arm. He was too embarrassed to play in the sand anymore.

The broken screen. Jordan was watching a video on his phone. Suddenly, he dropped the phone. He was horrified that his phone screen was broken. He quickly took the phone to the store to get it fixed. Luckily, the screen wasn't too bad and he was fine.

Snorkeling. I went snorkeling with my family. We found a couple colorful fish. We also saw a huge amount of coral and sea anemone. The fish were a lot bigger than my boat. I couldn't wait to go snorkeling again.

Pay. Betsy was making money from a small shop. She decided to make a website to sell her products. She was very proud of her work. However, she realized that the people that bought the products were not. She decided to stop working for the shop and make more money.
The Vase. The vase broke. Kane had it on her porch for years. She thought of buying a new one. She took a broom and carefully picked up the pieces. The vase looked amazing!

The Ship. The ship was heading to New York. They had been out of gas for days. They were running low on supplies. They had a lot of food and water in case they ran out. They made it to New York just in time.

No More Beard. Chris had a beard for over ten years. He loved his beard. One day his friend suggested he shave it. Chris was horrified and asked his friend for advice. Chris got a haircut and loved his beard after he cut it.

The Blanket. John had a very cold apartment. He wanted to make his apartment feel warm. John found a blanket in his garage. He put the blanket on the back of his sofa. John felt warm with his warm blanket.

Thanksgiving Dinner. Sally was hosting Thanksgiving for her family. She loved the food, but the family was very picky. She offered to make a turkey sandwich for them. Unfortunately, she burned the turkey and had to make something else. Luckily, her family loved the turkey sandwich.
The Tree. The Smiths bought a big box of Christmas trees. They loved their choice. The trees were all over the house. They were very happy. It was a good choice.

Subscription. Kate had two jobs. She had a regular job as an office worker. Kate decided to get a subscription for coffee and snacks. The company decided to make a subscription available to all. Kate was very excited to get her favorite coffee delivered to her house.

Friend's bicycle. Tom had a friend named John. Tom was going to give John a bicycle. Tom asked John if he wanted to ride it. Tom was so nervous he crashed the bike on the way home. Tom broke his arm and needed surgery to fix it.

Muscle. Tara had just started her weight loss journey. She was determined to get in better shape. She read online that healthy foods will help you get muscular. She started going to the local gym twice a week. She soon noticed that her exercise regimen was making her feel great!
Illness. Ruth had been out hiking. She fell on a boulder in a field. She was unable to stand back up. Her daughter took her to the hospital. Ruth had to rest and take medicine.

Chekhov's Warning. Jasmine has a crush on a boy. She decided to write a love letter. When her parents were asleep, she began to write the letter. Her father caught her and was upset at her. He told her to stop and told her to not do anything stupid.

Joe's Cars. Joe is working hard in his garage. His wife thinks it would be fun to take Joe to the car show. Joe agrees to go to the car show. Joe spends all weekend at the car show. Joe is happy that he got to go to the car show.

Bad Kids. Bill was a mischievous kid. He would often run and play outside without his parents permission. Bill's parents told him to go inside only when they were home. Bill started to play on his own. His parents yelled at him for the first time in hours.

Plants. I've always wanted to plant a plant in my yard. There were many good options to choose from. I read all the information regarding plant options online. I chose a tomato plant based on its size. My tomatoes did not survive the winter.

Lost Bird. Randy had a pet bird. He had a hard time getting rid of it. He finally gave up on getting rid of it. The next day, he found a dead bird in the kitchen. The bird had choked on a piece of cheese.

Class Reunion. Today my class had to get together in my office. My wife, her son, and daughter were attending. I went to a nearby restaurant for lunch and met with my former class. When I got there, my old friends and coworkers were there too. We had a good time talking about old times.

Presidential Vote. Ida was very nervous about the presidential election. She was convinced the only way to win was to vote. When the votes were counted, she was shocked to see her numbers up! Ida found herself not caring at all about politics after that. She vowed to be more open-minded the next time!

The Hot Springs. Jenna loved hot springs. Her mother always took her to them. The hot springs were at the bottom of a beautiful lake. Jenna went in and had her first experience. She was so happy she stayed forever.
The Topiary. Julia loved the topiary. It was full of beautiful flowers. She bought some to put in the yard. She added some sunflowers as well. Everyone loved the topiary.
Japan. Neil wanted to visit Japan. He applied for a student visa. His application was turned down. He was sad, but decided to take the next train. He arrived in Tokyo.

Angel has sex. Angel was a very good athlete. He always trained hard to get better at sports. Angel had a girlfriend that he loved very much. He trained with her everyday for many years. Angel now has a baby girl.
craft. Anna was helping her father make a craft. She kept asking him for help. But he said no. Then he remembered he was going to be a dad-in-law! He gave her some advice about how to do it herself!

The Embarrassed Girlfriend. Dale was in a long distance relationship. He tried to stay friends with his girlfriend. Eventually they got along but not all the time. One day she came out to him with something they didn't mean to say. He was so embarrassed he broke up with her.
New Dress. Marissa needed a new dress for prom. She asked her mom and dad for one. They found the perfect one. She wore it to prom. Her dress was pink with white polka dots.

Pumpkin Smashing. I like carving pumpkins. One day, I carved a pumpkin that was taller than me. I swung the carving knife at it to cut it up. It popped and split open. I have yet to make a new pumpkin.
Bubbles. The kids in the class sat in the bleachers. They were watching a video. When it was over, the kids came in. They wanted bubbles for lunch. They grabbed a bucket and ran outside.

No Ride. Gage's parents told him he couldn't ride home. They had already promised him a ride home. Gage looked at the map. He didn't see any other places in the area he was driving to. So he drove his friend's car instead.

A Jump Start. I was taking a long walk one day when I noticed my bike was gone. I turned around and found my bike on the ground with the chain on it. I went back home and started to work on my bike. After an hour I gave up and went home to my bed. I called my parents and waited for them to come pick me up.

Acknowledge. Trey was talking to his teacher. He noticed his teacher's name was in the teacher's hand. He was upset and tried to stop her. She kept on saying his name without any response. Eventually, she just said his name out loud.
Dried lake. I was bored. I decided to go fishing. I went to the local lake. I fished all day and had a great time. Afterwards, I went home.

Kids. I once babysat for an older couple. The kids were really loud. I could hear them singing a song at least thirty times a day. I decided to stop by and say Hi. They all laughed at me and said they didn't mean it that way.

A Friend Indeed. A little girl called me and asked to sit with me on my couch. I took her to the park to play on the swings. I gave her the swings. After we played for a while, we decided to walk around together. It was a nice walk after a long day!

Lost Homework. Sam always did his homework late at night before bed. One night, he couldn't find it on the table. His mother asked him what happened. He didn't know and he said he couldn't remember. Sam's mother told him to go to sleep.

The Disgusting Pie. Cindy decided to make pie. She had never made a pie before. After a lot of work, she baked a delicious pie. The neighbors were amazed at the pie. After eating the pie, Cindy knew to follow her recipe next time.

Down we go. When I was a little girl I really wanted a puppy. I begged my Dad for one for many days and finally he gave in. I went to the Pet Store with him to pick out a puppy. I got a beautiful poodle who was named Oliver. He was so soft, I named him Down we go.

Drove. A man wanted to start a daily workout regimen. So he searched online for exercises to start. He found a video on the topic. The video showed a variety of exercises to start. He found one that started him on the path to a good workout.

Choosing Just One. Tommy was out shopping with his mom. She was shopping at the mall with a friend. Tommy really wanted a new pair of jeans but couldn't decide. Finally she suggested a compromise. Tommy bought a pair of jeans and wore them at home that day.
Stained Pants. Tim got a new pair of jeans. They were pink and very frilly. One day he got out of work in them. His pants were covered in purple dye. Tim cried that the dye wouldn't come out.

Ordering a pizza. I decided to order a pizza. When I got there the pizza was cold. I asked the worker if it was a problem. He told me to bring my own food. I then left and ordered my food from the local pizza place.

My Little Helper. My Little Helper is a little black dog. He lives in our backyard with my parents. One day he saw a squirrel in the backyard. He chased it to his owners and they were able to catch him. My Little Helper is now the family dog.
The Tea Pot. Tina's grandfather had passed away. Her mother bought him a gift. It was a fancy teapot. She liked the way it looked. But she knew he couldn't use it.

A day at the golf course. One day Jimmy wanted to take his dad golfing. Jimmy asked his dad if he could go to the golf course. His dad agreed and they went golfing. Jimmy's dad hit his golf ball and it went over a cliff. Jimmy and his dad went home crying.

Military Veteran Tells A Story. A veteran from the Vietnam war spoke to a young man who fought in the war. The young man asked the veteran for a reason he was such a hero. The veteran told him he was a soldier and would die soon. The young man told him he was a soldier and had been in the war. Now the young man lives in Texas and the veteran lives in Arizona.

Hunting. Kenny loved to hunt, and he was a natural. One day, he decided to go on a long walk. While walking, he saw an elk on the side of the road. He ran after it, but he missed it. He realized that hunting was too much for him.

Braces. Amy's braces had been hurting her all winter. They were beginning to tear when they were loose. She decided to get a new pair. Her mom thought it was a good idea. Amy was able to get a new pair as soon as she was home!

Morning Noise. Jane woke up in the middle of the night. She ran around trying to get up but it was too late. Jane fell into a sleep on the couch. She then started hearing noises downstairs. She walked around trying to get to the source but could not find it.

Birthday Cake. Lana wanted to bake a birthday cake for her boyfriend's birthday. She found a recipe online. She bought all the ingredients. Unfortunately, she ran out of the icing and candles. Lana was forced to bake the cake without them.
Nice tip. I got a great tip the other day. It was a large amount of money. I was really impressed and tipped ten dollars. I'm going to use that money next time I tip. It was the best tip ever.

Hotel Surprise. It was the day I was supposed to meet my parents for dinner. I had no idea where they were, so I just kept driving. The weather was perfect, and I could see the ocean from my window. I parked and went inside, and I was shocked. The hotel was very far away from where I was supposed to meet my parents.

The Dog That Did Not Bark. The cat sat beside Molly on the couch. She would only sit on the couch for five minutes. Molly's mom was worried that this was because the cat was bored. She took Molly to the veterinarian for a check-up. The veterinarian found that the cat did not have any health problems.

The Accident. Tom had a terrible accident on the way home from work. He was at a stop light when his car veered off the road. Tom tumbled and hit another car. Both drivers were injured but Tom's insurance covered the entire cost. Tom's accident gave him the confidence he needed to drive again.

The Chess grandmaster. There was a grandmaster sitting at the chess table. A man who was very well liked asked if he would play. The man said he was interested, and would go to play if he was good. The man beat the grandmaster in the game. The man said he would have liked to be a chess grandmaster too.

The Argument. Cora was the oldest of five kids. She constantly got bullied by older kids. One day she decided to stand up for herself. She didn't play nice and everyone was scared. Soon after, she was picked on everyday.

Losing a sister. When I was in grade school, my friend had a twin sister. They were sisters, but I didn't like her sister. So, I ran away. The other day, I found her sister crying in the street. She had just lost her sister to cancer.

A Bear in Camp. Tom was playing with friends in his cabin. Suddenly, Tom heard a noise outside. He looked out the window and saw a bear. The bear quickly began to attack Tom and his friends. Tom called the local wildlife emergency number.
Tomato. Randy loved tomatoes. He bought all kinds from the store. He planted a small tomato plant. One day the tomato plant died. Randy was upset with himself for not remembering the season.

Siren. I drove past a police car in the middle of the road. The siren went off and they were calling for a siren. I got out of my car and began to examine the siren. The siren didn't work. The cop saw me and pulled me over.

Riding a Bike. Billy took his daughter to the park. He set up his bike and waited for her to get off. Billy's daughter didn't want to ride his bike. Billy told her he'd wait until she was ready. Billy rode his bike home.

Bad Vacation. It was Kate's turn to go on the vacation. Her family had been gone for months. Her brother was gone all of the time and no one had called. They waited at the airport for hours. When Kate finally got off she felt terrible for a long time.

Language. I just moved to a new city. The people there speak many foreign languages. I spoke French when I moved. After I moved, my French became very poor. I am starting to understand the language and people.

Very First Basketball Game. My son and his friend went to a basketball game yesterday. When they got there they were so excited. They went to the concession stand and got ice cream. The games started and they were having a lot of fun. I cannot wait to go to another game.

Dance Like You Mean It. When I was 12 I was in a dance competition. My first competition was at school and I did well. I was nervous the second one but I tried my best. In the third one I was still nervous. I performed flawlessly and won second place!

Snake At The Zoo. Tim and Julie went to the zoo. Tim really wanted to see the monkeys. Tim waited in line for about five hours. When it was finally his turn, the monkey started to approach him. Tim screamed and ran away screaming.
Stuffed Animal. Dan likes to play with animals. He brought home a hamster. When he was about to eat it, it bit him. Dan freaked out. He took the hamster outside and gave him a bath.
Hockey. Jim was playing hockey with his friends. He went up to score a goal for his team. He fell and hit his head on the ice. Jim had a concussion. Jim had to wear a helmet from then on.

Softball Game. Bobby and his dad were playing softball. They had never met each other before. Bobby's dad swung and hit Bobby over the head with a bat. Bobby was crying and embarrassed. Bobby's dad apologized, and they made up immediately.
jelly. Jane had lots of jelly in her mouth. She wanted it for jelly candy. She opened the jar and took a handful. But then she realized it was too hard! She had to throw it out.

Boxing Match. My cousin challenged me to a boxing match. We walked into the ring and met each other. He ended up throwing the first punch at me. I ended up receiving the second one. The third punch was blocked and we ended up leaving.
Breakup. Sam and Becky were dating. Becky was starting to act strange towards Sam. He called Becky and told her to call him if he changed his mind. Becky didn't call. Sam broke up with Becky.
Fear of Alleys. I hate alleys. I have been late to work multiple times. Last week the car in front of me was moving slowly. I almost ran over him. Luckily I got back on the road quickly.

Suspect. Jenny had been waiting in the car for her boyfriend for over an hour. He never showed up, and she was becoming more suspicious. She looked through her bag and realized she forgot his wallet. She called the police to let them know he was missing. Later that night, the police arrested him and Jenny was relieved.

Building Laws. Dylan had a project due in a few days. He had no clue what he was going to do for the project. He decided to ask his friend for advice. His friend told him to read up on building codes. Dylan was able to finish his project on time.

Trick or Treat. Lois loved trick or treating with her neighbors. Her neighbor's trick or treating consisted of hiding candy in buckets. On Halloween, Lois' buckets were opened one at a time. When Lois' buckets were empty, her neighbors would give her candy. She never found any, but had a fun time.
Chicken is good. I love chicken. But I don't know what to make it with. So I looked up my recipe. It made sense. But it tasted horrible.

The Pudding. The boys were bored one night. They made some delicious homemade pudding. They gobbled it up quickly. The boys were so happy they were able to sleep. They went upstairs to their room and slept well.

A New Car!. Kendrick loved his new car. He decided he would purchase a new car for the upcoming winter. He went to several dealership after-sales centers. He found the car he wanted and drove it home. Once home, Kendrick loved the way his car looked.

Old Speakers. I went to a concert. I was very bored and needed to take some music. The concert had speakers that were very old. I didn't know they were old. I had to pay a lot of money to get rid of the speakers.
Michigan Trip. My son took a trip to the state of Michigan. His friend took him to Lake Michigan. They stayed there for a week. They took a lot of photos. They told a lot of stories.
Notices. The mailman delivered my package. I was about to walk home. He asked for my name. I gave him my name and address. He immediately stopped his delivery and called me.

Christmas party. Jill and her family were planning a Christmas party. They made plans with food and decorations. Jill and her husband bought the supplies. They worked hard on the party. After they had it they had a lot of fun.

Large TV. Kim bought a large tv for her living room. But the big screen TV was too bright. Kim needed to get the room darker. So she went to get a much smaller, and less bright tv. Kim loved her new dark room TV.

Tofu. My family went to Japan for vacation. We took our meals and sat on the beach. I wanted to try tofu and so I went to a local market. There was a giant selection of tofu products and I found one I liked. I went home with $50 worth of tofu and was happy.
prison. A prisoner got very sick. He threw up in his cell. His cellmate saw him. His cellmate gave him medicine. The prisoner started to feel better.

Sleep. It was the middle of the night and he was falling asleep. He tossed and turned but couldn't get comfortable. The alarm clock finally went off. Sam rolled over to get the snooze button. When he hit snooze, it didn't go off.

Attitude. Tom was bullied at school. He was a new kid, but the bullies seemed to have attitude. One day they were picking on Tom so much, he got his courage. He stood up and told them off. They stopped picking on Tom and Tom became more popular.
girlfriend. The girl called her friend. Her friend was having a fight with her. Her friend's father didn't know. The girl called her mom. The girl's mom calmed the girl down.

Jim's Nice. Jim and Sam were neighbors who had nothing in common. Jim and Sam only got along on the weekends. At one time they fought over a girl that didn't like Jim. Jim told Sam to let her sleep with him because he was nice. Sam didn't let Jim sleep with him again.
Wet Boots. Tim was out for a run. He put his boots in the laundry. A few minutes later he went to go pee. His boots were soaking wet. He washed them and they were dry.

Ball Game. Jill was bored on Saturday. She decided to go to a ball game. There were so many people at the game she could hardly see. She finally decided to go home after playing a few games. The next day, Jill spent all Sunday watching the game on TV.
Stripes. The kids wanted stripes for their school uniforms. I told them they'd be wrong. They didn't listen. They colored the uniforms blue. It turned out to be a bad decision.
Lunch. The school was closed today. Sam was happy he could go to the library. He spent hours browsing all the books. He got some good information on birds. Sam had a great day of reading.
Snowstorm 5. John watched the weather forecast on TV. A blizzard was coming in. He was nervous about the storm. The snow began to fall in just an hour. John stayed inside until the storm passed.
diving. Ricky wanted to learn to dive. His uncle bought him a diving board. Ricky tried to learn the basics. But he became very frustrated. So his uncle bought him a diving tank.

Blown Surprise. My cousin and I took a road trip. When we arrived, the gas station was closed. I asked my cousin if we could go anywhere. I accidentally parked in the handicapped space. When we got out, my cousin laughed so hard.

Loud Birds. Our apartment building has large open windows. I used a mower to drive the bushes in the yard. The neighbor's complained to the police. They made my friend mow the bushes for them. The police gave him a ticket for excessive noise.

The tribe. The girls were from a tribe. The tribe had a lot of fighting and fighting. They wanted to make something great. They decided to give their tribe a name. It was going to be called The tribe.

Disappearing Bagels. Amy's favorite food was bagels. Amy's friends would always ask if she wanted to eat bagels. Amy felt like she could eat bagels everyday. One day, Amy's friends convinced her to eat bagels for one day. Amy ate all the bagels on her plate at once and lost 30 pounds!

Larry passes on. Larry was a good man. He gave his neighbor's dog away for free. The neighbors asked him why. He told them he gave it away because it was his dog. Now his neighbors can't do anything to him.
Temptation. Tom wanted to see a certain movie. He went online and found a copy on VHS. Tom ordered it anyway. He got caught up in the action. Tom lost all interest.
No Fork. I was eating a bowl of cereal. I tried to eat it without fork. It wasn't really going well. I was forced to use a fork. I was too mad that I threw the bowl on the ground.

Eating Fish. Jake had never tried fish before. He read online that the food was delicious. He got his girlfriend to buy a few fish for him. They both tried the food together. Jake said he loved it and his girlfriend agreed.

Emily Visits France. Emily has always dreamed of visiting Paris. Her friend recommends she try the Eiffel Tower. Emily decides to visit the Eiffel Tower. She visits the Eiffel Tower. Emily is happy that she has finally visited Paris.

poison ivy. Edna noticed a patch of ivy growing on her front lawn. She was afraid of it because her kids were growing up there. One day she decided to rake the ivy off her lawn and clear it. She had to dig a long hole but the ivy was gone. The next day her kids grew up and weren't afraid of the patch of ivy.
Safe Water. Tom's house had several leaky faucets. He couldn't afford to replace them. He tried to take out the old ones first. It was too late. Tom had to use a hose to get the water out.

Breakdown. Today my family went to a Christmas parade. We stopped to see all the bands and then went home. We then heard that a lot of people were in a bad accident. My dad and I drove to the accident site. We found out the accident was caused by a semi truck.

Coffee. I had a long day at work and wanted something to drink. I looked in the cupboard and saw I had no coffee. I went to the grocery store and bought some coffee. I poured myself a cup and took it home. After I drank it, I felt like I was refreshed.
Carpenter. Jim was a carpenter. His skills were sought after by businesses. Jim wanted to make his dream a reality. Jim took a big risk. Jim became famous in his town.

Diet. Marianne needed to lose some weight. She decided to diet. She started with a little food a day and slowly worked up to larger portions. She cut out all processed foods from her diet and started eating more. Soon, she felt much healthier and had lost 10 pounds.

The Puppet Show. Ava was performing at the school's talent show. She pulled a large puppet out of her suitcase. It was a puppet with big eyes and big lips. Ava began playing with the puppet for the judges. She won first place for the best performing puppet.

Aquaman. Kevin had always wanted to be an adventurer. He decided to apply for a job as an underwater explorer. He received a call back for an interview. When he went to the interview, he was very nervous. When he got the job, he was overjoyed.

Allie's birthday party. Allie was turning 5 years old. Her mom threw a birthday party for Allie. Allie was thrilled. She had a lot of fun and her mom threw a big party. Allie was thankful she got a big party.

tired. Gina needed to stay up late to watch a movie. But she kept watching at night instead. Her siblings would constantly interrupt her. She couldn't control them anymore. Gina had to find a way to stay awake.
Mary rides the bus. Mary needed to get to a school. She needed a ride to a school. Mary asked her friend if she could take her bus. Her friend said yes. Mary went to the bus stop and boarded the bus.
Late to Practice. Tim had a big test coming up. He stayed up all night to study. But then he woke up and got ready. He forgot all about the test and it was too late. Tim still failed his test.

Bad Reaction. The boy was playing hide and go seek with his friends. He hid in the bathroom because he couldn't see anything. His mother came home and found him. He said his stomach was in pain. He had eaten some chocolate ice cream.

Wrong Change. Kelsey needed $10 for gas. She walked to the gas station to use their ATM. She was greeted at the counter by a stranger. She told him to give her the money. Kelsey didn't have enough money for the gas and had to walk home.

Ouch. Bob and his wife were at the park. They were eating popcorn when a cat walked up to them. It looked guilty and looked at them. They were too embarrassed to say anything. They both decided to just eat their popcorn.

Sandwich. Joe wanted to make a sandwich. He opened the box of peanut butter and jelly. He then found out that they weren't peanut butter and jelly. Joe searched his kitchen for the jelly. Joe found some peanut butter and jelly in the freezer.

The Bus. I rode the bus home from school. The bus had been delayed due to weather concerns. When we got home I wanted to take a shower. But my mom said I could not use the bathroom in the house. I had to stay in my room and rest.

The Cheater. Molly was out of work for many months. She had applied for numerous jobs and none had been taken. She decided to try to make money online. She made many fake resumes. Luckily, she was hired within one week of starting.

The Dog Park. The other day I took my dog for a walk. We went to a park where there was a lot of dogs. She decided to play fetch with some of the dogs. She threw the ball too far and the other dog hit her in the face. Now we are banned from the park for a month.

The Jester. The family went to the park on a sunny day. When they arrived, there was a parade of floats. There was a very scary clown at the end. It frightened the family so much that they all left. They all decided to play video games instead.

Horses. The Smith's took their kids to the ranch. They both got to see all the beautiful horses. The boys had a lot of fun riding all of them. The boys had a lot of fun walking around and interacting. The Smith's had an amazing time at their trip.

Not Here. I was eating in the cafeteria when a man came and sat down. I was scared because I had never seen him before. When I sat down, I realized it was him. He also had a strange look on his face. Since I was afraid, I left quickly.

Remorse. I was really depressed in college, and it got worse during my junior year. My girlfriend got married, and it made things worse. We were also on the verge of getting a divorce. I decided to take a year off after a year. Now I'm much happier.

Ugly Picture. Tom had an ugly picture of his girlfriend on his desk. He decided to replace it with a picture of someone else. Tom went to the grocery store. He bought a new picture for the desk. Tom's girlfriend no longer looked at his ugly picture.

John's Chip Dilemma. John and his mom were talking. His mom was cooking chips in the microwave. John had to eat the chips while his mom cooked. John was a little hungry. But, John's mom cooked them both the chips at the same time.

Lunch box. Tim and his friends were out for lunch. Tim was too small to sit in the picnic table. His friend asked if they could eat lunch in Tim's lunch box. Tim's friend agreed and Tim got to sit in Tim's lunch box. Tim was glad his friend let him eat in Tim's lunch box.

A life worth living. I started college the same year that Elvis played his first concert. I was very excited and was hoping to do well. It was my first year and I was a freshman. However, by the end of the semester I had made great friends. Now I can't go to sleep knowing I will never graduate.

Leaving everything behind. Nita's parents had just died. She was so sad but she knew she had to move on. So she packed her stuff and went back to her mom's house. Her mom's house was much smaller than her own. Nita knew she would have to leave everything behind.
Low Bank Account. Tom was looking through his wallet. He had no money in it. He thought his debit card was broken. He went online to get it fixed. Unfortunately he wasn't able to.

Michelle's Dream. Michelle wanted to play basketball, but didn't have any shoes. She asked her mother for money. She could have used her allowance money, but it was no longer enough. She worked very hard, to get money to buy shoes. She finally was able to buy shoes for her basketball.

The house volunteer. Holly's house was badly broken. She had no money and no one to help. She decided to volunteer at a house for free. It was an hour long process of picking up trash, washing dishes, and fixing things. But at the end she felt like a big help.
Sue Buys A Chair. Sue was shopping at a department store. She needed a new chair. She decided to go to a furniture store. She picked out a comfortable white chair. Sue bought her chair at the store.

plastic mold. I found some old toilet roll at a thrift store. I thought the plastic would last forever. One day, I came home and saw plastic mold on the toilet roll. I cleaned it off. Then, I put the toilet roll back in the dumpster.

Tight Fight. Tom was walking to the club late one night. He was walking slowly but noticed a fight developing. He tried to stay calm as he walked to the club. After a while he noticed someone getting pushed and knocked out. He called out for help and waited with others to help.

Leftovers. Beth was very hungry. She put a bag of leftover chicken in the toaster. Beth walked out into the cold, windy night. After turning on the microwave, she left the food in there. The next day, she felt hungry and went out to eat.
Internet. I used to work for a transit authority. One day the internet went down. I was very frustrated. I reported it to the manager. He was very understanding and helped me fix it.
Final Exam. I took a final exam for my PhD program. I was very nervous. I felt like I could fail. I made it through it. I got my PhD and was happy.
Chemical. Tom's car wouldn't start. He got it towed to his mechanic. Tom's mechanic said the car had a chemical leak. He filled the car with propane. Tom fixed the car himself.

Keeping Out Cold Drafts. Tom had just gotten a new house. Unfortunately it had no air conditioning. Tom kept the house very cold at night. The next morning Tom was very hot and tired. He learned to keep out cold drafts.
The pain. Jane was playing with her toy train. All of a sudden, she slipped. Her toy train fell onto the ground. Jane immediately screamed. It was bad, but at least she could now go home.

Swimsuit. Samantha wanted to learn to swim. She had the idea to start with lessons. Samantha's parents signed her up for lessons. She worked hard with her parents and got the training schedule. She was happy she was learning to swim.

Jim Waches His Brother Play Basketball. Jim was watching basketball with his brother. His brother told him to try out for the team. Jim went to the try out and made the team. His brother was so happy he threw him a party after the game. Jim's brother invited him over for another party.

Bad Cramps. Ava was trying to exercise. She was at the gym and felt weak. She tried to squeeze her legs but nothing would work. Then she asked her husband to help her out. After a couple minutes of assistance, she was able to exercise.

Walking Barefooted. Sam was going for a walk one afternoon. He stepped on a loose rock in the ground. Sam felt his feet slip, but didn't panic. He slowly walked barefooted on the loose rock. After a minute, Sam was able to walk normally.

Sara's Cake. Sara wanted to make her mom a cake. She got all the ingredients together. She baked it according to the recipe. When she sampled it, it was delicious. Sara's mom told her it was the best cake she had ever tasted!
Bad but Good Sushi. Jim's favorite food is sushi. He went to his friend's house for a sushi party. There was lots of interesting food there. Jim asked to try a few things. He found some good sushi.

Martha's Strict Parents. Martha was a hard working mother. When she was young she had lots of toys that her mother let her keep. Martha's parents did not allow her to keep toys as long. When Martha turned ten she was allowed to keep her toy collection. Martha's parents became very strict about her toys and she was sad.

Thrift Store Rookie. Sally saw a great pair of pants she didn't have in her size. She went to the store and looked around. She finally found one in her size. She was excited to buy it. She was able to buy it before anyone else.

Carousel Barker. Eddie liked to ride the carousel. But he had always wished he could be a carousel carlionier. He worked hard all his life to become a carlionier. But he never got enough money to buy his own place. He decided to just let the carousel run while he enjoyed it.

Only Blue Pens. I used to buy my school supplies in blue ink. I went to the store and got everything I needed. I went home and opened the box to see what's inside. I couldn't find any ink in the box, only blue. The blue ink had been in the pen and I couldn't use it.

Stuck on top. I needed to go to the bathroom so I tried to move. However, the bathroom door was locked. I tried to turn the knob. However, it was locked. I had to jump off of the bathroom roof to get out of the door.
Mike Soiled His Diaper. Mike decided to take a nap. He forgot to use deodorant. After he woke up he smelled terrible. Mike decided to change his clothes. He now has a fresh pair of clean diapers.

Rave. I decided to go to a rave. I found my favorite music and tried dancing to it. After an hour, I decided to leave. My friends were disappointed that I didn't like the rave. I decided to find another rave.

The Dog Paw. Lucy was walking her dog on the street. The dog was excited to have something new to play with. Lucy's dog took off running. She had to chase her dog but couldn't catch him. Lucy was so upset that she couldn't enjoy the day.
Grill. Cara was in charge of cooking a steak. She needed to have a better grill. She checked her budget. Then she looked at her options. She went to a nice outdoor grill.
Busted. Kate was at a football game. She had been drinking soda with her boyfriend. She was too drunk to notice her phone fall. The screen was cracked. The police had to come and investigate.

Larry Tries Basketball. Larry was not very athletic. He asked his father to take him to play basketball. His father took him to a park. Larry played basketball all afternoon. Larry had fun playing basketball with his father.

Unsupportive. Dan had a big test in the morning. He spent all night studying for the test. When the morning came, he was very tired and had trouble staying awake. After the test, Dan was extremely disappointed. He failed his test, and didn't pass the class.
Dog bite. Allie went jogging one day. She got some dirt on her shoes. A dog ran in and bit her. She started to cry. Allie was allergic to that type of dirt.
Cookies. The lady made cookies for the class. They were brownies. They looked very tasty. They were frosted. The class had a great time.

Needing new glasses. Ava was going to a big concert with her friends. She realized that she couldn't see well enough to see them well. She went to the optometrist and asked for a new pair. The optometrist gave her a new pair of glasses. She was excited to be able to see well with the new glasses.

Cats. Tom hated his family's cats. He wanted to live with them permanently. After going through an extensive research process, he settled on one. The cat was named Frank and Tom was extremely happy. The next day, Tom's mother decided to take him away from Frank.

Power Outage. It was a cold November day. The Smith family decided to go to the mountains for a snow day. As the Smiths and their kids made their way out of the car, the electricity went out. They had to call the electricity company to get out. The family was upset that they couldn't spend the day sledding.

Party love. Sue was nervous about the big party her friend was having. She stayed at home to read a book for her friend. When she got there her friend had a bunch of drinks. Everyone started dancing and singing. Sue felt better and the party went well.

The Missing Tooth. Tom was eating candy with a straw. He was chewing when his tooth came out. He was so upset he started crying. He begged his mom to get him a straw so he wouldn't cry. She got him a new one and he was able to chew without chewing his tooth.
Not Done. I was reading my book. I had to close it to go to bed. But I read on. The book kept on being open. I ended up missing a page and my book didn't turn out ok.

The Lock. I was in my school library when a girl grabbed my books. I tried to walk away but she kept grabbing. Then I found out she was trying to open my locker. She knew the key was in her pocket and she was trying to get it. I ended up using the girl's name to call security.
Good report card. My report card was great. I got an A on all of my report cards. My parents decided to buy me an ice cream cone. I was disappointed. I sat there and ate the ice cream.

New froyo place. Kelly got the new froyo shoes yesterday. It's been awhile. She was excited to try them on. When she put them on however she spilled juice. Thankfully though the store did not charge her.

The First Job. Nancy's dad told her that she had to get a job. He told her she would have to start at the bottom. Nancy spent weeks putting in applications everywhere. She finally got an interview at a store. Nancy was happy that she finally had a job.

Positive Attitude. Derek wanted to become a champion fighter. However, he lacked self confidence. He went to a gym and trained for several hours. After a few months, Derek became more confident. Derek was glad that he was able to become a champion fighter.

School. My daughter's new teacher took the class out to lunch. She is a kindergarten teacher. The kids sang the school song for her. She was very impressed. She said her teacher would be proud of them.

Fussy Cat. Our cat Freckles loves to be petted. He seems to be quite fussy, but the owner cannot get him to sit still. Last night he was very fussy. The owner put a toy frog in his food bowl. He did not fall asleep, and slept well all night.

The autobiography. Gina was bored and began writing about her childhood. She wrote her dad and his adventures. The story was so funny she got a lot of laughs. Her grandma was so proud she gave Gina a hug. She realized it was time to share her memories.

Alex. Alex was so excited when his friend offered to show him something new. The friend wanted to show him a new type of toy. Alex and his friend played with the toy and laughed. His friend showed him a new type of car. Alex was so excited he didn't care that it was a toy.

Wounded Bird. Tom was sitting at a table with his girlfriend. They were watching TV. Suddenly, a bird flew in through an open window. Tom's girlfriend screamed in fright. Tom ran outside and retrieved the bird and his girlfriend.

Milk Trap. I was walking home from school one day. I found a little duck who had gone through a milk trap. He had to drink milk before he would come back. After a week, he was well again. I was surprised at how fast he grew after he had eaten his milk.

Painted Nails. My parents wanted me to be a lawyer when I was growing up. I decided I would do it, but wanted to be artistic. I decided I would paint my nails a bright red color. They were so beautiful when they were done. My parents loved them!

Small Fire. Tom was cooking a meal. All of a sudden his pot of food caught fire. It quickly started to spread throughout the house. Tom tried to move the flames to the kitchen. Unfortunately he lost control and the house burned down.

Career Pains. Sally was a successful writer, but she had just finished a novel. She wanted to take a break and recharge. She took a nap in her home for a few days. She then felt energized enough to write again. She wrote about her experiences that week and published them.

Dahlia. Dahlia had a pet chicken named Dahlia. Dahlia was a good friend to all of her children. However, Dahlia wasn't a very nice girl. Dahlia would always get in the way and fight with her children. Dahlia's kids stopped talking to her because of this.
Raining at pick up. Kelly was picking up her kids at the airport. They were going to play a game on the bus. All the sudden it started raining. She had to drive them home. The kids were disappointed.

Grease Burn. I was cooking chicken for my wife for dinner. When the grease was pouring out she grabbed some on the counter. I had to go to the bathroom to clean it up. Afterwards she put the tray on the counter and turned off the burner. She was upset she burnt her food.

Irrigation. When I was a child I would use the irrigation system. When I went to college I found out that my system broke. I called a repairman to come out and fix my system. I called them back and they told me the price of repair. I learned to use a separate irrigation system from then on.

Pouch. Kate wanted to play in her new Pokemon card. Her mother bought her a plush Pokemon card for the occasion. But it wasn't enough for a real Pokemon to be in it! Kate's brother got it for her. And she happily played in the Pokeball.

Cartoon. Bob was watching his favorite cartoon on TV. The episode was playing and he was having trouble sleeping. He decided to sleep on the couch to avoid any problems. He eventually fell asleep on the couch and went back to sleep. He woke up later the next day to find his cartoons had stopped playing.

Airplane Food. We decided to make some homemade hot dogs one day. I grabbed some hot dogs from the refrigerator, and made the sauce. I mixed up the condiments and put them in a bowl. I placed the hot dogs in the oven and left to eat. Once it was cooled, I decided it tasted ok.
The Castle. A child saw a castle in the distance. He ran very fast to see it. He ran right up to it. He climbed the castle walls. He was very happy that he had seen the castle.

Refreshing Yellow #3 Batch B. The red dye that I put in the batch B mixed up the dye. I poured out the dye into a glass bottle. I set the bottle down on the desk for a few minutes. When I came back I was surprised to see the bottle was still there. My cat had put the dye in the bottle the day before.

The Museum. Beth was at a local museum with her family. They were looking at old historical photographs. Beth's parents were impressed with the pictures. They had forgotten that Beth was in the same art class. Beth was so excited to see the artwork in the museum.
Tyler breaks his neck. Tyler is on a skateboard. He goes down a hill. He falls and gets hurt. Tyler gets taken to the hospital. He had a broken neck.

Bill Dates Dumb Girls. Bill has a crush on a pretty blonde woman at work. He goes over to talk to her after work and ask her out. The blonde woman says yes. She shows up to his apartment in a t-shirt and shorts. Bill is disappointed that she said yes to his request.
Late Notice. A woman called me. She was upset about something. She needed me to come over. I was already there. I forgot the woman was calling.

Tammy's Computer Skills. Tammy was a student in college. She loved computers but needed to upgrade her skills. She asked her teacher for help with her computer skills. She was able to find a few friends that she could help. The friends helped her upgrade her computer skills and she is now proficient.

Sleep. Sandra was exhausted from work. She lay in bed all day and slept. The next morning she woke up early and was ready to start her day. She went out to her favorite coffee shop and relaxed. Her day was always so much better after a nap!

Lance. Lance loved to drink coffee every morning. When he woke up, he could barely drink it. He drank coffee every morning for five hours straight. Lance went to the doctor for a physical exam. The doctor found Lance was addicted to coffee.

Grocery List. Kate's mom gave her a shopping list. But Kate didn't know if she had the right stuff. Her mom made some mistakes. And Kate had to redo her list. But she was pleased to find things she had.

Mailbox Surprise. Today there was a big delivery in the mail. It was a beautiful red box, with a name and number on it. The doorbell rang, and when I answered it there was a person. He told me that he's very busy with work and I should not bother him. He told me to enjoy the contents, but not the price.

Basketball Foul. Tom was playing basketball with his friends. He was getting fouled by the other team. He was trying to run in and steal the ball. However, the other team blocked him. Tom took the free throw and his team won.

Nothing To Talk About. Lacey was on a first date. She got on the elevator to meet a friend. When she got off the elevator, they talked about nothing. They didn't say much about anything at all. They sat in a dark room alone and talked about their feelings.

Worst Fear 2. My parents were going to take us to Disney World for my birthday. The weather was supposed to be nice so I could take a picture. The kids were wearing Disney t-shirts and shorts. My mom said we would be fine but that she wanted to see the park. As we made it to the park I had the worst fear I had ever had.

The Funeral. My sister had recently been diagnosed with stage IV pancreatic cancer. She had been on chemo for over a year, but was very tired. She was going to be buried on Monday night. We spent many days planning her funeral. On the day of her funeral, we felt very much relieved and bittersweet.

A girl who loves to Dance. Allie had always wanted to be a dancer. She started taking classes when she was very young. She fell in love with the art of it. She began taking classes as an adult. Now she dances in her spare time.
Sprinkles. The girl put on some perfume. She smelled the perfume and got a headache. She looked in the mirror and saw that her hair was wet. She sprayed some water on her hair. Then she washed it.

Iron Cross. Cyrus loved his school and was well liked. During recess, he would play kickball with all the kids. One day, Cyrus sprained his ankle in a game of kickball. He could not play for 3 days and the coach made him a special team. Afterwards, Cyrus was very grateful and cried when he saw the new team.
Rafting. Jack and Jane were going rafting. Jack was going faster than Jane. Jack was trying to catch up to Jane. He was going too fast. Jack wound up falling and breaking his ankle.
Holey jeans. Joe was at a party. He was drinking a beer. And it began to rain. Joe had to walk home in a pair of holey jeans. He was not drunk and he was able to walk home.

The Watch Shop. The watch shop needed a new technician. They offered to pay for a person to come in and help them. The technician came in on a Monday and fixed the problem. The watch shop was happy and thanked the technician. They gave him a bonus because he fixed a problem for them.

Dry Lawn. Joey had a large area of dry lawn. He tried using his truck to water it but it wouldn't work. Joey tried using a bucket of water but it didn't work. Joey tried using a hose but that didn't work either. Joey finally gave up and decided to water his lawn by hand.

New Dress. Kate's favorite clothes were going out of style. She was about to go out of town. She was nervous about how she would look for a new dress. Her mother suggested some new trends at the mall. Kate got the dress of her dreams and was happy.

A Hot Day. Jane's car had been having problems starting. She took it to her mechanic and the mechanic said it needed a new converter. She went home and paid the mechanic for the job. The next day she went to start her car. To her delight her car had started right up!

Pants. Heather bought a new pair of pants for work. When she got there she noticed that she didn't have any change. Heather thought that was weird but had to do it. Luckily, an employee was there to help her. They were able to exchange Heather's pants for the right ones.

Stay at Home Mom. Jen really wanted to have kids. She decided to stay at home and take care of her babies. Her first baby was just a few weeks old. Soon after that, she decided to adopt another baby. Now she has 7 children and spends hours a day with them.

The Security Camera. Lois and her family live in a very small house. One day, Lois heard a weird noise coming from the bathroom. Lois went to investigate and found a security camera. She called the police and they came to her house to investigate. It turns out the security camera is broken, so Lois had to fix it.

Pool Day. Linda wanted to go to the pool with her friends. She got her friends together in a small group. Linda and her friends jumped into the pool. Then, the kids jumped in too. They had a fun day together at the pool.

The test fail. Alexa has a math test tomorrow. She stays up all night studying. She wakes up extra early the next day to try to study. Alexa is so nervous that she cannot stay awake. She barely finishes the test and makes a C- on it.

Talk Show. We went to a talk show at the pub. I had never watched one before and it was very interesting. A man called in and was very arrogant. I found it very funny that he could never understand what he said. I laughed out loud at the end.
Chess. Bill likes to play chess online. Bill's friend challenged him to a game of speed chess. Bill agreed. He played his friend. Bill won the game!

Goo Rue Food. We had gone to Chinatown to eat some Chinese food. We ordered takeout and got two entrees. After the meal we ordered takeout to go. Our food was very good. We were happy to have gone to Chinatown.

Doing the Exact Opposite. I recently took a bath. After I took a shower, I poured on a nice lemon scent. I waited for it to wash out. As I rinsed it off, I realized my bathroom sink was clogged. I had to open the door and go downstairs.

Weight loss. Tina was a little overweight. So she wanted to lose some weight. She decided to cut out all sweets and sweets treats. She also tried to only eat small meals. Eventually she started seeing her weight decrease.
Trip. I had a really bad dream. I had to wake up in the morning. I walked to my kitchen. I made some coffee. I sat in the kitchen eating my food.
Swimming. Kara hated swimming. She had always wanted to go to the pool. She was finally old enough for it. When her birthday came, she was able to go. It was so fun, she had a blast.

Pregnant. Jane and her boyfriend Steve got engaged. They decided they didn't want kids, but wanted to stay together. Jane didn't think Steve could take care of a baby alone. So she started trying to make Steve a better man. He ended up being a much better man and he and Jane stayed together.

Summer Reading. We went to the Library during summer break. We looked for a book that we would like to read. It was hard to find anything, since it was so hard to find books. Eventually we found a few good options. We decided to check them out.
Job. Tom needed a job to pay rent. Tom decided to call in sick to work one day. Tom was never seen at work again. Tom took a job at the convenience store. Tom never did have a job again.
Green Grass. Tom had a lawn mower. He used it to mow his neighbors grass. He was tired of mowing so much dirt. Tom went to the hardware store. He bought some green grass seeds.
The Tattoo. Amber got a new tattoo that said "Beth" on it. Beth was her best friend. Beth was a pretty innocent girl. Beth loved tattoos. Beth decided she would not get another tattoo.
A Bounty of Soda. I took the garbage out. I opened up some cans. I picked up about a dozen bottles of soda. I took them inside. I opened them and filled them with soda.

I'm a Bad Goalie. Sam hated being a goalie on his high school basketball team. He tried out for the team but the coach wanted him to be a backup. Sam did his best but the coach knew he wasn't very good. Sam tried harder and was the best goalie on the team. Sam made the team, happy that he tried and tried hard.

Suspension. I was in college. The professor made us stand in a circle and read. One day I accidentally said I didn't want to sit in the circle. The professor suspended me. I was embarrassed and didn't talk to anyone for a week.

Cops. Cops was the nickname of a kid who wanted to be an actor. He made a lot of fake guns out of plastic. He would also spray paint a line of cops to look real. He would also hide behind buildings with cops in tow. The kids made money with his act and made it to Hollywood.
Ramen. Tom wanted to eat healthy. He decided to cook some ramen. He started with buying lots of vegetables. Then, he added plenty of water and broth. Tom ate his ramen very well.

Loose Cage. Tim got a new hamster. He didn't realize how tightly it was attached to him. Eventually Tim's hamster escaped from the cage. It tried to get out of his house. The cage was broken and Tim was upset.

Bike Race. My friends and I went for a bike ride one day. We found a good spot with a bike lock and got on our bikes. I was nervous as I began to ride, but then I realized that I didn't know where to go. I tried my hardest to ride as quickly as I could, but I wasn't fast enough. I ended up coming in third place.

The New Drink. Lance is tired of drinking water. He wants to get a new drink to satisfy his thirst. Lance asks his friend if he can try one of his drinks. Lance's friend agrees. They have a delicious drink that they both drink often.
Hunter. Terrance was going on a hunting trip. He got his rifle ready. He headed out into the woods. Suddenly he heard a scream. He had lost his quarry.
Angel at Work. Angel is an accountant. Angel works at the tax office. Angel doesn't like to be in the office. Angel decided to quit his accounting job. Angel doesn't like the tax office any more.

The Game. Timmy and his friends wanted to go on a game of soccer. They brought their balls and flags. Then they went to the park and kicked the ball around. It was a close game but they all scored points. They were so happy that they went on the game!

Problem Solver. James knew he needed a hobby to keep busy in his spare time. His friends suggested playing golf or jogging. James decided he would learn to ride a bike. He purchased a bicycle and got to work immediately. James was very happy with his new bicycle hobby.

Sara's New Friend. Sara had just moved to a new school. She had no friends at her new school. She was worried that she would not be able to make friends. One of her friends came to school that same day. They talked all day long about the new school and began to become friends.

Wedding Day. Mary was going to her wedding. She bought a beautiful bouquet. She had the groom pick her flowers. She took her veil and veil pins to be placed on her dress. Mary walked down the aisle feeling very special and happy.
Car Wash. Lily decided to wash her car. She filled a bucket and put the car in. Then she took the car outside. She washed the car with a hot towel. When she was done, she let it dry out in the sun.

First Day of School. Amy was nervous to start school because she had no friends. Her mother was also nervous. She took a friend with her to start school because of this. They made lots of new friends that day. Amy and her mother were both very excited to start school.
Wish. He wanted to wish for the best. He thought of what he could do to make it happen. He imagined what a perfect wish would be like. He wrote it down on a piece of paper. It was a happy wish.
Sleepover. A sleepover was set up. The moms all met in the living room. They played board games and watched tv. They made a lot of s'mores. They had a wonderful time.

Pilates. Eli decided he wanted to start exercising more. He bought some new workout equipment. Then he began working out on his own. Soon he saw his blood-oxygen levels improving. Eli was so happy that his hard work paid off.
The Canal. It was summer vacation and the kids were bored. They decided to go to the local canal. The kids explored the whole canal. They even played on the local beach. The kids had a lot of fun.

Test. Jim has been studying for a test. The day comes and Jim is ready. However the test is harder than Jim thought. Jim fails his test and loses all the studying money. Jim never went back to study for a test.

Shut Down. Kate bought a new car for her husband. They had been married for a year. They were on their way to a concert one night. The car had engine trouble and was out of gas. Kate's husband refused to go to the concert.

Need A Ride. Lacey was waiting in the long line at a gas station. She was not sure how long she had been here, but the line was long. A man in the gas station stopped to get a drink. The man offered Lacey his car, as Lacey had a long walk home. Lacey thanked the man for his kindness and took the car.

The Girl Scout. Kate was shopping for a special Christmas cookie. She went to the Girl Scout store and asked to sell them. After a few sales, Kate's store was filled. Kate's cookies were sold and she made a lot of money. She was so happy when the sales slowed down at the end of the week.

Bought new sheets. I wanted to get a new bed sheet but didn't have enough money. I saw an ad for cheap sheets online. I went to the store to buy some cheap sheets. I bought new sheets that were a little big. When I got home, I immediately put them on my new bed.
The Haircut. Tim hated his hair. He decided to get a new haircut. He drove to the barbershop. He picked out a great style for his new haircut. He was sad when he cut his hair in a month.

Marco's Big Goal. Marco was a young boy who always wanted to play football. He spent every day after school practicing and playing football. When his older brother Joe was playing football at school, Marco was excited. But Joe was always late and often did bad things. Marco decided to practice with his brother instead.

The Glass Bottle. A man was walking along the beach. He noticed a big glass bottle floating along the waves. He pulled the bottle from the waves. It exploded all over him. He was very upset and went home.
Weird Channel. My favorite TV channel switched channels. The new ones were way too creepy. They were all really violent. I was not sure how I would watch them. It turns out that I loved them.

Trash. Toby wanted to learn to code. He decided to become a computer programmer. His first project was to create a social network. He made a website that allowed people to post photos and videos. Toby's website became very popular and he made a lot of money.
Shiny Red. Gina had a shiny red car. But she couldn't afford it. She decided she would get a job to earn the money. She applied to several jobs. In the end, Gina was able to afford her car.
One shot. Allie had to get her first shot. She had to wait an hour. The nurse took her to the exam room. There was a needle. Allie was so scared.

The Abandoned Car. James parked the car outside of a store. The car was clearly abandoned. James looked around the car. He saw a poster for a nearby car club. James decided to drive the car to the club to help with repairs.

Competition. The boy was at a championship match. He was playing the best player in his team. He was playing very well. Then the game came down to the final round. He won the final round and was awarded the championship.

Louis and the computer. Louis liked to play video games. He used a computer everyday to play games. His computer stopped working. Louis looked online for a replacement computer. Louis ordered a new computer online.

High School Football. Tim was a high school quarterback. Tim would be in the starting lineup for the football team. The team was in the championship game. Tim threw the winning touchdown in the game. The team celebrated and Tim was now their quarterback.

The Play's the Thing. I've been trying to get to know my grandmother. She had a stroke in January. The first time I saw her was in a play. She was playing on a stage, and I was so moved by the play. Now she's visiting me in my apartment.
