Painted House. We have a large colored painted house on our front yard. We sell the house to people who are interested in renovating. I had to call a contractor today to put up the new fence. The contractor will paint the house in a few hours. The house looks beautiful in the new color.

Happy Birthday. I turned twenty-one. My girlfriend and I went out for dinner one night. My best friend took us to a fancy restaurant. I took my girlfriend home. We drank champagne and had a great time.

Quinn and Rowen at Recess. Quinn and Rowen had been fighting for weeks. Quinn had been picking on Rowen the whole time. One day Rowen and Quinn's teacher pulled them aside. Rowen was told that he was suspended for fighting. Both boys were glad to see their long fight over.

The New Dog. The neighborhood has been begging for a new dog. It has been years since they've had any dogs. One day, one of the kids named Jake got a new dog. The kids were so excited that they begged and begged. Jake eventually gave them a dog.

Hot and sticky room. My bedroom is really hot and sticky. So I decided to wash it. When I was done I smelled something burning. So I ran to get the can of air freshener. And I discovered that the room was too hot.

The Fly. Cindy's boyfriend had just returned from a trip. The fly had landed in the room and she wasn't sure where it had come from. She didn't want to know where the fly was and kept the fly in a jar. After a month of keeping the fly, Cindy found it in the jar. She let it go when her boyfriend brought the jar back.

New job. The new job seemed very interesting to Tina. She applied for it as soon as she could. The first day, Tina was very nervous. However, Tina worked hard to learn the ropes. By the end of the first day, Tina's job seemed more interesting.
Rick is hurt. Rick is at the bar. He drinks too much. He starts to drink too much. He starts to hit on some girls. He gets kicked out of the bar.

A Friend's Thanksgiving. Jill and her friend Ann went to a friend's Thanksgiving. They went to the restaurant and sat at their table. The girls got some pie and mashed potatoes. Then they ate a big meal together. When they left, the girls were so glad they had gone.
Treat. Bobby's mom told him he could have a treat. He got a candy bar from the store and ate it. He was so full that his tummy hurt. He then felt terrible. His mom gave him a tummy rub.
Olivia. Olivia had always wanted to be a star. She auditioned for a movie. She didn't make the cut. She practiced for months. Now, she is an Oscar nominated actress!

Apple Pie. Mary made a delicious apple pie for her mother's birthday. Her mother thought it was the best she had ever eaten. Mary's mother gave her a copy of the recipe to sign. Mary found it hard to find the original recipe. Mary's mother was very proud of her.
Motorcycle Accident. Tom was driving home from work. He was going pretty fast. He ran over a nail and flipped his bike. Tom scraped his knee pretty badly. He had to wear a cast for over a month.
Car. I saw this new model car at an auction. It was really cute. It was yellow and had a red interior. It cost $60,000. I think I will buy the car.

First Time Shaving. I decided to try shaving for the first time. I went to the store to buy my supplies. I picked out a cheap set of blades and some cleaning supplies. I headed out to the car and headed to the counter. I selected my first blade and razor and began to shave.

Registry Wit. Bob was a real estate salesman. He could not find any customers that had a record of an address. He checked the city registry but it was blank. He sent an email to all the customers to see if they had a record. Bob found an old mailing list with a lot of addresses.

All Work, No Play. Sara was a waitress at a local diner. She had never worked on her feet, so she didn't know what to expect. To her surprise, she loved it! All the people in the diner were surprised by how good it was. She was so happy and proud of herself.
Too Drunk. Jerry was out with friends. He was too drunk. He had trouble paying attention. His friends wanted him to go home. Jerry didn't want to leave and got into a fight.
Winning. Tom won a bowling competition. He was awarded ten thousand dollars. He took it to the casino. He won all his cash back. He bought a lot of junk food.

Movie Night. It was night and Gina wanted to see a new movie. She got the ticket and went upstairs to her hotel room. She laid on the bed and went to sleep. When she woke up the next morning she checked her phone. There was a text from her boyfriend asking her to see his movie.

Bicycle Accident. Dane loved to ride his bicycle. It took him too long to ride when he was younger. He had to go to his local park and ride his bike there. As he was going too fast, a semi hit Dane's bike. Dane was glad that he could ride his bike again.
The Pianist. A man sat down to write a poem. He took a pencil and wrote a few lines. He went on to write many more. He submitted the poem for publication. He won the Pulitzer prize.

Speak To His Mom. Curtis called his mother. He wanted to tell her about how he felt. Curtis's mother did not want to hear about his feelings. He decided to talk to her in a private place. After that, Curtis was able to tell his mother his feelings.

The Birthday Party. Jenny always wanted a birthday party. She invited her friends and family to her house. She had so many guests that she forgot her oven. It was so hot outside that she couldn't bake a cake. She still invited everyone anyway.

A Crazy Sandwich. John decided to make a peanut butter and banana sandwich. It was going to take a long time, but he wanted it finished. While he waited for the bread, he realized that it was wet. The bread had stuck to his fingers and he could not eat it. John had to go to the store and buy a new sandwich.

Pancake Time. Sue and her sisters decided they would make pancakes for breakfast. Sue wanted her pancakes to be chocolate covered. They went to the store to buy chocolate. They made their own chocolate covered pancakes. They were surprised they had made their own pancakes.

The Basketball Showdown. Jason always wanted to be the best at basketball. Jason practiced with the best players in the state. Jason practiced with the best players in the state. Jason practiced with the best players in the state. Jason won the state tournament.
The Bucket. A boy had to go outside to get the car. His mom told him not to go. The boy went anyway. The bucket got stuck in the fence. The boy got very frustrated with his mom.

Floating down the river. Josie was in the backseat of her car on a long road trip. She began to get nervous as they drove down the road. She could not stop shaking as they drove so fast down the river. She began to fall asleep in her seat as she drifted off into sleep. Josie awoke to her boyfriend trying to get her out of the car.
Alan's Eulogy. Alan gave his eulogy in front of his friends. His friends got together and applauded. Alan tried to stay stoic. The crowd got restless after a while. Alan was not happy.

Credit Card Debt. Abe was in dire need of money. He decided to buy a credit card. Abe soon ran out of money and couldn't pay his debt. Abe called and pleaded with someone to lend him money. Luckily, the person agreed to help him out.

Trip to the beach. My family went to the beach this weekend. We spent all day at the beach swimming and tanning. We played in the waves. At the end of the day we headed home. We slept under blankets that night.
Ralph's Dog. Ralph always had a dog. His dog died. Ralph was very sad about losing his dog. He went to a dog shelter and adopted a dog. Ralph is happy he is no longer sad.

Hiking up Hawksbill Crag. Tim took a hiking trip in the mountains. He went with several friends. They hiked to a very old waterfall. Tim brought his water bottle with him. It was a very pleasant hike up Hawksbill Crag.
The Playground. My nephew was excited to play in the sandbox. He built a sandbox out of dirt. My nephew threw sand at each other. We started to play in the sandbox. My nephew started crying.

Lawyer or prosecutor. Willie had to choose between being a lawyer or prosecutor. Willie knew both were equally important. He made a list of pros and cons to both careers. Willie made a decision and felt the pressure to choose. Willie chose prosecutor and never looked back.

Food Truck. Denny and his friends wanted to do something special for Halloween. They looked up many ideas and couldn't decide. Denny told them to try a food truck. The three friends all agreed to do a food truck. They got the truck and had a great time doing some Halloween treats.

First kiss. Yesterday I was at a friend's house. Her father said he had a surprise for me. I was in shock to see my girlfriend's father kissing me. I thought it was gross. Then I realized that it was only my cousin who kissed me.
Cruise. Bob and Lisa wanted to go on a cruise. They could not figure out where to go. They decided to just cruise from coast to coast. They had a blast. They decided to book their next trip.

Baby Bottle. I was walking in the woods with my friends. My friend was holding a baby bottle. I decided to drop it on his head. The bottle shattered on the ground. We decided to keep it away from him.

The Big Test. Jake has been studying all week. He has been so nervous about his science test. He walks into the room and is shaking. He looks up to see a familiar face. The teacher is standing right next to him.
The Dog Bowl. The dog loved the bowl of soup. He would grab it and eat it from the bowl. He ate so much he would fall off the couch. One day the bowl was stolen. The dog was not happy about it.

Peach Ice Cream. Bob was watching some TV. He got up to check his mail. He realized he had forgotten his favorite treat. He ran to the store to get some peach ice cream. Bob ate the peach ice cream while watching TV.
Strange massage. I was in labor for nine hours. I finally went into an office. My feet were being massaged. I was in a lot of pain. The masseuse said that was normal.

Four Minutes. I needed to clear some space on my computer. I thought about it for a while. I decided to make my own four minute timer. I watched tv for four minutes then waited. It worked and I was able to clear enough space.
Horror Film. Nancy wanted to watch something scary. She went to a horror movie theater. She was not scared at all. She laughed every second. Nancy was glad she got to watch scary movies.

Old Jeans. Jim took the jeans to the store. He was very excited when he found a nice pair of jeans. He took them home and tried to wear them out. Jim fell in love with the style immediately. He bought an entire wardrobe of old jeans.
Eggplant. Linda decided to eat eggplants. She liked them a lot. So she bought many of them. However, when she went to eat them they were too soft. Linda decided to buy her own eggsplants instead.
The Rescue. I ran to my brother's car. I told him to stop as he had a flat tire. He started up his car and looked down. He saw a dog stuck in the tree. He called for help and I ran to the car.

The Divorce. My sister in law's husband died. His father filed a will. He left his wife and his kids to his sister. She filed a lawsuit and a counter will. She was never able to get the money from the will.

Finally Alone. I was at a carnival and decided to ride the Ferris wheel. I bought my ticket and put my clothes on. I put on my rollerblades and prepared for the ride. I got on the roller blades and I screamed in delight. I screamed with excitement as the Ferris wheel dropped me to my death.

Put on Your Pants. Beth is going to the store for a snack. Her kids are whining when she gets there. They don't want to be out in the cold. Beth helps them put on their cold pants. She is happy that they are finally warm.

The Science Experiment. A scientist set up a new experiment to see how water works. He added a very small amount of water to a very large cup. The water was so cold it caused the experiment to fail. The scientist called in the backup scientist from another lab. The backup scientist fixed the experiment and the results were correct.
Cass. Cass and her brother were playing at the park. She accidentally stepped on a stick. Her foot started bleeding. Cass called the ambulance. She had to wait three hours to go to the hospital.

Tina's Dinner. Tina wanted to make some food. She got up early and started with making dinner. When she was done it tasted terrible. Tina didn't realize she had used too much garlic. She had to eat a piece of pizza to finish her dinner.
Car. Jim needed a new car. He found a perfect red car. He drove it all over town. After a month, it was wrecked. Jim decided he would not buy a red car anymore.

The Irritating Neighbor. Tim noticed that his neighbor was very loud. He asked him if there was a problem with his noise level. The man explained he was there to help a friend move. Tim invited him over, hoping he would keep his volume down. Unfortunately, Tim's friend turned the volume way too high.
Camel Ride. Garry was on his camel trip. He was on the front of the group. He was about to take a leap. When he turned around he realized he was facing the wrong way. He decided to try again.
Horace Eats Donuts. Horace decides he needs a snack. He decides to eat a donut. He eats it while watching the news. Horace feels terrible afterwards. He will never eat a donut again.

Early Breakfast. Tim was hungry one morning. He decided to make himself a quick breakfast. He went to the store to get a granola bar. It was cold, but he figured it would be fine. Tim didn't feel hungry until he got home.
Getting the last ipad. Suzy had a broken ipad. She didn't want to buy another. So she decided to just get it when she saw the price. She got the ipad at her school. Then she found the one she wanted.
Brought Lunch. The boy brought lunch. He brought a banana with pineapple. His mom put the food in the microwave. She forgot about it. He ate it.

The catch. Mark and Joe were playing baseball in the field. Mark accidentally swung at Joe's glove. The ball went sailing into the woods and went deep. The two boys ran after the ball. Mark returned the ball to his house.
Sober. Beth was feeling depressed. She decided to go to a bar to relax. She drank a beer and smoked a cigarette. She felt less depressed after the bar. Beth vowed never to drink and smoke again.
The restaurant. Joe loved to eat out. So he decided to try a new restaurant. Joe went to his favorite restaurant. But it was closed. Joe decided not to eat out anymore.
Hat. Tim was going for a job interview. He wore a big hat. He knew the interviewer liked it. Tim kept wearing it throughout the interview. It was a nice hat, but not his best.

The snakebite. Sophie was walking along a sandy beach. Suddenly, a large snake bit her! Sophie screamed and held her chest. She realized that she had been stung. She went home and cleaned up the bite.
Birds. The birds kept chirping. They were singing the tune of a carol. Bob went to get his ear plugs. They were full of bird seed. He made a big bird seed pile to attract them.

Teeth whitening fail. Allie needed her teeth whitened. She needed white teeth. She went to the dentist to get her teeth whitened. The dentist didn't agree with her color. She needed to have it rescheduled.

Going to the Zoo. We always have a lot of fun going to the zoo. The kids love to feed the ducks. We usually have to buy so much food. The kids always pick something out. I get to feed the ducks as well.
New Camera App. I wanted to buy a new camera. I looked up the best ones on the internet. The first one I saw was a big and fancy one. It was a Sony. I bought the big one anyway.

New dress. Susie wanted to go shopping for a dress. She knew her mom would not be able to afford it. But she knew she had a lot of other things to buy. She decided to just buy her mom a plain blue dress. She felt comfortable wearing her new dress everywhere.
Wrong Number. Sara got a call at the gym. She went to answer it. When she got there, the person asked about her. She realized it was a wrong number. She drove to the gym instead.

Mean Dog. Sammy has a big, bad dog. She has trained him to do a lot of tricks. She let him go outside one day without permission. He took off running with a ball. She confronted him and his attitude changed.

The Tower. Jenny liked to build towers. Her favorite was the tall tower. One day she decided she would make a giant castle. Jenny went into the attic and got some supplies. When she was finished she put her new tower up.

Fish Tales. Juanita went fishing in the middle of the lake. She didn't realize that she had forgotten her fishing pole! She was frightened when the big fish began biting her. Juanita was able to pull the fish out of the water before it attacked her. She was so thankful that she took her fishing pole with her the rest of the day.

Newspaper. Ava was a great writer. She wrote a story about the future. The story was so good, she won an award! She submitted the story to a lot of different magazines. She got published in over twenty different magazines!

Driving to the beach. One of the most popular things to do at the beach is to drive to the beach. We like to drive around the beach and look for the perfect spot. Last week my wife and I were walking and saw a sign for the beach. We drove there and looked at all the beaches, and decided on the beach. The trip to the beach was an hour long but we had a great time.

The Apple Orchard. Tod's dad worked in an orchard. Tod was always too little to be able to work in the orchard. One day, his parents surprised him with tickets to see his favorite movie. Tod spent the whole afternoon playing and riding in the orchard. Tod was so happy that his dad took him to the movie.

David forgets about the sandwich. David was sitting on the couch eating his sandwich. He heard a noise outside. He walked towards the noise. When he got there, he realized it was his dog. David realized he had forgotten about his sandwich.
Bad grades. Tina had a test tomorrow. She has been in trouble lately. She wanted to get it over with. Yet to her dismay she didn't do well. Tina had to retake the test.
The Show. The crowd cheered. A new show was on! A singer walked on stage. He began to sing the words to the song. The audience chanted his name.
Beach. Tom was bored. He wanted to do something fun. He went to the beach. He went swimming and had a good time. Tom felt less bored after that.
Bad Tooth. My wife was eating a piece of gum. She felt her tooth start to hurt. She started crying. I gave her a temporary tooth. She felt much better in no time.

Day Off. Today I went to work at the beach. While I was swimming, a storm passed over. All of a sudden the wind blew the sand into the surf. I had to get out of the water. I got sand all over my clothes.

Making Out at the Movies. I love going to the movies with my boyfriend. We usually go to one in the morning. On one particular day we decided to watch The Wizard of Oz. I was terrified of the movie. However I enjoyed it so much I decided to make out at the movies.

Charlie Helps Paint. Charlie was bored of the house he lived in. He decided that he needed to get paint. Charlie went to the store and bought paint. Charlie painted the inside of his house. Charlie was happy that he no longer lived in a boring house.

Black and white party. Susie wanted to have a party. Her friend invited her to a white party. So Susie decided she would throw the black party. It was so fun and got her friends to have fun. When she found out it was a mistake, she was not amused.

Unhappy about the gift. Nina was trying to buy her brother a gift for Christmas. She went to the store, but there was none for him. She decided to see if a neighbor of his could purchase it. The neighbor offered to buy it for her. Nina was extremely grateful to her neighbor.

The Gay Sister. Rene was dating her younger sister. She kept telling Rene that her sister was gay. One day Rene was sick and could not go to work. Her sister decided to change her number and Rene did not hear from her. Rene's sister was so upset that she broke up with Rene.
Water. It was hot out. And everyone was thirsty. So they all got out their water bottles. They filled up water jugs. Everyone had a thirst but they were happy.
Visit. I went to see my grandparents. I told them I was going to visit. They said they would be there in a few minutes. When they arrived I was waiting in the lobby. They never came.

Back to School. Amy's mom didn't have a car or bike for her to ride to school. She asked if she could ride the bus instead. Amy was sad her mom said no but was glad she could ride the bus. The ride was long and boring but Amy had a great time. She rode the bus to school for the first time.

Late Night TV. Jane loved watching late night TV. She was a big fan of SNL. She started dating someone at work who was a big fan of SNL. They got married shortly after marrying each other. Jane and her husband were able to watch SNL together from then on.

iPhone reveal. Kelly had always wanted to be an iPhone owner. One day her parents decided to surprise her. They took her out to buy her the newest iPhone. As they handed it over, Kelly smiled. The pink iPhone was absolutely beautiful.

Thrones. I was watching TV and was surprised by some familiar looking scenes. I looked through my DVR and noticed something on there. I realized I had a DVD copy of the first season of The Thrones. I decided to see if I could download it. It is now my new favorite show.

The Brave Fireman. Jenny was making a small pile of leaves on her deck. Suddenly a fireman appeared in the distance. Jenny panicked and ran towards him. The fireman got her out of the way and saved her life. Jenny felt good about this encounter.

Met at a Bar. Sam liked to drink at bars. He started going to bars late one night. He met a girl that he liked and decided to hang out at a bar. The next day Sam was nervous and upset. He felt embarrassed about going to the bar.

Cooking White Rice. Lizzy wanted to cook dinner for her family. Her daughter, Lynn, did not want to cook. Lynn was too busy to help Lizzy. Lizzy felt bad so she let Lynn help with the meal. Lynn helped and the dinner was perfect.

Mini golf. I was playing mini golf with some of my friends. I was down a hole but thought I could still make it. I started to get a bit nervous. Thankfully I made it to the bottom. Thankfully the round was over in an hour.

Dancefloor. One of the last places I wanted to be was dancing on the dance floor. I had a little boy and I would take him dancing on my dance floor. He would have a little trick, and I'd take over for him. It was a nice way to meet people, and it helped keep me warm during the winter. I still go down to dance floor, and it makes me feel good to be alive.
Shirtless. Tom's wife wanted him to go shirtless. Tom agreed. She taught him to tie his pants. Soon he learned that he could zip his pants! Tom's wife had learned her lesson.
Short Stories. My wife wanted to try her hand at writing. I said okay. She started a short story. It took a while to get it out of the paper. The story was finally finished and she liked it.

The careless destruction. Jenna and her friends decided to destroy the house next door. They made a huge mess in the living room. The living room was completely destroyed. The girls were charged with burglary. The damage was paid and the house was saved.

Big Change. John was a college student. He was living with his parents and had a girlfriend. John was really good with money and had a lot of things. John decided to start investing in himself and saving. Now John can buy the things he wants.
glasses. The man dropped his glasses on the ground. He picked them up. He put his glasses on his eyes. He went to the glasses store. He purchased new glasses.

More Books. Gina's book bag was full of new books. She was excited she didn't have to return all of them. But the more books the less room she had. Gina was sad she could no longer keep everything in her bookbag. She went home and read all she wanted.

Emma's track race. Emma wanted to run in her school's cross country race. She signed up to run the race. She trained hard for weeks. Emma ran a great race. Emma was happy to have participated in the race.

Overstepping Boundaries. Kate was always getting into trouble at school. Even if she was being really helpful, she sometimes got into trouble. One day she had to be escorted out of the hall by the principal. Kate had never disobeyed a teacher before. She knew she would have a tough time not doing so.
Terrible Haircut. Kim was a pretty girl. She got a haircut. Unfortunately it was way too short. She was very embarrassed. She never got the haircut again.

Birthday Cake. Jane wanted to bake her boyfriend a birthday cake. She got the ingredients together and got to work. After she was done, she realized her mistake. The cake had sugar instead of flour. Jane had to replace it and apologize.

Team Morale. John was the star quarterback on his team. During a big game, John was hit in the head. The concussion was severe and left him unable to play. John was the team's best player but couldn't help it. John got so upset he quit football.
A Bad Cut. Tori was working at a restaurant. She was cutting vegetables. The knife slipped and she cut her hand. She could no longer work. Tori's boss made her change positions.

Cheaters. Jake was an American high school student. He was in a large university. He was getting ready to graduate one day. Jake decided to cheat on his final exam. Jake was caught and expelled from school.

Park Accident. The kids decided to go to the park. They were walking to a nice hill. Suddenly a car sped past them. They quickly realized it was a drunk driver. They continued to walk back to their car.

Indigestion. My sister-in-law R is 65 and in a wheelchair. She was in a lot of pain last night. She had to go to the bathroom and was not walking. She is very clumsy but she is able to walk normally this morning. She is happy that she doesn't have to use a cane any longer.

Luke Plays Guitar. Luke decided he was going to learn how to play guitar. He bought all of the books he needed to learn. Luke practiced every day until he could play a few songs. Luke was excited to learn how to play guitar. Luke decided to start writing music with his guitar.

Pull Up Me. Jake was at a friend's house. He was being a jerk to everyone. Eventually, he got too angry and started to pull ups. His friends got angry at him too. Eventually Jake just picked up a few pounds and left.
Getting a snack. I was walking to the kitchen. I was not hungry. I walked to the refrigerator. I grabbed a bag of chips. I ate them and went back home.

Rita visits her grandparents. Rita has been wanting to go to visit her grandparents. Her mother has never been there before. She asks her mother if they could go for a visit. Her mother agrees to go. Rita visits her grandparents and has a wonderful time.

Childhood Games Made Real. In 2008 I found a box of old board games. It was the original sets from when I was a child. I thought my grandmother would give me the set. I opened the box expecting to be disappointed. Instead I found the set made from photos of my own childhood.

Pearls before (Guinea) Swine. When we went to the zoo the other day, my son went to pick up some pearl earrings. I asked him if he could keep them but he declined. He said it was too expensive for him to keep them. When we got home, he was sad that he couldn't keep them. Now he's thinking about buying some earrings of his own.

Making a New Friend. Joe decided to visit a friend for the first time. He had never met his new friend. His friend decided to teach him how to swim. After that, Joe and his friend met and had fun swimming. Joe and his friend became good friends.
Worried. Macy had been invited to a girl's party. She wanted to go and see her friend. She was upset because she had not been invited. She decided not to go. Macy felt badly.

Burn. I was doing a science project for a class project. I was supposed to heat a small amount of water to a high temperature. After heating the water I set the temperature for a few hours. I forgot to take the lid off when I was done heating the water. I burned my hand badly.

Open Door. Joey opened the door to his room to find his parents asleep in bed. He stood in the room looking confused. He was afraid he had done something bad. When he went to tell them the truth, they were very mad. Joey tried to hide the tears from them as he tried to get up.

Pink Shirt. Lucy got a new pink shirt for her birthday. She wore the shirt out for lunch. But as she was eating her burger, the shirt spilled. Lucy's shirt had a pink stain on the white shirt. She vowed to never wear that color again.

Camping Trip. I went on a camping trip with my dad last summer. We went out into the woods, set up our tent and went to sleep. The next morning we woke up and got ready for the hike. We made it to the top of the mountain and rested there. I had so much fun, I decided I wanted to go on another camping trip!
The Bad Hair Cut. Liz got a new haircut. She hated it at first. She thought she would hate her hair. She tried it on and it made her feel great. She decided to let it grow out.

Santa Claus. Every Christmas, Jack asked Santa for a toy. This year, Jack's parents got him a little doll as a gift. Jack played with the doll for hours. Then, at the end of the day, Jack was exhausted. Jack wished he had gotten his wish for a toy.

Cabin Fever. Sam went camping with his family. He was in the woods with his dad and sister. They pitched their tent. Sam felt a sharp pain in his stomach. He ended up having to throw up inside the tent.
Cold Pizza. Tom went out to eat for the first time. He ordered his usual pizza. It was too cold to enjoy. Tom asked for hot pizza instead. It wasn't as cold but it was better in his opinion.

Eggs. One day, the Smith family decided to make breakfast together. The father got the eggs out of the fridge. He threw them in the toaster and set the timer. They sat down and began to crack them. It was delicious!

Clancy Makes Toast. Clancy realizes that she has no bread to bake with. She decides to make a sandwich instead. She makes a delicious sandwich with ham, cheese and bacon. Clancy eats the sandwich. Now that she has bread, she can bake her own bread.
Jumping. It was a sunny and warm day. Tiffany and Tom were jumping together. It was a beautiful fall day. Tom fell off the bridge. They laughed about it the rest of the day.

Peppermint Bark. Sally wanted to get her kids to drink more water. She decided to try to have them chew some mint. Sally put a drop or two of mint in her children's water. She told her children to swallow the mint. Afterwards, her kids were able to drink more water.
Hospital Visit. I had a horrible cold. I called into work to be checked in. I went into the hospital. The doctor there examined me. I had strep throat.

Miniature Dining Room. Dan wanted to change the look of his dining room. He hired a local designer to create a new dining room set. Dan chose an authentic Japanese style. The dining room looked much better. Dan was happy with his choice.
The Snow. It was really cold outside. John wanted to stay warm. He decided to try to make a snowman. The first few seconds were slow, but he got it done. John couldn't wait to show it off!

The Well. Jane needed to make some money. She needed a way to pay for her rent. She decided to open a business selling well water. She hired her first employee and opened her business. Her well sales helped pay her rent.

Nathan. Nathan came from a big family. He had a big mouth and big dreams. When he grew up, he made a lot of good choices. But as he grew older, he made a lot of bad ones. He stopped loving his family and became a criminal.

A Bridge Not Too Far. A man was walking across the bridge to see the ocean. On the way he tripped over a loose board on the bridge. The board tore a large hole in the man's foot. He yelled and tried to get help, but was ignored. Afterwards, the man decided to walk across the bridge to avoid more problems.

Door Slamming. One night my husband and I heard a loud slam in our living room. We opened the door and looked outside. There was a cat in our living room. We were so confused we couldn't figure out what to do. We eventually decided to just ignore the problem and not fix it.
Shot in the Leg. Tom was playing football at school. He was being tackled hard. His knee felt tender when Tom fell on it. Tom was forced to lay on the ground. Luckily, his leg was not injured.

Reading. Dylan was a bookworm. He loved all kinds of books. One day, he decided to read a novel to write a book. He wrote a wonderful novel, and submitted it to a publisher. The publisher loved it, and published the novel.

Illegal Street Vendor. Bob was the street vendor in town. He would go to the park and beg people for money. Bob made the decision to quit his job and start selling drugs. He made a few bucks but didn't spend it wisely. Bob now has a huge headache waiting to happen because of the arrest.
Strong Beer. The man poured himself a beer. He couldn't finish it. He had to spit it out. He bought a new one. It was stronger.
Basketball Tryout. Sam wanted to try out for the basketball team. He practiced everyday. He got a try out at tryouts. He did his best. Sam made the team!

Stuffed. Tim was riding his bike. He was very excited to ride through the park. But then he realized he was on his bike all by himself. He had to push his bike up to the top of a hill. And then he was in trouble.
Crunches. Tom's coworker asked to have a cronut. Tom's coworker did not have a spare. Tom was out of cereal. He gave the coworker his spare. The coworker thanked Tom profusely.

Too Afraid For A Second Date. Ken got on a bus and went to a cafe. A cute girl sat next to him. She looked interested in Ken and he decided to ask her out. She politely turned him down. Ken vowed never to ask a girl out again.

Salt in the pepper shaker. I went to the kitchen to make myself some salt shakers. I used a salt shaker because it was inexpensive and easy. When I tried putting the shakers in the oven, I realized the lid was not on. I put the lid back on and closed the door. I made sure I didn't open it again.
Broken Dishwasher. Tom had a dishwasher. One day the dishwasher broke. Tom bought a new one online. He had to take it back to the store. The store exchanged his broken dishwasher for a new one.

Firing employees. I was having a meeting with some employees in my department. As soon as the meeting started, one person got up. He told us that the boss fired him. After that, everyone got up and left. I learned that it was the best meeting I've had in a long time.

Pageant. Holly went to her first pageant last Saturday. She was nervous about the event. She entered the pageant wearing a ballgown. Afterwards she was told to dress up in a gown. The judges gave her first place and her family won a prize.

A Good Bartender. Timmy's favorite restaurant had been put out of business. He was sad he didn't have any more of the drinks he so enjoyed. His friends told him about this place and invited him to come in. They gave him a ride into town to get a drink there. Timmy was very thankful for his friends.

Bill Goes Skydiving. Bill wants to take a different way to stay out of the cold. He decides to go skydiving. While he is in the sky he trips over a bump in the ground. He falls down and is hurt. Bill decides skydiving wasn't the right way for him.

Bob's Big Break. Bob was a great basketball player. He decided to try out for a professional basketball team. Bob had been training and worked hard all year long. He finally got to the try outs and got his shot in the mail. Bob ended up making the team.

Real Mom. Annie had a sister who wasn't getting along with her parents. She asked her father to stop picking on her. Her father told her to call her mom and tell her she was sorry. She called her mom and told her her she felt bad for her. Her mom came to visit her and told her she was in love with her, and they were family.

New shoes. Yesterday I needed new shoes. I went to the store to buy some. When I got to the store I could not find my shoes. I could not believe I could not find my shoes. I had to leave without my new shoes.

The Storm. We had to leave the car for a brief while for the hurricane. Our car had a flat tire and needed oil. After a few hours the tire had to be replaced. We had to stay home for days. When we got home, the tire was still flat.

Greg Raposo. Greg Raposo got his first job at his cousin's grocery store. The job involved loading and unloading pallets of items. When the pallets were loaded, he would grab the pallets quickly. Greg also worked on changing pallets in the warehouse. In the end Greg was called into his cousin's boss's office.

Ugly Art. Tim was at a flea market. He wanted to get a cheap piece of art to hang on his wall. He saw a cute frog and picked it up. It looked really funny and Tim really liked it. He was happy about his decision.

Price Matching. Josie and Bob went to the supermarket to buy the same food. When they got to the checkout line, Josie's favorite brand was priced differently. Josie couldn't help but pick up the cheaper item, and asked her husband for the difference. The man didn't have that much, but he insisted it was okay. It didn't matter, because Josie still had to pay for it, even if

Decision. Ida didn't like being single. But she wanted kids someday. She decided she was ready to have a baby. When she became pregnant, she was very nervous. She was glad when she found out it was a girl!
Falling at the rink. Alicia went skating with her friends. She had a great time. Yet Alicia ended up falling. She went to the emergency room. Alicia got a concussion.

Beanie Babies. The girl was too hot for a beanie. She bought a new pair of beige shorts. She tried wearing them to work the next day. Her coworkers complimented her on her new look. The next day she wore them again.
Beer. Tom wanted to drink beer. Tom was sick of beer. He decided to try wine. Tom loved wine. Tom eventually liked beer again.

Food Poisoning. Tim was eating his lunch. Suddenly he started to feel sick. He didn't know what to eat or what to do. Tim tried eating a handful of vegetables but didn't like it. Tim wound up getting sick.
Robot. Joe loved robot toys. One day he heard the school was holding a contest. Joe decided to enter the contest. He made a robot out of old cereal boxes. Joe won the contest!

Questioning. I walked across the room to get my homework assignment. Someone walked in and asked me what my problem was. I told her that the teacher is busy and that I can help. She said ok and walked away. I walked to class confused.

Left Out. Bob had to be at work early. He decided to walk to work instead of drive. As he was going to work, he got stopped by a cop. The cop asked why he was walking to work. Bob said he was leaving early so he could see his lawyer.

Boring Movie. Bill and Tim were watching a movie together. They were having a really good time. Tim kept interrupting Bill and Bill became annoyed. Bill eventually yelled at Tim and made him leave the movie. They were both embarrassed and went to the store.

The Angry Model. Kate was a fashion designer. She needed some clients to show off her new collection. She decided to give some free samples to her friends. None of the customers seemed to like her new designs. The business was a failure.
Bill's Wife. Bill had been divorced for 10 years. He got into an argument with his wife. Bill called her and apologized. The next day, he met his wife for coffee. Bill's wife made him dinner.

How regretful. John broke up with his girlfriend. She got back together with someone else. His ex-girlfriend never met the new person. John was angry. So he decided to stay with her as long as he could.

Dog House. I had always wanted to own a dog. My sister told me I should buy a dog house. I started going to the dog house with my sister every weekend. We bought a small brown dog house. We named him Rocky and he was a good companion.

Bat. I once had a pet cat named Fred. My friend was out with Fred. I heard a huge noise and looked down. Fred was lying on the floor with his head down. I quickly scooped him up and rushed him to the hospital.

Backpacking Trip. The man was out hiking in the woods. The hiking became too strenuous and the man got dehydrated. The man stopped at a local gas station for a rest. He continued his hike to the end of the trail. The man was glad he had stopped to get a drink.

Random. Sam didn't know what to wear to work. She looked online for a few ideas. Then she started brainstorming. She realized she could make some new outfits. She went to work with confidence and style!

Severe Reaction. Nelly was playing soccer. And he was hit in the head with a stick. A few seconds later, he started to bleed. And his dad had to carry him to the hospital. The doctor said that he had a mild concussion.

Solar Panels. A large tree grew in the middle of a field. The tree had branches that could reach into the solar panels. The homeowner was excited to put solar panels on the roof. He bought all the materials. He installed all the solar panels the next day.

Wet Floor. Gina's parents were out for the weekend. She wanted to spend it with her friends. But it was raining. Gina didn't want to wait to go home and dry off. She decided to spend the whole day inside.
The purse. Tommy went shopping. He left his credit card at home. His credit card was declined. He had to call the bank to tell them he lost his credit card. They gave him his new credit card back.

Soul Mates. Kate's boyfriend and his friends were fighting. Kate wanted them to leave her alone. She said if she got mad she would leave him. He ignored her and continued to fight. Kate was upset they had to separate.

The Fit. John was at the movies with his girlfriend. They had just bought tickets for a midnight showing. While sitting in the theater they had an argument about the seats. Their argument had them screaming and crying. The manager had to intervene and they were able to sit in the right spot.

I Walked Home. As I sat in my car on the way home from work, I noticed an ambulance. I saw the paramedics and paramedics rush toward the door. The paramedics brought me to the ambulance. Afterwards, they gave me a ride back home. I felt relieved because I didn't have to take the bus back home.

Museum. Giselle loved going to museums. She went to the state library and looked around. She looked in the art gallery and the history museum. Finally she found the perfect museum for her trip. Giselle went home with many great pictures and stories.

Pickpocket. Macy was a pickpocket. She would steal wallets and change from people. One day she stole a wallet from a poor man. She used the wallet to purchase a ring. She then kept the ring and it has never been used.
Hearing. The lady felt something behind her. She heard a snapping sound. It was her earring. She looked away and threw the earring away. The lady felt embarrassed in front of all her friends.

Professional Photographer. Karen had always wanted to be a professional photographer. She took classes at school and took photos in her free time. After a couple years of hard work she had a portfolio of photos. She applied to several companies and began to work at a studio. Within two months she had her first client!
Try. Bobby decided to try a new product. He bought some powder and stirred it in a cup. He poured it into a cup and then put it under his tongue. He tasted the cup. The powder was delicious.

Baseball. John was playing baseball in his yard with his friends. He hit the ball over the fence. John's neighbors saw John do it and yelled at him. John didn't think twice about it and continued to hit the ball. John hit the ball into the neighbor's neighbor's window and was sent to jail.
Spicy Food. Kasey was really hungry. She couldn't decide what to eat. She decided to make some spicy food. She put a bit on her food. It was too spicy and she had to throw it out.
Trash. Kate was in a hurry. She walked into the dumpster. But someone snatched the trash. Kate saw it was the same person. She had to walk home to throw it away.

music with sticks. Jim was playing a game of marbles with his sticks. He had gotten very tired of playing so long. He decided to play with only his eyes. When he looked up at the audience he thought they were staring at him. Jim decided to get up and walk away.
Bad tattoo. Kelly got a new tattoo. She thought it would last a while. To her dismay it was ripping. She had to have it pulled. Kelly was furious.

Cheerleading Squad. Janelle was a cheerleader in high school. One day, the squad was practicing for an important game. Janelle was feeling a little anxious, so she decided to skip practice. As she ran out the door, the coach caught her. He pulled her aside and made her sit in the office.

School Winter. It was a cold day outside. The snow made it hard to go outside. Anna had to stay inside during the whole winter. She had to shovel the roads. She missed her friends when she was sick during the winter.

The Belt. I am not a fan of the red belt. However, my coworker's sister had red belts. I thought she must like the look. As soon as I saw her today, she was in tears. I laughed, and she hugged me tightly.

Waitress. Cathy was a waitress. She was on her second day at her new job. The customers were demanding a refund on their drinks. Cathy felt like she could not be a waitress anymore. She decided to quit her job and go back to school.
Messy Hair. Tom was at a party. He decided to take a nap on a couch. Tom woke up with an awful mess in his hair. Tom decided to wash his hair. After that Tom's hair looked a lot better.
Scared. Sally was a toddler. She was playing with her stuffed bear. Suddenly, the bear fell and broke. Sally was scared and started crying. Her mother gave her a new bear.

Easter Egg Hunt. Bob and his friends were going to a local park. They decided to get together at the end of the day to find eggs. At the park, Bob's friend asked him to help look for an egg. Bob was too far away from the other kids to find an egg, but he found one. After getting an egg, his friend brought him some peanuts.

College. Anna wanted to go to college. She had applied to many different schools. Then she thought she saw a good fit for a new school. She applied and waited. On Monday, she was offered admission to her dream school.

Live in Person. I once had the idea to build a farm out of cardboard boxes. The boxes were stacked in rows. The boxes were stacked in rows and stacked in rows. Then, it was just like magic, just like that. Now, I use boxes to live in.
Thud. I used to be the best skateboarder in my town. One day I got a skateboard for my birthday. However I got in an accident. I broke my arm. I cannot skate or bike anymore.

Logan's Mistake. Logan was going to buy some snacks. He went to the store but didn't have enough money. He decided to steal the money from the register. When Logan went to get his groceries he didn't have his money. He was caught and his mom had to punish him for a week.

Lost Keys. I was going to my car and forgot to lock the door. When I arrived at my car I realized I lost my keys. I called a friend to come get me. When he got there he found his keys. My friend drove me home.

Cell Phone. John got a cell phone for his sixth birthday. He loved it very much. John was always talking and texting his friends. One day John lost the phone and had to go buy another. John was very sad and did not speak to his friends.
The Baby's Toy. Tara had a very precious toy. She was taking it to school one day. Suddenly, a baby started crying. The baby's toy fell from its stand. Tara quickly went to find the baby.

Safe. We got our car today, and checked the hood. We saw the light come on on our side. I opened the door and stepped out, still in my pajamas. My foot sank into the gas pedal and I heard a loud noise. I was scared until I realized my toe had hit the floor mat.

Pee Break. My boss let me go to the break room to take a break. I grabbed a soda and water from the dispenser. I drank and drank until my eyes watered and I fell asleep. I was too tired to go back to my job. I drank a cup of coffee and went back to work.
Potato. She took a potato to the kitchen. She was trying to peel the potato. She peeled the potato. She decided to take a nap on the potato. She was too tired to peel it.
Drag Racing. Dan loved cars. His favorite car was his '66 Mercury Montego. In college, he became interested in car racing. In high school, he entered a local car derby. Dan's car won the race!
Freeway Speed. Tom was driving home from work. A freeway was going much faster than normal. Tom decided to change lanes. When he was about to change he lost control. Tom ran into oncoming traffic.

Baby's First Tooth. Sally wanted to start to brush her baby's teeth. Her daughter asked to try a different brushing method. Sally bought a toothbrush and changed the baby's tooth. The next week the toothbrush was in the refrigerator. Sally's daughter started brushing her baby's teeth.

Wrong Flavor. Dan was trying to cook pasta for his mom. He had put it in the wrong way and it tasted weird. He tried a new method and it worked. He decided to try the old way again and it was right. He threw out all of the old noodles and decided to cook pasta for herself.

Grown Apart. In the seventies my friend Tom moved to the suburbs. He went to visit a friend in Boston. Tom asked me for directions. My friend's brother said to turn right on Brattleton Street. Tom turned right on Brattleton, but his brother lost the car keys.
Shoe Lifter. Tom was at the mall with friends. His friend dared him to steal a pair of shoes. Tom agreed. He slipped them on and ran away with them. Tom was ashamed and ran home.
Kicked out. Tom got into a fight with his friends at the park. The police came to talk to them. They knew Tom was going home. They told him to go home. Tom left and went home instead.
The backup singer. Sally was a backup singer for her high school band. The band was playing the first day of school. Sally got to perform her song. It was terrible. Sally quit the band after that.

Dumping for someone else. Allie had a crush on this guy Jamie. She decided to ditch him for him. She did so when Jamie found out about it. Jamie was mad. Allie was now the only one who could talk to Jamie.

Meet The Manager. A woman's job requires her to attend daily meetings with a manager. Every week she attends the meetings, but she hates them. She goes home, cries, and thinks of quitting her job. After months of being at home, she decides she needs to meet her manager. When the manager meets her, she is so nice, she likes him!
Business. Mark's company was hiring. Mark got a call from the company. Mark flew to New York. He was called in for a interview. Mark got the job.
Ice Skating. Sally liked to ice skate. She loved her new skateboard. One day Sally fell and broke her arm. She cried for weeks. Sally's mom promised to give her a new skateboard.

Zombies. There was a zombie show at the theatre. I was bored so I sat down. After the show I looked around for something to do. There was a lot of people watching so I left. I decided to go home and sleep.

Doing the Dishes. Jane was getting ready for bed one night. She ran a hand through the dirty dishes. She had to get all the dishes out of the washer. As she was running through them, she slipped and fell. The next day Jane had to clean all of the dishes.
Tea. Jenna was visiting her grandmother in India. Her grandmother invited her to tea. Jenna picked out some green tea. Her grandmother drank the tea. Jenna felt better after drinking the tea.

Claire and John. Claire and John were best friends. One day John was diagnosed with cancer. Claire and John felt very sad over losing John. They decided to have a small party to celebrate their good friend. John and Claire will be having another small party soon.

Reading the diary. I went to my mom's house for the first time today. I took out the diary I had with me. I opened it to read her diary. I read it for about 30 minutes. I closed the diary and put it away.
Peppers. The woman peeled the peppers. She put them in the pot. She heated the pot up. She smelled the burning. The woman threw out the burnt peppers.
Injured Arm. Ike was playing baseball with his friends. He threw the ball too hard, it hit his elbow. It went right into his hand. Ike was worried about his hand. Luckily, it was just a bruise.
Charm bracelet. Kaya went to the jewelry store. She found a bracelet with lots of crystals. She had never seen a bracelet like that before. It was really pretty. Kaya was so happy she bought it.

Makeup Artist. Gina was shopping for makeup at the drugstore. The woman at the counter was attractive and very funny. Gina wanted to impress her with a nice gift. She bought her a red lip liner for her lipstick collection. Her mother was proud of Gina for not wasting money.
Pigs. I used to have a pet pig. One day I decided to give him away. I drove to the humane society. I found a good home for the pig. I felt good that I had given my pig a good life.

Cornelia Finishes a Book Report. Cornelia has been writing books for three months. She has an unfinished manuscript due in three days. She finishes the book report for class the night before. She gives the report to her professor, who is impressed. Cornelia's book has a good review in the school library.

Pencils. Maggie loved to draw. She was especially good at drawing inked art. Her friends all liked the style she drew and wanted to show it off. They gathered their supplies for a trip to the art store. They each found something they thought was pretty cool and bought some.

Bob Nearly Gets a Ticket. Bob was driving home from work one day. He was pulled over by a police officer. The police officer warned Bob that he may be pulled over again. Bob ignored him and continued driving. Bob almost got pulled over by the police again for speeding.
Bad smell. Alicia walked into a restaurant. She ordered a few meals. Then she smelled something terrible. Alicia was horrified. She had to throw the food away.
World Series earthquake. Tom was at the baseball game. There was an earthquake at the stadium. Tom was at the very front. He was crushed by the earthquake. He had to go to the hospital.

Pitbull Party. Jenny was throwing a pitbull party for her kids. She got them all together to feed the dogs. Soon enough, the pit bulls were ready to be picked up. The kids all ate from their hands and jumped around. By the end of the night, all of them were too tired to go home.

The Research Project. Gage had a research project to complete. He decided to make a poster to put on his desk. Gage worked very hard on his research poster. He went to school to do his research. When he returned to his classroom, his poster was torn to pieces.
Emu and Ostriches. Emu and Ostriches are both big dogs. One day we saw one in the city park. He was a friendly looking breed. He was also very big. We brought him home with us.
Writer's Block. Tom loved to write. He wanted to write a book. Tom decided to write a novel. He wrote about his life. Tom became very popular with his novel.

Viral. I decided to make a new website. I made a website that featured funny images. People were shocked when they found it online. I sold about a thousand hits! After that, I got paid and could quit my job.

The New Home. My mom decided to start working on a new house. She started in her garage and worked her way to the front door. She cleaned, painted, and shined her new home to the world. Her friends and family came for a visit. It was the most beautiful house they had ever seen!

Rufus Visits Florida. Rufus has always wanted to visit Florida. His friends and family agree that he should take a trip. After researching Florida, Rufus decides to visit. He takes a boat ride out to sea. Rufus is happy to have finally visited Florida.

Monopoly. Benny and his friends would always play Monopoly. He thought it would be fun. Everyone he knew was rich except him. Finally, he put all of his money into the game. He won the game and had a great time.

Volleyball. Amy was a star volleyball player. She was the best in her school. Amy was offered a spot on the national team. Amy accepted the team offer. She was excited about her chances in the Olympics.

Astronaut. Benjamin dreamed of becoming an astronaut. He worked very hard in school. He got a great scholarship to college. He went to space camp to learn about the experience. He learned a lot that way.

attention. There was a man named Mark who was always attention seeking. He was always late, and never punctual. One day a friend made a note about this man in a journal. Mark got angry and threatened the friend. The friend backed down and Mark felt better.

Picking berries. I went to the farm with my grandparents yesterday. My grandparents had picked blueberries for us. I didn't get to pick berries, but my grandpa did. He was going to make homemade jam for us to drink. He even made my favorite drink for me today.
Car Key. The man put the car key in the ignition. The car went to start. The key did not work. He took the car to the mechanic. The mechanic gave the man the car key.
Shopping at Target. The other day I went shopping at Target. I needed to buy new clothes. I had a hard time choosing what to buy. Eventually I picked up several shirts. I bought a black t-shirt.
Dan can't fly. Dan was about to fly a kite. Dan's kite didn't have a flotation device. Dan went up on the kite. He got a shock from the kite. Dan fell off the kite.

The Pacific North. The coast of Hawaii was called the Pacific North. The people lived there were mostly of Japanese descent. They would work in the fields and fishing for fish. The people were not very wealthy. However, they did a lot of fishing to help them feed their families.
Reading. The children were bored. They sat in front of the big fire. They were going to read one another a story. One child got bored first. They all read together.
Late to Class. Today I had a test. I had forgotten to bring my laptop. I ran into a friend. They gave me their laptops. I took them to class.

Discontinued. I purchased a video game on Amazon. I waited a day for my package to arrive. I waited another day for the package to be returned. I called the store to complain. The manager said they were no longer selling the game.

The Move to Tulsa. Charles' family lived in Kansas. One day he and his dad decided they wanted to move. Charles was sad, but he understood. His father had been laid off at his old job. Charles moved with his parents and was happy there.

Geese. Lily lived near a pond. One day a flock of geese came to her pond. She let them eat all her vegetables. Soon the geese were eating all the vegetables at her home. Lily was relieved to be rid of the trouble.
Old Water Bottle. Sam was drinking from a water bottle. It kept going up the drain. Sam got annoyed and threw it out. The water bottle was too small. Sam bought a new one from the store instead.

Sports Day. Amy was playing volleyball with her friends. She had scored all of her own points. When it was her turn, she hit a buzzer beater. She had scored five points! Amy felt very proud and popular.

Chase. Benny ran to the house to see if he could get a cookie. There was a box in the kitchen. Inside was a huge cookie with dozens of candy bars. Benny opened the box. He had so much candy he couldn't eat it all.

Not Enough Ingredients. Kendall made a strawberry milkshake for her boyfriend. He asked for it with ice cream instead of strawberries. She didn't have enough ingredients in the cupboard. She had to drive to the store to get more. It didn't taste as good as she expected it to.

The Bum. There was a young bum on the corner. He had no friends, so he sat alone and waited for someone to give him a ride. A couple of kids approached him and offered to help him. The kids took him around town and got him home. The bum was grateful and invited them to live with him.

Durpston. I had the nerve to talk to a man. I was very shy but decided to do it anyway. I sat in the office next to the office mate who is Chinese. We exchanged pleasantries. He introduced me to his wife and I smiled to myself.
Wango. I am a huge fan of wango music. In 2006 I went to a concert in Tokyo, Japan. I was so moved by the performance. I learned a lot. Now I am studying the wango music of Japan.

Resourceful. Dwayne was a well-liked person. People looked up to him for assistance wherever they needed it. He wanted to help the less fortunate, so he donated money. He felt good about his actions. He helped the less fortunate, and felt better about himself.

Train Ride. The train was headed to the destination. A man sat next to me and asked if I was ready to go. I took out a small book and handed it to him. The man smiled and took it. We went to the destination together.

The Barista. Jenna was getting ready to work. She was at the coffee shop for her first day. The barista told her how much coffee she needed. She walked in and got a nice cup of coffee. The barista gave her her order and Jenna started working.

Driving to Work. Jake needed to get to work. He called his company and asked if he could come in later. His boss had to decide if he would need to work late. Jake got to work an hour late. Jake still got his job.

Valedictorian. Gabe was valedictorian of his class. He had never been in a room full of peers before. He was nervous about being a nobody. At the end of the day, everyone made a speech and Gabe made a speech. He felt like he made a great speech.

First Day of School. Today was the first day of school. I was excited for the day and all my friends were there. We all met outside of school and we were ready for the day. We went inside and everyone went to their desk. We played with their toys and ate lunch together.
Save Often. I was reading a book on my phone. After a while, I stopped my reading. I decided to look at the phone screen. I saw a message from my friends. I decided to talk to them.

Football Star. Sam has always loved the game of football since he was little. He plays his favorite sport of football as a youth. He was recruited to play football in college. Sam works hard at his craft every day. He wishes to make the college football team.

Lecture. A young girl stood in line outside a movie theatre. It was a very crowded theatre. A man in a mask stood next to her. She didn't look at him. She felt scared that the man was actually a terrorist.

Arcades. My friends and I decided to play arcades. We got on a few different games and started to play. My friend wanted to play the ferris wheel. My friends wanted to play a shooter. We had a lot of fun playing our games.

Going to the Movies. I went to the movies yesterday. I got popcorn from the snack machine. I bought a ticket to see the new movie. The popcorn came out hot and tasted awful. I was so disappointed I did not enjoy my time at the movies.

Car Sick. Ava was driving home when her car started to feel weird. Ava was worried because she had never experienced car sickness before. She checked the dashboard and realized she was very sick. She got on her car and took it to the nearest hospital. Ava ended up recovering and had to stay home for a week.

"School". Alfred was nervous about starting school. He didn't want to make any new friends. His teacher asked what he liked to do. Alfred said that he liked reading. Alfred made lots of new friends at school!
The Therapist. Cindy was feeling stressed. She went to the therapist for help. The therapist said she had anxiety. She was diagnosed with OCD. Cindy decided to quit therapy.
The pony. I heard a meow. I looked down and there was a little pony. He was scared to go outside. I went in and saw him jump in my lap. He was so cute.

Police. Cay had to report to the police station. He was nervous, but had to do it. He drove up to the station. They asked him his name and he was calm. He was relieved when they told him his name was Greg.
Honey Pot. Bob bought a new house. It was not his favorite house. He decided to buy a home improvement store. He bought a new hutch for his home. He was happy about the investment.

Lost Friend. Tim had a friend who he was sad to lose. Tim went to see a movie with his friend's mom. His friend came along with him and everyone was talking. Tim realized that his friend never came with him to see the movie. Tim's friend never came to see him again.

Random. A girl wanted to be in a competition. She made a song about randomness. The competition was held in a diner. The girl performed on stage with no real purpose. Her song was so bad that no one listened to her.

project. A little boy came to the store to purchase some toys. He had two carts and one car. When he got home, he realized he forgot his car keys. He panicked, but then realized he left them in his car! It was now night and the boy was asleep and didn't have to go to the store.
Test. John's science teacher assigned all students a test. John had not studied for the test. John felt unprepared for the test. John failed the test. John was embarrassed about his poor grade.
Beer. John was drinking a beer. He noticed it was cloudy. He wasn't sure what the problem was. He checked the cap to find out what was the problem. John had a cap error and had to throw it away.

Meter Monitor Or Thief. I took my meter reading to the bank. I had my car parked at a nearby bank. A meter reader parked at the bank. The meter reader walked out of his office with my money. I found out that the meter reader stole my money.

The Long Flight. Jake had to get back to work. He was already working when it hit 75 degrees. He took his first drink of water and got into position. He looked at his phone and saw there were several missed calls. Finally, Jake could breathe and continued working.

Birthday Beach Trip. I took my son to the beach on his birthday. I let him pick out his beach towel. He put on the towel, and laid in the sun all day. I then brought my son home, and he had a great day. We had a great vacation.

Benjamin Played Video Games. Benjamin never played video games before. He decided he wanted to learn. Benjamin enrolled in a community college course on video games. At the course, Benjamin learned a lot about playing games. Now Benjamin plays video games and loves it.

Disappointment. I had to find a new job. I decided to apply for the sales force at a local business. After two weeks I got an email with an offer. I took the job immediately. I was so happy when I started my first day.

New Show. Sara was on the news waiting for a big breaking news story. Suddenly she got a text from her friend. Her friend told her she found an old clip of a news segment. The clip was airing last night, but the segment was new. Sara was so excited that she immediately began watching the news.
The Car Wash. Dane was having some problems with his car. He decided to get a car wash. He spent lots of time trying to wash it. Unfortunately it took a long time. Dane was very frustrated.
New Bag. Jenna needed a new bag. She went to the craft store. She purchased a large bag. When she went to put it on, it fell apart. Jenna had to return it.
Girls. The kids were in the car. The mother got out of the car. They were talking about what the weather was like. She decided to change the topic. They got back into the car.
Tree. Barry needed a new tree. So he went to a tree farm. He picked the biggest tree they had. Barry took it home and put it on his porch. Barry loved his new tree!

The Wait Game. John was waiting at the bus stop with his mom. The bus was coming quickly. Just as it approached the stop, another bus arrived. John's mom waved goodbye to him. Just as he did, he noticed that the bus had left.

School dance. Kelly decided to go the school dance with Beth. Beth wasn't into Kelly at all. However Kelly showed her how to dance. Kelly and Beth danced all night. The school dance ended up being an amazing time.
Getting a Raise. James was nervous about his next pay raise. He decided to ask his boss for one. His boss told him no. James decided to keep working hard. James was promoted to manager!

Giving Up. Lucy and her grandmother didn't like each other. Grandma said she'd be back at 6 PM. Lucy decided it was better to give up than to get upset. Lucy decided to go to sleep instead of staying up. Lucy fell asleep when her grandmother didn't show up.

Thunderstorm. I was watching the news at my work one day. All of a sudden there was a flash of lightning. It was a really scary lightning storm. I decided not to watch the news at work anymore. I had to take a day off.

Ball Game. Today was the game against the Marlins. I drove my dad to the ballpark. He was so excited and was ready to go. He got into the stadium and looked at the players. It was a good game but we lost.

Enchanted Village. Lilly was very excited for Christmas. She decided she wanted to visit the enchanted village. She arrived early to see it in action. She played on the water and the trees. She enjoyed herself as she entered the village.

Popout. Kia was cooking for her family in the kitchen. She had been using a long pan, so she tried to spread butter. It splattered everywhere. Kia was horrified that her family would be upset. Luckily they just laughed and laughed at Kia's silly pan-out.

Quex Quacker. Quacker was a black cat. Quacker did not like to hide from her owners. One day her owner came home from work. She saw that Quacker was waiting in the kitchen. She made Quacker come outside to be safe.

Paid to stand in line. Cathy was in line at an ice cream shop. The line moved very slowly. Finally, Cathy was in line. She paid a large amount of money. Finally, Cathy was able to order her ice cream.

barn raising. I went on a trip to raise money for my church. I was given a lot of jobs and work for a few months. I spent all of my money on food. The food was very unhealthy for a church. I ran out of money and went home.
Dog. My neighbor's dog got out of his yard. He went up and down the street. He was not wearing a collar. He was scared to walk in the house. I took him home and he sleeps there now.

Art Obtains Understanding. Art had been reading a lot about ancient Greece. He found it to be very dull. Art started taking a more holistic view of his history. He decided that his country was not perfect. Art was glad he could see more of his country in the world.
Crazy. The guy took off his shirt. He looked in the mirror. His legs were hairy. He asked the waitress what the problem was. She said he was a crazy person.

Room for Happiness. Ben was very unhappy. He was always busy and never had the chance to relax. He searched online for a job that involved more time in his room. He decided to apply for a job at the local factory. Ben was very happy when he received a call of an interview at the factory.
Long Time. The man walked into the bathroom. It was extremely long. He waited in line for over an hour. The cashier told him the bathroom was already full. The man had to leave in disgust.

The Eggs. Gina and her siblings were hunting for hidden eggs in the dirt. But there was no one hiding eggs in the yard. They were all too excited to hide them. Finally her sister came over to help her find some. The siblings were able to hide three eggs in the dirt!

Cooking. Beth was trying to teach her toddler to cook. She would let the toddler try a few different foods. One day, the toddler decided on a salad and it was good. Later that day, the toddler got sick. He had to go to the hospital for a full stomach.
Need feet to run. Sam went running for the first time. He was having a lot of fun. Until his feet got caught up in the treadmill. He tried to push but it made him trip. He ended up falling off.

Jackson. Jackson was playing football with his friends. They were all running the same plays. One of Jackson's friends threw the ball into his chest. Jackson felt sick and had to be rushed to the hospital. Jackson recovered, and his friends never made fun of him again.

Snowball Fight. I was outside playing football with friends. We were sledding down a hill and the ground was covered in snow. Our ball came loose and rolled down the hill. The snowball fight began. We were all covered in snow.
Sugar. Tim wanted to help people. He tried to be kind to them. He thought they were nice but they were greedy. Tim tried to do good with them. Unfortunately he was caught and then put away.

Dishonest Andrea. Andrea had always wanted to be a waitress. She started out as a waitress in a small restaurant. At a dinner party, she served dinner to a very poor woman. Andrea's boss told her that she wasn't good enough for the job. Andrea decided that she was not good enough for the job.

Too Big To Flush. Tom bought a house that was supposed to be a condo. He had problems with water in his basement. Tom wanted to sell the house before it flooded. He thought a lot of different things but couldn't find a solution. Tom finally decided to just put a cistern in and be done with it.

Sunday Morning. Amy awoke to find her mother asleep in bed. She asked her to come downstairs to the living room. The woman in bed was her cousin Lynn. She hugged her until her mom woke up and left the room. Amy pretended to be asleep as she watched TV and cleaned the house.

Bitcoin. Jules wanted to sell a piece of art. She was at the art store looking at art. Jules saw a piece of art that looked like a digital currency. Jules bought the piece of art. Jules hung the piece of art in her house.

Driving. The other day I was on my way to work. I was trying to get home but kept getting distracted. I started to drift into another lane. A car came out from behind me and hit me head on. I ended up needing to be hospitalized for my injuries.
Making a Video Game. Chris was bored one evening. He decided to make a video game. He made the game he wanted to play. After a few hours, he had the game done. The game worked and he was happy.

Rhonda Visits a Museum. Rhonda has always loved learning about history. Her favorite museum in town is the History Museum. Finally Rhonda decides she would like to visit the museum. Rhonda is very excited when she finally sees the exhibits. She is glad that she has finally visited the History Museum.

Wine Lover. Tom had never really had a girlfriend. He didn't know how to approach her. One day he bought an old bottle of wine and put it on his desk. He met her at lunch and asked her to take a drink. She said yes and they have been dating ever since.
Cattle. We went to the local farm for dinner. They had a cow that was very large. It was black and beautiful. After dinner, we drove home. I took a photo to send to my boyfriend.

Final Exam. Ivy had studied for weeks. She was about to take her final exam. When she got to class, her teacher announced it was postponed. She asked her why. Ivy said it was a snow day and she had to study later.

The late gift. I received a gift box from a coworker today. When I opened it, it was a present certificate. I immediately wrote a thank you note. My coworker told me that it was a Christmas present. She gave it to me and said that she liked it.
The Swimming Competition. Lisa loved to swim. She signed up for her school's swim team. The first day of practice went well. They practiced for a competition. Lisa won first place in the competition.

Patience. Jane was walking with her children. They were not paying attention and lost their bearings. They got stuck in a tree. They were afraid to get out of the tree. Their mother came to save them.

Family Ski Trip. Jenny wanted to do something special for her family. She decided to take her kids skiing on a snowy day. The children got very sick. They decided to quit the ski trip. The family didn't have much fun.

Tornado in the Mind. Jim was a farmer on the other side of the state. One winter a tornado had come through. Jim was at work when it began to rain. Jim's whole farm was destroyed. Jim went back to check on his crops.

Bad Christmas. On Christmas day, Jeff's parents opened the presents. They only had a couple of gifts to open. Jeff thought they were going to buy him a video game. However, when he opened the last present his parents got him a book. Jeff is going to be more cautious this year.
Sweater. Tom was cold. He decided to knit a sweater. He gathered the wool, needles and yarn. Then he sewed his sweater. It was a cozy sweater!
Fishing Trip. A friend of ours went fishing this weekend. We went to the lake, and had a nice time. We caught three catfish, and two smallmouth bass. I was very surprised. I did not catch any fish.

Spanish Test. Lola had a Spanish test in English the next day. She didn't have enough time to study. She decided to pull an allnighter. On the day of the test, she was tired and slept throughout. Luckily, she was able to pass with a perfect score.
Wire Hangers. We had to buy new wire hangers. We needed a lot of them. We ended up using a lot. We ended up using way too much. We ordered a lot more and we got rid of the excess.

World view. Ella wanted to visit the world. She had no money and wanted to learn about all cultures. So she joined the school travel office. The office told her she could book a plane ticket and visit the world. Ella took the trip to the Amazon rainforest.

Rainy Day. Carson woke up late one morning. Carson got dressed and went outside to play in the rain. Carson fell down a few steps in the rain. Carson got up again in the rain to go back inside. Carson went back to bed because it was too dark for his eyes.

Glenda. Gina wanted to go to a library. She asked her friend and she took her there. It was full of her friends but no one to see her. She found out that she had to leave the library to go home. Gina knew the library was a place for her friends only.

Family. John loved his family. He felt they gave him everything he wanted. Unfortunately he got divorced from them. John wasn't able to be as close with them as he wanted to. He eventually left for another state.

Flat Tire. Tim was driving to work. He noticed he was really low on air. He pulled over to the side of the road and took a pump out. It helped quite a bit. Tim was able to put his tire on right before going to work.

Riding Lawn Mower. Dan had a big yard full of old flowers. Dan decided he needed to pick some for the garden. Dan went to the local flower shop to purchase the roses. Dan picked out 5 different roses for his garden. Dan now has the biggest garden in his town.

Leaving. John loved his dog and went out every day for him. His wife was always busy and they rarely left together. One day his wife told him he needed to leave town. He told her he'd be back soon but not yet. John's wife was sad, but soon she was happy to be back at work!

Boring Main Event. Tom was a fan of one particular UFC fighter. He would watch him fight everyday. He never expected his fight to be so boring. It wasn't that he liked watching, it's just that it never ended. Tom watched one more fight and then got sick to his stomach.
Chair Claimed. Tom's chair broke. He tried to put it back together. It wouldn't budge. Tom decided to call a repairman. He went with a cheap cheap one.
Running. I had to get a running start. I walked slowly for a mile. By mile five I was faster. I sped up a bit after mile six. I got to my finish line faster and had a great time.
