Fired in One Day. I was working on my laptop. I was waiting for a project for work. I decided to play video games on the laptop. However, I forgot to turn off the laptop. My boss noticed and decided to fire me.

The Spite of Rodents. A girl was running around the neighborhood with a tennis racket. She knocked a nest of ants off a ledge. They began to crawl back up the ledge. She was so scared she screamed and ran home. Later that day a neighbor found her and sprayed her with insecticide.

Softball Tryouts. Cody signed up for softball tryouts. She spent the whole weekend at the batting cages. Cody did well, hitting three home runs. The next week she went to the tryouts. Cody made the team!

New Sister. Sara's mom was taking her to get a haircut. Sara and her sister were both excited. As they were leaving the barber, they heard the doorbell. They went to the door and were greeted by a new sister. They were both excited for this new addition to their family.
Drews big date. Drew is nervous. He has been asked out on a date by a girl. Drew goes on the date. He tells her he has a great time. They get a second date.

First Day. The new janitor was having his first day. He had a long list of chores. The first task was cleaning the classroom. After that, he had to go wash the school bus. He got the hang of it quickly and was excited for the day.
Water Slide. My son and I went to the local water park. We took our bathing suits off. We got on the water slide. He ended up falling and getting hurt. We both had to go home.
The Blender. Sasha was going to make smoothies. She bought a new blender. She set up the blender to blend all the ingredients. Her blender worked great. She blended up a great green smoothie.

Scared. I was really scared of spiders. I wanted to get away from them. So, I decided to face my fears and go for a walk. When I got there, the spiders were nowhere to be seen. I decided that I don't like spiders and went home.

Joy. Joy was scared to be the new girl in school. She was quiet and kept to herself. One day she was approached by a girl named Lily. Lily was very nice and Joy realized she had to open her mind. Joy went out of her shell and became very open and outgoing.

The Compassion Of Crazy. I walked into the room and was mortified when I saw all the money. Everyone looked at me with disgust. The man behind me asked if I'd seen all these millions in cash. I told him I had been reading an article about the IRS. He said I didn't believe the IRS and threw a coin.

Countdown. Liz was waiting patiently for her doctor's appointment. She sat in the waiting room staring at her watch. She was sure that she was going to wait a long time. She made a mental note that if she didn't see her doctor she would be late. She felt much better when her doctor walked in an hour later.
The bird. There was a bird in the attic. I called for it to come down. The bird went upstairs. I put on a blanket and went downstairs. I let the bird go outside and it was fine.

Waterfall. One day Bill took a walk down to the waterfalls. He loved looking at all the different rocks and colorful fish. He also loved the relaxing feeling he got from the waterfall. He made plans to visit every day of the week from then on. Bill now spends more time on the waterfalls and gets more done.
Ride. It was time to go on vacation. I was ready to go on vacation. I called my friend and told him to pick me up. We picked up my friend from the airport. We then drove to the beach.

An accident. Tim was driving to work. His car started to make a noise. The sound was coming from under the seat. Tim got out and saw it was a nail. He was in a lot of pain and decided to call in sick.

Coffee Coffee Coffee. Evan and his friends were bored in school. So they decided to make a pot of coffee. They heated up the coffee maker and added all their ingredients. Then they put it into the coffee pot to heat up. The boys had a good time playing board games in the afternoon.

J'accuse!. Gabby was at a party. A man named James challenged her to a race to the finish line. Gabby knew it was a joke, but couldn't help it. She ran as fast as she could in order to win the race. The man jokingly called her a thief.

Wild Scare. My mom and I went to the lake by our apartment. She warned me to not touch any of the wildlife. I ignored her and started to swing on the waves. The water was so high that it splashed into the living room. It was scary, but not a life-threatening emergency.
Cancun. Today I took a cruise. The ship was beautiful and serene. It was a long trip, but I really enjoyed it. I want to go back soon. I can't wait to go on another cruise!

Laundry. I needed to get the dirty laundry out of the dryer. I put the clothes into a small laundry basket. I put the basket into the washing machine. After a few minutes, I heard an explosion. I had broken my washing machine!

computer class. My friend needed help with his computer. I offered to help him, as long as he bought me a computer. The first two days of the class, I bought the computer. I showed my friend my laptop and showed him how to operate it. He was thankful, and we became friends.

Lasagna. Lucy had never made lasagna before. She loved all the recipes she had heard about. When she went to make her first batch, she was shocked. The lasagna was way too hard. Lucy had to go and buy all the ingredients and it ruined her night.

The New Bike. Brett had just gotten a new bike. He really wanted to use it all the time. He kept forgetting to charge it. Finally he bought a charger and charged it on his way home. After that he never forgot to charge it again.
New PHone. I was using my smartphone. All of the sudden it started to freeze. It wouldn't turn on. I threw the phone. I had to purchase a new phone.

Rock climbing fun. Kelly was very excited about rock climbing. She got up one morning and got ready for adventure. She got in her car and headed to the rock climbing wall. She climbed for hours and hours. When Kelly finally made it up the wall, she felt accomplished.

Angry Mom. Joyce went to pick up her son from school. She asked his mom to feed him dinner since he's hungry. The mother refused since she was lazy. Joyce took her son to the school cafeteria. They argued about the food being thrown at them.
Lunchtime. I got home from school. I didn't know what to eat for lunch. I went to the kitchen. I saw a plate of leftover chicken. I ate it.

The Bears Game. We decided to watch a football game. We bought all the TV's to see what was happening. We sat in the big stadium to watch the game. We watched every minute of the game. It was so exciting and exciting that we couldn't stop talking about it.

The Roadside. Jake was on the road with his Dad. They were trying to pass a gas station for supplies. A lady stopped Jake's Dad to ask for directions. Jake had never seen the road that way before. He followed his Dad's advice and was able to stay on the right track.

Jay's Garage. Jay wanted to have his own garage. He got all his items together and put them in his garage. Jay thought it would be a lot of work but it wasn't. A few weeks later Jay realized his garage was not the right size. He realized it would be much more work to add his items in the future.
Sick Day. It was a really hot day. Allie had a fever and ached badly. She stayed home and tried to stay quiet. She could not sleep and got up at 3 am. She finally went back to bed.

Barking Dog. I was outside my apartment building yesterday. All of a sudden there was a dog barking. I was quite startled. I ran inside my apartment building and scared the dog away. I then called the police and filed a report.

Release the Stress. Rita was having a really hard time at work. She kept getting angry and cranky. She felt that her manager was trying to put her down. She talked to her manager about how much she hated her job. She finally relaxed enough to let her manager have it.
City. Ethan was looking to move to a new city. He was going to look through Craigslist. He found the perfect apartment. He called the landlord. He was able to move in the same day.

Bomb threat. Miles was waiting in line at the coffee shop. The line moved very slowly. Suddenly, the sound of breaking glass was heard. A bomb was placed around the store. Miles hurriedly left the store.

Rocket Surgery. Sara was a very active person who wanted to do something new. She decided to perform a risky surgery to jump start her fitness. She decided she wanted to be able to do this without risk. She decided she would be the first to attempt this. Luckily her health went smoothly and she jumped start her fitness.

Gum Hair. I had never worn a pair of clogs before. I wanted to try them on today. They looked like they would go with any outfit. They were surprisingly comfortable. However, the gums got in my mouth pretty badly.
Plane. She had never been on a plane before. When she got on the plane she was afraid. It was scary. She couldn't believe how fast it went. She was amazed by all of the things that could happen.

Lucretia Prints Her Paper. Lucretia had to print out some papers for her classroom. She had to use her old Xerox machine to print the papers. She realized she was out of ink. She went to her local pharmacy. She purchased a couple of ink cartridges.

The Accident. I went to the dentist for a routine check-up. While I was there, I was startled to see my neighbor standing in the waiting room. I felt weird because she had a funny smile on her face. I thought it was cute that she was standing by me. We exchanged numbers so we could meet up the next day.

Christmas shopping. Rita decided to buy her children a toy car for Christmas. She went to the toy store to look at cars. She found a toy car that her children liked, but it was expensive. Rita decided to buy a toy car for the kids instead. She bought the children a toy car for $15 dollars.

unrealistic. Kasey was at a fantasy convention. She was expecting to meet a fantasy character. When she got to the park she was disappointed. All the characters were incredibly unrealistic. Kasey was so upset about it she walked away.

Clown Lover. When I was a child I was a clown for a party. My parents were very disappointed in me when they found out. They thought I would quit. When I told them that I could not, they still wanted me. I am still a clown to this day and make a lot of money.

Fire. Bob lived in a very hot part of town. His home began to smell funny one day. He noticed the smoke coming from his kitchen. He immediately called the fire department. Bob then called the police and waited in the lobby.
Games. I love to play games. We have board games, card games, and trivia games. We have a trivia competition tonight. I am not really good at this game. My wife says she will make me a game.

Pizza Delivery. Nancy was starving. She decided to order a pizza. But when she got home, she realized that she was out of cheese. So she decided to order pizza without cheese. And when she got home, she felt satisfied.

Disney World. I used to love going to Disney World. I would always go to Magic Kingdom and Epcot. As I got older and realized Magic Kingdom and Epcot were closed. I started saving money for some time so I could go. After saving enough, I can go to Disney World.
The Pets. We went to the park. We went to a petting zoo. Our friends were at the park. There were lots of animals at the park. We had fun at the park.

The suet and the squirrel. Reece was sitting on the grass. Suddenly, she heard a rustling sound. A bird had jumped onto her chair. Reece picked up the bird and let it go. She didn't let it return, so she killed it.

The Football game. I decided I would watch a football game. I put on some headphones and listened to the game on the radio. The game was intense and exciting. I decided I would buy season tickets. I got tickets for the New York Jets and was very happy.
Ears. Bob wanted his ears pierced. His mom took him to the parlor. He had to wait for a while. Finally he was able to get his ears pierced. He cried a little bit afterwards.

Work's a Beach. I decided to go to the beach and take in the sand. After a few hours I got sick and felt very dirty. I was not happy that I wasted so much time at the beach. Later on, I decided to work at the beach from home. It took me a few days to become used to it, but it's fun!

Apartment Repairs. I recently moved to a new apartment. However, I needed to replace a lightbulb. I went online and searched for a repairman. I spoke with a repairman and had an appointment set for the afternoon. I am glad I went to the repairman because he fixed the bulb.

Bad temper. I had a very bad temper. I was in a lot of trouble with my parents. I got in fights with them. I was so angry and violent that I got sent away to boarding school. After a year of boarding school, I learned to be nicer.

Picnic Clean Up. It was a beautiful and serene summer afternoon. The Smith family decided to make a picnic for everyone. They all brought their favorite foods to share. The kids cleaned up the picnic after lunch. They all felt like adults when they left the park.

Morning. I was supposed to wake up for school but it was raining. I had been up all night drinking. I finally decided to put my stuff away and sleep. I woke up just as the sun came up. I tried to run to school without realizing I had my book bag in my hands!

Rally. A crowd of young people started to gather on the street. They began to march towards the rally. People from different walks of life came to their side. They marched until it was time to end the rally. The rally ended peacefully.

New candy shop. Yesterday I went to a new candy shop. The line was so long I couldn't walk. I was just about to give up, but then a new line opened up. By the time I got in the line I was ready. The candy was so good I ended up buying two bags.
Cook Work. Sandy was cooking some pasta. She forgot to buy the noodles from the store. She went to the store and got the noodles. Sandy cooked the pasta. She got her noodles home.
Chess. My friend Jim wanted to play chess. I offered to teach him. He was very interested. Jim played for an hour. He had a great time.
Gamestop. Jenny went to the casino. She decided to go on the slots. Jenny lost a lot of money. Jenny never went back to that casino again. She decided to never gamble again.

Detention. Jill was on the playground. A group of kids approached her. They began to tease her for no reason. Jill immediately got up and ran away. Jill didn't go to the playground until she was more mature.

Frank's Diet. Frank was feeling really hungry one day. Frank decided to make himself a healthy meal. Frank mixed all of the ingredients for a healthy meal together. He put the meal in his blender and started blender. Frank made a delicious healthy meal.

The Dusty Puppy. It was time to take the puppy for a walk. The puppy ran straight to the door. The puppy tried to catch the door. It started to open and closed too quickly. The puppy finally got tired and just laid in the door for a bit.
Mascara. Janet had an eyeliner job. She put on some mascara. It smeared across her whole eye. Her boyfriend laughed. He had to wash it off the next day.

Our Visit. My cousin is from a neighboring town. Last week we visited my cousin in-laws. We had a really nice dinner and a visit to the museum. We went for a long walk in the park. It was a really good time.
Cockroach. I was watching television one day. A cockroach appeared on the screen. I screamed and ran. I ran under the bed and shut the door. The cockroach went back on the screen.

Survival. There once was a boy named Jim. Jim loved to play board games. Jim never played poker. Jim had to go on a scavenger hunt in the woods one night. The boys found lots of board games, but Jim didn't find any.
Bread. Nancy always had a craving for bread. One day, she couldn't find any bread in her house. She found some milk and eggs. Nancy made a fresh loaf. Nancy ate the bread and it was delicious.

Tired in the line. It was Tina's first time to be in the line for a movie. The line was ridiculously long. The theater was out of popcorn and soda. Tina was not happy about that. Finally they gave her an extra snack.

Case. I was on a forum and someone wanted to sell me an Xbox. I had seen it was on sale for $40 so I bought it. I drove to the store to find out the system was out of stock. I saw they had a special on the system, only 100 were left. I took the game back home to redeem it so I could buy a new one.

Cat Fur. Cathy saw a stray cat outside her apartment one night. She was afraid the cat would attack her. Cathy decided to try and pet the cat. The cat bit her hand and scratched her. Cathy was very upset that she scratched herself while petting the cat.
Car Wash. We had to wash our car last Friday. We drove to the auto store. We bought a car wash kit. When we got home we drove the car to a car wash. The car was washed.

The preconceived notion. My best friend was taking a test today. She had been doing so for weeks. When it was time to take the test she didn't study. She felt that she could easily do poorly on the test. I laughed when she didn't do well on the test.

Reenactment. A family went to an Easter egg hunt. They were hoping to find Easter Bunnies. While they were searching, they heard their neighbor scream. He was finding a baby bunny with his foot in its mouth. His dog had swallowed its mother's purse and was missing too!

Brad and the water life. Brad had a water filled pond. Every day he would take his kids swimming in the pond. One day while playing the water filled up and his kids got scared. Brad was afraid that his kids would get sick from the water. Brad eventually decided to just let his kids swim in the lake.
Taxi. Barry was traveling with his friends. Barry needed a taxi to get to his hotel. Barry called a taxi. The taxi arrived to Barry's house. Barry and his friends enjoyed the taxi ride.

Nature. Jim and I went on a nature hike last week. We saw some deer and even a bear, but we didn't disturb them. We spent a lot of time just sitting and observing the scenery. We got so much in our time, we didn't even touch the food! But when we went back home, we were so happy we hadn't disturbed any animals.

Ben's new pet. Ben has wanted a puppy his entire life. Ben visits the pet store to find a puppy he can afford. He finds a small puppy that he immediately falls in love with. Ben takes the puppy home and spends the day playing with it. Ben is so happy he has a puppy.

Larkscall. Tom was playing in the woods. He heard a strange noise. Someone in a loud voice asked him if he had heard their Larkscall. Tom told them about it. They told him they didn't know it but he thought it was funny.

Tennis. Anna was a great tennis player. She had been playing competitively for about three years. Finally, she made it onto a high school team. She was determined to make the team. Unfortunately, she was never able to make it into the team.

Christmas Morning. It was Christmas morning. I woke up to a very loud noise. I turned the lights off to see what was the matter. It turns out that someone left a Christmas tree in the back yard. Now, I am free of the annoying family tradition.

Tabby. Tabby the cat always got stuck in the dog house. His owner was frustrated because he couldn't get him out. Finally he decided to take him to the vet. The vet explained that he needed surgery on his leg. Tabby is now able to go outside.
Forgotten toothbrush. Allie needed to brush her teeth. She got her toothbrush out of the box. Unfortunately it was hard to find. She looked everywhere for it. Finally she found it.

Homemade Cards. Ava was bored and decided to make her own cards. She bought all the supplies she needed and gathered them all over. Then she got to work making them into the shapes she wanted. At first they looked awful but soon they were all shaped like her. When they were all folded and put in her classroom she was happy she'd made them.

On the Subway. Jane was riding the subway home. She was hungry but had no food in her bag. Jane saw a sandwich on the floor and asked for it. The person gave it to her but Jane was too far away to return it. She decided to just eat her sandwich on the way home.
No Kenny. Kenny was a boy scout. He decided to go camping alone. He set out his tent. His dad came by and found out what had happened. Kenny was grounded for two weeks.

Torn Pantyhose. Diane was sitting in her living room. Her pantyhose were falling off. She went to the kitchen to grab a towel. When she got home, her pantyhose were wet. She went to the store to buy new ones.

Valentine's Gifts. Mary was very excited when her boyfriend gave her a Valentine's Day card. She took it to school one day and was told to not bring it. Her boyfriend found out and was furious. He was happy to get it back but was upset that it was a fake card. Mary had to go back home and throw it away.

Gayle's chores. Gayle has been doing her chores for the whole week. She has mostly been doing laundry. Gayle decides to take a bath. When she comes out of the bath she notices something strange. Gayle's clothes have been washed in a different laundry machine.

Working hard. The other day I got up really early. So I walked to the bus station. But then I realized I forgot my wallet at home. So I had to stay the night at the grocery store. It was a really long and tiring day.

Metabolism or illness. Lila was overweight. She knew she needed to get in shape but it was hard. Her doctor recommended she drink more water and eat more. She complied with all the doctors advice. Lila lost all the weight she had gained and felt much better.

I Almost Killed Myself Playing Pokemon Go. When I was a kid I started to play Pokemon Go. I went to the park one day and walked around all day. I started running into people, and ended up knocking over a trash can. The trash spilled everywhere. When I got home I had to clean it up and go to the emergency room.

Chef's Kitchen. Karen loved cooking. She decided to make a new food using her cooking skills. She bought ingredients and learned how to cook them. She made lots of new dishes that her family loved. Soon, Karen was a famous Chef's Kitchen chef!

James's New Job. James was a waiter at a restaurant. He had been training for many months. James was promoted to manager. He had to hire more people to help him run the restaurant. James decided to work from home and was happy with his decision.

Macy's Favorite Ice Cream. Macy was very tired and hungry. She was craving an ice cream cone. She drove to the store. She bought chocolate ice cream cones. Macy was very happy with her ice cream cone.

Mule and Plow. Liam and I were playing with our new mule. Liam tried to pull the mule around the plow. Then Liam's father yelled at him. His father told him to stop or he would hurt his hand. After that Liam always listened to his father.

The Jail. Gloria lived in a very old jail with many old inmates. She liked visiting the jail and seeing the old men. One day, Gloria found a very old man being beaten by another prisoner. She broke his nose with a stick and he was crying. Gloria took the old man to the hospital and treated him.

Keep on Giving. A woman found herself on the streets and wanted a change. She began walking to work everyday. People stopped to look and she saw many things. She learned that she had made a huge difference. Now she gives twice as much as she used to.

Working Stores. Gabe needed more money. He decided to open up his own business. His first few hours were very rough. Gabe started to learn how to run his business. Gabe ended up making a lot of money.

Goaltending. Ricky tried out for his high school soccer team. He thought he was a great goalie. But he made a few terrible saves at tryouts. Ricky wasn't offered a spot on the team. Ricky was disappointed but he worked hard anyway.

Banana boat. My friends and I had a lot of fun in our small banana boat. We decided to go to the beach. When we got there it was very hot. There was not enough shade and so we had to sleep under the stars. When we finally got to the beach we felt like sunshines.
The Beach. The family loved spending time together. They loved being at the beach. They all went to the beach. They had so much fun playing in the water. They all had a great time.

Lost for Awhile. The other day I had to take the ferry to Queens. The trip there took two hours. After leaving, I realized I had forgotten my wallet. Thankfully someone found it for me. I thanked the man.
New Shoes. Jill needed new shoes. Her old ones had ripped. She went shopping. She found some great ones. She bought them and felt great.

The Fireman's Dog. The fireman's dog was scared of cats. The fireman's wife fed the dog catnip. The dog started shaking and making noise. The dog scared the fireman's wife so she had to go get it. She put the dog in a box and made her husband take it outside.

The New Alphabet. The kids were having a field trip. They decided to do something fun. They went out to buy a coloring book with the names. The first name they chose was alphabet. They were excited to learn how to write their name.

Time Lost While Playing. Jane and Bill both loved to play. They were both very competitive and did it all the time. One day while playing cards it was a close game. Jane won by a landslide. They are still friends despite the score.

The Cat. Troy was sitting at the kitchen table. Suddenly, the cat walked up to the table. Troy tried to hide from the cat, but the cat kept staring at him. Eventually, Troy's dad took the cat away. The cat didn't bother him anymore.
Spoiled. Rosa had a bunch of cookies. She went to the store to buy more. But, the store was closed. She decided to walk the neighborhood. Then, she bought new cookies.

Can't see who's calling. Kelsi's phone was not charging anymore. She checked the battery and it was still not working. She had to use her cell phone in the car anyway. When she dropped her phone it slid right out of her hands. It crashed and cracked on the way home.

Animal safari fun. I went to an animal safari today. While I was there I saw lions and cheetahs. I did not see any elephants though. I was very bored. The next day I went back to the safari and had a good time.

Out of Beer. Jim was thirsty. So he searched through his cabinet to find something. He found a can of beer and grabbed it. Jim drank it and then forgot about it. He went to the fridge and checked for more.

Home Econ. The couple bought a new home in Florida. It was on the coast and had a lot of big houses in it. They were excited to see their new home in their new home town. But then the water level in the house rose high enough to flood! They lost their new home and had to move back in.

Cranky. I was sitting on the floor reading when a loud voice came from the room. The voice said I needed to speak. I stood up and looked at my neighbor who I was sitting with. She said that I needed to calm down. I said that was fine and went back to reading.
Can't Click Away Fast Enough. Tina was looking at her mail. Her cat was going through it quickly. The cat kept clawing at her mail. Tina yelled at the cat. The cat ran off.

Too Hot For Ice Cream. My wife's coworker Sue loves ice cream. She usually drives to the ice cream parlor but was delayed today. The weather was ninety degrees. Sue decided to cool off at a restaurant. She ordered an ice cream cone and had a hot day.

My niece. My niece had a boyfriend for awhile. When he left her, she was devastated. She wanted him back but had to wait until he was better. I encouraged her to find a new boyfriend quickly. She didn't listen and is now a lesbian.
Jacob Breaks His Phone. Jacob was having trouble with his phone. He dropped it onto the concrete. The screen cracked. Jacob called his phone service provider. They replaced his phone.

Riley is too loud. Riley is trying to sleep. Riley isn't allowed to sleep at her uncle's. He has to turn off the radio at night. Riley complains and his uncle lets her stay up late. She sleeps soundly the rest of the night.

Elizabeth can't kick. Elizabeth was a gymnast. She was the best in her school. One day she tripped and sprained her ankle. She had to sit out the next competition. She couldn't do gymnastics after that.
Cleaning the house. Today is a big day for Jen. She has finally cleaned her entire house! After cleaning she makes her bed. She cleans her bathroom. Then she mows her lawn.

Too Fat. Dan loved eating cookies, so he decided to become a weightlifter. He lifted weights every day to lose a few pounds. After a few months, he noticed he was much more muscular. Dan also started gaining weight, and decided to stop. Dan never wanted to become a bodybuilder again.

Small world. Sally had lived in a small town for 2 years. She really liked her hometown and its culture. One night, a big storm came and destroyed her house. She was really sad and didn't know what to do. Sally decided that she would miss her home town but didn't give up.
Going to School. Jake had to walk to school every day. He started getting scared of his mom's car. He saw a man in the car. The man jumped out of the car. Jake ran to the car and jumped in.

Mahabharata. I read the Mahabharata a few years ago. I was interested in Indian history. I found it fascinating. My son and I made a movie of the Mahabharata. My son made a movie of the Mahabharata and I have it in his room.

Blanket head. Tina went to the store with her boyfriend to buy some gifts. While she was there her boyfriend bought her a blanket. The blanket was pink and fluffy. Tina loved the blanket. But she didn't want to keep it.

The Promotion. Jena was a great worker with a great job. She wanted to be promoted to assistant manager. She practiced talking to her boss every day. She had been waiting for a promotion for over two years. When she finally got the promotion she was thrilled!

Sledgehammer. John was cutting wood. He needed a hammer. John decided to try to smash it with a sledgehammer. It fell and smacked John in the face. John went to the emergency room and got a bloody nose.
Being rude. Jim was a kind and generous person. He never said mean things to people. One day, a customer said mean things to Jim. Jim was very upset. Jim decided to be a nicer person from then on.

Test. Gina's test wasn't going so well. She was worried that she might be failing. She knew if she didn't pass it she wouldn't get an A. But she stayed up all night studying to prepare for the test. When it was time to take it, Gina was more prepared than ever.
The Pencil. Ida loved drawing. She bought a new pencil. She drew all day. She had no idea it would hurt her finger. Then she realized she had a paper cut.

The Babysitter. Gina's sister was babysitting her cousin. But Gina had no interest in watching the children. Instead, she read a book while her cousin was playing. She was bored enough to watch a movie alone. Gina regretted having brought her sister to watch TV.

Dark Stranger. A man came to town dressed as a stranger. He walked up and down the streets in search of someone to be with. One person stopped and talked to him. The stranger left to go find a girl he knew. The stranger looked at the girl and ran away, never to be seen again.

Mounting Bills. I have had a few bills to pay in the past few days. Most of them are small, and not that important. One big bill caught my attention. It was due today. It's already late and I can't pay it.

Addictive Game. Jenny played the board game Addictive. Her daughter challenged her to a game. She won a few rounds, but then lost the game. Her daughter won the last game as well. Jenny is a competitive person, but she found the game too addictive.

Marco Visits Utah. Marco always wanted to visit Utah. He always heard wonderful things about the beautiful landscape. Finally he bought a ticket for his dream trip. Marco went to Utah. He had a great time.

The Interview. Tanya had a job interview. She was nervous but went to the interview confident. She was invited to go out with them but declined. She did not want to seem unprofessional. Tanya's boss was not very pleased with her answer.

Stray kittens. Sam found a stray kitten in the middle of the road. The kitten seemed abandoned and hurt. Sam picked up the kitten and took it home. Sam cared for the kitten for a while. After a while the kitten seemed better.

Spring Water. My friend Sam lives in Maine. One day she came down with Spring Water. She was so sick she couldn't move for ten days. She finally got better and came back to her apartment. Now she lives in Virginia.

Driving again. Karyn had been feeling really sick all week. Finally her mom took her to the doctor for an exam. The doctor told Karyn that she needed to go on a liquid diet. Karyn agreed and took a diet drink every day for three days. After three days, Karyn had lost almost 10 pounds and felt great.
Seth Rides a Bike. Seth wants to learn to ride a bike. His friends encourage him to try biking to work. He buys a bike. He rides his bike to work. He loves being able to bike to work.

Ribs. I love going to the barber shop. The barbers have a special machine they use to cut my hair. I hate that machine though. The barber just cuts my skin from the inside. I prefer to get my hair cut by hand.
Fluffy Socks. Hanna got a new pair of socks. They were pink and soft and fluffy. Hanna took them to school the next day. She tried on a pair. They were the best socks Hanna had ever worn!

The Dare. Amy was on the playground, playing pretend. Suddenly her mom yelled at her. She told Amy she was being dared to climb the fence. Amy felt terrible, but climbed anyway. Her mom laughed at her and told her to come back later.

Battle of the Bands. The other band members were getting ready for the battle of the bands. Jenny was nervous and trembling. She stepped on stage and began to play. The crowd loved her and they all clapped and cheered. Jenny took a bow and began to play again.

Terrible perfume. The other day I was running late for work. When I got there the store was closed. I decided to go home and buy some perfume. I got home and smelled terrible. I learned my lesson and never left a house without perfume again.

The Prisoner. One day, Jim got sent to prison. At first, Jim was scared to go there. After his first day, he was relieved. After a long time, he decided to enjoy his new life. After a while, Jim became a nice, old man!

Clean Up Your Toys. Tom hated going to the store. One day he left all of his toys behind. His dad told him to clean them up. Tom did it but accidentally broke one of his toys. Tom cried because he loved that toy more than anything.

Wrestling Show Disaster. I was watching a wrestling show. They were doing a match that involved wrestling chairs. I threw my popcorn into the arena. The popcorn shattered and the wrestling show was halted. I got a big popcorn refund and got back into watching TV.

Winner. Sara had entered a cooking contest. She was cooking pasta and cheese. She cooked them well and served them to her family. She was so proud when they each gave her a sticker. Sara was so happy.

The Smallest Player. I used to be a very small player. I would only play on my little sister's couch. When I played with her, she could barely reach me. Then she got taller and stronger. Now she can reach me easily.
New years eve. Allie had her friends over. They wanted to celebrate New Years Eve. So they went to the bar. But unfortunately no one was awake. So they decided not to celebrate.
The Staircase. The stairs were falling down! It was so loud! It was time to call maintenance. The maintenanceman came by and shut down the stairs. The kids cheered with relief.

The Cereal. Ida bought a giant bag of granola bars. She mixed them together and put them in her car. She put her keys on her lap. Ida was driving and spilled her granola everywhere. Ida had to go home empty-handed!

Cleaning Up. Jan was cleaning up her house. Her house was littered with her ex's trash. Jan had no idea how she was going to clean this up. She asked her brother to help her. Jan's brother picked up her trash.

The Sunglasses. I went out wearing the sunglasses. The sun didn't bother me as much as it usually did. I decided to go back inside and put them back on. I took them off to use the bathroom. I felt like a total loser.
mike is angry. Mike is an american in a new country. His dad is from china. One day while eating breakfast he gets angry. Mike tells his dad to leave him alone. Mike leaves china for good.

cotton candy. I was bored at work today and decided to buy some cotton candy. I put it on the table and began eating. After about 20 minutes, I had too much. I was very hungry so I continued eating. When I finished, my stomach was cramping so I had to leave early.

Windy River. Kathy was walking home. A gust of wind pushed her into a tree. She was so scared she could not move. Suddenly the tree toppled over, leaving her scared. She decided she would not be so rash.
Laughing. Tom wanted to find a new hobby. He thought he could find something funny. He decided to be a laugher. He bought a laugher moustache. He then laughed about his new look all day.

Pharmacy. Lucy went to the pharmacy. She bought some things for her grandma. Her grandma was not happy about it. Her grandma wanted to know why she paid for the items. Lucy said that she was broke and her grandma would not get mad.

The new job. A new job was posted for Jill. Jill was very excited. She was very confident she would do well in the interview. Jill arrived at the office on time and started the interview. She ended up getting the job the next day.

Purchasing Decisions. The manager at a department store called to complain about a customer. The customer came in with a brand new iPod. The manager said this iPod is great, but you can't have it for free. The customer said OK, but he wants a discount. The manager refused to give in and the customer left.

Fire. One day Jeff forgot to take out the trash. He was watching television and heard a big explosion. He ran outside to see what was going on. Jeff saw that a fire truck had come out of the garage. Jeff ran back inside and called the fire department.

Dumb Prank. Tom decided to play a prank on his roommate. Tom called his roommate's cell phone. Tom started a prank with a prank phone call. Tom called the roommate's cell phone again. Tom hung up on the phone and the prank did not work.
Lola drinks coffee. Lola decides to try coffee. She decides she likes it very much. She goes to the store and buys a lot of coffee. She drinks a big cup. Lola is now addicted to coffee.

Michael goes to prom. Michael was so nervous he was about to throw up. His mom knew he needed to get over his nerves and make a good impression. She decided that she would take him to the prom. He went to the prom by himself. At the prom he had a great time.
Lanterns. Beverly's birthday was coming up. She wanted something new. She looked through all her old presents. She saw a box of lanterns. She couldn't wait to have her own lantern.
Online Chess. I played online chess the other night. My opponent played an old friend. I lost the first game. I won the next three games. I won the next two games and won the game.

Clams. Liza was invited to a cookout. She went with her friends to find something fun to do. Liza really wanted to eat some clams. Her friends ordered fried clams. Liza really enjoyed them and agreed to go back.

The Dance. It was Gina's first dance class. The girl she was dancing with was her cousin. The two danced around the room. It was an odd combination of music and music. Gina was uncomfortable but had a good time.
Painting Pottery. The Smith family went to the art store. They bought pottery. It was a very beautiful piece. They painted it and brought it home. They put it in their dining room and loved it.

Books. Maryann's mom was too ill to go to school, and Maryann had to go to school. She was scared to leave her books behind because she loved her mom. She put them all in her car and started it out. She was surprised when she realized the house wasn't that far away. Maryann had found the perfect house.

Degrees. My brother-in-law got a doctorate in philosophy. He got his doctorate in philosophy in 1971. He started his PhD in philosophy in 1973. He worked as a philosophy professor for thirty years. He retired in 2013.

What did mom tell you  about talking to strangers. My friend's son, Jake, had recently moved to a new school. Jake was trying to meet some new people. He wanted to know what his schoolmates thought of him. One of his new friends, Sam, told him that people hated his accent. Jake learned that Sam was right.
Mturk. I like to work on Mturk. I make money doing it. One day, someone was offering to help me out. They were paying me $10 per hour. I declined because I have a lot of work to do.
Leg. I had a stroke in 2011. I could not walk for a month. I decided to take up yoga. I felt really good when I started. I love having a leg in my daily life.

Elephants. I took my nephew to the zoo today. He had never seen an elephant up close before. He thought it would be really cool to get a picture with one. When he got to see an elephant he was so excited. It was so big and majestic!
Volleyball Match. The team was playing volleyball. The score was tied. The coach told everyone to go serve the ball. The team did so and the score was tied. It was tied at the end of the game.

A waterfall. Tim wanted to do something special with his girlfriend. He decided to take her to a waterfall. He planned the trip out carefully. He even went on the boat to get there. Tim and his girlfriend were excited when they got to the spot.

Michelle's New Puppy. Michelle went to the pet store to purchase a new puppy. She looked at all the puppies to choose her favorite. She chose the biggest and fastest puppy to buy. The puppy came home from the pet store on the same day. Michelle named her new puppy Dash.
The baby won't sleep. Maggie was expecting a baby. She wanted to help him sleep. She took him to the doctor. The doctor said he was just going to sleep. Maggie was glad that the doctor was wrong.
Growing up. Cara was a little girl with lots of energy. But as she grew older, her energy decreased. She decided to go on a healthier diet. She began to exercise daily. Her health began to improve.
Grease Fire. The family was cooking burgers. They were mixing up the ingredients. The grease splattered on the ground. They ran to put out the fire. The grease splattered onto the hamburger bun.
The Circus. Barry loved the circus. Barry decided he would attend the circus. Barry bought his ticket. Barry waited for the clowns to arrive. Barry had a great time at the circus.

Life Changes. Mary really wanted to improve her health. She read that she had to start with simple foods. The first food was water. Her second was salads. Mary's new lifestyle was good for her health.

Pen Caps. I decided to make my own pens. I grabbed some sheet metal and a ruler. Using a ruler, I created a guide to align the parts. I then carefully aligned each part. Finally, I filled in the shapes with spray paint.

First Day of Work. I woke up this morning excited for the new school year starting. I looked out my window and there was no school outside. I rushed to the store just to find out if school was out. I ran to the car and drove to school. The first day of school was great.

No Friends Left. Gina hadn't heard from her friends in awhile. So she decided to check their phone numbers. The first thing she did was call them to ask about their phones. She heard nothing back from them. So she assumed they hadn't heard from her either.

Allergy Medication. Kim's doctor prescribed her allergy medication. She didn't have an allergy but it gave her gas and upset stomach. Kim decided to change it. So she found an alternative medication. Her doctor said she could try it without an allergic reaction.
Sweatpants. Tom was out of work. He needed to buy a new pair of pants. He looked online and found a great pair. They fit him perfectly. Tom bought the pants and was so happy.

Angela 5. Angela was very nervous about starting kindergarten. She was a very clumsy child and had trouble with balance. Angela's mom worked hard with her in a very difficult class. After a few weeks, Angela was the best in her class. She was happy to see that she was not the slowest child.

Italian. Dan was a very hard worker and loved his job. One day his boss said that he needed Dan to come in for a few days to work. Dan didn't believe it was a joke. Dan decided that his job had to change. Dan quit and moved to Italy.
The Office. The new office was very big. It had a lot of cubicles. He sat down and began to work. He realized he'd forgotten his lunch! He ate at the break room, and was more productive.
Keurig. We went to our cabin in Alaska. We brewed a big batch of coffee. We roasted it in a Keurig. The Keurig did not heat up. We decided to buy a new Keurig.
Tibet. Our daughter was in China for 4 months. She is learning Mandarin. She took a trip to Tibet. There was a lot of snow. She was in Tibet for 1 month.

Hockey Game. We saw our old friend at the hockey game today. He was wearing a blue jersey and had a hat. We thought he was a part of the team. He told us he was only a coach. We left the game impressed that he had become an adult.

The worst cup of coffee. I went to buy some coffee today. When I got to the coffee shop, I ordered a coffee. When I sat down to get it, I saw it was terrible. It was too hot to drink. I immediately asked for a new one.
gold. Anna was shopping. She saw a beautiful gold necklace. She bought it. Then she took it home. She loved her new necklace!

Soft Avocado. My friend Jim was talking to me about his recent avocado experience. He went to the grocery store to buy his favorite variety. While he was there, he decided to buy a lot of avocado. When he got home he heated it up and tasted it. It was surprisingly delicious.
The Kiss. John and Sally were dating for three years. Sally was tired of waiting, and decided to kiss John. John told Sally he loved her too. Sally kissed him too. Now they are together happily.
Trying hard. Tina wanted a new car. So she went to the dealership. She found the best car. But she couldn't afford it. So she had to put the car on the lot.

The broken tail light. Amber was driving to her friend's house. Her car turned off suddenly. Amber realized that her tail light had broken. She called her friend and told her about the accident. Her friend picked her up from her house, and Amber's tail light was fixed.

Mouse. Abe was a computer programmer, and wanted to play his computer games. His mouse did not have any buttons, so he had to write some code. Abe wrote an entire game to play on his mouse! He shared his game with his brother, who made it into a very successful game. Abe was so proud, he gave the brother a hug.

Missing the Last Episode. Jane and John didn't know what to watch on the cable. They kept flipping through channels. Eventually they found one that they both liked. They kept flipping through it until it was time to go to bed. They were able to find the last episode after all.

Catch the Thief. Gina and her friends were hanging out at the park. She had heard them talk about a guy who would steal their lunch. She watched as they all approached the man. He ignored them and walked past them. He slipped his coat on and walked away.

Contaminated Shorelines. The Smiths were vacationing on the Florida coast. While walking along the shore, they were swept along by a storm. A few minutes later, a storm appeared on the horizon. As the storm grew bigger, the Smiths began to run from shore to shore. Unfortunately, they drowned in the water, along with all their belongings.
TuTu. Anna was going to sleep in the car. She could hear her dog barking. Then she heard a tiny noise. The dog had come out and jumped on her. Anna quickly put her to bed.

Lipstick mishaps. The woman painted her lips with a bright red color. As she was painting her lips, she put her hand on a rock. Her finger got burned. She had to apply cream on the wound. The woman cleaned her finger with alcohol.
Jackpot. Tim took his wife to a casino. They played the slots for hours. His wife won $10,000. Tim paid his wife $1,000. He won another $10,000.

Boring Movie. John went to the movies with his friends. They sat down and tried to find something to watch. After looking for an hour he couldn't find anything. He decided to just skip it. John wound up having a lot of fun and wasn't as bored.
John Visits His Grandma. John's grandpa had just died. John decided to visit his grandma. He had a good visit with his grandma. They talked about old times. John wished his grandpa had lived longer.

Clothes Shopping. Sara wanted to go to the store for new clothes. She had heard of a new store that had just opened in town. The store had a huge selection of new clothes. Sara could not decide what to get. She eventually gave up and bought several dresses.

Brand. My father has this weird habit of putting all his brand name products in one pack. He has several different brands of beer, some bottled and some draft. One day, I tried to sample a few beers and he had them all in one pack. He tried to tell me that some beer had alcohol in it. It was so funny that he did that to try to make me think.

First day of school. Today was the first day of school. I went to the bus station. When I got to school, I found a seat. Everyone else had their seats taken. The first few days are rough, but I'm glad I went to school.

Tokyo Trouble. I had my Japanese-only passport taken from me when I returned home from college. I decided to keep the passport instead of returning it. I took a wrong bus from Tokyo to Osaka. After two weeks of trying to find a ride, I finally found one. I had to wait a week for my passport back to be returned.
Nice investment. The man bought a house. He realized that it had low value. He decided to fix it up. It cost him a lot of money. He kept the house for several more years.

Sick Daughter. Jill's daughter wanted to be an actress. Jill's husband was not sure how she could get started. He was interested in her career but thought it was a bad idea. After talking with her daughter she decided to sign her daughter up for an audition. Jill's daughter made her first ever acting role and her husband was proud.
Failure. Gina was in class. But her teacher wouldn't let her stay up late. After 3 hours she was tired. But she decided to stay up late anyway. She passed out in class and failed her test.

Camping. The girls decided to go camping. They packed their bags and drove to a nearby campsite. They set up their tent in the center of the woods. They made a fire and shared their food and water. The girls had a great time at the campground.
Borrowed car. Tom loaned his car to a friend. The friend forgot to bring it back. Tom took it home anyway. Tom couldn't tell it was stolen. Tom never told anyone.
First Time Drinking. My friend Jim and I went out last night. We went to a bar. Jim thought it would be funny to get drunk. He did get drunk. We laughed about it.
Javier Scores A Goal. Javier had spent the whole season on the bench. The team needed a goal. Javier was finally put into the game. He played great. His team won and Javier was finally happy.
Noisy Toddlers. Tom was at his mom's house. There was a lot of noise coming from upstairs. Tom's mom turned up the music. The kids in the upstairs took it too far. Tom decided to turn the music down.
Fold Them. I wanted to make my boyfriend a present. I decided to sew him a pair of new socks. I bought all the supplies. I began making the project. I finished it and my boyfriend loved them!

Surprise Dinner. Jane's daughter Sara had just turned two. Jane decided she would surprise Sara with a birthday party. At dinner, she served her daughter several cheeseburgers. At the end of dinner, Jane called Sara's parents. Sara's parents came to the party with cake and Sara was surprised.

Tornado Alley. Ricky and his family lived in a small town in tornado alley. One day the tornado warning started out sounding really strong. The next day a lot of tornadoes were predicted. They decided to evacuate and found a new home. Ricky and his family are happy they made it out.

Bob's Son Hits a Homerun. Bob's son has never been a good baseball player. But one day he decides to take up baseball. He practices very hard for a few weeks. He even practices with a baseball bat! Now Bob's son is a great baseball player!

The Epidemic. A little girl named Tia was diagnosed with chickenpox. Her parents brought her to the doctor for help. The doctor ran a series of tests. After a few days, Tia's infection was all clear. Her parents took her home and she started feeling better.

Read to Me. Gina's brother and a girl were listening to her cousin. Gina liked the girl and she was in trouble with the parents. She went up to talk to them about it. When she wasn't recognized, she told them she was sorry. The girls laughed and said it wasn't their problem.
Speech. The man gave a speech. The audience was not impressed. He apologized for his speech. He changed the speech to something better. The audience loved his new speech.

Newbie. John just started out in his new job. He was nervous about meeting new people. John dressed and introduced himself to people at work. John had a few pleasant conversations with them. John soon made several new friends at work.
Arm Wrestling. Mike wanted to impress his friends at school. He decided to challenge his friend to a duel. They both met in a ring. They each picked a belt. They each beat their friend.
Swimming. Anna was always afraid of swimming. She was scared she would drown. She decided to get in shape. She went for swimming classes. She soon became very comfortable with swimming.

Homework Help. Kendra's mother was always encouraging her to do her homework. Kendra hated to work on her homework, but her mother kept asking. Eventually, Kendra found that her homework was so important that she had to do it. She began to complete it every day for her mother's encouragement. Within a few months, Kendra's work was done and she was no longer asked to do it.
NYSE. Jim was nervous. He was going to be the new CEO of the company. He was also going to be in charge of it. The first day, Jim did a great job. His colleagues were very impressed.

The Find. A man was walking along the beach. He was having a great time swimming. Suddenly, he felt a sharp pain in his foot. He looked down to see a piece of metal. The metal was a metal detector, and it led him back to the shore.

Candy Store. Sara loves making homemade candy. One of her favorite candies is mint chocolate chip. However, Sara's boyfriend does not like mint chocolate chip. She decided to try making his favorite candy. Sara was happy to see that his favorite candy was actually mint.

Sleepy. My daughter's friend Becky had a child in her early thirties. Becky told me the child was sleeping very well. I talked to Becky and asked if she was sleeping at her parents' place. Becky was not sleeping well so I went to the nursery to see what was wrong. The child was sleeping well so she went back to bed.

Kidneys. My friend Ben recently had kidney failure. He had to stop working and eat canned food. His son was at his house and found him in the bathroom. He had the kidney dialysis, and he was in so much pain. Ben is thankful he is recovering but he is sad.

Jackie's New Shoes. Jackie wanted a new pair of shoes. Jackie didn't have any money for the shoes. Jackie borrowed money from her mother. She bought the shoes with the money from her mother. Jackie was very happy to have a new pair of shoes.

No Response. Tina and her friends were waiting in the hall for a party. The house lights came on and the music started. Tina turned on her phone but it didn't connect. She was about to get in trouble for using her phone at the party. But, her friend came in and showed her that her phone was fine.

Truman's Keyboard. Truman sold his typewriter in a garage sale. He received a call from an old friend who wanted to buy the typewriter. Truman had the typewriter shipped back to him. The friend went to the typewriter and began typing on it. Truman's friend told Truman the typewriter was no good and that it was discontinued.
Games. I went to play a game with some friends. We decided to play Monopoly. We split up the properties. We also took turns getting money. We ended up getting into a big fight.

Mturk. I started doing freelance work on Mturk. I didn't really make much money doing it. I put my work on mturk to help pay bills. Soon, my paychecks started to drop. I stopped doing freelance work on Mturk.

Noises. Anna went outside to check on the noise. She saw her neighbor's dog barking at a tree. She called the animal control to complain. They came and took the dog away. Anna never saw that dog again.
cookies. I was in a hurry to get to work. I saw a box of cookies in the kitchen. They looked great. I ran to the kitchen to open it. They smelled great.

Sign the Autograph. Ike had a baseball autograph signed by his favorite player. Ike felt excited for the opportunity to get the autograph. Ike asked for his name to be inscribed on the baseball. Afterwards, the player gave Ike a special gift. Ike gave the player his number as a tribute.
Spin class. Jill went to her first spin class. She was nervous but excited. She was determined to go in better condition. When she got out she was the champion. Jill took a photo to remember it.
The Couch. The man pulled out a couch. It was old and beat up. He set the couch up in his living room. He tried to give it a good scratch. His couch came apart and broke.

Car Accident. My brother's car was making a weird noise. When he got out it had been slightly dented. I could hear the engine revving. He said that he was trying to fix the problem. The next day my brother's car died.
The trip. The kids were bored. They decided to go camping. They bought all kinds of camping gear. Then they headed off. They had so much fun!

Money. I was doing a report on my salary and expenses. I had a document that shows my salary and expenses. I opened up the document. The document was blank. I asked my friend what happened, and he said someone stole my money.

The Snowball King. I've always wanted to be the snowball king. I challenged my friend Jake to a snowball fight. The match started and I threw my snowball at Jake. I missed and landed on Jake's face. Jake started crying and I was the snowball king.
Stan's Hat. Stan wanted a new hat. He asked his brother for a new hat. His brother gave him a great hat. Stan tried on it on a hot day. Stan found the hat he wanted.
Peppermint tea. Kerry wanted to try something different. She bought a large pot of peppermint tea. She placed the tea in the cup and took a sip. The tea was delicious. She loved the new flavor.
First Dye. Sam was dyeing his hair. He mixed a dye with his hair. When it was all mixed, he put it in his hair. He rinsed out his hair with water. The dye came out pink.
Stray. Sue was walking to work one morning. She saw a stray dog. The dog bit her. Sue decided to go back home. She decided not to ever walk by that road again.

Long Journey. Joe had never driven cross country before. He signed up for his first adventure. It took him three months of driving. He wound up driving all the way to Texas. He was very proud of himself.

Theo. Theo found an old wallet in the park. The wallet contained all his old school information. He felt bad about his school years. Theo turned the old information into the school. The school shared all his information with the world.

Aurelia Learns to Tango. Aurelia wanted to learn how to tango. She went to a local tango class. She learned how to properly swing her feet. She also learned some cool moves. Aurelia was proud that she could tango.

Not a Federal Holiday. Dan celebrated the holiday by eating a ton of candy. It was already late and night already ended and he couldn't sleep yet. Dan woke up, got dressed, and drove to his parents house. Upon arriving, Dan's parents surprised him with a huge bonfire. Dan thanked his parents for being such a nice family.

Swimsuit. Amy needed a swimsuit for her school swim meet. The store didn't have any. Amy didn't have enough money to buy one. She asked her mom if she could borrow her a swimsuit. Amy's mom lent her a swimsuit so Amy could attend her swim meet.
Corner. The couple looked in the mirror. Their nose was dirty. They looked at the mirror. They both laughed. They decided to clean up their faces.

New Puppy. Jack wanted a new puppy. Jack looked up puppy adoption places in his area. Jack went to a friend's house to ask for a puppy. Jack's friend had a dog that needed a new home. Jack adopted the dog from his friend.
Ken's Kilt. Ken is a 12 year old boy. Ken wanted to learn how to tie a kilt. He asked his mother for lessons. Her son showed him how to tie a kilt. Ken was able to learn to tie a kilt.

Military. Cody joined the military the first day he was told. He joined up with a regiment and went through basic training. After a few months he was told that he would not be in the regiment. Cody was so upset and told his parents. He was very unhappy and never joined the military again.

Unaffectionate. Jenny is very affectionate. Therefore, no one can make fun of her for it. However, this is different for Jenny because she is gay. A few weeks ago, Jenny felt very much in love with another man. She told him she was gay and that he was just her boyfriend.
The Arrest. Sam was walking home from school. The police stopped him. He had been illegally using drugs. He was arrested and charged with using drugs. Sam was in prison for 3 months for using drugs.

New Boys. Josie was in the 5th grade. She was nervous about the new boys in her class. Josie knew it was time for her to make friends. She spent the morning playing with the new boys. Her new friends made her so happy that she didn't feel so nervous!

Accident or fate. I once had a pet squirrel named Moe. I was tending to a garden and Moe wandered up to my flowerbed. I was tending to Moe and the two suddenly ran off. I couldn't find Moe and started searching for a week. Luckily, I found Moe and I was so happy that he was my pet!

Cable Service. John always wanted cable. He looked at his options and saw they were expensive. He decided to try his luck with a streaming service. He installed it and watched a bunch of shows. He felt very satisfied and accomplished.

Vance Veers Verbose. Vance has always wanted to learn how to write a novel. Vance's friend tells him to write about a real person. Vance writes a short novel. He sends the novel to a publisher. He is paid handsomely for his novel.

Early Race. Dan loved to go racing. Dan attended the local track and joined a team. Dan raced every chance he got with his team. Dan raced for a couple of weeks. Dan eventually became the fastest team member.

Anniversary Gift. Gina had never purchased her husband a gift for their anniversary. The problem was she was too broke. She didn't know how she would afford them. Finally, her brother found an extra job. Now Gina has enough money to buy her husband a gift.

Las Vegas. Bill was a big gambler. Bill gambled so much money he got into an accident. Bill was severely injured in the accident. Bill lost all of his money gambling in Las Vegas. Now Bill only gambles in New York.
The Picture. Lucy was with her grandma. They had a nice picture. She loved it. But it was blurry. Finally grandma agreed to get a new one.
Lost Voice. Nancy was an up and coming singer. She went to a talent show. She sang in front of a huge crowd. Suddenly she lost her voice and couldn't sing. Her audience was really disappointed.

Basketball Superstar. John is a great basketball player. He is a star on his local high school team. The team is not very good. They need to be good to make the State Finals. They play hard all week and are confident they can do it.

Injured. I was walking to my car from school one day. I tripped over a curb and fell into a small creek. I began bleeding profusely. Someone pulled me from the water. They bandaged my wounds and said I was okay.

Jason gets robbed. Jason is walking to work one day. He sees two men come up to him. The men pull out a gun and rob him. Jason tries to run away but the men catch him. Jason is lucky that he wasn't shot.

The Speech. A man came to my work with a speech impediment. He wanted to tell me why. He told me that his mom had died when he was only four years old. He said that he'd told his mom he was going to tell her, and was ready. I told him that he'd be disappointed if he didn't hear from her.

Cheese Bandit. When I was a child, a bully named Jim would pick on me all the time. I ran home from school one day and decided to go to my house. I walked through the door and a man was standing outside my house. I saw a black man and wondered if it was Jim. I turned to see him grab me by the hair, pull me to the ground, and run!
New Car. The woman got a new car. It was a red car. She didn't know how to drive it. She went to her friend's house for help. His neighbor's car was also new.

Cute Girl. Tom and his friends were talking in class. The teacher noticed them staring at each other. She asked Tom and his friends if they were in love. Tom and his friends shrugged and said they weren't. The teacher ended up giving them detention for not telling the truth.

Broken Stove. My friend and I cooked on a campfire one night. We cooked spaghetti, chicken and rice. We got up to walk out the tent. But the fire spread too fast and we started a forest fire. We spent the night inside my friend's car.

The Pizza Coupon. A pizza store in Buffalo had a promotion going on. Whoever ordered a pizza with a coupon would get free pizza. I called up the store and ordered a large pepperoni pizza. I tried to pay but the cashier didn't accept credit cards. I was very disappointed.
Snowstorm. Joe was snowed in his driveway. The ground was very slippery. He called out the emergency number. He was able to get the snow cleared out in time. Joe was happy about the snowstorm.

Saying Hello. Sam thought he heard his name from the neighbor's yard. It sounded like the house was empty. When he went outside, his neighbor was nowhere in sight. Sam went back inside to call 911. He was relieved to hear that nobody was home.

The Code. A friend of mine worked for the state DMV. His job was to take scans of old birth certificates. The data was saved in a special database. The state put a lot of effort into maintaining the information. I was impressed by the work done to keep information confidential.

The Bar. My parents decided to host a sleepover. The boys and I decided to stay in the living room. When it was time to go to sleep, they told me to clean. I decided that my house was clean enough, so I slept in. After the sleepover, I decided I didn't want to sleep in the living room any more.
Ice Cream. Beth was craving ice cream. She ordered it from a fast food restaurant. She sat down to eat her ice cream. She didn't feel good after eating it. She ate it to feel better.

Bruce Dog. Bruce had just gotten a new dog. He loved it a lot but it was barking all the time. He asked his mother to take him to a dog trainer. His mother got him an obedience trainer for his dog. Now Bruce is a lot happier.

Car Lock. John was getting ready to leave his house. He realized that his car keys were in the ignition. John looked for his keys. John realized he left them in the ignition. John drove back inside his house.
Wrong Pizza. Sam was hungry. He went to get a pizza. The pizza place gave him a pizza with different toppings. Sam tried a few and didn't like any. Sam decided to get a different pizza.

Colin wants ice cream. Colin wants ice cream. His mom takes him to the ice cream store. The cashier checks Colin's wallet. He sees an ice cream cone on his wallet. Colin pays the cashier and gets ice cream.
DJ. Tom wanted to become a better DJ. He would constantly practice. He even practiced at home on his own turntables. Tom went to DJ school. He passed the exam and got his degree!
French Fries. I was eating french fries at my work lunch. I dropped one of the fries in my bag. I put another one in my bag. Later I got a phone call from my boss. I forgot to bring fries in my bag.
Clean up duty. Beth was doing her homework in class. She couldn't concentrate on the lesson. She decided to take a break. She walked around the block. When she was done, she was able to focus.

bank. Ida went to the bank to deposit a check. Then she had to wait while a teller called her account number. When the teller rang her name, Ida panicked. She'd left her ID in the car! She didn't have enough money for that check either!
Discount. I wanted to get an ice cream cone. I found a great deal on an ice cream truck. I got out my ice cream and sat down. I ordered a large cone. I loved my ice cream so much!

Break Not Break Up. Dan broke up with his girlfriend. It was hard for him, but he was determined to move on with his life. Dan found a nice apartment downtown. He began working at the apartment. In two weeks, Dan was living at his new place and doing great.
A Snack. Amy's mom told her she could only have one snack before bed. She wanted to eat something sweet. She went into the kitchen. She looked around. She couldn't find anything sweet so she gave up.

Trey's Soup. Trey wanted to make a meal for dinner. He had never made soup before. He bought all the ingredients to make his soup. Trey mixed all of the ingredients together and made a bowl. Trey was happy to have made a delicious meal for dinner.
Losing a Wallet. I went to the grocery store. While walking through the store I dropped a few snacks. I had my wallet on me. I went back to the store to get it. I had lost it.

Wolf in Sheep's Clothing. Devin was the new kid on the block. He was always the first one to go on the swings. He didn't notice there was a wolf in his neighborhood. One day the wolf tried to get on his swings and run away. Devin chased after the wolf but the wolf got away.

Jill's Surprise. Jill was excited for her friend's birthday party. She went to her friend's house to surprise her. She invited her boyfriend over to watch movies. While her boyfriend was at the movies, Jill's boyfriend came over. His girlfriend was surprised, and she didn't even know she was there.
Greg's party. Greg was bored one evening. So he decided to throw a party. At the party people drank and ate snacks. They danced and had a great time. Greg was happy that he had a party.

Christmas Gift. Travis was shopping at the store. He was trying to buy a Christmas gift for his mom. Unfortunately he was out of paper plates. Travis had to buy new ones instead. His mom loved the new plates.

College advertisement. I am interested in applying to several colleges. The college I am applying to has a lot of scholarships available. I was shocked that they advertise scholarships for the first time. I immediately called my recruiter to inquire about the scholarships. I was able to get one of them, a $5,000 tuition waiver.

Home Perm. Sara loved the feel of silk perms. She decided to get some. She had so much trouble finding the right yarn. Finally she found some that was perfect for her. She was glad her decision to get a perm made her happy.

A Car Baby. Kim was watching TV with her husband. Her husband's car started making a funny noise. They looked under the hood and saw that it was a car baby. They tried to fix the car. It didn't work and it was totaled.

Slow keyboard. Fred started his new job in a new office. He found out that he needed to learn to type fast. He bought a new keyboard at the store. But after two weeks he still had a problem with his typing. Finally he bought a mechanical keyboard.

Pretty Pictures. Gina was at a restaurant with her friends. They were eating. Her mother told them to take pictures of her face. When Gina saw the pictures she didn't smile. The other girls at the restaurant laughed.
sky. The boy climbed a tree. He fell from the tree. The boy broke his arm. His dad took him to the hospital. His dad got him a cast.

Tonight's Supper. My wife made a special supper for tonight. She cooked the chicken, potatoes, and carrots. She also made the sides from scratch. My wife and I looked forward to the meal. I ate a few bites, then went back to bed.

Interesting Run. I ran across the street on my way home. I saw a car at the next street. I thought it was a person who needed help. However, it turned out to be a raccoon. I felt bad that the raccoon stole my house.

Jana Looks For A Home. Jana was very lonely and had no friends in her apartment. She needed a new friend. She went to the apartment building's public information office. They directed her to a local homeless shelter. Jana decided to stay at the shelter after work for a month.
Fajitas. Lola loved to eat fajitas. She couldn't figure out how to make them. She asked her grandma for help. Her grandma showed her some recipes. Lola made homemade fajitas and they were delicious.

Earl gets in trouble. Earl is always playing pranks on his friends. He always gets them in trouble. His friends want him to stop but he never listens. He continues to do it and they get even. Earl gets in trouble with his parents.

Train Ride. It was a hot and sticky summer day. Tom went to a gas station and bought some drinks. Tom went on a train ride to a friend's house. Tom had fun riding the train to the friend's house. Tom returned home with several drinks.

Sharks at the Aquarium. Joe and his family went to the aquarium. They saw a lot of fish and sea creatures. They even saw two sharks in the water. Joe was amazed by the creatures. They were able to bond over the sharks.

Jealousy. Bill had a very large ego. Bill was the boss of a very large business. Bill decided he wanted to be the boss of all his employees. Bill made his employees work very hard to impress him. Bill realized that he had no friends and was now alone.
The broken arm. I was playing with my cousins. I was swinging on the swings. Suddenly I fell off. I was on the floor with a broken arm. My cousins helped me to my feet and bandaged it.

Pepper safety. Tom was a very curious child. He wanted to learn more about his ancestors. He decided to take a trip to a historic graveyard. He had to take a lot of pepper spray with him. Tom was a much more careful person after that.

Mike's Mountain Adventure. Mike decided to climb a mountain. He went to the mountainside and set up his gear. While setup, Mike got a bit dehydrated and fell. Mike decided not to climb a mountain again. Mike decided to climb a mountain on Mturk instead.

Baby Passport. Alicia and her friends wanted to visit the country of Mexico. However, they could not afford a plane ticket. Alicia's friend gave her a gift card to use. Alicia used the gift card to purchase the plane ticket. She was happy to use the gift card and take her friends to Mexico.

Media Day. Sandy got home and found an email from a local news organization. She was thrilled because the local news was having a media day. Sandy gathered her kids and gathered all of her blankets. Then they brought in their phones and played games on the tv. Sandy had a great day on her local news day.

The Ring. One evening while cleaning the house, Jane noticed something. She found a ring on the floor. It was a gold ring. She had lost the ring before cleaning. Jane was disappointed to have lost the ring.

Simple Hunger. Hannah really wanted a chocolate chip cookie. However, she couldn't afford to buy any. So she tried her hand at baking a cookie herself. She mixed up all of the ingredients in her kitchen. The resulting cookie was delicious.

I'm Sorry, Baby. Today was the first day of school. I was nervous for my first day and didn't know who to be. My mother told me that she liked me, so I was relieved. She hugged me very tight to make sure I was safe. She was proud of me for making a new friend.

Hoping for a snow day. Jake went out for a walk. He had been looking forward to snow all day. Jake heard the weather report that predicted rain. Jake thought it was going to snow and went home. His wife came out and said that it was snowing a lot.

President. I like to watch the president. I think he is very smart. Last week he announced a plan to combat climate change. He is not going to cut back on oil. I hope he makes good on his commitments.

Visiting Santa. The kids were visiting Santa for the first time. They loved his red suit and big red beard. Then they saw that he carried a tray of presents. They eagerly picked out their gifts. They thought the trip was the best yet.

Bicycles are Fun. Gina had a new toy bike. Her brother and sister had bikes, but neither of them owned one. Gina borrowed her sister's bike. It was too dangerous for her to ride, so she promised to be careful. Her promise helped her find a safer way to keep the bike.

Knockout Gas. Tom was driving home one night. He noticed a horrible smell coming from his car. He decided to pull over to investigate. He realized it was just a blow out gas leak from his car. He called the auto parts store and luckily they were able to help him fix it.

A grade. Samantha had just been assigned a chemistry book. She had to bring it in and read it. Samantha got a C on the book. She decided to go home and read the other books. The teacher looked at the books and gave Samantha an F on the other books.

Creepy Basement. I have a very scary basement. My kids would cry when they heard my basement. They thought it was haunted. One day I heard them laugh and ran upstairs. My children are now afraid of my basement.

The Mailman. Terrance got a new job delivering the mail. He was excited to see his name in the paper! When it came time to check his mail, he dropped it! He was so excited to see the damage and vowed to be more careful. Terrance got his second job but still had a great experience.
Vineyard Blues. Jane had a vineyard. Her vines got very tall. The vineyard was over-growing. Jane's vineyard had to be raked and chopped down. Jane put her vineyard up for sale.
Cat and Dog. The cat jumped the fence. The dog chased the cat. The dog ran into the neighbor's house. The cat's owner was home. The cat ate some dog food.

Alternative. The teacher gave us a list of work choices. She asked us to choose one option. My choice was to take the road trip to visit family. Afterwards, I decided to go to a movie. I had a great time on the road trip.

Law Breaker. Devin tried to play cards with his friend Todd. However, Todd tried to cheat. He tried to take Devin's cards away. Devin tried to play a trick on him. Todd ended up losing because of his bluff.

Mario. Mario was a quiet boy, but he always got into trouble. He once stole a carton of milk from a neighbor's carton. He left the milk carton on his front lawn. When the neighbor found out, he gave Mario the milk carton. Mario thanked the neighbor profusely.

The Closet. Remy was getting ready to move out of his parents' house. He looked everywhere but could not find his closet. Remy went through the attic and looked for his closet. He found his old school clothes. Remy put them in the closet and locked the doors.

The Surprise House. The kids were playing tag. They were playing on a secret house. There were lots of toys and games hidden in it. One day the kids got in trouble. They all got out at their door and were not allowed back in.
