Fair. Tia decided to go to the fair. She had never been to one before. But her friend Tina suggested they go to the food court. Tia reluctantly agreed to go with Tina. Tia was surprised how much the fair was worth.

Hungry. Derek loved to eat, but he hated to cook. One day, he decided to make breakfast for his family. He ate very quickly. When his mom arrived, she didn't like it. Her mom made him stay in bed all day.
Grilled cheese. I love grilled cheese. It gives me energy and keeps me cool. One day I got to try something new. My first grilled cheese was great. It was so good that I continued to order it.

The Tulips. Tiffany had always hated flowers. She would just toss them up in her room. Then one day she decided to try them. She tried a bunch of different kinds. After a while, she was happily in love with them!

The Call. Tom was playing a card game with his family. He kept losing, so his family thought he was losing. Tom's mom was worried and asked him to please play again. The game went on for hours and by the end, Tom won. His mom was so happy to have such a great game of cards with him.

Intern to Director. Joan was an intern for her local cable TV company. She was happy when her boss called her in for a meeting. Joan was given many assignments that she would do for the company. As the months passed, Joan became very skilled at her job. Joan was promoted to the head intern position.

Boredom. Sam was very bored. He did not have any friends. Sam decided to play a prank on his roommate. Sam put a huge pack of candy in his roommate's backpack. When Sam arrived at his roommate's house, he found out he was very sick.

A Day at the Beach. Jenny and Bob were having a relaxing day at the beach. They spent the whole day walking the beach. When they arrived, they were ready to go home. They walked all around the beach and relaxed. They had a great day at the beach.

Stomach. Joe had been having a hard time eating lately. His stomach started to hurt. Joe thought maybe it was time to see a doctor about it. Joe went to the doctor. He was diagnosed with constipation.

Lingering Cramp. My wife and I were playing in the park. She was tossing her Frisbee around. Suddenly, she felt a sharp pain and stopped. I took her to the ER where she had to stay overnight. The doctor told her that she had a cramp.
The Bonfire. Jim was invited to a party. They had a bonfire. Jim and the friends lit it. It was a nice way to spend the night. Jim and the friends were sad when it was dark.
Shin. Tom had a small dog. His dog got very tired. Tom tried to help his dog. Unfortunately he got scratched a lot. Tom's dog needed a lot more help.

Out of battery. Yesterday I was trying to charge my phone. I couldn't find it anywhere. Finally I decided to get a charger. I went to the Apple Store. I was able to charge it with the charger I found.

Raging Rivers. A few years ago my family and I went on vacation. The river went down the river in front of us. I was riding with my brother when I noticed something big. It was the biggest river I had ever seen. It filled up the whole river about five times.

The Broken Pot. Sean was boiling some rice. Suddenly, he realized that he'd left the pot on the stove too long. The pot burst into flames. Sean was trapped in his basement with no way to get out. Luckily, he had a spare pot in the cabinet.

Aliens. One day I went to the library to check out books. There was a huge amount of books to check out so I went quickly. When I got there I realized I forgot my library card. I searched everywhere for it and could not find it. Luckily a nice librarian gave me her card and gave me a ride back home.

The Fender Bender. Jan and her husband went shopping. They were shopping at a grocery store. Jan got into an argument with her husband over some food. Her husband tried to argue back but she got violent. She accidentally hit him in the face with her elbow and he left.

First dibs. It was the last day of summer. Bella didn't have any money for anything. She had to walk down the street with just a few dollars. She looked for places that were open. Luckily she got some snacks from a stand that was open.
Losing the mail. Last month I lost my mail. The mail was supposed to arrive by today. It never came. I called the company. I was then able to get my mail.
Gerry. Gerry was riding the bus home. He was waiting at a stop sign. A man passed by. He ran up to the bus stop to catch the bus. He boarded the bus without waiting for the man.

The Coming Out. Alicia was a quiet child. Her parents wanted to know her true self. When they sat down to think she started to open up. She talked about how she felt about boys. She started dating boys and was happy.
Runny Makeup. Mary was going on a date. She had a nice dress on. She was very excited about the date. Unfortunately, Mary found her make up runny. Mary was embarrassed that she ruined her date.

The Promotion. Jenna had been in her job for a few years. She was not doing as well as she wanted to. Jenna was getting frustrated. She finally decided to talk to her manager. Jenna's manager offered her a promotion.

Charlene the Song Bird. In 1973 I bought a cat. The cat was called Charlotte. Charlene wanted to sing like her auntie Maureen. She sang a song about her love to a girl named Maureen. Charlene sang her song for her love, and her love died that day.

Heart Attack. Jena was a strong woman, but she was also very fat. She didn't exercise much, but she decided to go to the gym. At the gym, she exercised for only thirty minutes at a time. Jena's chest hurt after the workout, but she didn't realize it. Later that day, she had a heart attack and died.
ice cubes. Ida was freezing in her room. She could not bear the cold anymore. She crept into her room. Then she grabbed a large container of ice cubes. Ida's room was so much cooler!

Struck. A man went for a walk on a bridge. He heard a sound coming from behind him. It turned out to be a truck trying to move a trailer. The man didn't move fast enough and the truck crashed into him. The man had been killed in that car wreck.

The Anime. Kim bought a DVD box set of an anime. It was the first one she'd ever watched. She couldn't wait to hear more about it. The first episode she watched made her laugh. She decided to keep watching more anime.
Oliver's Birthday. Today was Oliver's birthday. He had been looking forward to his birthday all month. Oliver's mom packed a birthday cake. Then they decorated the cake. Oliver was very happy.

The Lightning Storm. Jim was sitting at home relaxing. Suddenly lightning struck close to his house. Jim's entire house began to shake. He turned on the television and heard the news report. The lightning had caused a massive lightning storm in his area.

Fleas. I was scratching my legs. My dog accidentally scratched me on the leg. The dog scratched me again. I grabbed a piece of paper and a comb to get rid of the fleas. After that, my legs are no longer scratching.

England. Neil wanted to learn about England. He hired an English teacher to teach him the language. The teacher was not good at English. Neil's English teacher did not help him learn about England. Neil decided that English was not the language for him.

Camping Trip. The campers loaded up their tents and gear and headed to the mountains. At first, the trip was uneventful. After a few hours, a bear spotted the campers. The bear ate all their food and left the campsite. Campers slept under the stars the next night.

Fast Playing. The band played a song at a local bar. The patrons started yelling at the band. They didn't know why they were yelling at them. The band stopped playing. They asked the patrons to please not clap their hands.

The Contest. Molly entered a raffle to win a new car. She had bought the car but needed a lot of help. She worked as many shifts as she could. Finally, she had enough money to enter the raffle. Molly did her best, but still lost the raffle!
Heavy rainstorm. I went to a park today. I wanted to enjoy the day. It began to pour. I decided to stay and play. But the rain ended up washing out the entire park.
Home Work. The man sat down to dinner. He was very hungry. He went to the kitchen. He made himself a sandwich. He sat down and enjoyed the rest of his meal.

Sea Turtle. One of my favorite things about going to the aquarium was the sea turtle exhibit. The exhibit had small, colorful fish that resembled turtles. In the middle of the exhibit, there was a large, colorful sea turtle. This turtle scared me, so I was very nervous about it. I got out of the exhibit quickly, so I never got to see the turtle.

Dinner. It was dinner time at my house. I was having a hard time deciding on what to cook. I went to the kitchen and decided to make tacos. They were delicious! I decided to make tacos every night now.
The Vest. It was a cold night out. The wind blew through the branches. The branches blew over a tree branch. The wind blew the vest away. The branch broke open and it fell down.

Baking a Cake. Mary woke up and decided to bake a cake. She gathered all of the ingredients to bake it. She mixed the batter and put it in the oven. After an hour, the cake was ready. Mary then took a bite of the delicious cake.

Dentist. I had to go to the dentist. It was a pretty scary experience. I was afraid the hygienist would hurt me. When she started to take my teeth out I screamed. I will never go back to that dentist.

Regrets. Alicia never smoked. One day her mom took her to the doctor for a checkup. She decided that she would start smoking. Alicia was horrified to realize it. She was forced to quit smoking for good.
The Shower. The man took a shower. He got soap. He rinsed his face. He changed into clothes. He left the house.

Mugged. I was waiting for my friend at the bus stop. He was waiting at a bus stop across the street from me. He was wearing a green t-shirt and jeans. He got mugged in the middle of the street. I told him that my ex-friend mugged him.

Protest. Gina's school was protesting the firing of one of their teachers. The next day the protesters vandalized the principal's house. There was graffiti and stickers on the door and the paint was wet. Gina watched from her window as the principal and security guards watched. She had no idea what the protesters would do next, but she was relieved.

Carson Wins the Game!. Carson was running for his high school baseball team. His team was tied with one run in the ninth inning. Carson hit a homerun on a line drive. His team won the game. Carson ran up and hugged his parents.

Late Flight. Kim always had a lot of problems with airport security. She always forgot to bring her phone with her. Her family was going to a destination on a flight early next month. They had never been through this before and had a lot of questions. They figured out Kim was going to bring her phone on the flight anyways.

The GoldFish. It was a hot summer day. The Smiths went out to their backyard to play. They found a goldfish on their deck! The goldfish had a beautiful blue and pink coloring. The Smiths took their new pet to be kept.

Rose and Her Rose. The old rose bush in the front yard was overgrown. One day when we went back inside, the rose bush was gone. My dad took a stick to cut down the old rose bushes. I saw her sleeping next to the rose bush. It was the most beautiful rose I've ever seen.

Desert Journey. I always thought driving to the beach was relaxing and peaceful. My friend invited me to go. I said yes. She had me drive for two hours to the beach. She had a blast and we all laughed.

Molly's Beau. Molly was getting married in a few weeks. She wanted her best man to match his suit and tie. The day of the wedding she visited the tailor. She selected a suit and tie that matched his. Molly's boyfriend walked down the aisle to her dress and they cried.
Race. The car entered the race. A man in the second car ran strongly. The man passed the first car. The first car ended up in a wreck. The race ended in a tie.

The Scissors. My grandmother made us a special treat for Christmas. We got her a gift of her very favorite pink ribbon. She wrapped it up in pink paper and hid it in the drawer. On Christmas morning, the drawer was unlocked and the pink ribbon was gone. My grandmother has been making us special gift every year.

Tom Gets a Mechanical Keyboard. Tom got a cheap mechanical keyboard for his birthday. He found out after a few days that he could not type on it. He purchased a more expensive one in order to see if that would help. Tom typed a lot more on the more expensive keyboard. After a few more days his typing improved and he was very happy.
Movies. We had a lot of fun at our friend's house for dinner. We went to the movies. We saw a really fun horror film. We sat in the theater. We did not want to leave!

FB Affair. Tom was in an affair. It was all too much for him. He realized his wife had been cheating on him with someone else. He confronted his wife about it. She confessed and Tom's life was much better.
Sinking Boat. I was out on my boat. We were going to run across the lake in our new motor boat. We hit some bad weather. I heard a loud crash. I realized that my boat had hit a rock in the lake.

The Man with the Cane. Sid the man with the cane was a very funny man. He would tell funny jokes that would bring his friends and neighbors together. One day a man asked him to take out the garbage. The man took out the garbage with Sid's cane. The man told jokes with Sid's cane for the first time ever.

Girl Scout Cookies. Kathy wanted to go to a Girl Scout cookie sale. But she was too shy to ask her mom to buy her the cookies. Finally, she asked her mom if she could buy some. Her mom said yes! Kathy got to get her cookies for free that day!

Car accident. Randy and his wife were going on a road trip. He decided to take her to the grocery store. While they were at the store he noticed a car accident. He immediately drove to help. He helped his wife out and they were both okay.

The Turkey Leg. Jenna was going to make dinner. She decided to make some chicken legs. She put them in the oven to cook for an hour. When she came back, they were burnt and raw. She was happy when she saw she had forgotten to check the oven temperature!

A lost wheel. Kelly was riding a motorbike down the road. All of a sudden her bike went wheel to wheel. She pulled over and her wheel was almost on fire. She put on some new tires. Thankfully she was able to stop and get it out.

Cavities Galore. Jane went to the dentist for her first visit. She was nervous to go because of her fear of the dentist. The dentist reassured her that she had not needed any cavities. The dentist also reassured her that she wasn't going to have any cavities. Jane was happy that she wasn't going to have cavities.

The Proposal. Dan recently got engaged to a beautiful girl. Dan wanted to plan a romantic getaway for his girlfriend. Dan decided to invite all of his friends and family to the getaway. After the getaway, Dan proposed to his girlfriend. Dan was so excited to have his girlfriend, Amy, as his bride.

Exchange. Tessa was on a trip to her new school. She was so excited for it. She had never been overseas before. But when she met her friends they were very different. Tessa was very disappointed in herself.

Secret Smoker. Amber wanted to quit smoking cigarettes. She did not know how to do it. She decided to try to cook her cigarettes on her own. She cooked them for her roommate. The roommate was a good friend and helped her quit.

Down the Stairs. Gina had been in a bad mood all day. It was getting so bad that her grandma would be upset. Her grandpa helped her up the stairs to her room. She couldn't help herself. She jumped down the stairs to her room, feeling better.

Spaghetti. Mary was cooking spaghetti for the first time. She followed the recipe perfectly. Her first time cooking spaghetti she burned her tongue. She quickly realized she would need to adjust the cooking time. After some practice she was able to figure out the issue.

The Track Meet. The field was set up for the mile relay. The flag was waved and everyone started running. As the flag was raised, it fell onto the ground. Everyone stopped and ran after the flag to get it. They won the race, and the team celebrated with a barbecue.

Used Books Suck. Sara liked to go to the library. The library would always have books that she wanted to check out. Sara had never checked out any of the books in the library. One day, Sara checked out a book that was about vampires. Now, Sara doesn't like to go to the library.

The Burger. Beth was feeling hungry and decided to make a burger. She made the pattie from scratch and grilled it on the grill. When she was done it looked amazing. She sat down and took a bite and was amazed. The burger was absolutely delicious!

The Accidental Crime. Larry was walking home. When he passed by a house he noticed the house was empty. He walked to the window and began to peek inside. A man was standing in the yard. Larry watched as the man tried to sell a house.

Making Music. I've always loved watching music videos. There are many that I enjoy watching that I can't make. One day, I decided that I would make my own music video. I worked on the video for a year and got it done. Finally, it was time to share it with my friends.

System Failure. My internet went down this morning. I had an appointment at work the next morning. It took forever to come back up. Eventually I decided to call my internet company. They were able to fix it within 30 minutes.

Trick or Treat. Sally and her friend were trick or treating. They walked down the streets looking for houses. Sally knocked on many doors. Her friend ran through the door, knocking on the neighbor's door. They both ran back to their house.
Football. Dan liked to play football. He went to the park to play one day. He played kickball for several hours. It was late at night when they went home. Dan had to stop playing football.

A Wild Zebra Attack. Jodi was at the zoo with her family. Suddenly, a wild zebra came up and began staring at them. It was very aggressive and almost attacked them. Luckily, the zookeepers had a plan. They had the zoos staff distract the zebra by singing and dancing.
Food. We went to a pizza place. It was a large pizza. I wanted to eat pizza but the cashier insisted. She insisted I put in an order. We ended up eating a few pieces of pizza.

Walking in the store. Today I was walking at the grocery store. It was very boring. It took me forever to go through the produce aisle. I tried to find something to eat. I ended up buying chicken and a soda.
Busted Pipe. The other day I heard a loud bang. I was home alone and my girlfriend heard it. She went up to the porch and looked down. I told her that the pipe had burst. It was just a busted pipe.

Justin's Job. Justin had just started his first job as a computer programmer. He was told he would be working from home for two weeks. Justin and his friends made friends in the computer lab at work. Justin's job wasn't easy but he learned a lot. He made a lot of friends there and worked even harder.

Like father like son. Mike was a carpenter in a small town. He was a father of 2 boys that he never knew how to work with. One day, his neighbor's 2 year old boy asked for his help. His neighbor was on a ladder, helping his brother with a shed. He was so thankful to have Mike's help that day.

Bad Weather. Tom's wife told him she needed to go to the store. Tom reluctantly went. On the way there Tom ran over a log. Tom's wife freaked out and couldn't stop calling him. Tom's wife apologized but felt terrible.
Marty's Roach Problem. Marty was walking in the park. He began to feel sick. He ran to the doctor. The doctor told him he had a roach problem. Marty cleaned his whole house and lived a healthy life.

Making chili. Kelly decided to make chili one day. She went to the store and bought all the ingredients. When she got home, she mixed everything up. When it was done she tasted it. Kelly was glad she had bought all the ingredients.
First Snowfall. I went to the park. The snow had just stopped overnight. I was excited about the next day. The next morning it was finally snowing. I had a blast playing in it!

Gas pump. Ida had a gas pump that she needed to replace. Her pump had died one day. She brought it into the store to replace it. She paid for it and went home. She fixed her pump by the end of the day!

The Playdate. Drew took his girlfriend to the playdate. He was so nervous because she didn't like to clown. He made an effort to calm her down. He played the game, but wasn't very funny. She ended up enjoying herself and they laughed about it a lot.
New Shirt. Tom had just bought a new shirt. It was green. He wore it out one night. Tom lost his balance and fell into the pool. Tom never wore that shirt again.

Last Minute. We made plans to watch Netflix for the night. We left work at about midnight. We had to drive back home. After we got home, we realized it was too late to watch the movie. We got into an argument about it and it was over quickly.

Tired. Toni was feeling tired. She decided to drink some energy drinks. She went through a couple before she knew it. Toni wound up feeling way worse than before. Toni was happy she didn't drink the energy drinks.

Delivery Mistake. Devin's mom took him to the grocery store. He didn't realize she was going to be late for the grocery store. The store was closed so she had to wait for another day. When she got to the store she realized she got it wrong. She didn't get her milk or meat but at least she got free stuff.
Peapod. My wife has been using Peapod for her groceries. She has been waiting for it to arrive in the mail. Yesterday she ran out of the house. She finally got her package. It arrived today.

Game. I wanted to play a game. I looked on the internet for a suitable game. I found out it was a tiebreaker for the spelling bee. I decided to call it The Game. My friends loved it, and the competition was fierce!
March. The boys were playing outside. They decided to march around. They marched to the playground. They had a blast playing basketball and skipping rope. The boys had a great day of fun.
Angry. Angry man. Tina was trying to look great. She took an Uber home to relax. But then she spotted a sign. The Uber driver was going so fast! Tina felt very angry that she had to wait so long.
Food Sale. I was hungry and wanted to eat food. I went to the kitchen. I walked around for awhile. I realized I only had food that I had. I grabbed my things and went home.

off the beach. Susie loved to surf. So she was rather excited to go to the beach. She waited in line to enter the beach. When she was allowed to surf, she was nervous. But when she was surfing, it was beautiful.
Loud Music. Tom was driving home. He heard some really loud music. Tom decided to pull over. Tom got out and heard what the music was. It was a neighbor's car, so Tom called to complain.

No Knife. Gina couldn't find her wallet. She was upset because she had brought a knife to use in school. When she got to the teacher's desk she couldn't find her money. When she went back to her desk her teacher gave her a new wallet. Her mom took her to the principal's office and he gave her back her money.
Lexie brings breakfast. Lexie is hungry one morning. She goes to the kitchen to get some food. She finds some eggs and waffles. Lexie makes breakfast. Lexie is happy to be full.
Vegetables. Sam wanted to eat vegetables more. He decided to cook a big salad. He chopped lots of vegetables. He put them in his bowl. Sam enjoyed the delicious vegetables.

Grocery store. The grocery store was very busy and there were lots of customers. I went in to find some cereal for the kids. When I got to the store, I realized there were too many people to order. I tried to make it to the front door, but the crowd made me lose my balance. I ended up rolling on the floor and hurt myself.
Store Clerk. Eli was a little bit of a clerk. He worked at a fast food restaurant. It was his first day on the job. He took his first order at the counter. He made a twenty dollar order for himself.

Revenge. In grade school I played on the playground with my friend Joe. Joe and I were the best of friends. I ran after Joe and grabbed his nose. Joe was scared and thought I was going to punch him. Instead, I pushed Joe into the fountain and we had a big fight.

The Book Fee. I bought a book from Amazon. It was a collection of short stories. The author did not give a receipt to me. I contacted the author about the problem. The author was willing to issue a $20 credit.

Baseball Fever. Maurice was obsessed with the Boston Red Sox. Baseball season was coming up and Maurice wanted to be a fan. He spent most of the year watching every game. Unfortunately, Maurice's season didn't live up to his expectations. Maurice was disappointed and decided never to go back.

Climbing. Tom wanted to climb a mountain. He began hiking regularly. Tom started climbing the world's tallest mountain. Tom eventually reached the summit of the mountain. Tom celebrated his accomplishments by taking a picture at the top.

A sad day. My father died of pancreatic cancer last month. He was 90 and my mother has a brother that died of cancer. They both went through chemo treatments. I was sad, as they both passed away. I was glad to see them both go, but very sad for their daughter.
Camping. Tom was on a camping trip with his friends. They went to a river to go fishing. Tom wasn't able to find any fish. They decided to take a nap. Tom woke up to find a large fish in the river.

New Running Shoes. Tom had an old pair of running shoes. They became worn out. Tom didn't know how to replace them. He researched them online to find a replacement pair. Tom was able to replace them by himself.

Reuniting. Kate and her sister Erin were about to start a new school. They were both excited about going to the same school. When the new year started Erin was worried about the new kids. She worried about them because the kids seemed very different. They made new friends and the two became best friends.
Owner. Jane was not much of an owner. She let the dogs run free in her house. One day the owners went out of town. Jane did not know who to blame. Jane had to put out the gate and keep her dogs.

Tech Troubles. Dan purchased a brand new PC for his work. At first, everything worked well. Then Dan realized his mouse and keyboard didn't work. Dan couldn't afford to buy a new keyboard, so he was stuck. Dan was so frustrated he never worked again.
Salad. My daughter wanted to make some soup. We bought some carrots and celery. I also bought some salad ingredients. She did a nice job, but it was a tough soup. We got sick a couple of hours later.

Math Mastery. Trevor has always been a good student in school. But he always struggled with math. The teachers he had never helped him. One day, Trevor's mother was sick and Trevor tutored her with math. After a month, Trevor never struggled with math again.
Softball. Dan liked softball. He was good at it. He played all summer long. Dan made the school softball team. Dan now loves playing softball.

Karen's Trip. Karen took a trip to Florida for a vacation. While in Florida she met a man and fell in love. She planned to marry the man but she got pregnant during her trip. She was forced to leave Florida with her baby. Karen now works in the hotel business and makes lots of money.

Ants. Tom was having dinner at a fancy restaurant. He started to get sick. Tom tried to throw up in the bathroom. It was too late and Tom had to go home. Tom ate an entire pizza to make sure he wasn't sick any more.

Louis Breaks Down. Louis is driving home from work one night. Suddenly his car begins to make a loud noise. He pulls over to the side of the road to inspect his car. Louis realizes that his battery is dead. Louis calls for help and waits for his friend.

Cream. Dana always felt she needed a special type of cream to treat her acne. So one day she went to the store and bought an expensive bottle. She felt the cream very strongly and took a lot. She didn't even notice the acne appeared on her face for the first day. But as the next week, acne had grown and she was horrified!

Quentin Cleans House. Quentin notices that his house is starting to smell bad. He decides to go to the store to get cleaning supplies. After his visit, Quentin is happy that he cleaned his house. However, he is still very unhappy about the smell. He wishes he had purchased more cleaning supplies.

Fighting Neighbors. Gina's neighbors didn't seem to care. She would see them hitting on girls at night. But Gina's mom and dad always got tired of it. So Gina started to wonder. Finally she decided she wouldn't let it happen again.

Good Neighbors. Joe had a very messy home. His neighbors decided to help him clean. Joe was thankful for his neighbors' help. His neighbors left him the cleaning chores. Joe cleaned his home a little less afterwards.

The Conference. Kate had just graduated from college. She was applying for jobs. They didn't call back until a week later. She waited in the conference room for an hour. When the interviewer finally called her back, she was relieved.

Janice's First Day. Janice was so excited to go to summer camp. The first day of camp was beautiful. The other kids made fun of Janice. Janice didn't like being teased. She didn't go back to summer camp after that.
Hungry. Gina had a lot of candy left in her house. But she wanted to eat. So she went to the kitchen. But there was no food left in the house. Gina was so hungry she had to get more.

Pizza Pie. Randy was hungry one night. He decided to make some pizza pie. After gathering all the ingredients he realized that he didn't have cheese. Instead Randy went to the grocery store and got the cheese he needed. Randy was able to make a delicious pizza pie that night.

Closer Desk. John was a secretary at a restaurant. John's boss asked him to move his desk closer to the front. John felt the need to move his desk so his boss could see. John moved the desk so that his boss could see the food. John's boss gave him one last glance before moving on.
Work. Kelsi decided to get more hours at work. She asked her boss for more money. Kelsi's boss obliged. Kelsi got more hours at work. Kelsi was happy.

Leg Press. Sara wanted to become more muscular. So she bought a new pair of leg press machines. She got a trainer to help her with her goal. She worked hard for a whole month. And the new machine helped her become more muscular.
Lactose. I loved to eat dairy. However, there was a brand of milk that was 100 calories. I decided to eat it. I ate all the milk. It was too delicious.

Animal safari fun. Kelly went on a safari with her parents. The animal's were very cute. But then the safari went to an elephant's home. The elephant was very loud and very angry. Kelly was in a bad mood for the rest of the trip.

Oven shopping. My roommate was having a birthday party. He wanted to get new oven mitts for his son. I decided to go to the grocery store to buy some. After getting there, I picked out a few to buy. After I bought them, I went home and had to wait for them to heat up.

Door Handle Disaster!. I needed a door handle for my new kitchen. My old one was in the way and breaking. I looked up how to replace it on the internet. After a lot of research, I found a cheap replacement. After replacing it, I was able to make my kitchen door handle work.

My niece. My niece and her husband are expecting a baby in June. We live in an old farmhouse. The whole house is falling apart, it was built in the 1940s. I told my niece she could have a crib at the house. She agreed, she's getting me an antique crib so we can celebrate.

Cancer. The doctor told me I had Stage III pancreatic cancer. I did not want to accept this news. I spent the next 5 years in the hospital, chemotherapy, and radiation. After I had the cancer, I was declared cancer free. I was so happy that I told the doctors I wanted to die peacefully.

Baby. Ava was nine months pregnant. She was really excited to meet the baby! She was carrying the baby in her arms. But then she saw that she was in labor with twins! Ava was sad that she couldn't meet the babies.

Transit Photos. I am a transit buff. I decided to use the transit images from the MBTA. I scanned them off of the TBM website. I made a print of a few. I sent the scanned photos to a transit buff for use.

New Leg. Sara was a ten year old girl. She started growing taller. She was almost ten feet tall by the time she was eight years old. Her parents were horrified. Sara no longer got to sleep in her own bed.

Hepatitis A outbreak. Lily got a lot of her friends together for a party. She brought several drinks with her. All of a sudden she felt sick. When she went to the bathroom she felt extremely sick. She had to go home early and change her clothes.
Robbery. Bobby's apartment was broken into. There were several valuables missing. Bobby called the police. The police arrested the two men. Bobby's apartment was broken into again.
Hack. Kate was working on a website. She was working on a website about kittens. Her cat escaped. Kate went into a room and found her cat in the trash. Kate now has a cat named Hacker.
The Heat. Tom was having problems with his car. It was overheating. He called a mechanic. The mechanic gave him some good news. He told Tom it could be fixed in a few hours.

Cereal and Milk. Kim was watching a cereal commercial for milk and cereal. She was really excited to get cereal for the first time. So she went to the store to buy it. She poured some cereal and milk into a bowl. Her mom was really excited to have cereal.
Old shirt. My old shirt broke. I was wearing it in the bathroom. I could not reach the buttons. I tried ripping it but it wouldn't do. So I had to get a new shirt.

Tantrum. Tom's mom got mad and threw a tantrum. She yelled and screamed, but Tom didn't understand. Finally she calmed down. Tom apologized to his mom for being so mean. Afterwards, he felt a lot better.

Gymnastics. Nancy was competing in her first gymnastics competition. She was nervous about her competition. She put everything that she could into it. She was able to win the competition. Her parents were very proud.

Mike's Dream. Mike always wanted to play basketball. He has played many sports, but he always comes out as the weak link. He thought he might never get on a professional team. As a freshman in college, he tried out for the team. He was overjoyed when he made it on the team and made the varsity team.
school id. John was walking to his class he went outside to look for his class He saw someone he knew He ran back inside and told his teacher They were going to start an investigation

Float Plane. Tommy wanted to learn to fly a boat. Tommy looked up video tutorials on the internet. Tommy looked up how to drive a boat on the water. Tommy drove the boat and was flying a boat. Tommy loved learning to fly a boat.
Jane Moves Out. Jane has to move out. She doesn't have any friends anymore. Jane tells her mom and her mom accepts her. The move is scary. Jane is sad but doesn't regret it.

Visiting. Maryann had to visit a friend. Maryann called a cab to take her to her house. Maryann walked to her friend's house. Her friend had invited her in. Maryann played hide and seek with her friend all night.

Old Friends. Cindy was having a hard time making friends. She always made sure to give new ones a chance. One day her friends decided to not call her for a couple days. She spent the next few weeks trying to make friends again. After a while it looked like she made friends again.

The Pork Dinner. Rene was grilling out on her property. She made a pork dinner that included some of her favorite foods. She put the food in the toaster and turned it on. When it was time to take it out, she checked on the toaster. Luckily, the toaster was already off and the pork was fine.

John burns the biscuits. John is making biscuits. John is mixing the ingredients. John forgets to put salt in the mix. John forgets to add the salt. John burns the biscuits when mixing the ingredients.

Scrapbooking. My friend and I decided to make a scrapbook. We decided on our favorite cartoon. We wrote the names of our favorite characters on cardboard. We put the cardboard on a shelf in our room. We decided to make a giant collection of our favorite cartoons.
Facetime. Barry was working on his piano. Barry did not notice the music stop. He was able to finish playing it. Barry heard his computer stop. Barry had a seizure and lost the music.

Stuffed Animal. Sammy had never eaten a turkey before. He decided to buy a turkey and try it. It was delicious. Sammy then tried a couple of other types as well. He decided to eat more turkeys in the future.

The Weird Deer. I once had a pet deer. It was a very cute and white deer. When we went out in the country one day it did not appear to be hungry. Instead it stood and ate a lot of grass. I guess it was hungry because it came in the car with a huge mess.

Ventilation. The air conditioner ran out of coolant. I turned on the fans, and kept the room cool. I turned on the fans to keep the room cool. One fan blew out the power cord, and the room shut down. I ended up using the fan that stopped working.
Hair. Giselle was getting tired of her hair. She decided she needed to cut it off. She went to a salon that cut hair for her. It was not an easy process. Giselle ended up getting it all cut off.

A Job At 14. Kia wanted to get a part-time job in her town. She applied for jobs at an online retailer, but they didn't hire. She went online and applied for a retail store manager job. The next day, she sent in her resume and went to the store. She got the job, and worked there until her eighteenth birthday.
Spaghetti. John went to eat spaghetti. The waiter brought the food to his table. John sat down and ate the food. He began to feel sick. John went to the restroom and threw up.

Gravy Boat. Tom's grandmother had a grudge against him. Her grudge was that Tom always spent too much time in her house. Tom tried to spend more time with his grandmother. He spent too much time in the kitchen. He was sent away to the kitchen to clean it up.
Wetting the Bed. Sam's mom had made him a bed. She had it very comfy. It got really wet one night. Sam had to wett his bed. It didn't dry out and made his head hurt.

Interview with Strange Man. Nancy called me in for an interview at a company. She wanted me to interview her boss. After an hour of waiting she finally picked me up. As we were driving, a strange man asked her for an autograph. She refused to get him because he was weird and creepy.
The Jack O'Lantern. Mandy was throwing a Halloween party. She had made a jack o lantern. All her kids wore their costumes. Somebody hit it with a pumpkin and it exploded. Mandy had to take it away.

Tea Time. Ralph was feeling depressed. He wanted to start feeling better. He went to his favorite local tea shop to have tea. He enjoyed his tea and felt better. Ralph was very happy that he finally felt better.

Loan Shark. Tom was a student loan shark. He was in his office lending money to his friends. Tom took their money without interest. Tom then pocketed the cash and pocketed the interest. Tom then loaned it to the bank to pay them back.

A Flat Tire. John was driving on the highway. He noticed a sign that indicated a flat tire. He stopped and checked his tire. He had no air in his tires. He had to call for a taxi to take him to the nearest shop.

Teacher. A teacher was upset that he was late for school. He walked into the school office and explained to the teacher what was wrong. The teacher told him he had to go back home. The teacher then picked up his backpack and went home. He forgot to pack his lunch for school the next day.

Skiing Black. Bill took his kids to the park to try skiing. The kids were amazed at how fast they could ski down. He told them to be more careful of the trees in the park. They decided to go to the hills on their own. The kids were amazed at how much they could ski down the hills!

A Stolen Coat. Lucy's grandmother bought her a new coat to wear. Lucy took the coat to her grandma's house. Lucy's grandma found out the coat was stolen. She asked if she could have the coat back. Lucy said she didn't have it.

Acoustic Guitar. Sam was trying to get his guitar out of storage. He found an old guitar on the ground. He picked it up. Sam was able to play it for the first time. Sam was so excited he played every day after that.

Dream to Reality. Tom took a chance on a new game from the arcade. It was a side scrolling shooter. He found out it was very similar to his favorite old game. He began playing right away. He beat all his friends on it.
Helpful. I walked to my car to go to a friend's house. When I walked in, my mom was already talking to me. She wanted me to join the game. I didn't want to and walked away. I left after I went home.
Making potato chips. Susie always wanted to make potato chips. She got the ingredients together. She then put them in the oven. After a while she checked on them. They were ready.

A New Friend. John moved into his first apartment. John got along well with his neighbors. One day, a friend of John's came over to visit. They had a lot in common and became best friends. Now John and his new friend live together.

Money is no good. One day a very rich man came into town. He invited a very poor man to dinner. The poor man could not eat because of his hunger. The rich man decided to offer him money. The poor man accepted and he was no longer hungry.

Skipping Lunch. Bill went to the store with his girlfriend. His girlfriend had to go to work. Bill wanted to skip lunch and eat later. He bought himself a sandwich and a bag of chips. He ate all of his lunch at the store.
Shaving. Tom bought a new razor for a shave. He tried it out one day. He rinsed it out. His face was razor burn. Tom decided to buy a better blade.

Irony. Sam was very religious and he believed in Santa Claus. One morning he woke up and decided to walk downstairs. As he was walking down the stairs a cop stopped him. He told Sam that Santa was an evil guy with no real Christmas spirit. Sam felt so defeated he started to cry.

Wine Taster. Laurie wanted to learn how to taste wine. She hired a personal wine taster for her anniversary dinner. The taster tasted many wines, but failed to note any. She was very upset. She learned her lesson about trying wines blind.

Hill. Sam was a tall kid with a big heart. One day he decided he wanted to climb a hill. He started off slowly at first. But slowly he began to climb higher and higher. After one hour Sam climbed the very biggest hill in the neighborhood.

Beating the Rain Home. Kim and her family drove down to their town's lake house. It was a sunny day and they sat on the deck watching the water. Kim heard a rumble from the basement and jumped for joy. She ran upstairs to check on her siblings. Her parents hurried back downstairs and Kim was able to catch them.

Pizza party fun. Every Sunday, Mike and his friends get together to have pizza. The kids always pick the toppings. This Sunday, they decided to bring homemade pizza. All of their friends were very impressed with their pizza. This Sunday, they will have even more fun.

The Lost Contacts. I have a really dirty pair of contacts. I wore them the other day and they were all covered in mud. I decided to get some wipes out. I was so relieved when I washed the contacts. Now they are clean and I can wear them again.

Messina. Lily bought a house for her young son Frank. He had been in and out of foster care for 10 years. After 2 years, he was ready to meet his new family. Lily bought a beautiful red dress for Frank as he sat in the grand opening. Frank was so excited to meet the new family members!
Match. Jill was playing basketball. She was very good at it. But she felt like she was going to lose. So she challenged a friend. And won the game.

New Appliances. Jane was in a rush to move to the new house. She needed to replace her bathroom sinks. She found the best ones she could. They cost over a hundred dollars. Jane was glad when she was done.

Changing routine. I noticed my body was hurting a lot after a month of heavy lifting. I decided to change my workout routine. I started off light and gentle. I worked up to more intense exercises. My body felt much better after the change!
New Puppy. Karen wanted to get a new puppy. She went to the local animal shelter. She looked at all of the puppies. Finally, she picked one. Karen went home with her new puppy.
Flooded Street. John and his wife wanted to get to a park. But the streets were flooded. John's wife could not drive. So John went to the store. He bought a car and they got home.

Cardiac Arrest. Jake was at the park one day. He was playing basketball when he got spooked by a sudden sound. Jake dropped his basketball and his heart stopped beating. Jake's friend came to pick him up. Jake was rushed to the emergency room to get help.

Fishing trip. Tia had always been scared of fishing. Her boyfriend insisted on going on a fishing trip with her. Tia was reluctant at first. But when he brought her a nice big bass, she was happy. She ended up having a great time fishing!

Late getting home. Lisa was running late for work. She was running around frantically trying to catch up. Finally she arrived home but it was too late. She had to call out sick. She made it on time but still got yelled at for being late.
The Garden. The girl was working in her garden. She began to dig a hole in the soil. She found something amazing. It was a large frog! She picked it up and put it in a bowl.
Vegas. Last week I went to Vegas. It was amazing. I saw a ton of cool places. I even got some tattoos. It was an amazing time.

Sunrise. Jill had always wanted to see the sun rise. She went to her friend's house to go for a walk. She sat down on a blanket and waited for the sun to rise. Jill finally saw the sun rise at her friend's house. She went home and had a nice, hot, sunny afternoon.
Basket. Eli wanted to buy a basket. He decided to get a big one. He bought everything he needed. He put it all in the basket. Eli was so proud that he proudly put his basket on his porch.

The Poker Game. Jason wanted to learn how to play poker. His friends decided to teach him. They sat him down and they taught him how to play. Jason was able to beat them all at the first game. They taught him how to play more and he won lots of games.

Shopping with Bill. Bill had never shopped for himself before. Bill went to the grocery store looking for a few groceries. Bill was surprised to find so many different items for sale. Bill purchased the items on the list. He enjoyed the shopping with Bill.

Tires. I found a pair of great new tires in the garage. I was in the market for a new set of tires. I drove to the dealership to purchase the tires. I found a pair of wheels that matched the tires. I paid the dealer and took the new tires home.
Lost ring. I was walking with my girlfriend yesterday. We were walking around the mall. I kept looking down at my phone. Suddenly, I lost my ring! Luckily I didn't lose it during our walk.
Looking for a dog. I went to the animal shelter. There were so many dogs there. I looked at all the dogs there. One puppy I really wanted. I paid the lady in cash and she took it home.
Older Child. My sister-in-law's daughter is forty. She moved out when she was thirty-five. Her husband is a doctor. She has four sisters. She is always lonely.

Cable Issues. My husband and I have cable issues. We call them to find out what is going on. They send out a cable tech and I get a call from them. When he comes, they unplug everything and tell me they are sorry. They tell me to call back in the morning.
T-Bar. I wanted to learn how to do pull ups. I tried different dumbbells. None of them would do. I ended up using a t-bar instead. After a few weeks I could do 100 pull ups.

Reynolds. A young lady went to her uncle's house for dinner. Her uncle had many kinds of foods. Reynolds was trying to make a fish dinner. He threw all the fish into the sink. His wife found out and came to see what he had done.
Eddie He crashes hard. Eddie is at the bar with friends. He drinks too much. He loses control of his car. He crashes into a pole. Eddie gets out and leaves the bar.

Sewing a Dress. Mary was sewing a dress. She kept forgetting to put thread in the needle. She tried to put the thread through, but the needle wouldn't go through. Mary took the needle out and gave it to the needle. She took the thread from the needle, and sewed the dress.
Back pain. My coworker came in with back pain. I sent an email to the office for a referral. A few days later, the man called. He had back surgery that same day. He was very sore for months after.

Kristy's First Recital. Kristy had always wanted to play the trombone. Her school had a recital coming up and she was anxious to get there. On the day of the recital, she was nervous. Kristy got up on stage and tried her best. Her performance was flawless and she got an A.

The Game. Jim was at a local bowling alley. He had never bowled before. Jim wasn't sure if he'd do well, but he tried his best. Jim did very well, earning $15 and the thrill of victory! Jim decided that bowling wasn't so bad after all.

Overweight Dog. Sally's dog loved to eat grass. She had to try to figure out a way to get it to eat better. She finally decided to put up a fence. The dog refused to play on the fence. Sally bought some chicken and her dog ate it to satisfy her hunger.
New screen protector. Susie got a new protector for her iPad. But her screen was getting scratched. She was horrified. Then she saw the new one. Susie immediately put it on.
Ballet Class`. Jane was having a ballet class. The class started off slow. By the end of the class she was exhausted. She wasn't sure she could go on. But she decided to finish the class and go home.
A roach. Maggie was eating out. She noticed something on her food. She took it off. It was a roach. She screamed and threw her tray.

Facing the Fear. Jared is terrified of clowns. Every Halloween he goes to his local circus and stares at the clowns. This year is no exception. Jared gets up early the next day and finds an open spot. He faces his fear and is surprised at how easy it was.
Angry Dog. Bob got a dog. He took the dog to the park to show it how to play. The dog played for several hours. A strong wind blew the dog away. The dog chased the wind around the park.
First Day of School. Today is Dan's first day of high school. He's a nervous boy. He's also very funny. At lunch he meets a nice girl. Dan is happy to be in a group of friends.

Ana Eats Cereal. Ana was trying to lose weight. She decided to eat cereal for breakfast instead of toast. At first she hated it. But after a few days, she found that it helped her stick to her diet. Ana was very proud of herself.
The Look. Tina loved to make her own makeup. She would apply the foundation, then apply blush. She would then apply mascara. She loved the way her look came out. Tina loved the look of the day!

Puppies. Lina's family was very poor. She wanted to take care of her siblings and keep them safe. She decided to buy them a dog. They loved her new puppy more than anything. Lina was happy she could do something to help her family.
Gift. I ordered a gift from Amazon. I did not know what to get. I went on Amazon and looked at all the options. I decided to buy some books. I bought a bunch of books and a cookbook.

Beatles. Dan loved watching the Beatles live. His wife thought it was boring. Finally Dan convinced her to go with him. They went to see them play at the local stadium. They were very surprised to see how talented they were.

Brockton Rox. I had a great time attending the Brockton Rox baseball game on Monday. I had my ticket stub in the bleachers. I waited in the parking lot of the stadium. I found a spot to sit and eat peanuts from the concession stand. It was a great day and a great time.

Death Scare. Tim was a school bully. He often terrorized the kids at his school. One day, a student tried to fight Tim. Tim attacked him, and the boy got scared. He ran away from Tim and never went back.

First Day. It was Abby's first day at her new school. She wasn't used to new people. She tried to make new friends. It was too hard and she had to move on. She is now going to have a hard time adjusting.
A Good Student. Sam was a good student. He would always get good grades. He hoped to be an adult as well. He studied harder than ever. He ended up achieving his goal.
Life Changes. Tim had a lot of problems at work. He decided to quit. He was miserable at first. Eventually he got better. Tim decided to never give up his dream job.

Allergic Reaction. Rita was playing football with her friends. The ball landed in the sprinkler. She was instantly drenched in water. She ran to the hose and drank water from it. Her skin became very dry and red.

Travel Spanish. Ricardo was traveling through Mexico. He needed to learn some basic Spanish. He was able to catch up to the locals. He was able to pass some basic questions. He ended up speaking Spanish fluently.
Energized. Tim got drunk. He lost his car keys. He looked around for them. He couldn't find them. He turned around and drove back to his hotel.
Class. Milton has always wanted to be a lawyer. He decided to take an early morning law class. He was terrible at it. Eventually his grades got worse. Milton ended up dropping out of the class.
Shampoo. Jenna was having a bad day. She needed to shower. She did not want to be gross. She looked in the bathroom cabinets and found some shampoo. She put it in and went to shower.
Caught. Tim was doing poorly in math. His mother wanted him to take his test. Tim kept being bad. Eventually he was caught and grounded. Tim never got good grades again.
Headphones. I bought my first pair of headphones. I couldn't believe how sensitive they were. I listened to a song I had purchased from amazon. Then I forgot about it. I woke up to find them missing.

Tough Negotiation. Amy got her paycheck and walked out of work. She was at a nearby store when the manager approached her. The manager asked her if she needed any help since she lost her job. Since she was broke and had no job she was in a bad mood. Amy refused and walked out of the store.

Jason Goes to Spain. Jason had always wanted to vacation in Spain. After Years of saving money Jason finally booked a trip. He took a cruise to Barcelona. At the end of the cruise he went to the beach. He was happy he had finally visited Spain.

Aw Nuts. Tina wanted to make her mom some new homemade nut crackers. She mixed together all the ingredients. Then she made her mom a bowl of them. When she took them out of the oven she noticed they were crispy. She had made them!

Bulk. Kate wanted to put on more muscle. She began to eat more food. She also started lifting weights. Eventually her muscles grew big and strong. Kate was proud of herself for being able to lift so much.

Swimming Lessons. Cora was excited about swimming lessons for her birthday. She was afraid she would be too young and not know how to swim. Her mom encouraged her to just relax and enjoy it all. Cora realized she didn't need to be afraid, and decided to take lessons. It turned out that swimming was not that scary after all!
Johnny plays basketball. Johnny is playing basketball. He is trying to score the winning shot. Johnny is losing the game. He gets fouled by a defender. Johnny makes the winning shot.

Making a painting. I wanted to make a painting. I went to the art store to buy supplies. Then I went home and painted my picture. Then I put the painting on a poster. Now my painting is hanging in my house.

The Blanket. My sister wanted to sleep. She bought a blanket and curled up in the living room. I tried to get under her blanket. She rolled under the blanket and I had to get her out of it. She was upset that I rolled under her blanket.

Dottie Needs A Bath. Dottie loves taking baths. She doesn't have any soap in her bathroom. Dottie decides to go to the store to buy some. She drives to the store to purchase some soap. She returns home and takes a bath.

Hunting. Brent wanted to take his son hunting. He drove to the park to do so. While there he told his son to wait at the shooting line. Brent's son waited, but no shot rang out. Brent realized it was not his son that was waiting for a shot.

Health Care. Dana has lived in the same city her whole life. When her husband dies, she will leave the city she loves. Dana's husband died of cancer, and Dana doesn't know how she will pay for care. Dana's sister works for the same hospital, and is trying to raise money. Dana is hoping to raise enough money for both of them.

Work Life. Mary is the oldest of five sisters. She has a job that pays very little. She worked very hard all throughout high school. Mary went to college and got a degree. She now works a job that pays more than her college degree.
Hair. Kim needed a new hair style. She did not like how she looked. She decided to get some dye. When she did, it looked awful. Kim decided she would not dye her hair again.

Amy's New Child. Amy's husband died from a heart attack while pregnant. They had to get a new baby quickly, or her mother might have an issue. After several months of searching, Amy found a baby girl. Amy went to the hospital and gave birth to a healthy girl. She loved the sweet baby girl even more than her old one.

cooking class. Lulu needed to learn to cook for her family. She decided she would go to a cooking class. Lulu signed up for the class. Her family loved the cooking lessons. Lulu made the family happy.

Fusion. Kenny was a big fan of anime. He decided to visit his favorite series. He spent his days in a local anime convention. While there, he was inspired by many of the fan's culture. He decided to use it as his inspiration for his own life.

First Haircut. Allie always wanted to cut her hair very short. When she was sixteen she got a job at an assisted living center. She would do the majority of the job herself. She learned she needed to cut hair for other people. Now Allie has her own stylist for all her needs.

Train Trip. Tim's friend invited him to go on a train trip. Tim was skeptical at first, but went anyways. They went to different cities across the country. Tim found the train ride fun and interesting. He decided to go on another train trip the next week!

The Investigation. A man went to a store for a glass of water. When he reached for the water, he felt something soft. He realized it was his wife. He got up from the bench and checked on her. She was crying and her eyes were open.
Berry gets hurt. Berry is playing with his toy cars. Berry has a huge accident. Berry is knocked out and hurt. Berry calls for help. He is taken to the hospital.
Too tired to remember to pay. Ivan was tired. He decided to leave work early. He got to his destination. But he forgot to pay his cab fare. He went back to work, furious.
stray. A stray dog ran into the house. It was scared of us. We gave it some water. We gave it some food. The dog calmed down in no time.

Land Surprise. Lily was going to see the moon in her state with her family. She invited a few close friends. When she got there, she went straight to the big telescope. Lily was amazed by the sheer beauty of the moon. She wished she hadn't spent so much time on the ground.

The Trampoline. Jim decided to build a trampoline for his son. He bought all the materials at the store. He then spent a long time putting it together. Jim then took his son to try it out. Jim's son was so happy he jumped for the first time that day.

Best job. Dana got the job of her dreams. She was a great waitress and loved her job. One day Dana made a bad decision and got fired. Now Dana had nothing but bad memories of her bad job. Now Dana just wants to quit her job and give up.

Dishes. Kia's mom cooked every Saturday. She had a lot of dishes to clean. But then her dad died and she was alone at home. Her mother moved in and Kia had to clean dishes again. Her mother was angry when she found out!

Cancer. I told my doctor I wanted to get a biopsy. I waited for a week and asked to schedule it. I woke up the next day and called the doctor for an appointment. He came to my house and set up my equipment. The biopsy was a success.

Fashionista in Training. Caroline was getting ready for her next class of the day. She had to put on a skirt and some jeans. She spent the whole class doing her hair and makeup. When she got home, her mom was surprised by the changes. She decided that Caroline was going to be a fashionista.

Cat at the  window. Sara was in her bedroom when she heard her cat barking. She looked up and saw her cat peering through her window. The cat's attention was grabbed by a bird on the kitchen table. The bird knocked the cat onto the floor. The cat clawed her arm trying to get back up.

The Dented Car. The kids were playing outside. They found a ball and began to chase it. Suddenly, the ball rolled into a puddle of water. The kids were scared and started crying. They ran back home to tell their parents.

Large. The man had a large amount of money. He decided to use the money to buy a small car. He saved up over time and bought the car. The car was so large that it ran out of gas and had to be towed. The man was very sad to find out that he wasted his money.

A new bike. Abe got a new bike for his birthday. It was green and green and green. Abe rode his new bike to school every day. One day, a bird flew by and landed on Abe's bike. Abe went back to his mom to get a new bike.

Phone Service. Tom went to the phone company for a service call. The service was very slow. Tom complained to the manager. The manager apologized for the inconvenience. Tom called the provider back the next day.
Bee. The bee stung Ray by the hand. He ran to the doctor. He needed to get some antibiotics. The doctor gave him some antibiotics. Ray's finger was swollen and red.
Painting. Bob wanted to become a better painter. He went to the paint store to buy a kit. The paint store was out of paint. Bob got angry. Bob punched the paint store owner.

Shark Attack. I went fishing with some friends yesterday. We were fishing at my favorite spot in the lake. About an hour into fishing, a big shark appeared. Everyone on the fishing boat ran in the water. They were all scared and did not catch any fish.

Beach. Abe's family wanted to go to the beach one day. It was getting dark and it was almost time to go. They drove to the local beach and packed their towels and bathing suits. Then they went out into the ocean and played in the water. It was a great way to spend the day!

Life is No Beach. Dana went on vacation to the beach. She forgot to pack sunscreen and a hat. The beach was incredibly hot and she got sunburned. She tried to ignore it but it was too painful to ignore. She learned that not packing a spare will pay off in the long run.

Loud Neighbors. Tom was getting into his late twenties. He was having trouble finding roommates. Tom heard strange noises coming from his neighbor's house. Tom was able to get a few roommates to move in. Tom was able to relax.
Found Change. A man was driving down the street. He noticed a box on the ground. The box was filled with ten pennies. He put the pennies in his pocket. When he got home he counted them all.

Out to lunch. Amy had just finished up at a diner. She hadn't eaten a bite of her meal. At lunchtime Amy sat down at the cafe and ordered a burger. Amy thought she couldn't eat too much, but she took a bite. The burger was delicious!

Songwriter. Tim always loved to write songs. One day, he decided to start a band with his friends. His friends wanted to play together as well, but Tim thought it over. After a lot of thought, he decided that he would join the band. They went on to become very successful and popular.

Defensive Driving. My boyfriend drives me everywhere. We always make plans to go somewhere different. This time I am going to an amusement park. He has no idea where I am going. I told him that if he drives me there I will take off.
Just Order Pizza. The kids were hungry. So they decided to order pizza. They got a small cheese pizza. They all loved it! They could not wait to get a larger one.

Rock climbing fear. My cousin went rock climbing this weekend. He brought his girlfriend along. He took a couple of hours to climb all the way to the top. Then he went all out and went on a long swing. She fell and was injured.

Accidentally. Ivan was a very curious boy. He asked his dad for a toy remote control airplane. His dad thought that Ivan would be happy to get the toy. But Ivan didn't want to play with the airplane. So his dad told him to wait till after school.

Robbed. Sandy was standing on her front step. She heard some noise in her house. She looked up and saw a robber walking around with her purse. She called the police and explained what happened. The police caught the thief and Sandy was very happy.

Embarrassment at the Mall. Amy was at the mall. She was shopping with a friend. Amy was looking for a new outfit. She realized she had no money and no way to go home. Amy felt really embarrassed that she had no way home.
Bench. Joe sat on his bench in the park. He liked to read. A man came up and asked Joe for some help. Joe asked if he could sit with him. The man said he was a big fan of Joe's.
Warm Milk. Kim was trying to stay warm. She had hot coffee and tea. Finally she tried the warm milk. It tasted a lot like coffee and tea! Kim realized that she should have bought cold milk.
Ghost. My dog was scared to sleep in the house. I took her to the pet store. I found her a nice little dog. I bought him a mask. It did not work, but she did not panic.

New Chromebook Laptop. My friend brought me a new Chromebook laptop for my birthday. I tried to find some music I liked on it, but it only had one song. I was disappointed that I couldn't hear anything at all. My friend took the laptop back and I returned it with a new one. Now I can hear the music all the time!

The Good. Beth's friend invited her to a party. At the party Beth saw several attractive men. She felt uneasy, so she said no. Her friend felt that Beth was trying to be a rebel. Beth felt bad, so she went to the party reluctantly.
Tough burn. Today Tina went to the beach. She brought some sunscreen. As she was walking she got bit by a mosquito. It burned her badly. Luckily she had a band aid for it.

Objection. Maryann was talking to a friend in the library. She noticed that she was being followed by a stranger. She became suspicious that someone was following her. She ran out of the library. The stranger gave her an irritated look and left.
Gym. Alicia wanted to get in shape. She decided to join a gym. She got her membership and started to work out. She loved it. Alicia had lost 5 pounds.

First Female Football Player. Cindy wanted to play a sport but she was afraid to try out for a team. Cindy felt embarrassed to try out for the girls' team. In a fit of competitiveness, Cindy was selected to be on the team. Cindy had so much fun playing with her new teammates. In the end, Cindy and her teammates became best friends.

Bird Feeder. I came home from work this afternoon. I noticed there were no birds outside my door. I went to my garage and took out my bird feeder. I placed the feeder in my front yard. Now birds eat from the feeder.

New School. Jane was starting her first day at a new school. She was nervous, but she got over it quickly. At lunch time she had her tray and found out she was new. Everyone there was so kind to her! She learned quickly that school was not so bad.

Funny Girl. A little girl had a funny look on her face. Her dad asked her what she was doing. She told him she was trying to say a phrase she heard on the radio. He laughed so hard he couldn't hear. When he heard it again, he laughed even harder.

History. Tim was in eighth grade and wanted to be good at history. He decided to spend every Sunday afternoon reading history books. He even wrote his own history books for his mom and dad. Eventually Tim became quite good at history. Now Tim is happy that he learned about his history.

Angela's Essay. Angela wrote an essay about her childhood. She couldn't finish it in one hour. She tried to start the essay but it wasn't moving. She decided to leave it on the teacher's desk. The teacher read the essay and was happy with it.

The Phone Fiasco. Tina was working on an important project. She was texting her sister in class. She accidentally sent an embarrassing message to her. Tina's mother found the text on her phone. Tina's mother grounded her until her grades improved.

Moused. I was cleaning my house one day. I found a lot of matted dirt and grime on the floor. I used a mouser to make a rag out of it. It helped to clean off the grime. The mouser worked so well I ended up using it everyday.
Karen's help. Karen was looking for a place to stay. She found a nice motel. She checked out her room. Then, she called her friends to ask if they needed anything. Luckily, her friends said yes.

One Man Circus. Tom was riding his horse down the street. A man was riding on the same horse. The man called out for Tom's help. Tom rode up to the man. Tom was able to help him out by giving him some advice.

economics class. My friend and I were assigned to do an experiment. We went to a university lab. I was able to get the wrong chemicals. The chemicals turned out to be propylene glycols. They were very strong, so we had to be evacuated.

sailing. Anna wanted to learn to sail. But she wanted to learn from her mom, not her dad! She begged him to take her out to the lake and show her. He finally agreed to let Anna go out to the lake. When they got there, Anna was so happy to see a beautiful boat!

Trip to the Vet. Our dog Max died of dehydration. The vet said Max had a broken leg. She sent a post mortem report with a picture of Max. Our family went to the vet's office and took Max home. Max was happy to see us after he recovered.
Baking. I baked some cookies this morning. They looked great. I brought them with me for lunch. Everyone at lunch thought they were great. I have to make them more often.

Not Impressed. Nancy saw that the food served at her restaurant was really hot. She tried to tell her waiter that she was sick. Since she couldn't afford to pay for it, she had to cook it. She burned herself and had to call 911. Luckily, the ambulance arrived soon.

James and the Driving Test. James loved to drive his motorcycle. James was very careful during all driving conditions. One day, James drove very fast, and the motorcycle flew off. James didn't make it to the finish line on his first attempt. James decided to never drive a motorcycle again.

The New Puppy. Today my dog is getting ready for the day. He is getting ready to run and play in the yard. He looks happy but he looks tired. The puppy gets ready to play. The puppy eats dinner and cleans up.
Birthday Cake. We baked a cake for Jane's birthday. She loved the cake very much. We got her a glass of wine. We also gave her a book. We were sad to see her leave.

Rebooting The Network. Dan wanted to give his company a small cash injection. He decided to reboot the company's network. Dan's colleagues started complaining about the changes. Dan was fired over the changes. He decided not to reboot the network again.

Visiting Family. Today my family and I are going to visit my cousins. My cousin lives in the town where we live. I drove all the way to the town in a minivan. We had lunch and then drove to the hotel. We stayed there all day and visited my cousins.

Bottom of the sea. I once decided I was going to go down the bottom of the sea. I loaded up my boat and took off. After a couple of days of waiting I started to get impatient. I was so impatient that I decided to go home. I wish I never went down the bottom of the sea.
Chef Tasha. Tasha wanted to become a chef. She trained hard in culinary school. She was able to attend several culinary schools. Tasha got a job working as a chef. She is now a successful chef.
Hamster. I decided to buy a hamster. I went to the pet store to look around. The hamster was very small. The cage was too small. I decided to just buy another hamster instead.
Allergic. Lucy was shopping at the store. A bee was on the table. She was very allergic to bees. She ran out of the store. She decided to never shop at the store again.
Doll. Anna was an elementary school student. She needed a doll for class. She asked her mom to buy her a new doll. Her mom agreed to buy Anna a doll. Anna was happy with the purchase.
Getting Fat. Sandy was very fat. Her friends made fun of her. Sandy went to the gym. She started working out everyday. Soon, Sandy was a skinny little girl.
Nature. Bethany was feeling sad. She decided to look into nature. She went to the local park. There, she saw many animals. Bethany was happy to be in nature.

The Big Storm. When she was a little girl, Ann wanted to ride the roller coaster. She was only six and it was the first one she ever tried. Ann screamed with excitement at the very first drop. As she got older, she grew tired of it. Ann decided she did not want to ride anymore roller coasters.

Haunted?. Sam was very scared of the dark. He was having a bad dream the night before. He couldn't get his eyes to open. He laid in bed staring at the wall for hours. Sam eventually drifted off to sleep.

The Ski Trip. Ike and his dad had always wanted to ski. They were going to take their first trip to the mountain in a few years. Ike loved skiing and had to get a lot of practice. When they got to the mountain, Ike fell and broke his leg. He and his dad took the rest of the trip home.
Muffler. The brakes were making a noise. They were worn down from years of use. I took it to the dealer to have them rebuilt. They came out and rebuilt my brakes. They are now quiet as can be.
Class. Jim was bored. He decided to join a class. The class was mostly reading and writing. Jim learned a lot from the class. He decided to stay and continue to read more classes.

Ears Pierced for the First Time. I've always hated the idea of earrings. After Years of avoiding them, I was finally ready to change my mind. My ears began to hurt, and I wanted to scream in pain. I went to my family reunion and got my ears pierced. Everyone laughed and told me I was stupid for not trying sooner.

mermaid. Mia was at a fair. She saw a mermaid in a mermaid costume. She thought the mermaid looked very pretty. She asked her mom if she could get one of the mermaid costumes. Mia's mom bought her the mermaid costume for Halloween.

Tomboy Ballerina. Tammy wanted to be a tomboy. She thought she would wear princess ballerinas and shorts to school. Tammy's mom and dad weren't comfortable with this. Tammy asked to borrow a dress to wear in her school. Her mom and dad let her wear whatever she wanted and Tammy became tomboy.

Garbage Man. When I was five years old, I loved to play games. One of my favorites was a type of board game called Monopoly. I got a lot of money in the monopoly game, but it wasn't enough to buy a car. I asked my dad if I could play, and he gave me his old truck. Now I love to play monopoly with my dad.

Poor artist. John was commissioned to paint a mural. John loved doing artwork but had a hard time. The only problem was that he had no idea how to draw. John practiced everyday for months. By the end of the month, John was an expert painter.

Roasting Session. I decided to learn how to roast some chicken. I bought all of the materials I would need. I bought a roasting pan, charcoal and a bag of chicken. I spent the next hour roasting the chicken. It was the best roast chicken I ever had!
Flat. Gina was waiting in the car. She hoped no one would notice her. But now the car was moving very slowly. She wondered how long she'd be there. She sat down impatiently.

His Feet. My dad had a pair of white tennis shoes. He wore them to play in the soccer game. The ball rolled out of his hands and into the road. He had to jump on a truck to get back on his feet. My dad never saw those shoes again.

The last chance. Mike was a musician. He had never played in front of crowds of people. One day his band was invited to play at a wedding. He was a bit nervous but decided to give it a shot. The audience loved the band and they ended up winning the wedding.

Horse Races. There were a lot of horse races this weekend. I went with my daughter and her friends. We rode from the beginning to the finish line. We cheered for each horse as they were passed by. I got a good time but only made it to second place.
Homework. Sara hated doing homework. Her mom insisted that she write a story. She worked on it all night. Sara finished it on time. She was glad she had to do her homework!

Fruit salad making. I wanted to make fruit salad for my kids. I decided to go to the store to buy some produce. When I got there I found out that all fruits were not very healthy. I went to a different store to buy some vegetables. After finding some vegetables, I made fruit salad for my kids.
Cake. The man baked a cake. He tried a new recipe. It turned out terrible. The man gave up. He went to the bakery to get a new recipe.

The Lipstick. Katie bought an expensive lipstick online. She thought it would last forever. But a month later, she got a terrible rash. Her lips were swollen and red. She had to stop wearing the lipstick for good.

Fred. Fred is my brother's best friend. One day my brother's friend Fred left his home. Fred has been missing for over two weeks. He was last seen at a restaurant with a friend. I hope that he is found safe.

Figuring out the story. I wanted to figure out the secret behind the boy's name. He had a name I could not remember. I looked in my notebooks for my notes. I tried to find some information but all I found was random letters. It didn't take long to realize the boy was a hoax.

The Wedding Announcement. Mary was getting married. Her best man was supposed to be at the reception. Her friend's family had a surprise for her. His name was announced at the reception. He came to the reception with his parents.
Billburg. Billburg was a professional dancer. She practiced every day. She auditioned for an upcoming competition. Billburg won the competition. She was awarded a medal of thanks.
A few drinks. I went to a bar last night. I started drinking a bit. At first it was just going to sit there. After a while I wanted more. I ended up finishing the whole thing.
Snow Storm. I was playing outside. I heard a loud noise. It started to snow. I ran inside my house. I forgot about the snow until I heard the car.

Hypnotism. Sue was at work when she was feeling very weak. She needed to get home quickly. Sue went to her office and called in sick. She went into the back room and asked for an assistant. Her new assistant called the doctor and gave her medicine to relax.

Hail Storm. My friends and I went to a bar one night. We were drinking beers and watching tv. A large hail storm came and we ran inside. We watched it as it crashed through the house and knocked things over. I felt scared but safe, and left immediately.
New Name. Jane wanted to change her name. She was sick of her old name. She wrote a letter to the editor. Jane went to the newspaper. Jane changed her name.
