No More Swimming. Lana hated swimming at the beach. She went to the store and bought a life jacket. She also purchased a bag of sand to use as a swim pad. She set her bag on the sand and went for a swim. She went back home after she was done and turned her bag inside out.

Luscious. Mara was a girl with a very small head. She always seemed to wear makeup and lots of fake eyelashes. Her parents always said that she looked beautiful. Until one day, she decided to stop wearing fake eyelashes. Now Mara looks incredibly beautiful.

Talking Smack. I got in trouble at school for being disrespectful to teachers. So I decided to practice my verbal diarrhea skills on my friend. I told him I was going to be mean and he told me to shut up. After I finished, I went to my friend's house to practice. But my friend showed up with a bucket of water and told me to be quiet.
Illness. Nolan was always ill. He didn't know why. One day he realized it was from being outdoors. He went back inside for a day. His wife helped him rest until he felt better.
The Hat. Sue loved hats. She found the perfect one for the party. Everyone loved it. Her friends asked her to wear it. She wore it at her party that weekend.
Pilot. I was flying a kite one day. I felt something on my leg and yanked. I pulled my kite out of the trees. I went to get a better look. It was a large golden retriever.

Shopping. I went to the store for some groceries. I had a grocery list so I could go shopping. I got in my car and drove to the store. I got everything on the list out of the car. After driving home I gave the groceries to my mother.

Password Woes. Karen worked for an online retailer. One day, she noticed her password was missing. She tried to figure out what happened. After some detective work, Karen realized it was a phishing scam. Karen had her password reset and lost all the work she'd done.

Haunted. My cousin and I were going to go to the haunted house. We got really scared and decided to go back home. We decided to see the manager, who was very nice and funny. The manager gave us snacks and told us we would be safe. It was a really fun time and we decided to go again!
Sam's Tomato Plant. Sam loved tomatoes. He planted one in his backyard. Sam didn't pay much attention to his plant. Sam's tomato plant grew and grew. Sam was happy with his new plant.

The empty theater. Julie was excited for the new movie playing in the theater. She went over to check it out. There were only empty seats at the box office. Julie looked at the ticket counter and realized they were free. Julie happily went home to have a movie.

Dandelions. Ava was walking her dog. Her dog didn't see the dandelions growing in the grass. The dandelions got pulled out of Ava's dog's mouth. The dandelions stung Ava on the arm! Ava had to go to the doctor to get medicine for her arm.

Purse shopping. The Smith's couldn't afford to pay their rent. They decided to use the money they made from a job to get a purse. They found a nice looking one that they liked and bought it. They had to make sure they were wearing it to the next store. Unfortunately they fell asleep before getting to the next store.

Meg's Field Day. Meg and her teacher decided to throw a field day at school. Meg's teacher and her friend Beth planned the field day. They brought games and treats for the kids. After the field day the kids had lots of fun. They returned home with a lot of candy and games for the next field day.
The New Car. Bill got a new car. He didn't have a lot of money. Bill wanted a down payment. Bill didn't have enough money. Bill was late on his payments.
Troubled Child. Jane had a toddler named George. Jane noticed George was fussy and crying. Jane took him to the doctor. The doctor examined him. Jane was happy when he had a good day.
Making Tea. Tom wanted to make some tea. He boiled some water. He added a tea bag. He steeped the tea for a while. Afterwards he brewed some tea.
Too loud of a vacuum. I was using a large vacuum yesterday. I tried to fill it with some quarters. The vacuum went really loud. I got really scared. I then had to turn it off.

Ear Buds. When I was younger I really wanted to play football. It was at a local junior high school football game. Everyone wanted me to go down to the football field. I put my headphones in and started playing the game. After I ran all around the field I had to run back to my car.

The Rookie. John was a very good soccer player. He was chosen to play on the soccer team as a rookie. The first game of the season, he hurt his leg and couldn't play. John was disappointed. However, the injury healed and he was able to play again.
My Trip. I visited my girlfriend in Mexico City during the summer. I took a bus to her home town. The bus broke down halfway there. I was stuck in the city. We ate at a local restaurant.

Sylvia's Change of Opinion. Sylvia was a very picky eater, and could not eat a lot of foods. Sylvia's friend asked if Sylvia would like to go out one day. Sylvia had a great idea, and her friend took her out for dinner. After dinner, Sylvia decided she liked the food a lot, and thanked her. Her friend agreed that they should see each other more often.

actor appearance in show. I decided to try out for the school play. I dressed up and did my makeup. Then I went to the audition and did a very good job. I got the part! I did my best performance at the audition!

The Party. Tara had a secret party to attend. She didn't tell her mom. She hid in the bathroom closet. When she walked out, everyone looked at her with disgust. Tara laughed and said she didn't have to have anything to do with it.

Setting Up Her Sister. Kim was at her grandmother's house for the weekend. She asked her sister how to set up a computer. Her sister did not know how to set up anything. Kim helped her learn. Her sister is doing pretty well now.

Prom Pals. I was in the third grade. My best friend from the year before was a popular girl. I used to play with her at the county fair and in the hall. She got into the third grade and became popular. It was fun to be friends with her again.

The Artist. Diane liked to paint. She painted the walls of her home and even the garage. When her dad died, she sold everything she painted. Now Diane works as a professional artist in her free time. She is so happy she painted her own home and garage.
The Acorn. I used to collect acorns from the forest. One day I found an acorn on the ground. It was very old and green. I picked it up and put it in my bag. The acorn has become very special to me.
Yo yo. Anna got a new yo yo. She needed to use it. So she decided to try it out. It worked out very well! Anna was happy she had got it out of the package.

Best intentions. Tara thought her boyfriend would never date her. She was very naive about him. But after years of dating, he asked her on a date. She was thrilled. It turned out he was actually very good.

The hostage situation. Freddy was eating lunch at a diner. Suddenly a man came up to him and demanded the money. Freddy was afraid so he pretended to be scared. The man took the money and ran away. Freddy was so thankful that he didn't cry.

Crystal Chandelier. I had a pet cat named Crystal. I loved Crystal so much. I decided to make her a pet chandelier. I put blue crystals in it and arranged them around her. Crystal's chandelier is her favorite feature!

The Wheelchair Death. John was walking down the street. His foot got stuck on a metal bar. He tried to use a wheelchair. He fell down and hit his head on a lamp. He was able to get a few stitches after that.
The Gift. Cindy was planning on giving her sister a birthday gift. She decided to get her sister some shoes. She bought her a pair of shoes. She gave them to her sister. Her sister loved them.

Pokemon Go. Tina downloaded Pokemon Go on her phone. She immediately started looking for her lost pokemon. She had no luck until she found the perfect Pokemon. She found the perfect pokemon to capture and sent it to her parents. Tina felt relieved as she returned the pokemon to her mom.

Past Ghosts. The past residents of a haunted house were talking about it. Everyone was saying the same things, it was creepy. They talked about ghosts from the past that they lived in. I realized that they were talking about the same ghosts. We decided to just go back to the haunted house and go with our group.

Using a Coupon. Dina was at the grocery store. When she got back, she found she got a coupon for a big purchase. She was excited but realized she couldn't use it right now. Dina decided to use it at a later time. After that, she was able to use it on her purchase.
Gift. My grandmother got my mother in law a present. It was a beautiful gold watch. My grandmother's eyes lit up with happiness. She gave it to my mother in law. She thanked her in a letter.

PIE. Sam went to the bakery. He wanted to buy a slice of pie. When he walked inside he realized that they had no pies left. He decided to go home and make his own pie instead. His pie turned out to be the best that he had ever eaten.

Driving on the highway. A young man wanted to take up driving. He bought a used BMW. He looked up local driving schools and went there. He got his learner's permit the very first day. He went back to school the very next week.

The Holiday. Abe couldn't wait to go home for the holidays. He had been working hard all year. But he'd been in a lot of debt. He could barely afford his gas bill. He knew it would be hard to make it home this time.

New Job. John worked at a bank. He was fired after a few months of poor performance. John went to interview for a different job. His interview went really well. John got the new job with no more problems.

Gym Error. Sam went to the gym. He saw someone jump on one of the bars. Sam looked down and his foot was on the side of the bar. He tried to jump out but missed. He got up and found out that he broke his ankle.

Best Friends. The Anderson family went on vacation every summer. The oldest daughter always got picked last. She liked to dress up as princesses and fairy princesses. One time she dressed up as a princess and her parents were upset. She always had to be the princess for the whole trip.

Road Trip. I decided to drive to my job in California. I planned out a route from Los Angeles to San Diego. My friends were going with me. When I got to California, I was exhausted. I took a cab to my job in San Diego.

The Don Becomes King. The Don is having an unhappy life. He is a widower with two kids. The Don decides it is time to start living his dream. He becomes a King in his country. The Don is glad to have fulfilled his life's dream.

Time Capsule. Tia was in charge of a time capsule. She had to build it. She got a bunch of her friends together. She was excited to see what they would do. But then she realized it was just a box and it wasn't time yet.

Starbucks. My mom decided to go to Starbucks. She went to the coffee shop and sat down. She wanted to order a latte, but did not have enough money. Her debit card ran out of money on the way to Starbucks. My mom had to pay $20 to get her coffee.

The Refund. Jenny wanted to buy a new video game. She looked for a cheap copy online. She received an email from the store. The store gave her a refund for the game. She took it home and played it happily.

Medal. Gina's family was proud of her for getting the ribbon. She told them she was glad she had done it. She didn't want to tell them what the medal was. But when she got home they were upset. The medal was a photo of her and the other girl.

The Parade. The kids were excited to see the parade. They got dressed up and headed out. It started with music and waving flags. Then, they saw giant fire trucks! Finally, they headed home with candy and treats.
Cindy goes out. Cindy was an elderly lady. She got very lonely one day. She decided she would visit her old friend. She drove to her friend's house and met up with her. They had a fun day.

The Author. I read an article about a famous author. He wrote about being bullied by a rival school. The author said he was so sick of being bullied that he quit. The article made me want to be the author. Now I write fan fiction about my experiences in school.

Paris. Paris is a beautiful city full of fun activities. It was my first time visiting Paris. I went to the Musee d'Orsay. I was blown away by the artwork. I returned home with new eyes for the beautiful city!

Wedding Troubles. Rachael is getting married in a month. She is scared because she hasn't been in a relationship for over a year. On her wedding day, she meets her fiance. He is really handsome and asks her on a date. Rachael is overjoyed and feels so happy.
Great date. Lily and Fred had a great time at the movies. Fred decided to take Lily out. Lily agreed. Fred picked her up and went to a nice restaurant. They ended up having a great time.

Javier Wears Cleats. Javier was not very athletic. He decided he needed to start to wear cleats more often. He spent an hour a day running around the track. Eventually he got stronger and began to be able to run faster. Javier is happy to be wearing cleats more often now.

Pizza place. John and Jimmy went to this pizza place for lunch. They ordered three pepperoni pizzas and a chocolate cake. They ate them all before lunch. They sat on the couch to watch tv. They both felt hungry.
The Bike. I bought a new bike for my daughter. It was pink and yellow. It looked like a bike with wheels. We put it in her room. She loves her new bike!

Harry. Harry went to the corner store on his way to work one day. A strange man stared at him in the store, and Harry became nervous. Harry picked up a broom and looked at the strange man. The strange man did not notice Harry. Harry left the store, feeling less nervous about people that he does not know.

Ruined Vacation. The Smith family was in Costa Rica. They decided to go to the beach to swim. But they were too tired from work to swim. They decided to take the highway instead. Unfortunately, a drunk driver ran them off the road and into the sea.

Compulsive Liar. I told her about my friend Jim. Jim was always taking things personally. He'd lie about anyone who was close to him. One day, Jim called me at work and accused me of lying about him. Now he has his friends all over him trying to hurt him.

Second Home. One day, our 2 year old granddaughter returned from vacation. Her mother had left her at her grandmother's house. Her mother was not home when the family went to check on her. They called her mother's home and she had come over. Our granddaughter is home, and the mother is happy to have her back.

Samantha's Flight. Samantha had to get to another airport. She didn't have a car so she had to walk. She saw an old lady on the side of the street. She decided to walk her home. Samantha was glad that she had walked instead of driving.

Bad Pasta. Seth was a chef. He made a pasta dish for a party. He wasn't paying enough attention to the pasta. When he served the pasta, it was very overcooked. He wasn't able to sell the dish at the party.
Ebay. I sell used items on Ebay. Today I found a bike that I was selling for $50. I put it up for bidding and it sold. I received the item and posted it for $40. I posted it for $60.

Football game. Travis was excited about a football game. Travis was going to be a good sport. Travis made his dad buy tickets. Travis and his dad met up with other family and friends. They all had a good time.

Cat leash. Jill was sitting on the floor with a cat. The cat was trying to get loose from the floor. Her cat had been tied up for a long time. The cat kept tugging on the leash but it was useless. Jill had to let the cat go.

Stage Props. We were looking for props for the school play. We finally found some at the thrift store. The props were ugly but we found them and bought them. It took a while to put them together and glue them on. After putting it all together, the props looked great.

The Mine. I wanted to be a mine geologist when I grew up. I visited my first mine in grade school. I decided to get a job there when I grew up. I became a mine geologist at my school. Now I make a lot of money and am happy.

The Sick Boy. My son loves to play football with my best friend. One Sunday afternoon my son was sick. His mother took him home to get well. After a while he got better. He loves to play football again, but now he can't go with his friend!
The Dress. Alyssa wanted a new dress. She was excited when her mom finally bought her one. It fit perfectly! Alyssa wore it the next day. She felt great in it!

Charlie. Charlie was a quiet boy in a big city. He went to the store every day for candy. One day the clerk handed Charlie a roll of quarters. Charlie began to chew them while looking at the store. Charlie lost all of his candy in one day, and became sad.

The Dune Buggy. I was playing with my toy Dune buggy in my yard. It was so big and fun. I rolled it around and chased after it. I chased it up and down a few hills. It ended up being stuck on a big rock.

Beating the Game. James was playing Pokemon Go with his friends. He was playing near a pond. He had wandered too far from the pond and got lost. He ended up losing the game. His friends all pitched in and bought him drinks.

Alphabet. Bobby wanted to write his first alphabet. He looked online for an alphabet book. Bobby found an alphabet book for toddlers. He bought the book and began to read the alphabet. Bobby learned to write his first alphabet!

Spilled medication. My daughter got a new flu shot today. The nurse gave her the shot. I took my daughter to the doctor's office. The doctor checked her out. The flu shot did not make her feel better.

Obsessive Sam. Sally was a very sensitive girl. She would always cry when she lost her glasses. One day, Sally lost her glasses and cried even harder. Her mother decided to buy her a new pair. Now Sally is no longer sensitive and is very happy.
Backyard Tennis. Sasha was on vacation. Her neighbors had a tennis court. They would play on it all the time. Sasha wanted to play too. Her family agreed to join her for a month.

Pool. Tanya and Tom wanted to go to the pool. They got their swimsuits and towels and went to the park. Once there, they saw a huge crowd of people. It was an hour before anyone had swam. After everyone had played, the pool was clean and ready to be used!

Drugs. Jim went to his friend's house to visit his dad. His dad was asleep and Jim wanted to stay and play. His friend offered to buy him some heroin and Jim accepted. When Jim came home, he was high on heroin and had to sleep. Jim was never allowed to leave his friends house again.
New Cat. I moved to a new apartment. I needed a pet for my apartment. I went to the local shelter. I found a tiny cat that I liked. The cat was so cute, that I adopted him!
Rax. Tom was at the beach. It was a hot day. Tom decided to get out of the sun. He put on a light coat. Tom was able to enjoy the beach much longer.
The Book. Sara really liked reading. She was reading her favorite novel. The book was getting very long. She could not finish it. She decided to finish it after all.
tired. I woke up tired. I felt like a zombie. I went to the kitchen to get some coffee. I took a long shower to get more energy. I finally felt awake again.
IHOP. My parents went to the IHOP for lunch. We had a few choices. I was happy to get the eggs. I decided to get the bacon too. They gave us both.

Apartment. A man worked at an apartment complex. He was a supervisor for a unit on the second floor. A woman came in to report a break in the apartment. The man investigated the break in. It turned out to be a minor scratch and no damage.

A light Jog. I ran a 5K race in January. It was a great way to prepare for the upcoming season. I was nervous about how I would perform. I was able to finish in a good position. I felt good about my run.

Bingo. Ike went to a bingo game for the first time. The host asked if he wanted to play, and Ike happily said yes. Ike and his friends met up and started to play. Ike and his friends lost, but they had a lot of fun! After that, they often talked about bingo together.
Surgeon. James had a fascination with anatomy. He wanted to be a surgeon one day. He got good grades in school. He graduated high school. Now James is a surgeon.
Gym Visit. Jane went to the gym. There was a huge line to get into the gym. Jane ended up getting in by accident. She tried her hardest to wait. Eventually she got into the gym.
Job Interview. My wife and I had an interview yesterday. It was at a restaurant downtown. She came prepared to look sharp. She did not look sharp. She was not hired.

Yevgeny gets a flat tire. Yevgeny is driving down the highway. He notices his tire is flat. He pulls over to the side of the road. Yevgeny checks under his car to check if it's on. His tire is not on, he has a flat tire.

Fancy Dress. Randy was shopping at a department store. He looked at a pretty dress. He picked it up and put it in his trunk. The day after, he heard back from the sales associate. She had informed him the dress was not available.

Cheap as dirt. A man bought cheap shoes. He tried to take them on a trip. He didn't realize how much of a hassle it was to pack and pack. He got stuck in traffic, and got to take his shoes. He wore them the whole trip.

Cheater. Tom was doing poorly in his math class. He noticed his teacher was giving out extra credit. Tom took it as a chance to get a better grade. He cheated off the wrong other student. He got caught by the teacher.
Food Critic. Lana went to the kitchen. She had a burger. The waitress brought it to her. She got a different order than her. She complained.

The Plan. A man was working on his car in the garage. He needed to come up with a plan to get it done. He began talking to his wife about it. She helped him come up with a plan. The man was very pleased with his wife.

The New Neighbors. I was moving across town to a new house. While moving, the old neighbors stopped talking to me. I didn't understand why they would suddenly want to be friends. Eventually they got along very well. They even agreed to be neighbors from then on!

Birthday. Amy's birthday was coming up soon. She wanted a special present. Her mom told her she couldn't afford one. So her mom got her some of her favorite things at a nearby store. Amy was very surprised when she received her gift.

Orange Juice. I am diabetic and very sensitive to sugar. I am forced to eat lots of fruit for every meal. I am very picky when it comes to juice. The juice I drink is not tasty anymore. I now make orange juice instead.

Fall. Anna went outside to see a fall leaves. She walked slowly to avoid stepping on anything. When she got to the base of a tree, she froze. She didn't know what to do. Then she saw her neighbor's dog pulling the tree's roots into the ground!
The Old Lady's Boots. Jane was on her way to work. It was a warm summer day. Jane walked her usual route. She passed by an old lady in her boots. Jane stopped to help the elderly woman get around.

Bookmarks. Dan loved to buy bookmarks from vending machines. He had a bunch of different bookmarks that he could find. Dan would always look for the same bookmark on each visit. Dan decided that he would not go to the vending machine for bookmarks. He began shopping for a new bookmark that he could always find.

What Shade. Kim was wearing a pink shirt with white pants. A boy from school decided to tease her about it. He threw a rock at her. The rock hit her in the face. She went home with a bruise on her forehead.

Feeding Frenzy. Hazel was making breakfast for her family. She made a big bowl of cereal and a large cup of milk. She poured milk and cereal onto a plate. She served herself some cereal and milk. All her family loved her breakfast.

Math pride. I had a math test in my math class today. I was not very good at math and knew I had to study. I stayed up all night studying. I could not sleep because of how tired I was. I managed to make an A.

Computer Problems. Dale was using his computer. He was having problems with it. He couldn't figure it out. Eventually, he gave up and called customer service. It turns out the problem was with the motherboard.

The Futon. The family was watching tv. They pulled the tv out of the trunk. The kids were so excited. They were going to use it for their bedroom! They were so excited to have the tv in their bedroom.

Ghost Sheet. My wife is retiring next week. Her boss decided to buy her a ghost sheet as a tribute. She went to an old friend's house to look at his stuff. It was very interesting. She hopes he is as pleased as she is.
Cooking Class. Kelsi wanted to be a great cook. She signed up for a cooking class. Kelsi was afraid she would mess up. But she did well. Kelsi was happy she took the class.

Ronald's Speech. Ronald was running for student body president. Ronald was making a speech at the next school meeting. Ronald's speech went horribly and the crowd booed him off the stage. The next day at school Ronald got suspended. Ronald learned to be more careful about public speaking.
Hot sun. It was a beautiful day when I went outside. I was sitting under a tree. The sun was so hot. My legs were burned. I had to go inside to treat the sun burns.

Walking in the woods. It was the beginning of summer. I was walking through the woods by my house. Suddenly, I saw a bear eating my berries. I immediately ran home. Luckily, my neighbor saw me and yelled.

Movies. John decided to take his girlfriend out to watch movies. They picked a romantic comedy. They got ready and were ready to go. John met his girlfriend at the movies. They watched the movie and had a great time.

Cell Phone. I have been using my cell phone for a week now. I had a lot of fun using it except for one thing. I have been calling people at a late time. They do not answer right away. Now I only use it at night.

Dad's Comet. My dad was telling me how important astronomy was to him. It seemed that every day he saw a new wonder in the sky. One day he pointed to the sky. It was a big, bright comet! I was very excited to learn that he was able to see it.

Trouble Board Game. One day Mary bought a new board game. She was excited about playing it. But she soon realized that it was very difficult. She tried to go through all the rules. But she ended up throwing it away.
Ring. The woman found a ring. She thought it looked like her husband's. The man at the pawn shop claimed it was his. The woman had it appraised. The jeweler put it in his safe.

Puzzle game. Tina and her friends wanted to win a round of trivia. They went to the local bar and bought a drink. Tina sat down in the bar and began to ask questions. The girls then began to solve their final question. To their surprise, the winner was a mystery.

Taking my cat to the vet. My cat has been scratching herself all day. She also has been throwing up a lot. My husband took her to the vet yesterday. When she got there, she had a huge wound on her leg. The vet cleaned it up and said it will be better in a few days.

Healthy. Diana was very sick. She didn't feel well so she went to the hospital. The doctor gave her medicine to help her feel better. She felt better and was released from the hospital. Diana was happy to be home.

Power House. The family was visiting Disneyland. They couldn't wait to ride the ferris wheel! They were going to ride so much they didn't have any money left. They decided to spend all of their money on a Power Wheels ride. They were disappointed when they had to wait an hour before it started.

New Job, Old Fear. Tom was really nervous about moving to a new country. He had never traveled overseas before. Tom went through with it and tried not to panic. Tom felt very comfortable in his new country. Tom eventually started to like his new country.

New Jersey. I wanted a new football jersey. I went to the store and looked for jerseys. I found a jersey that fit me perfectly. I paid for the jersey and wore it the next day. I was happy to see that it fit perfectly.

The Peace Corps Beckons Again. Jenny's family was very poor and hadn't seen her in many years. The Peace Corps contacted Jenny and arranged to have her join them. At first Jenny was wary of this plan but she trusted them. They traveled to Bolivia and helped many people in the rainforest. Jenny is very proud to be part of the Peace Corps once again.

Money. Jane needed to get money to buy the new laptop. She was short a hundred bucks, however. She decided to walk through the nearest store. Jane purchased the laptop. She was able to buy the laptop with the money she earned.

Smell. My dog has a huge dog fur. This morning I found a terrible odor in the house. I went to the kitchen and sprayed some cleaner everywhere. I looked all over the house to see what it was. I found a dead mouse in the bathroom!

Infestation. Tom was in a new apartment. He noticed that the floor was infested with fleas. He hired a professional to help clean the infestation. After a few months, he had a good floor clean. Tom saved money by doing so.
The Walk. Today I took my dog for a walk. I thought she would play fetch. Instead she wanted to sniff flowers. She was very happy to see me and play fetch. We had a wonderful day.
Cheater Cheater. John had a big test coming up. He was not ready to study for it. John stayed up all night studying. When he got to class he was not ready for it. John failed his test.

First Day of School. Tim was excited to be starting his first day of school. He woke up bright and early so he could get his supplies. Once he arrived, Tim and his class began their school day. The classroom was small and Tim didn't make any friends in class. The teacher made him repeat the test the next day to improve his attendance.
Jasmine gets her car stolen. Jasmine was riding in her car. Her car gets stolen. She calls the police. The police come and capture Jasmine's car. Jasmine feels vindicated.

Being Missed. Kim was going to go to a concert. She put her headphones in her ears, waiting to hear the band. She couldn't hear them until she was an hour into the show. The concert was finally over and she was left to wander the crowd. The next day, she went to the concert and missed them.

Martha's Reward. Martha took the dog to the dog park. A woman was walking around with her dog. She asked Martha if she wanted to play fetch with her dog. Martha said yes. The woman brought Martha a treat.
Stress reliever. Tom was always stressed out. He needed a stress reliever. He bought some pills online. He took them everyday. He soon felt much better.

Fool's gold. The man bought a new house. He took his family to see his new house. The house was not that impressive. He told his family he would pay for their mistakes. His family did make some mistakes.
Waiting. Jena had been waiting for her parents for an hour. Finally, they came home. Jena was so relieved to see them. But then she began to cry. Her mom had said she couldn't eat ice cream anymore!

The Girl. I used to hate being the only girl in my class. I would go to all of the boys lunch to cry about it. One day I sat next to a girl who sat next to me. That girl taught me a new skill. Now I don't have to be a bad person to get what I want.

expensive troubles. I had to go to the bank to make a withdrawal. I went inside to find the teller. The teller asked if I needed money to pay rent. I told her no because I had no money. The teller gave me a bad tip because I was broke.

The Art Thief. A painting was stolen from the museum. The thief would hide it in a box in the back of a store. When the owner returned from shopping, he would see the box. When the owner opened it, he saw the painting. The owner bought it back from the thief and left.

Dental work. When I was a child, I was terrified of the dentist. He would fill the cavity with a special kind of metal. He would even pry open the hygienic crowns for them. As I grew up, I learned how amazing dentists can be. Now I trust dentists to check for cavities before they fill them.

Sign Language. Nelson was in elementary school. He was only 10, but he felt bored in class. His teacher suggested that he learn sign language. Nelson practiced signing all the time. Soon, Nelson was the best student in his class.

Pregnant again. Tina thought she was pregnant for a second. The other day she realized she was pregnant again. She called her husband to make an appointment. He was shocked. Tina was excited about being pregnant again.

Kate. Kate went to the movies alone. She had always wanted to go on a date with a boy. She bought a ticket and waited for the movie to start. Kate's seat was close to the boys seat. The boys didn't sit close to Kate so she got to sit in the middle.

First Day of School. Today is the first day of school. I have not been nervous about it at all. I am excited to start my first day. My mom made me a new favorite treat. Tomorrow I will sleep in and I am excited for tomorrow.
It was his call. I received a call from a reporter. The reporter wanted to interview me. I said I had nothing to say. He started to tell his story. I ran out of the room.

Blind Date. Kim set out to find someone to date on a blind date. She asked around and got an okay result. She set the date for Saturday night. When she got to the restaurant, she noticed someone else. She found out her date was just sitting at the table.

Paying off credit card. I got a card for my eighteenth birthday. I paid off the card in full the day I bought it. I had a very good impression on the salesman. He talked me into buying a nice car. I paid off my credit card and am now debt free.
New Phone. The new iPhone was released. Alicia waited in line to get it. She picked the biggest phone she could find. When it was her turn she put it in her pocket. She was so happy when she got it.

Fast Food Party. Halloween was coming around the corner, and John wanted to do something fun. He decided to hold a drive through drive thru as a way to celebrate. He bought many fast food burgers and fries from the store. Once there, he told all his friends what he was going to do. He ended up making tons of new friends that night.

Out of Hot Water. Sally had to go to the store. She remembered there was no hot water in the house. She tried to figure out what to do. Then she remembered she forgot her hot water filter. She put in a new filter and she was happy again.
Belly. I was sitting on my school bus one day. Suddenly, I felt a sudden pain. The pain increased and I started to cry. The teacher came and looked at me. He told me that it was my belly button!

Late Night Swimming. My friends invited me to the pool. We set up a lifeguard's chair. After I got out of the pool I swam a few laps. I fell asleep after my first lap. We finished the pool and had a good time.

Big Moose. Tim was out on a hike in the woods. Suddenly he heard a loud roar. He saw a big moose running towards him. It was too fast and Tim ran away. He did not see it again for the rest of his hike.

He Returns. Alfred's dream was to own a pet. One day he went to a pet shop to pick a puppy. The owner let him name the puppy Ralf. Alfred and Ralf both had a great time playing together. Alfred was happy that he finally owned a pet.
Snow Day. Today was a very snowy day. I was not prepared for it and it snowed. I decided to drive to the mall. When I got to the mall, it snowed as well. Now, I am not prepared for snow.

The Great Coach. James was a coach at a high school. He helped many kids grow into their athletic bodies. One day his nephew was playing football with a girl. He blocked her with his arm. She ran home crying.
Laughing At Good Price. Tom went to a garage sale. He got a few nice things for cheap. They were a few extras. Tom didn't care about the extras. He was laughing with the price tag.

Jenny. Jenny and her friends were bored at school one day. They decided to play a prank on their teacher. They tied her up and made her watch movies. When her teacher got home, Jenny freaked out and jumped out of the window. Jenny cried when she realized it was fake and they got in trouble.

Musician Signs Himself. I once found a musician who was performing in my city. I met him on Facebook and decided to visit him. I bought his CD and got his autograph. I felt bad as I drove away and drove back home to my parents. I feel bad thinking about this experience now.
The World Series. We watched the World Series. The Yankees were playing. The Giants were up 2-0. But the Yankees hit a homerun and won the game. It was a great World Series win.
Hopscotch. Jim and Janie were playing hopscotch. Jim kept getting lucky and winning. Janie started to cheat. She beat Jim by a lot of points. Jim was so mad at Janie.

Dax's Decisions. Dax is a college student. His mother calls him at night to see if he's okay. Dax tells his mother that he has not been sleeping well. Dax's mother comes home from work. Dax tells his mother that he is going to sleep in the dorm.

A Trip to the Store. Tina had been working at her job for 3 months. Today she was leaving to go to the store with her children. She had just gotten home from work and couldn't wait to get home. Unfortunately Tina fell asleep at the wheel as she was driving. Her car ended up crashing into the curb and Tina had to go to the hospital.

Bill's Big Break. Bill loved playing the trumpet. He wanted to be a professional musician. Bill signed up for a jazz band for an audition. The group practiced for months and practiced for many more. Bill was hired to join the band.

Phone case. Logan wanted a new phone case. He searched online for a great case. He found the phone case was too expensive. Logan ordered a cheap case from Amazon. The phone case arrived on Monday and he was very pleased.

Quentin Tastes Cheese. Quentin has never tried cheese. However, he has always wanted to learn about it. One day he asks his friend to teach him how to eat it. Quentin tries cheese and loves it. Now Quentin loves learning about cheese.

Kitchen. I was cooking breakfast one morning and realized I had forgotten the milk. I had to make pancakes, but the milk was not there. I ran downstairs to look for the milk but there was none. I looked through the kitchen but found the milk. I put some cereal on the counter to make pancakes and the milk.

Mary's Flower Basket. Mary bought a basket to plant flowers in her front yard. She chose tulips for her first plant. At first the tulips did not grow. However, soon enough, the tulips started to grow large. Mary's tulips grew into beautiful flowers and Mary was happy.

Tennis. Fred wanted to join the tennis team at his school. But he was afraid he would have trouble hitting the tennis ball. So he decided to practice hitting the ball. But he struggled with hitting the ball, so he quit the tennis team. Fred found out, though, that his lack of hitting power was a big problem.
Kids in a Pool. Timmy went swimming at the lake. It was a hot day. He stayed in the pool with his friends. His friends were getting annoyed. They tried to play a game to get him back out.
Buying Water. My family was in dire need of water. My mom took me to the store to buy water. I purchased a gallon jug. I brought it back home. I filled it up with water.
First Credit Card. Lucy was shopping at the mall. She noticed a credit card. She decided she would get her card for her birthday. She purchased some items with it. Lucy ended up paying cash for it.

Inventor. Ed learned how to make things with his Dad. He decided to open a business making toy motors. His Dad gave him the money and told him to go make some! He built all sorts of cool creations! Ed was a pretty successful business-owner!
Rude Joe. My friend Joe asked me for a ride. I gave him a ride to the school across town. I later heard a loud car coming. Joe was impatient and made a comment about it. I asked him to pick it up.

Arm Wrestling. My friends and I went to an arm wrestling tournament. It was very intense. Some of our opponents really hurt each other. The tournament winner got a medal. Everyone cheered for the winner.

Job Promotion. Tommy just qualified for his dream job. He went in for an interview and it went well. His boss was impressed by his credentials. He offered him the position of general manager. Tommy accepted the offer.
Noise Complaint. Tom worked at a factory. He had a lot of very loud people. They made a lot of noise. Tom tried to complain about it. They didn't care and kept it up.
The Drunk. Dan was a new high school student. He had a lot of trouble at first. Then he decided to join a frat. Dan became the new drunk in the school. He got expelled after the next school day.
Doug has a problem. Doug is drinking at the bar. Doug is drinking too much. Doug tries to drive home. Doug hits a deer. Doug has to go to the hospital.
School. The children were excited for school. They were going to learn to do their math. They practiced every day. They became very good at their math. They were happy to learn to do their math.

The White Dog. Tim wanted to get his friend a dog. He had one already but it was white. He asked his mom if she would get him one for him. She said yes and took the dog for a walk. Tim decided that he was happy with his new dog.

The Reporter. Paul was a very good reporter. He worked hard at being a reporter for his paper. He was asked to write a story for the paper. He was a reporter for three years and had a knack for writing. Paul got a job at his paper.
Too much. Tim was hungry. He decided to go to a fast food place. He ordered a large burger. Tim ate too much. He was no longer hungry.

Elms College. I took my daughter to Elms College in Brighton, MA. She was excited when she saw the dorm rooms. She met the dorm manager, who introduced her to the people. My daughter stayed in a classroom. I did not go to the college as it was not something I wanted to do.

The one that perseveres. The first time I saw my first snow angel I was terrified. I thought I would never see one on the big screen. As the day passed I saw a sign for the Angel of the North. I didn't see it in person but I was so happy I couldn't sleep. It's funny how miracles can happen even if we don't see them.
The Fruit Juice. Sue was making a fruit smoothie. She poured in the fresh fruit. She mixed it in a blender. It tasted delicious! Sue was happy she'd made it from scratch.
The Wild Cat. Betsy saw a big cat in the alley. She ran to it. It stared at her for an instant. Then it ran away. She never saw the cat again.

Rude Awakening. Jenny was working a late shift. The next morning, she woke up to a strange noise. She tried to ignore it but to no avail. Finally, she heard a doorbell ring. She was so shocked, she didn't answer it and went to sleep.

Caterpillar Panic. Jim was looking at his girlfriend Stacy's wedding photos. The photographer didn't bother to take a picture of them together. At one point Jim ran into the bathroom mirror. He broke his glasses as he bumped them. Jim learned his lesson and never took pictures at parties again.
Gross Mold. Tim's roommates were eating pizza. He tried to eat some. His roommate brought over a bag. Tim took one bite. The food was made of mold.

Monument. I wanted to create a memorial. I wrote my name and wrote about my life. I visited many different places. Eventually I created a large monument in my backyard. I loved the memorial so much I decided to keep it.
The Tire Machine. The kids were playing in the yard. The tire machine was on. The tire went flat. The kids got angry. The dad apologized and fixed it.

The extra cookies. Kelley was having a cookie exchange with her sister. She was having a great time when all of the sudden they found some extras. They had gotten extra cookies as a thank you for coming. Kelley thought it was the best idea ever. She was so happy to get more cookies.

Shoes. Ike was very self-conscious. He hated how he looked in the shoes he bought. He put a lot of effort into cutting down on his shopping. By the time Ike's wife saw what he'd done, they were both happy. In fact, they both looked happier with the change!
monster. Tom was walking home. It was dark outside. A monster began to walk out from behind a bush. Tom tried to run away. The monster chased him until it was too late.
Ray. Ray wanted to play football. He asked his parents if he could play. His parents said no. Ray decided he would take up meditation instead. He played football without his parents' knowledge.

Music man. Carlos was a professional musician. He wanted to get better and start touring. He decided to take a vacation to Africa. He went to South Africa and performed in Cape Town. His concert in Cape Town went very well and everyone was happy.

Lost. One day, Joe went to the mall to go shopping. When he got to the entrance, it was closed. Joe didn't know what to do. He ended up running around trying to find something. Finally, he found it and went back home.

The Bird. Ella loved butterflies more than anything else. She had a huge collection of them on her bookshelf. She watched them come and go all day long. She would wait until the last minute to catch one. When she finally did, she took it home and named it after her cat.

Bird Friends. My two birds love to go outside to feed. Sometimes they won't go in one place and will fly around. When we are outside together they fly in circles. Sometimes they even chase squirrels when they want to eat them. They are so attached to each other they can't decide where they want to go.

Playing by the Pool. Joe and I decided to spend the day by the pool. We grabbed a towel and pulled it over us. We walked inside and sat down. Then we went inside the water and swam. Afterwards, we played for an hour.

Max Cooks an Omelette. Max had never cooked an omelette before. He bought the ingredients to cook one. When he arrived at his favorite diner, he realized he forgot something. Max remembered that he left the eggs in the refrigerator overnight. Max remembered and cooked the omelette.

Breakfast. Jane decided to make herself breakfast. She grabbed a large bagel and some cream cheese. She mixed all the ingredients together. She then baked it and ate it. Jane was happy to have made breakfast.

Peanut. Sara wanted to eat a peanut butter sandwich. She went to the kitchen to make her sandwich. Sara realized that she was out of peanut butter. She had no peanut butter left. Sara had to go all the way home to get more peanut butter.
Dan loses a bet. Dan is playing pool. His friends decide to bet him twenty bucks. They all bet a lot of money on Dan. He goes all in. He loses it all.
Erica Trips. Erica is walking down the sidewalk. She notices that she is slipping. She tumbles down the sidewalk. She looks down and her feet hurt. Erica decides to go to the hospital.
Casual Friday. Tina was going out with friends. She was invited to a casual Friday night. Tina was nervous to attend the party. She went anyway. She was completely surprised.

Too many favors. Suzy was working for an old lady when she needed help. She always did the right thing. The lady needed help on her mortgage. Suzy helped the lady do her mortgage. The lady was glad to have her help.
Snoring. My daughter had a sleep study today. The snoring is getting to be annoying. I have to go see a doctor. I have a sleeping pill for her. She was very happy with the sleep study.

Gold Digger. My grandpa bought an old TV when he passed away. We were sad that he did not pass the family with the TV. I looked for the remote to turn on the TV. I could not find it. Then, I found his gold digger bracelet in his garage.

Poisonous Mushroom. I once went camping with my friend, who does not like mushrooms. I prepared the meal in advance, but was not sure of the preparation. I tried to prepare a meal with many different mushrooms, and they were poisonous. We had to go home early. My friend and I had eaten poisonous mushrooms.
Cupcakes. Tina loved cupcakes. She decided to make some herself. She started off making cupcakes. She took a lot of pictures of them. Tina then shared them with her friends.

He Wasn't Much of A Fan. Joe hated baseball, especially during Spring Training. He even went to a game so he could see how fast the player was. During the first game of Spring Training, a player hit a home run to end a game. Joe, who loved baseball, cheered as the player won. Joe was glad that the player was a fan of his.

Lessons. Karen worked at the local diner. Her coworkers decided to take her to learn French. They gave Karen an exercise program to get in shape. It was exhausting, but worth it. At the end of the week she felt better than she ever did.

Uncontrollable. Gina was at her grandma's house for the holidays. She was in the living room at all hours. Her grandma decided to take her phone off of her phone. It fell on the ground, ruining it. Gina was furious and went straight to her mom to confront her.
What color. Kim got a new job. She needed a uniform for her new job. She could not decide what color to use. She finally decided to just wear orange. Now she was happy with her uniform.

Shelly's Lunch. Shelly forgot her lunch. She drove to the store to buy a meal. Shelly went inside the store to grab the food. She realized she had forgotten her lunch. Shelly went back to the store for her lunch.

Visit to the Doctor. My doctor called me the other day. He said I had a sore throat. He gave me some medicine. After a few hours I felt better. I had to take the medicine again, but still I felt upset.

4K TV. Today we watched some TV on our smart TV. We had to run to a store and buy some video games. When we got back to the TV we realized it stopped working. We had to call the store and they said we needed a new one. We drove back and bought the newest one.

Jerky. Jim was making homemade jerky. He bought the best meat he could find. He started the dehydrator and waited. Soon, the jerky was ready to taste. Jim was proud that his homemade jerky was delicious.

New Friends. I went to the park to play basketball. While there, I met a couple of people. One of them had a lot of piercings. She was very nice and we talked for a long time. I went home with them and decided I wanted to play basketball too.

Anything for Pizza. Jane was watching her daughter play outside. All of a sudden she saw leaves and grass all over the ground. Jane decided she had to do something about the lawn. She sprayed some fertilizer down the hill. After a few days the lawn looked great.

Unemployed. Mark has been unemployed for 6 months. He has applied to many jobs online. One of his last applications went unanswered. He went through the process to find a job. He applied to a job and got the job!

Major Switch. Dan wanted to switch schools. Dan asked his teacher what the switch would mean to him. The teacher explained that Dan could go to any school he wanted to. Dan chose the one school he would attend for a year. Dan had the opportunity to switch schools at last!

No Free Money. Tom was on his way to visit family. While there, he saw an ad for a movie rental. Tom rented a movie at a very expensive rental price. It was a movie he absolutely hated. Afterwards, Tom decided not to return it.

The Upset DJ. Jake was working a gig with friends. He was playing his set at the club. His music was very popular so he got a lot of people to come. He started dancing to more and more music. Eventually people started getting annoyed by his music.
Check on it. Kia's cat had scratched herself badly. She took the cat to the vet. The vet took a look and said she needed surgery. Kia was devastated. The vet made her get another cat right away.

Butch Awakens. Dan always went to the ice cream parlor at the mall. One day the parlor shut down, as the ice cream truck moved elsewhere. Dan thought that maybe ice cream wasn't for him anymore. At that moment, Dan decided he was going to give it another shot. He walked out of the ice cream parlor and bought ice cream at the store.

Binge Watching. Diane was watching a new show on Netflix. She was hooked into the show, and binge watched it all week. The next day, her girlfriend said she was sick and told her to stop. Diane refused and kept watching the show. She never knew her girlfriend's secret, and she never watched it again.
Lion. A boy went to the zoo. He saw a lion. The boy was scared. He hid under a rock. The lion didn't see the boy.

Mopping the Floor. Bobby's mom told him to mop the floor. Bobby wanted to play video games instead. He didn't listen and played a video game without cleaning. Bobby's mom got mad at him. Bobby never listened to his mother again.

Cooking. Lisa wanted to learn how to cook. She saw a cooking show on TV and wanted to get involved. She called the show and asked to sign up for lessons. Lisa learned how to cook from watching the show. She became a good cook and her family was very pleased.
Fired. Tom was a manager at an electronics store. He got into a big fight with a customer. He was fired after. The customer sued him in court. Tom won and the customer lost.

Hotel Lobby. The airline had a meeting room in the hotel lobby. They wanted to make it more open. They hired an executive to open it up. He was a businessman, but very talented. It opened up like a museum.

Boot Camp. Alyssa had never been in a real military unit before. She was eager to prove herself. When she joined the boot camp she did her very best. She worked hard every day to be prepared to make it to the base. As a reward for being such a good girl she received a medal.

Pantsuits are great for work. One day a coworker told me they had a great new pantsuit. I decided to try it out. I tried it on for work the next day. I was so impressed with the pantsuit that I immediately purchased it. Now I work pantsuit for an outside business.
Hurting my mouth. I was eating at an Italian restaurant. A woman started telling me rude comments. I had a huge headache. My face turned red. I asked the manager for help.
Diapers. My wife decided to buy diapers for our two-year old granddaughter. We bought the latest infant diaper in pink. She loved them. Then she started to cry. We were angry and embarrassed.

The Perfect Couch. Jack was tired of his living room. He was tired of all his cuddling. Jack looked online and saw a couch in his price range. He ordered the perfect couch online. Jack's cuddles became his favorite place in the world.
Lunch box. I saw this awesome lunch box at the store. It was shaped like a dinosaur. I wanted to put my toothpaste in it. I picked it up and put it in my mouth. I loved that awesome lunch box.

Midnight mass. Beth's parents took her to midnight mass in Chinatown. Beth wasn't into religion, but she really enjoyed listening to a CD. The CD was called "The Garden of Eden". Beth listened to it every day for a week. When she went to church with her family, she asked to take home the CD.

Broken Heart. My husband used to love going to a concert in Vegas. One weekend, he went with a girlfriend and her kids to see one. While they were there, her daughter got married to another man. The next day, my husband felt guilty and didn't come home. He called her and apologized, but she didn't want to hear it.

Teaching French. Sophie was a French translator. She had been working with a man who couldn't speak French. She was working on a novel about French history. She decided to translate a little bit of her novel into French. Her boss liked the translation.

The Dance. John really liked this girl he had a crush on for a long time. John decided to ask her out. They went to the dance together and had fun. John was shocked when she told him she had feelings for someone else. She felt weird but accepted him for who he was.

Mean women. Nina was a very smart woman who worked in a store. She was so clever, she would often do things by herself. One day, a nasty woman came into the store and started yelling at Nina. Nina didn't understand why and assumed the woman was mean. The woman turned out to be very nice and gave Nina her number and name.

The purse. Lisa's boyfriend needed her help to buy a gift for his parents. He asked her what kind of gift she would like and she said flowers. He went to the store and picked her up on time. He took her to the car and they set up her gift. Afterwards, she gave him the gift and he gave her some money for gas.

The Easter Present. Molly was playing in the woods. She found an egg and thought of what to give it to her mother. She got out her map and drew a route. Molly took the egg to her mother. She wrote a thank you note and gave her a great Easter present.
Love Song. Jane wrote a song. She didn't know how to put it on the radio. She asked her dad. His advice helped her. She was able to put it on the radio.
Eyeglass Debacle. I wore my new pair of sunglasses today. The sunglasses fell down my face. They cut my eyes. I got really scared. I put my glasses away.

Cold Sore. My girlfriend and I were playing outside. I fell down and hurt my leg. When I looked at the injury, I started to cry. My girlfriend tried to comfort me but I wouldn't listen. After crying for a few minutes, I let her borrow my phone to call for help.

Headed to France. Beth decided to go on a trip to Paris. She found the train that would take her there. When she got to Paris, she disembarked. Beth spent a few days shopping for souvenirs. Afterwards, she boarded a plane bound for Italy.

Pain in the Back. Gina was in a long line to get her new hair color. She'd already paid for it, but it was now very hot. Gina was sweating and was crying as she waited in line. She tried to ignore her pain. She just wished she wasn't in this pain.
Mild Food. Sam made a sandwich. When he took a bite of it, it was very cold. Sam took it out of the freezer. He ate it anyway. Sam ate too much.
Seeing an Ex. Tom was walking home from school. Tom saw a cute girl from school. Tom talked to her a bit. The girl asked if he wanted to see her again. Tom and the girl became fast friends.
Joan. Joan worked hard on the farm. She was able to earn lots of money. She had her own store and sold her fruit. Then, she became wealthy. She bought a home, and her family moved in.

Keyboard. My friend John wanted me to get a new keyboard. John's keyboard was old and needed replacement parts. I picked out a cheap one that had all of the same parts. It worked perfectly. John loved his new keyboard.

Baking Hand Pies. The Smiths were baking hand pies for friends at a friend's house. They mixed the ingredients in a bowl. Then they put them in to cool. When they were done, they baked them again. They couldn't wait to have the hand pies to eat.

The wrong cake. Lulu decided to bake a cake. She gathered the ingredients and put them in the oven. She waited a bit and then checked on the cake. It was not coming out right. She then realized she had used the wrong type of cake batter.

A New Pet. Ben had been feeling sad. His family noticed this and decided to get him a pet. Ben wanted to get a dog, but his dad decided to get a turtle instead. Ben was happy to get a pet of his own. Ben named his new pet turtle and was glad to finally have one.

School for the Blind. Maggie was the first person to ever walk with a personal tutor. Maggie was a very smart and popular child. She would go to school and be able to see the whole school. Maggie became a great teacher at the end of her tutoring sessions. Maggie eventually became the Head of the School for the Blind.

Mom's Cookies. My mom used to make cookies when she was pregnant. We would often visit her house and eat the cookies when she was sick. One day, she gave me a cookie with a note attached. She said she was pregnant, and had no clue what was in it. I gave her cookies in secret, and she never knew the cookies were real.

From New to Broken. Tara was getting ready for a sleepover one night. She decided to use her favorite pair of jeans. She forgot to take them off before putting them on. She got her friend to help her put them back on. The jeans ripped right away.

A cat. Maggie saw a stray cat in her yard one day. She picked up the cat and brought it inside. Maggie began giving the cat a bath and feeding it. Afterwards, the cat and Maggie went for a walk around the block. At the end of the day, the cat and Maggie both felt happy.

Unorthodox Choice. I was on the subway. Someone said something rude to me. It was about the color of my skin. I didn't reply so they threw up feces on me. I had to catch the next train to get off the subway.
The Story. The family sat around the campfire. The mother told a scary story. The child laughed. The whole camped out in the fire. The family decided to write the story down.

Kind Words. Gina had fallen on the sidewalk, crying. Her mother picked her up and offered her some kind words. Her mother offered her some money, which she gratefully accepted. Gina walked into the house and opened the door to thank her mother. There were tears in the corners of her eyes, but she felt glad she had done it.
Barefoot. Jane was walking in the park. All of a sudden, her barefoot stepped on a rock. She fell down and scraped her knee. Jane had to go to the doctor to get it checked. She had sprained it badly.

Never too late. Fred had always wanted to be a professional wrestler. So he decided to get into wrestling when he was young. When he became a professional wrestler, he decided to try out for a tournament. He was nervous but did his very best at the tournament. After his debut, he won the tournament with a gold medal.
Tree. I planted a tree. I couldn't wait to see the tree grow. When the tree was ready it had lots of branches. I had to pull the tree down. I decided I would not plant another tree.

Teacher Leaves. I was at a math class. I was writing a paper for my teacher. After some time I had a lot of trouble with a few words. I decided to give up on my paper. Luckily my teacher told me I could continue to study for the exam.
Strike. I was hungry. I didn't want to eat. I decided to strike a line. When I got to the counter, the line was over. I was happy that I had no food left.
Swan. The family was visiting a lake. It was a very quiet place. A boy from the family began singing an old song. The mom sang along and was very pleased. She told the boy she loved his singing.

Cat Food. Sue has a cat who is very dirty. The cat doesn't get enough food. Sue feeds her cat a granola bar every day. After a few weeks, her cat doesn't miss the granola bar. Now her cat gets all her food.

Tired workout. I went to the gym yesterday. I was feeling really tired. So i decided to stop and take a break. After taking a break,i realized that i'm tired. So i decided to work out until i'm tired.
Driving after my stroke. It was late at night and I was driving my daughter to work. She sat up in the driver's seat. She couldn't see a thing. I tried to get her to move the car. She wouldn't move.

Halloween on the street. Jenny dressed as a witch. She walked down the streets of Philadelphia and waved her arms. A car pulled up in front of her. It turned out to be a truck that was looking for candy. Jenny waved goodbye to the driver, threw the candy in the truck and ran.

Birthday Cake. Joe's aunt gave him a birthday cake for his birthday. Joe loved the cake so much that he asked for a second one. His aunt let him get the first one because she knew he was hungry. However, he accidentally dropped the cake on the ground. His aunt gave him the other one even though he begged for it.

The Tree. Cody's mother was sick and she needed to go to the hospital. Cody drove to the hospital. Cody found a beautiful tree in the forest. Cody fell in love with the tree and went inside. Cody planted the tree in the back yard.

The cook off. The kids were having a cook off. They picked the best meal and each got one vote. Then, the decided who would get pizza. They all got pizza and everyone was happy. They were then voted on who was the best cook off.

Wedding Day. Dennis had a huge wedding to attend. On the day of the wedding, he was so nervous he could hardly breathe. He did his best to remain calm throughout the event. At the end of the day, he took out his flowers and a bow. Dennis walked down the aisle, shaking with emotion.

The Big Test. Sara had a big test in school. She had been studying for weeks. Sara was ready to give the test and went to the library. She turned in her test as fast as she could. She got a good grade on the test and made a great impression on her teachers.

Banging Noise. One evening, Tim heard a loud noise in his apartment. He looked outside and saw several large chains. Tim noticed that a door was chained to one side. Tim yelled at his landlord for not listening to the warning. He filed a complaint and was relieved when the door was opened.

Freshly baked rolls. Tina decided to make rolls for her boyfriend. He was not a fan. Tina didn't understand why he would not like the rolls. Tina decided to be nice and let him try one. After tasting the rolls, he decided to like them.

Zoo. My sister-in-law took her two children to the zoo. She does not know about zoos. Her daughter picked a baby elephant. The little girl cried as the elephant died. Her daughter went home and told her mom.

The present. Molly was cleaning her house. She found an old present. It was a toy that her grandparents had given her. It was a big one that was attached to a string. She decided to take it home and put it in her room.
Wrong Change. Sam was at a gas station. He wanted a soda. The clerk said he didn't have any change for it. Sam had a cup full of pennies. He used one of the pennies to buy the soda.
Bad Back. Bob suffered from a back injury. He got a job as a janitor. He worked hard for many years. Eventually his back got very bad. Bob quit his job as a janitor.

Guys. Brett wanted to be a good man. He was very careful not to kill anyone. He knew there was always someone he had to do it for. He was very protective of his wife and kids. He murdered one person because he thought she would go to heaven.

New York. In 2005 I took a train from San Francisco to New York City. When I got there I was amazed by all the culture. I went to museums and visited many art galleries. I took lots of photos. I wanted to move back to California so I could explore more.

Shareholder. My boss had a meeting today. He told the employees that he needs their input. They gave him a list of items they need to do. He said that he will contact me when he is done with it. I told him it was a great meeting, and I plan to have another one next week.

Family Photos. John was planning a family photo shoot. He took his family around the neighborhood to take pictures. He asked the kids if they would pose for a photo. They all said they would pose for the photo. John then shared the photos with all of his friends.
Too Fast. Tom was taking his final exam. He was a few steps ahead of the others. A student challenged him to a race. Tom accepted the challenge. Tom won the race but got beaten.

Bad Pie. Nate decided to make a pie. He put the pie into the oven. While he was waiting for the timer, he knocked over the oven mitt. He accidentally dropped the pie in the oven. Nate had to clean up the mess.

Plumbing Problems. I was washing dishes in my house when I got a call from the plumber. I ignored the call until it came in the mail. A plumber had come to my house and fixed my bathroom sink. He was very cheap and a good plumber. Now I have a new sink and it is working great!

Missing. Kia's baby sister was visiting. Kia didn't know where to look for her. After searching a long time, she gave up and decided to call 911. She frantically waited for help until it was safe. She vowed to be more prepared next time!
First Day of School. It was my first day of high school. I really wasn't looking forward to it. On the first day of school, I fell down the stairs. I hurt my ankle. Luckily, I was okay.

A Bad Movie. Tom was watching a movie with his girlfriend. The movie was incredibly boring. After a while, Tom got bored and decided to watch something else. He wound up watching a horror movie. When Tom looked at the movie, he thought it was very scary.

Double Rainbow. Bob and his friends were watching a baseball game. All of a sudden it began to rain very hard. The rain was falling really hard and they all ran to the stadium. They were soaked but luckily they made it home in time. They had a fun night watching the raindrops.

Jesus the great. In 6th grade I fell in love with Jesus Christ. I had to wait until my eighteenth birthday to meet Him. I traveled all over the country with Him to see Him. When I met Him he was very rude, mean and mean. I had to leave Him because he treated me like a piece of meat.

Violin. Jenny is a talented violinist. She recently performed in a symphony. She played the best performance of the night. When asked about it, everyone said it was amazing. Jenny is thrilled to be in a symphony.

Distraction. Barry had been drinking wine all night. He felt like he needed something to do. Barry tried to ignore his thoughts. He decided to stay up and watch a movie. Barry fell asleep when his wife woke him up.

Registering to vote. I was only 18, and wanted to register to vote. I went to the local registration center and filled out my information. I received my voter registration card and went to the voting booth. I was happy to have become a registered voter. I went home and registered to vote.

Lemonade Stand. A woman walked into a lemonade stand one day. She was selling lemonade for ten cents. No one was buying it, though. The woman went back outside and found people to sell her lemonade. She did so well that she made a thousand dollars.
Saturday Cartoons. I was watching a Saturday cartoon with some friends. We found a few to watch. However, I kept missing the end. I found one last episode online. I was happy I didn't miss anything.

Dinner Proposal. Liz has been single for months. She has always wanted to have a serious relationship. Liz has been waiting for her boyfriend to propose to her. The day of his proposal she gives him her number. Liz is ecstatic when he calls and asks her to dinner.

Sushi Roll Prices. Last week I went to the sushi bar. I saw a guy roll a twenty dollar roll. I didn't have enough money. I thought maybe I would buy it later. Instead I ate the roll and didn't even pay for it.
Henry gets caught. Henry is a police officer. Henry is trying to stop a robbery. Henry is attacked and beaten. Henry gets arrested for his beating. Henry is sentenced to prison for 3 years.
New Beds. Tina needed new bedding. She found some nice looking ones online. Tina wanted to give them a try. Unfortunately they smelled terrible. Tina never bought them again.

Bra. Nelly was trying on some clothes for prom. She wanted to wear her favorite purple dress. But when she tried it on she thought it looked awful. She told the cashier what she thought. The cashier helped Nelly change the dress.

Vacation. Kate always wanted to go on a trip to Florida. This summer she was planning her trip. She looked online for a great place to visit. She found a good resort in the Florida Keys. She went there the next day.
The bug bite. Cindy was sleeping. Suddenly, she felt something. A huge bug was crawling all over her! She quickly jumped up and ran outside. Then, she shooed the bug away.

The Cleaning Lady. Kim's room was very messy. She hired a cleaning lady to come help. The lady took over Kim's room. The cleaning lady swept and mopped the floor. Kim was impressed that the lady did such a good job.

Lost Book. Dan couldn't find his book. He searched his whole house but it wasn't there. Finally, Dan checked his car. He checked under his seat, under the hood, and in the engine. Dan found the book and was glad that he didn't have to go to school.

Bonfire. John was at home relaxing in the house. John was listening to the radio and started singing along. John's friends heard him and wanted to join in. They made a fire that John made a mess of. John was upset that he ruined the perfect campfire.

The War. The men had to fight a war to protect their home. The enemy attacked them on all sides. They were shot and stabbed at night and day. They went out of their homes and joined the army. The war was over in a few weeks.
The Pizza. Tara wanted to make a pizza. She had never made one before. She bought all the ingredients and followed the recipe. When the pizza was done it was perfect. She couldn't wait to taste it!

Bad First Day. Beth took her new job at a fast food place. She arrived to the office on her first day. She noticed the floor was covered in grease. Her coworker informed her that it was grease from the fryer. Beth was not pleased with that first day.

Icy Road. The driver sat at the wheel of his car and waited for the ice to melt. There was a large hole in the road. The car slid into the ditch. A tow truck came to get him. The driver drove to his house to clean it up.
Fertility. I didn't want to be a mom. I decided to get pregnant. I went to the doctor. I had my eggs retrieved. I took a pregnancy test.

Nerves for the date. Sally was nervous for her date tonight. She was nervous because she did not like the idea of going on a date. After her date, she realized she did not like the person. After that, Sally had a lot of fun. She was no longer nervous about going on a date.
The bad grades. Kia was in high school. She was doing well at first. Then she had bad grades. She had to change schools. Kia was happy to go to a new school.
Detention. The teacher decided to give detention. He was mad that there was no music in class. The kids went to recess anyway. When he walked in, everyone was out of class. The teacher didn't mind.

Far too hot. Ike and his wife decided to go for a drive in the desert. He took off his shoes and put them on the car. He was shocked to find they were on the stove burner. He went into the desert and went on a hike. Ike was sweating in his car, but happy to explore.

A gift she didn't like. Katie loved to do crafts. She made some paper plates for her family. She wrapped them in colorful paper and mailed them to her mother. Her mother hated the plates and didn't want them. Katie was very disappointed and sad she lost the gift.

Startled Cat. Timmy was sitting on the couch with his cat. Suddenly, his cat jumped up from the couch and jumped up onto his lap. Timmy immediately yelled at his cat for being so rough. After a while, Timmy started to calm his cat down. Luckily, Timmy and his cat were able to calm down their pets.
Full Volume. Joe was reading a book. He got into the middle of it. The volume went to full volume. Joe couldn't put it back down. He had to wait to buy another book.

Back to Ukraine. Sebastian had always wanted to play with his dog, a golden retriever named Spot. One day, Sebastian's mom took him to the pet store. At the pet store, Sebastian's mom bought Spot a leash and food. Sebastian and Spot played together at the pet store for a week. After a week, they returned home, fed Spot, and played.
Knots. I've always had a lot of knots in my neck. The knots keep getting larger. I've always been able to pin them out with a sewing needle. One day, I went to get a knot. Unfortunately, I lost it.

The broken headphones. Sean's headphones broke. He was in a hurry so he decided to go to the mall. He checked for any free ones. Unfortunately, he was the only one that needed a new pair. He decided to just buy some headphones from the mall.
Chicken to Car. I ate a lot of chicken. My stomach started hurting. I went to the doctor to see what the problem was. The doctor told me to eat more vegetables. I ate a lot of carrots.

Fish. Tom had never cooked fish before. He had never even seen the fish in real life. On his way to the market he ran into an old friend. They talked for an hour about what it was like to cook fish. Tom decided he would try to cook fish soon.
The Pool. The girls loved to swim. They would go to the pool everyday. One day, they forgot their bathing suits. The pool was closed for repairs. They still had a fun time swimming though.
Brand new phone. John was buying a phone. It was his favorite color. But he was only getting a white phone. He tried to find a different color. The colors did not fit.

Tennis Table in Tennessee. I've always wanted to buy a wooden tennis table. My friend gave me an old red one he found on eBay. He said it was perfect. I set it up and took it home. The table was great, and I wanted another one.
Flute. Tom wanted to learn a new instrument. Tom decided to learn the flute. Tom bought some flute equipment at the store. Tom practiced at home everyday. Tom now plays the flute in a band.

haunted house. My friends and I were terrified of our house. So we decided to have a haunted house. So we set up all the items. We put on costumes and went to a haunted house. We had a lot of fun and scared the kids.

Loud Construction. The people at the apartment complex were complaining about the noise. They called the police and complained. The police came and talked to the tenants. They decided to start making the noise more subdued. The police were able to quiet down the complaints.
Lost and found. I used to go to the park everyday after school. One day I lost my bike. I went to the park to find my bike. I couldn't find my bike anywhere. I had to leave the park and go home.

Auschwitz. On August 6th, 2014, my family and I visited the historic Auschwitz memorial in Amsterdam. First we went to see the former Nazi death camp and to hear the Holocaust. After the memorial, we walked down to the former ghetto and read. After reading, we went back to the memorial. Next we went back to the memorial and went home.

Carla's Phone. Carla had a new phone for her birthday. She didn't have the money to get a new one. Carla went to the store with the money. She bought the phone. Carla took the new phone home and activated it.

Addison rides a ferryboat. Addison had never been on a ferryboat before. He was quite nervous about his first trip. Addison boarded the boat. He was very nervous on the boat. He really enjoyed the experience.

The shadow. It was the end of the summer. Bobby was excited because it was the end of summer school. His parents were going to send him off to the army. He had to leave at the end of the summer. The next day he woke up and went to school.

Getting some running in. I used to run every morning before school. I would take a couple of hundred steps before starting my run. One day I noticed I had a lower running rhythm. I decided I was going to run more slowly this time. My running rhythm changed from very quick to slow.
No service. Allie had her computer ready to use. She thought everything would be working. But she noticed no service. She called the tech. They said they couldn't help her right now.

Banana Split Fiasco. I made a banana split fudge. Alas, the banana split fudge burned. The bottom fudge ended up looking like mashed potatoes. Alas, the split fudge tasted just like regular mashed potatoes. I decided to use both of the pieces and just call that thing "fudge".
The Bad Rental. Tim was in a terrible accident. He needed to be put in a wheelchair. His family didn't want to take him. They told him to get a cheap rental. Tim wound up having a terrible time.

Saving Grace. Bethany always told her mom that she had problems with money. When she was eighteen, Bethany took a loan from her mom. After school, Bethany had to find a job. At first, Bethany was not getting enough work and money. However, Bethany ended up saving enough money and eventually got a job.
