Copper Kettles. Dori was bored with her copper kettle. It had started to leak in the kettle's metal lid. Dori was concerned for the kettle's safety. She got an emergency metal repair kit. After removing the lid, the kettle was now fixed.

Kite Flying. My friend and I went to the park to fly kites. We went out with a kite to find a place to set them down. As we were going down, I felt a gust of wind. I tried to take my kite up, but the wind blew the kite straight down. I landed the kite on the grass, instead of a tree.

Dog. I went to the park with my dog. I walked my dog for a bit before I noticed him pooping. I called my husband to tell him what he found. I brought my dog to the park bathroom where I could pee. He pooped in the bathroom for a minute before I could use it.

Marty. Marty wanted to get a bike for his birthday. His mom said no because she already had one. Marty asked her if he could ask for a bike if he didn't have one. Her answer was no, because Marty was too small to get a bike. So Marty got a skateboard instead.
Traveling. A man went on a cruise. He did a lot of sightseeing. He visited many different places. He enjoyed everything he saw. He booked his next cruise.

Better Cardio. I decided to improve my cardio. I bought some high quality cardio equipment. I practiced with the equipment several times a week. I improved my cardio so much I started getting buff. My friends and family complimented me on my buff looks.

Metamorphosis. It had been raining very hard. A small pine tree near my house was beginning to die. I had never seen a pine tree morph, but I got an idea. I tried to pull the old tree from the ground, but it resisted. Instead, I used a net to lift the trunk to the top of a tree.

Friends at the Arcade. Dan and his friends were at an arcade playing a game. Dan went into the machine, and his friend wanted to play too. Dan suggested they both play on his game. They both played, and it was Dan's turn to win. After the credits, Dan decided he'd rather play arcade games alone.

New Science. My family went to the science museum to see the exhibits. The exhibits were very complex and interesting. After the museum we went to see a movie at the library. We sat in the library and read books about science. I hope the library is open all day.
Ruined blanket. I bought a beautiful blanket. It was my favorite color. I used it everyday. It was ruined within a week. I didn't even bother washing it.

Grandpa Fish. We had a grandpa who lived in a big home. He had a small fish in his pool but he never had to use it. Today he gave me a little goldfish he had always wanted. The fish looked healthy and white. It was the biggest fish he had ever seen.

Windy Accident. Tom loved going to the lake. Unfortunately it was a lot of windy at this time of the year. It would bring the lake up to an angle. He always tried to stay out of the water. Eventually the wind would make his plan no longer possible.

A Walk in the Park. Sue went for a walk in the park. She started to get very bored and wanted to go home. She stopped by a tree and waited for a while. When she was bored she decided to climb a tree. She ended up falling out of the tree and broke her arm.

Yacht Story. Jim decided to go to the Caribbean on a yacht. Jim got a great deal on a yacht. His crew and friends did many fun activities while on the boat. After a few days, Jim and his crew returned to land. Jim had a great time on his trip.

Curly hair. It was Lisa's hair day, she was excited to see what it would be like. She walked to the beauty salon for the day. At the salon, she picked out her hair style. Then, she waited to pay for her hair. When she got home, her hair was a beautiful blonde.
Loud Alarm. Tom's neighbor was being a bother. He was always loud. Tom decided to get a noise dampener. He did so and it worked well. His neighbor was happy.

Online deals. Alicia was shopping online. She found a great deal on her favorite jeans. She thought she could use the coupon code. But to her dismay, the code did not work. Alicia ended up returning the jeans.

Crush. Amy was at school with the cool kids. Her crush Ray had pulled her aside at lunch. She hadn't been talking to Ray since he started to flirt. Amy was embarrassed she had let him get away with it. She decided to go home early from school instead of asking him out.

Keys Overboard. The bus was running late. As he waited he noticed his keys were getting caught under the seat. He tried to use the lumbar as leverage. He fell off his seat onto the floor. The bus driver stopped the bus.

Chef. I used to work at a restaurant. One day a young man came to work who was very funny. He used his wit to make the staff laugh. I used to pay him to come on Fridays with my meal. He still visits with me sometimes.

Don't Try This At Anywhere. I got into an argument with my boyfriend one night. He said he was tired and needed to sleep, but I had to teach him. I grabbed my coat, knife, and poker chips and walked outside. I went inside, locking my door behind me. Once my husband was asleep, I went back outside and apologized.
Movie. The family went to the movies. They had a fun time. Unfortunately one of the kids dropped his soda. It fell all over the screen. Everyone had to go home empty handed.
The Shower. The kids were bored on a summer day. The dad took them to the park. They had a big party. Then they went to the park again. The kids were happy with the day.
Salesman. Mike was a salesman. He worked in a department store. Mike loved to show off his wares. Mike even had a stand to sell things for customers. Mike enjoyed meeting new people and helping them.
Shoes. Ned went out to buy new shoes. He was very excited about how nice they looked. As soon as he stepped on them, he dropped them. His new shoes broke in half. Ned was very upset about it.

Crime. Ben and his friends always liked to drink beer. They went to a bar one night. While there, they met some tough kids. Ben's friends decided to go back home. Ben and his friends drank beer all night.

greedy. Bob really liked candy bars. He got a lot of them as snacks. But he realized he only had one stomach ache from all those candy bars. Bob gave up the candy bars and ate only healthy food. And he never got sick from all those candy bars again.

Camp. Lucy was so excited for summer camp. It was a week of sports, games, and more! She spent the whole time in the campgrounds and loved it. She couldn't wait until camp was over. She would never forget those days at camp.

Daniel Moves Out on His Own. Daniel decides that he wants to live his own life. He decides to move to his hometown. He packs his bags and goes to a moving truck. He packs his truck with his things. Daniel moves to a new town on his own.
Being sick. I felt so bad the other day. I had the worst cough. I felt like I was going to throw up. But then I felt better in a few hours. I hope I won't get sick again.
Depew. Neil took a train ride into the Depew of New York City. The ride was very pleasant. He took a detour to get more souvenirs. He got stuck on a street without lights. He was late for work!

GENGHIS. Anna and her friends went to the zoo to visit the giraffes. The giraffes loved them because they weren't so crowded. But when they got back, they realized they were gone. They looked around, but never saw them again. Their mother was taking them to a special place next week.

The Blanket. Jane was watching the snow fall outside. She put a blanket on her head and snuggled under it. Her parents were upset that it looked like a storm had passed. They took the blanket and told Jane it was snowing. Jane had a snowball fight with her cousins instead.

Canceled Playdate. Tina's friends were playing a game of checkers. Tina wasn't having a good time. Tina had already lost a few games. Her friends didn't want to have another one. Tina decided to call her parents.

The Paddleboard. Tory loved to take trips on her dad's old paddleboard. Every chance she got she went out and paddled down. Her friends were always impressed with how far she could go. She had to put the paddleboard up for auction though. Her dad bought it for the charity instead.

Mark has a bad tooth. Mark went to the dentist today. He found out that he has a toothache. The dentist told Mark that he has to have surgery to fix his problem. The dentist gave Mark an ice pack to put in his tooth to help. Mark started to feel better shortly after.

Song. Kia was writing a song. But she couldn't decide what to write. She wasn't a good singer or musician. Then she thought of the perfect songwriter. Kia had it all figured out, and wrote the perfect song.

The Doctor. Bill's mom was sick and had to go to the doctor. Bill was scared so he hoped his mom would stay home. Bill's mom stayed home and Bill and his sister played with her. The doctor examined Bill's mom and found out she had cancer. Bill's mom had died before they got to see her.

Collapse. Tiffany found herself in her kitchen. She was having a cook-out. When she tried to turn on the oven, she realized something. The floor had a hole and the floor was collapsed. She had to call the plumber.

Nick's babysitter. Nick wanted to be a better father to his son. Nick decided to hire a nanny for his son. Nick was pleased with his decision. Nick started to see the child a lot more. Nick started to love his nanny.

Ellen's Job. Ellen is a secretary for the manager of a factory. Ellen is a hard worker and makes excellent money. Ellen is getting bored at work and asks her boss for a new position. Her boss gives her a choice of two positions. Ellen picks the first one and starts working at the second job.

James Takes a Risk. James was a young man in his early 20s. James decided to invest in an illegal casino. He spent all of his money, and then lost it all. He lost all of his life savings. James eventually went broke and was very lonely.

Ruth wants to play too. Ruth had a passion for comic books. She begged her parents to let her be a superhero. They told her she needed to grow up. So they got her a summer job working at a comic shop. Ruth ended up loving it and working hard.
The Star. Kris went outside. She looked up at the sky. She saw a shooting star. Kris looked up at the sky. She saw it was a solar eclipse.

Cookie Trouble. Ella and her family lived in a very old apartment. Her grandparents lived next door, and it was hard to get out of bed. The door was locked for weeks on end, and the police never arrived. Finally, Ella's mom called the landlord to see what was going on. The landlord had locked the door for days, but the police never showed.

The Elephant. Jack wanted a pet, but he was only three years old. He decided to take an elephant home for a pet. Jack's mom was so proud when she opened the door that he cried. He had an elephant of his own. Jack felt good that he'd raised his little friend.

Uber to the Rescue. The driver had to call a cab to pick her up. Her cell phone was dead so she needed to borrow an app on her phone. She had to download it to her phone so she could order Uber. When she had her Uber account setup she could order Uber to pick her up. When she got home she could drive her car around without a cab.

Big Sale. Amy was in a hurry to get to work on time. She put everything up for sale, including her favorite t-shirt. At the end of the day she sold over her limit. She was disappointed she didn't get her item. She tried her best to find something for sale in the future.
Todd's nap. Todd was tired after a long day of work. He wanted to take a nap but didn't have any. He decided to nap outside. After a little while his eyes felt heavy. He fell asleep on the grass.

Room with a View. Caitlin and I went to visit her uncle. We stayed in his house until the sun came up. I was sitting in his living room watching the sunrise. We sat in the kitchen and ate dinner. My uncle showed us his large indoor pool with a pool table.
Too Close. The man opened the door to the store. A young child was running into the store. He tried to run after her. However, he was too close. She ran away.

Cello Practice. Sam was taking guitar lessons. He would practice all week. When he went to the recital he was really nervous. The solo on stage was beautiful. Sam realized that he could play as well as the best players.

Smoking or no smoking. Bert felt that it was impossible to not smoke in one's free time. He'd always tried to find a way to do it, but failed. But one day, he thought he might be able to. He smoked and enjoyed himself, even if it wasn't a healthy habit. Bert was very happy with his decision to try smoking.

the fort. When I was a boy my grandpa told us that there was a fort at the farm. He told us the name was Big Blue, and we were to call it that. On Saturday night we went there to ride horses. We stayed for three days, and had lots of fun. Now we are at Big Blue again.

Yin's Chopsticks. Yin was learning how to use her chopsticks. She was the only student who did not know how to use them yet. Her instructor gave her a pair of chopsticks. Yin picked one of the chopsticks and started to use it. Her instructor was surprised that she knew how to use them.

Racer. Tim loved to run. He would spend most of his day out on the trails. On the weekend, his friends decided to run a race. Tim didn't think he could do it. He tried and ended up doing it and felt great.

Mommy. Marge was always told by her dad to help the children. Marge would do anything for her kids. She worked hard to be there for her kids. She got to the hospital one day with two of her kids. It was because Marge had taken her kids to the hospital because of Marge.

Crying Baby. My 2 year old niece has been having a hard time falling asleep lately. She starts to scream and cry in the middle of the night. Last night we got up to check on her. We had to force her to sleep in a bedroom, although she wanted to sleep. It is so frustrating to have to get up and leave her when she cries.

ironing board. Tim was trying to iron his shirt. He got too frustrated and threw the iron on the floor. The iron burned his shirt. Tim was upset because it ruined his shirt. He decided to buy a new iron.

Cough Drops. Gina was in a room with a tall window. She could see the clouds moving in from out of her window. She heard a loud cough. She looked out the window and it was dark outside. She grabbed her pack of cough drops and put them in her pocket.

Tough Allergies. Tom was very allergic to peanuts. He ate a peanut butter and jelly sandwich at a restaurant. Tom quickly developed an extreme rash and his face swelled. He had to go to the hospital. Tom learned his lesson and never ate peanuts again.

Looking for Moutai. Sam was a bit lost and needed help. He didn't know where to look so he looked around. Eventually he realized that Moutai was the town's ferry. He boarded and found it to be a simple matter. After he arrived at the dock, he went to look for Moutai.

gMail Spam Filter. Jim hated his gMail spam filter. So he decided to do something about it. He downloaded a program called gMail Spam Filter. Jim used this program to block the email spammers. Jim was glad to have fixed his gMail spam filter.

The Worst Doctor. John's doctor said John had a cold. He gave John some cold medicine. John did not take the medicine correctly. John threw up all over the place. His doctor was right, he had the flu.

The Forest. My friends and I were bored one summer night. We saw a forest in the distance. It was dark and mysterious. We walked through the forest until we found a camp. After spending the night there, we all decided it was a good idea.

Potato Chips. Jane decided to make potato chips for her kids. They were not the greatest but tasted good. After a while, the kids started asking for more. Jane tried to sell them but they were not popular. She decided to give in and buy potato chips from the store instead.
Raw Dinner. Tina was hungry. She went to her kitchen to get some food. She went to the fridge and looked around. Nothing looked good. Finally she decided on a salad.

Dog Grooming. Dylan loved dogs and spent many hours grooming them. One day while grooming his dog, he shaved his face. He didn't realize that the hair had fallen out and ruined his face. Dylan was very upset about this. His parents promised to never let him shave his face again.

The Cable Bill. Bob called the cable company. They were billing Bob for $600 a month. Bob decided to cancel the service. The cable company asked him to call back. Bob called back and told them that he didn't want service anymore.

Freda gambles her paycheck. Freda was at the casino. She decided to play the slots. Freda was shocked by how much money she had. She started putting in more money. Finally she could win enough to pay off her gambling debt.
Loans. Jim was in dire need of cash. He decided to lend money to a friend. Jim took the money to the friend. The friend repaid Jim. Jim was very happy to have the money in his hand.

Jelly Bean Jar. Tom was at the store looking for candy. He found a jar of jelly beans. He picked the biggest ones he could find. Tom bought the jelly beans and brought them home. He put them in his favorite bowl to eat.
Bird. Sam saw a bird on a park bench. He decided to pet it. Then it flew off. Sam was sad. Then he decided to watch the bird fly away.

County Fair. Every year the state fair comes to the county. This year they will be coming from all over. My daughter, son and I headed down to the fair. We went to many different fairs. We found something we like and left with a smile on our faces.

Poor Kelly. Kelly was walking home from school. She was tired and started to get hungry. She saw a stray dog with a dirty diaper. Kelly took the dog to the shelter. The dog had a diaper rash and was microchipped.
Lost Tooth. Tiffany lost her tooth. It was a really large one. Tiffany was so sad she cried. Tiffany decided to see a dentist. Tiffany's tooth was pulled out and she was very happy.

Poor Little Girl. Kia's baby was growing fast. She was running out of room in the house. She went to the store and bought a large bed. The next day, she went to her room and there was a huge mess. Her baby had climbed onto the bed and destroyed it!

Mentality. Tom was driving home from work. His girlfriend asked him if he'd seen any stray animals. Tom told her that he had but he wasn't sure how often. She said that he always did but this time had been particularly. Tom thanked her, and began to think a lot about his dogs.

Playing a Video Game. I found an old board game called Pandemic. I decided to teach myself how to play. I bought all the game's components. I researched the rules online. I learned how to play the game.

Going to the store. Lucy really needed to buy something. She had to drive to the store. After driving her grandma stopped by. Lucy got her a big bucket of cereal. Grandma was happy to see Lucy happily eat.

Rufus Visits His Son. Rufus has missed his son very much lately. He spends his days crying about his lost boy. One day he decides to visit his son. Rufus visits his son at home. Rufus is very happy he has visited his son.

Fresh Baked Cookies. Maryann was invited to a party. She went to the store to buy the ingredients. She was excited to make cookies. When she got home, she set up the cookie dough. She enjoyed the cookies when they came out of the oven.

Driving with no direction. Today I was driving my family around. My youngest got really lost. I didn't know where he was. After a couple of hours of driving, he found his way. He told us that we were lost, but it was worth it.
Rico's Letters. Rico's mom always sent him letters. Rico always loved them and wrote them himself. One day, his mom died. His letters became forgotten and never found. Rico never found them.
The Flight. The family was taking a trip. They were taking a scenic flight. The family loved watching the scenery. They sat in the window seat. It was a great experience!

Sunshine. Amber woke up at five in the morning. She knew it was sunny, but it felt so boring. She got up and went to the beach. She had a great tan and was happy. She went back to bed and closed her eyes.

Caramel Apples. Kelley always hated caramel apples. Her boyfriend was going through a hard time. He got so depressed about it that he ate a lot of them. His skin peeled off. It was gross but he never brought it up again.

Rainy Days. It had been raining for weeks. Kim decided to take a break to go to the park. She decided she'd be back the next day. But when she got back it was still raining. Kim decided to stay home for the day instead.

Car Accident. Tim was taking a long way home from work. He noticed the road was covered in snow. Tim didn't notice at first that there was so much snow. He was late for his stop and missed his stop light. The next morning the car ran out of gas and slid into a ditch.
Egg Donor. Amber wanted to be a donor. She made an account at the local office. She made an account every month. She then made a donation at the end of the month. Amber is happy she is donating now.
New rug. Tim had an old rug. It was filthy and he didn't like it. He decided to get a new one. He went to the store and picked out a nice rug. Tim loved his new rug.

The Show. The local theater in town decided to put on a play. They worked very hard to find the perfect cast. When they went to cast the roles, they weren't sure they liked them. When they got the plays, they found that they did. The play was great and they were glad to have tried something new.

Big Fright. Dan was having trouble sleeping at night. He thought that something was stalking him. Eventually he decided to turn on his neighbor's outdoor lights. After dark, he heard loud thumps outside. He jumped out of bed and ran out to see a large shadow in the window.

Pretty Payback. Sheila bought the new kitten at the pet store. She gave the kitten some fish so she can feed her. A few weeks later she noticed something. A snake had bitten her on her leg. Sheila was so angry she threw the cat away.

Earning money with music. I wanted to get money. So I started to play the guitar. But, I didn't really know how to play. So, I tried practicing for a few weeks. After practicing for a few weeks, I felt good about playing the guitar.

Gonna Fly Away. Tom loved to fish. Tom went out on a boat to go fishing. The boat hit a rock on the way into the lake. The rock cracked a hole into the boat. Tom got a tetanus shot, and never went fishing again.

Too Much Time Out. Jake sat in his living room watching television. Suddenly, his mother called him. He had forgotten to set the television to silent! Jake had to get out and go play. He was so annoyed he never played with his friends again.

Free Book. Lance had an overdue book from the library. The library didn't want to return it to Lance. Lance checked his phone for a service he could use to pay. The phone didn't have any service. Lance was able to pay using his credit card.

Bad Smell. Tom had the worst smell in the house. His girlfriend hated it and couldn't figure out why. Tom eventually tried different things. The first few didn't work. Eventually he gave up and tried baking soda.

Bad Move. I was at my friends house. We were bored of our living room and wanted to do something. We decided to get out of the house and find something fun. We drove out to the beach and found a place to go. The move was rather awkward, but we ended up having a lot of fun.
The New Job. Sara got a job with a new boss. She hated her old boss. One day, her boss was fired. Sara quit her old job. She got a new job with the same boss.
Overslept. Boris was always late. He was supposed to be at work at nine o'clock. The alarm didn't go off for him. Boris was angry when he woke up. He vowed never to be late again.

New kitten. Today is the day we get our new kitten. I looked everywhere for him, but couldn't find him. Finally, I looked through the cat's litter box. I pulled out three kittens. They all look great, and we have a litter to play with.

Liz's Passion. Liz wanted to take a field trip to her local zoo. She found the tickets and bought her plane ticket. She took off in the plane for 2 hours of field trip. When the plane landed Liz realized she forgot her wallet at home! She went back home and had to pay for her own trip!

My first time rock climbing. I always wanted to learn how to rock climb. I went to the gym the other day. I noticed there was a new rock gym opening up down the street. I walked over there and signed up for rock climbing lessons. I did great and learned how to rock climb.

The Ruined Dress. Katie was getting married. She was wearing a white dress. When she got up to get dressed her dress got stained. It was so bad that she couldn't wear it. She had to get a new dress instead.
The cell phone. Beth bought a new cellphone. She took it with her to school. She accidentally dropped it in the toilet. The screen cracked. Beth was very upset.

Race Day!. Jill loved track and field. She was very good at it. Jill trained day and night to be the fastest on her team. On the big day, Jill ran the fastest race on the team! Jill won the championship!
Dreams. Hannah had dreams of being famous. She didn't really have one though. She decided she was going to try to become one. She went to school and got a degree. Hannah is now very famous.

Creepy Woman. Randy was playing ball with his friends. He was wearing a clown costume. As he was throwing the ball, a woman began following him. She stood in front of him, looking very menacing. Randy screamed and ran as fast as he could away from her.

Crusty. Amy's parents sent her to the store. Amy picked out a box of cereal and went into the car. She grabbed the milk out of the fridge and went to the store. When she got to the store Amy saw that the cereal was scented with cinnamon. Amy was disgusted and left the store without the cereal.

Sally learned she likes mustard. Sally wanted to learn to like mustard. She asked her mom if she could eat a little. Her mom gave her a tiny packet of mustard. Sally put the mustard in her mouth. Sally now loves mustard.

Prom Dress. Kim was getting ready for her high school prom. She had to order a new dress so she would be ready. She drove to a local boutique. Kim tried on a beautiful purple dress. Kim thought it was the best dress she had ever had.

Soda Pop. Kia's friends were playing volleyball at recess. But Kia wasn't enjoying playing the game. She was drinking a soda pop that her dad had given her. She dropped it into the trashcan! Kia's friends were so mad!

Scuba diving. Jim and his friends decided to go scuba diving. Jim put on his wetsuit, gloves and fins. Jim dove down into the ocean with his friends. Jim saw a lot of fish. Jim decided he would dive again.
Plastic Life. A man was playing with toy cars. He got a real plastic car. He loved to play with his car. One day he got very sick. He put his plastic car in the trash.

Sick Days. I have a job which requires a lot of travelling. Sometimes I am so sick that I cannot leave for work. Sometimes I will be too sick to travel at all. I go to the doctor and he gives me medicine. I finally get off the plane and can travel!

Lost tooth. I was in the bathroom playing my video game. I got a tooth stuck in a crack on the bathroom floor. I tried to pull it out but it wouldn't come out. I had to go to the dentist. The dentist gave me a floss that was too small to pull out.
The String. Sara wanted to play the harp. She didn't have any string. She was having a hard time finding it. She finally found it under her bed. Sara was able to play the harp.

Concert ADventures. I went to an all nighter in order to be able to go to a concert. I slept through my alarm. I woke up late. When I finally got there I realized I wasn't at the front. I still had fun though.

Weird Assist. Sally is a very fast runner. She has been training for 5 years. One day she got very sick and couldn't run for 2 weeks. She decided to finish off by getting a new coach. After 2 months she had recovered, and her new coach helped her run.

Dance Myla Dance. Myla wanted to learn the dance of her favorite song. She practiced dancing every day after school. Her mother encouraged her to take dance lessons. After many years, Myla became very good at dancing. Now, she performs for her parents and friends every Christmas.

Logic puzzle beat. Yesterday I was doing my logic puzzle. I made a mistake and ended up with a black spot on it. I went to my friend to show him. He said he will copy my solution. Now I know how to do a logic puzzle!

Playing Hookey. Elliott had always hated playing Hookey. Elliott would play with his friends, but none of them ever beat him. One day Elliott played Hookey to the death. His friends were so happy that Elliott had lost his Hookey. Now Elliott never plays Hookey again.
Lasagna. Sarah made lasagna for her mom. She was making spaghetti sauce. Her mom told her to mix the cheese and sauce. When her mom tasted it, it was terrible. She had forgotten the cheese!
Too many babies. Susie had just had a baby. But she was not satisfied with the results. So she went to the doctor. She was told she was having a dozen babies. She ended up with 11 children.

Disturbed. Sheila's mom said she couldn't ride the swings anymore. Sheila was very upset, thinking the swing would be a danger. She cried and complained until her mom relented. Her mom let Sheila ride the swings. Now Sheila is much more calm.

The Lazy Dog. Gina's dog wouldn't stop snoozing. The dog kept looking for something to do but nothing. Gina didn't know what to do. Finally she decided to give the dog some water. She finally was able to get the dog to move on.
Forgiveness. Lacey broke up with her boyfriend. He still thinks she is cheating. She decided to forgive him. She forgave him in front of everyone. His girlfriend forgave him in front of her friends.
Stolen fragrance. Susie tried on her favorite perfume. She wore it to a fancy party. As soon as she got there she smelled something. It was the wrong one. Susie was horrified.
Test. I took the test on Monday. I could not remember most of the questions. I tried to find something that was easy to remember. I memorized most of the questions. My grade was a C+.

Loans. I took a loan out of my brother's account to buy a computer. The bank informed me that I could not loan money out of my brother's account. I asked my brother for some advice about this. He said I had to take out a loan from a bank that I had never heard of. I took out a loan from this bank and bought a computer.

Don't Bite. A young lady was on her school's soccer team. One day, the coach tried to teach her a trick. She kicked the ball at him and it flew over his head. The ball hit a classmate in the face. The classmate got a black eye.

Chocolate. Mary loves chocolate. One day, Mary decided to make a chocolate bar. Mary mixed all the ingredients in a bowl. Then, Mary put the chocolate in a pan and melted it. Finally, Mary poured the chocolate into a bowl and ate it.

Closet Game. Tom wanted to play a game with his friends. He didn't know what game to play. He asked his friend for advice. His friend suggested they start a closet scavenger hunt. Tom was able to beat all of his friends at the closet game.

Alien Toy. Bill loved toys. He bought a toy robot as a kid and still plays with it. A month ago, Bill decided to play with the robot in his room. Bill couldn't believe his eyes when he saw the robot inside the toy box. Bill grabbed the robot and decided to keep it on his desk from now on.

Fishing Time. Bill and Sally go fishing. They go all day and catch many fish. They both want to try their hand at fishing. They decide to get some fish on a stick. They catch as many fish as they can.
Depression. I was a very high functioning person. I never felt depressed. I decided I was depressed. I took a depression test. I learned I was not depressed.

Carl's Computer. Carl had an old computer. Carl decided that it was broken. He went to the electronics store and purchased a new computer. Carl then brought the old computer home. He started to try to fix his computer but could not.

Smoking. Tucker hated the smell of cigarettes. So his dad would get him one every time. One day, he was in his room while his dad smoked. But he couldn't stop sneezing. So his dad got him some patches.
Music. The man put on his headphones. He started listening to a song. He liked it. He wanted to learn more. He started studying more.

Camel. There was a man who desired to purchase a camel for his traveling needs. The man drove to a local breeder. He asked the breeder if he could purchase one of the camels. The breeder complied and gave him a camel of his choice. The man brought the camels home and set them on the side of the road.

Cost. I saw a large package of groceries at the grocery store. I drove to the store to get the groceries. The cashier gave me a receipt. The total price of the groceries were more than I paid. I drove home and gave the cashier the money.
Tag 2. The third grade started. My daughter was in second place. A teacher noticed. He sent my daughter to the office. My daughter did not win.

Game at the Bar. Jenny ordered a drink at the bar. She did not have enough money to pay for it. Instead of throwing it out, she decided to split it with her friends. They played a game of drinking pool on the table. The loser had to pay for their drinks!
Rifle. Joe had a hunting rifle. He was going deer hunting. He was practicing with his new rifle. He shot the first one with the rifle. Joe was very happy.
Missing the meteor shower. The sky was very clear. When it got dark, I went outside. I watched the sky for several minutes. Then, I looked for the meteor shower. I could not find it.

Tim's new love. Tim was in a bad relationship. Tim decided he wanted to change things. He decided to break up with his girlfriend. It was hard but Tim did it. After breaking up with his girlfriend he was happy again.

The Carrots. Timmy's carrots were starting to rot. He tried washing them but the smell was awful. He tried throwing them out, but the smell would not go away. He decided to eat them anyway. The next day they were better than ever.

The kings defeat. The royal family of Scotland were watching the Olympics. The United Kingdom team was playing Argentina. The game was tied and Argentina was winning. Suddenly, Argentina scored a goal and the game was almost over. The United Kingdom family cheered and chanted for their country to win.

String Bikini. My favorite dress for the dance was a string bikini. It was black and very pretty. The one I chose was a little too big. I was so embarrassed that I took it off in front of the whole school. I never wore it again.

Neck. I was playing basketball with some friends at the park. We were passing the basketball when one of my friends slipped. His neck snapped and he went flying out of the park! We all rushed him to the ambulance. Luckily, he was okay, but I will never forget his neck snap!

my computer mouse. I got a new computer mouse today. It is a really nice mechanical mouse. I cannot wait to use it. I really like that it can be plugged in. I cannot wait to see what others will think of it.

Fish Story. My dad went fishing. He had a rod and reel. When I got home, I was sad because he had not caught anything. I tried to cheer him up. But he only felt sad because I wasn't his favorite fish.
Money Does Buy Love. Sara was dating a guy named John. She was very happy. One day, John dropped his money on the floor. Sara was crushed. She told John he had to pay her back.
Lost Dog. Jake's dog ran away. Jake searched everywhere. He called his parents. They never heard from him again. Jake cried for weeks.

Clowns. I went to the circus with my cousins and saw a clown in the first act. His name was Dave, and he was dressed in a green suit. After the show he went back to his dressing room and started talking to me. He made a funny gesture, and I smiled because I loved clowns. I laughed so hard that I forgot my fear of clowns.

Child Visitation. I was asked to leave my son in his room. I thought the police might come. I waited until I thought he was sleeping. Then I let him go outside. I walked him to the front door to let him out.

Winter Break. Jim is a college student. He has been working hard for three weeks. He has been studying all night and is tired. He decides to go to the winter break. Jim gets a great time off work and is glad he didn't stay up.

Free Samples. One of my favorite things to eat is ice cream. I have over twenty flavors of ice cream. I have all of the best ice cream in town and they all have free samples. I order a free sample every time I get ice cream. It makes me feel good when I eat it.

SnapChat Photos. Tom was at a baseball game. He went on a snapChat. His photos got shared with everyone he was close to. It turned out Tom had a huge collection. He was able to sell a lot of them for a lot of money.
Ticket. Kate got a ticket for riding her bike to work. She was mad. She was supposed to wear a helmet. But she didn't see a helmet on the bike. She felt really silly.

Swap Meet Sunday. Lucy's grandmother was always giving Lucy a hard time about making good grades. It was Sunday morning and Lucy wanted to do well for the family. She went out on the playground and played on a big ball. It was almost time for the next school board meeting and Lucy wanted to shine. She made good grades, won the big swap meet, and she got the gift.

Watching a Movie. I love to watch movies. I put on my favorite movie last night. After I watched the movie I realized it was too boring. I took the movie to the DVD rental place. I bought a new movie from the DVD rental place.

Work Day. Today was the first day of my new job. I was nervous that it would be hard and that I would have to work overtime. On the bus I saw an old man with a large hat on. He told me to give him a smile, and he smiled. This made me feel good, and I got to work on time.
After the Fight. Joe was at a bar. The other guy was a bully. He got in a fight with him. Joe had to go home. He went home feeling regretful about the fight.

Wardrobe Malfunction. The other day I ran into a friend from school. We had a lot in common. We talked about the same things that happened today. She asked me what happened and I was sad to hear about my poor wardrobe choice. Now I take better care of my wardrobe.
Jason's camping trip. Jason wants to go camping with friends. Jason buys supplies. Jason and his friends get in their car. They go camping for the weekend. Jason is happy to have gone camping.

Golden Glow. Tom and Bill were going to buy a new house. They wanted to make sure it would be a good home. They decided to paint their new house yellow. The paint didn't dry very well and the house came out dreary. Tom and Bill were glad they had decided to paint their house.

Basement. When I was young I wanted to go to the basement. I went upstairs and told my parents that I wanted to go down. I told my parents that I wanted to go down and that I wanted to play. I was playing with my toys in the basement. My parents caught me and grounded me for a month.

The carnival. The family was driving down a street on the coast. They were heading to a local carnival. They rode a lot of rides and had a lot of fun. By the end of the night, they were exhausted. They didn't want to leave.
Bitten by a Squirrel. Tom had a dog. He got a squirrel as a pet. The squirrel liked to eat his dog's food. Tom got a plastic bag. He caught the squirrel with it and it bit him on the leg.

Samantha Makes Breakfast. Samantha woke up very hungry. She went to the kitchen and found she had no food. She remembered she had eggs and ran to the kitchen to get more. She made herself a nice big breakfast. She sat at her kitchen table and ate the eggs.

Ants. My daughter saw ants in our dining room this weekend. She went into the living room to throw something at the ants. There were three of them and she threw a tennis ball at them. They did not move an inch. She threw it at the wall and left.
Shaving Cut. Tom's beard was getting long. He decided he needed a shave. He bought some blades online. He had his dad go ahead and shave his beard. Tom's face looked better.

The Campfire. Jim and his friends decided to build a campfire. They gathered sticks and sticks. They started the fire and started a campfire. They cooked their food and s'mores over the fire. They had a great time at the campfire.

Brick. Dan and his girlfriend loved the color yellow. One day they decided to paint the house red. They decided to paint the brick red as well. They set up the bricks and waited. The brick came out very vivid and bright.
Sparrow. It was a rainy night when our cat fell off the couch. She had been injured. We put her under my bed. I put a bucket of water in her mouth. She is better now.

Goals. Gina was watching her brothers rap music videos on their phones. The music was blasting very loudly in the living room. She hated their music but she liked the rappers. She wanted to impress their parents who wanted to meet with them. But she had no clue how she would explain the music videos to them.

A Fast Ride. Jane and Bob were going on a road trip. They were going from Florida to Arizona. They were trying to get to their hotel quickly. They decided to drive down the highway. It wasn't an easy drive and they both had a great time.

Chinese Broccoli. I went to Chinatown one day to pick up some food. At first, I thought the place was very crowded. I went in and sat down and waited for my order. After 20 minutes, I was finally seated. I was surprised to see that it was only four people.

Sand Castle. John and his friend wanted to build a sand castle. They went to the store and bought all the supplies. They spent the next two weeks building it. When they finished it, they set it up in their backyard. They loved their sandbox castle!
The Dog. I was going for a walk. I heard a noise in the yard. I looked down. There was a dirty dog. I took him home and he's my best friend.

In the Dark, all Cats are Black. Daphne was sleeping in her pajamas one night. Suddenly, she awoke and felt something. She looked down to see a black cat. She screamed, but her mom quickly comforted her. Daphne was so relieved that she didn't feel scared again.
Not funny. The man was trying to be funny. He tried to do it in a rude way. The woman laughed. She told him to stop. The man stopped.
The Roller Skates. Margo was a gymnast. She was training for a competition. She was trying to be a better Olympian. She got the best chance to win. Margo got to win and was really happy.

Maya the Writer. Maya was a great writer. She decided to join her high school's theater club. Maya became involved in theater club activities. She made many friends. She continued to write and act in plays and movies.
Skydiving. Joe went skydiving. His friends dared him. He agreed to do it. He was nervous. He jumped.

Innovation. A team competed for a championship in baseball. There was a new stadium being built downtown. The team was worried about losing. The team designed their stadium to be like an old baseball stadium. The team won the championship!
Angry man on the bus. Tim was on the bus. A man came up and yelled at him. Tim ignored him for a second. The man began to shout even louder. Tim ran off and left.

Biking with Noah. Noah loves to bike in the rain. He has been warned that he could get hurt from the wet. His friend was biking and fell off. Noah was very upset but he felt bad. He taught his friend how to ride a bike.

Paula Plays Harpsichord. Paula wants to play an instrument. She decides to try playing harpsichord. She practices a few times. She becomes proficient in harpsichord. Paula is happy to be playing an instrument.
Depression. I was feeling depressed. I decided to go to see a doctor. The doctor told me I had depression. I was depressed all day. After the doctor told me that, I felt much better.
Steps. The man walked to the front door. He reached out a hand to get the doorknob. He stepped back and let out a shriek. His neighbors heard him scream and yelled. The man had broken his doorknob.

Harp. Cynthia wanted to play the harp. So she bought a pair of harp strings. After she played it for a while, she got a headache. She realized that she needed more strings. After that, Cynthia never bought strings in the future.

A Dog Savior. My dog is in a lot of pain. He has hurt his leg really badly. It hurts so much that I need a walk for him. Yesterday, we were walking down the street. A man was walking his dog and it saw us and saved my dog.

Baseball Injury. I went to the baseball game yesterday. I had a lot of fun playing the game. However, I caught a foul ball and had to sit out. When I went home I could not sit on the couch. Now I have to wait weeks before I can play with my friends again.

Jump Rope. My son loved to play jump rope. We went to the park and went down a rope course. My son did not like to stop and go back up. I asked him if he had seen any other jump roping courses. He said jump roping was fun and I was relieved.

Playing Checkers. Toni and Rob were bored one day. They decided to play checkers. Neither could beat the other. Toni and Rob decided to settle the game by coin flip. They were both happy to have a game to play.
Cats are crazy. A cat got out of the tree. The cat ran away with a mouse. The cat and the mouse lived in a ditch. The cat was afraid to get in the ditch. The cat never left the ditch.
Bad pie. Lucy wanted a pie. She was starving but decided to make one. She got some fresh berries from the fridge. Then she put sugar and butter on it. To her dismay it was terrible.

Dare. Cindy went to the fair, hoping to win a prize. She kept asking the workers for her money. She kept waiting, but none of them seemed to give her any. Finally, one worker offered her $5 for her courage. Cindy was so glad to win, and quickly went home.
Homework. Tina had a math homework assignment due tomorrow. She had not started it. She did not know the formulas used. She asked her math teacher. Tina's teacher gave her a new formula.

The Bad Potter. Tia loved doing house chores. She decided to mow the lawn. Tia took out her broom and got to work. When she finished, Tia realized that the lawn was much better. Tia decided to mow the lawn every day.

Test Drive. John was invited to a friend's house to test drive his car. He waited around nervously. Finally his friend's father drove up with a car. John pulled up and was given a ride up. John went in the car to get it started and it worked!

Cutting School. Alfred was not happy about cutting school. He had just failed all of his exams that week. He was going home for the weekend. His mom offered to take him to the principal's office. Alfred made a new friend and was very happy.

Found Wallet. I went to the grocery store to get milk. I had to buy several items and some paper money. My eyes started to feel foggy and I began to cry. The cashier walked over and told me I had found a wallet. I realized I had left my wallet at home.
Bad cold. Lilly felt sick the other day. She did not feel better the next day. Finally she decided to go to the doctor. Lilly was told she had a cold. She had to stay in bed and drink liquids.
Mail. Beth's mailbox was on the ground. She decided she needed a new mailbox. She went to a local shop to buy a new one. Beth chose a white mailbox. Her new mailbox arrived at her home in two days.

To The Bathroom. A man went to the bathroom to change his clothes. The man put on a pair of clothes. The man forgot the shoes in the changing room. The man came out of the bathroom. The man put on shoes.
New Sandals. Mary wanted some new sandals. She went to the mall. She tried on lots of sandals. She finally found one she liked. The sandals were very stylish.

Going to the drive in. Last week we went to the drive in to see Star Wars. We were in line about two hours. We had a really long time getting our popcorn. They gave us so much more. We ended up being there for hours.

Waste of an Hour. I am in my first year of high school. We are supposed to make an hour presentation before a class. I didn't start on time but I was running late. It ended up being an hour late. I tried to avoid the teacher, but she saw me and decided to not call me.
Beach Trip. Tom was bored at the beach. He decided to go to the beach for a fun day. Tom went to the beach to see the local beaches. He then went back home. He felt much better after.

First Day Treat. Toni bought cookies at the store. She decided to make some cookies. Her mom made a batch of chocolate chip cookies. She brought the cookies home to her daughter. Her daughter loved them.

Jasper Makes Linguine. Jasper had always wanted to make linguine himself. He decided to try to cook some linguine. Jasper's linguine was not very tasty. He decided to try adding more herbs to his linguine. This time, his linguine was delicious.

Thanks!. Gina had been at her grandparents for several hours. She was on her way back home. She tried her hardest to finish her homework as fast as she could. It wasn't enough to keep up, so she gave up. She was mad at her grandma for the rest of the afternoon.

Planting and growing. Cathy wanted a large, flower-filled garden. She decided to plant some seeds in her garden. At first, the seeds grew slowly. However, Cathy planted a few seeds. After several weeks, the garden was well-formed and vibrant.

Good Deed. Tom received a $100 tip from a waitress. Tom was poor and didn't have much money. Tom went to the store to buy food. He paid with a $20 bill and left the rest of the money. Tom was thankful he found a good friend.

Shark Attack. Joey's family went to an ocean fishing spot for the weekend. When they got there, they saw a lot of people. The beach was full of sharks. They didn't want to go back. Luckily they had a life jacket on so they got away.

The stealing friend. Max was a little boy who didn't like to learn. He was always stealing from everyone. One day he was given a book on ethics to read by his teacher. He thought about how great this book was. He started reading it and learned a lot about responsibility.

Small Town Jean. Every summer my boyfriend took me to a small town. We would drive to the farm to feed the cows. Once he asked me if I wanted to see a movie with him. I said yes. After the movie I had dinner and then we went home.
Stray. Bob heard his neighbors crying. He went to investigate. His neighbor's dog was alone. Bob petted the dog. The dog was very grateful.
Checking the mail. Liza was home alone. She was waiting for the mail. She started to hear a noise. Liza jumped up. She couldn't find the mail.
Face paint as costumes. The kids are playing in the yard. They are painting their faces. The mom says, you can have one face paint only. She takes one of the kids. She says it is her husband's face.

Making pizzas. Lily loved her family's pizza tradition. She decided to try to make it herself. She bought all the ingredients and prepared the dough. When it was time to put it in the oven she realized her oven wasn't working. Luckily, her aunt's oven worked and everything came out delicious.

Scholarship. Kendall was a student at university. She was studying hard in her classes. In her senior year she applied to be a senator. She was very excited to hear that she had won her scholarship. Kendall could not wait to be in school.

The Garage Sale. The Smith family wanted to get rid of some old stuff. They decided to put it on their garage lot. On the weekend they went to the garage sale. There were lots of things they didn't want anymore. It took them an hour to put everything back in the garage.

Randy's Train Ticket. Randy was traveling on a train across the country. One day a ticket inspector caught him not paying. The ticket inspector refused to mail Randy's ticket to him. Randy called a friend and asked him to mail it to him. The friend mailed it to Randy.
Pads. She put on her new gym bag. She checked her bag again. The gym bag had ripped open. She threw the gym bag away. She bought new gym pads instead.

Soccer. Nia decided she was going to play soccer in school. She was nervous because she didn't know how to kick. She spent months practicing kicks. She even learned a few new ones. When she stepped on the field, Nia was ready.

China. Tim had a lot of money in his savings account. He had never been to a foreign country before. He wanted to learn more about other cultures. Tim decided to visit China. He found it to be very exotic and fun.
Chess. I played chess online yesterday with an old friend. I am 60 years old and played 10 hours per day. My friend beat me. I was very upset. I told my friend that he was a bad chess player.
The awesome batch. Sally bought some chocolate bars. She took them home and tried to make some. She was sure they would be great. Yet to her surprise, they were awful. Sally had to throw them out.

Jennifer wins big. Jennifer is a small child. She wanted a new bicycle. Jennifer worked all of her free time to get her bicycle. She took the money to the bank. Jennifer won a brand new bicycle with her money.

The Pop Quiz. Laurie was having a hard time understanding a complicated math question. She decided to read the problem over again to see how it was done. She read the answer aloud for the whole class. She got all of her classmates to copy the answer. It turned out that the answer was the exact same as before.
Best Friend. The best friend of my son is named James. I went to his mom's house today. James came to his mom's house. I have not seen him in over 10 years. James was very happy to see me.

Bringing Home Baby. The family got together to surprise the baby. The mom was holding a bottle to bottle. She was shaking with fear as her baby pulled out. The baby took a few seconds to cry out. Finally, the mom held back the tears and delivered the baby.

Grown Man Selling Barbies. Cathy's family was very poor. She got her first job at a factory that made t-shirts. Cathy began to sell t-shirts and get her first customer. After a few months of selling t-shirts, Cathy made enough money. Cathy quit her job and went home to make her own money.
Crash. I was driving on the highway. Suddenly, I heard a loud screeching noise. I got out to look at the problem. I found a small pipe was sticking up. I fixed it and was able to go again.

Impressing Girls Is Easy. Rita wanted to impress a group of girls at school. She decided to make them all laugh. Rita decided to sing songs that the girls would enjoy. After that she realized that her humor was very funny. The girls at school gave her lots of compliments.

The Wire. Sue was watching TV. She heard a loud clatter as she bent to hook up the cable. She was worried it was broken. She tried to hook it up but nothing happened. It turned out she had tapped the wrong wire.

College?. Alicia was very upset when her friend told her college was out. Alicia had always loved college and couldn't get enough of it. She then found out a friend was accepted to the same school. She was thrilled and immediately asked her to come visit. Alicia now had two friends that she would be friends with.
Olga. Olga was a nice woman. But she had many secrets. Olga kept them from her husband. His wife found out. His wife broke up with him.
Poor Eyesight. Sam had bad eyesight. He was told to wear glasses. One day, Sam got a piece of glass stuck in his eye. Sam couldn't see properly. The doctor took his glasses away.

Smile. Bob's wife told him he was attractive. She went up to Bob and leaned over him. Bob felt like a fool for thinking so. He quickly turned around and glared back. Bob's wife was amused by his behavior.
The Gross Seat. Tina was sitting in her seat. She was watching a movie. Tina's mom came in to take her seat. Tina had left a stain on her seat. Tina had to clean it before her mom would leave.
Too much fun. The carnival was having a big parade. Tom and his friends decided to join. They ran all over the place. They had a lot of fun. The carnival was a fun event.

Dance Team. Tasha wanted to become a dance team leader. She spent countless hours studying and practicing her routine. She also worked hard on her team's uniforms. She was invited to the dance team meeting. Tasha gladly accepted and impressed the team leaders.

Hockey Fan. Brad loved to watch hockey on tv. He watched games from all over the world on tv. He had tickets to his very favorite hockey team. The team was scheduled to play their first game in a month. Brad was thrilled he was able to be a part of their historic season.

The Booking Failure. Amy was on a flight with her mother. As they sat down they decided to make some food. The flight attendant suggested they order a pizza. Amy didn't know how to order pizza so she didn't order. They ended up throwing away their food and paying for a pizza instead.

Fried Trout. I took my daughter fishing in our backyard. I felt bad about throwing her the trout, but I did. I waited for a long time before I threw it. My daughter caught it, and I had to run back home. Now we always throw the trout together.
Bicycle. Jeb loved his new bicycle. He would try to pedal it up and down the road. Jeb wasn't able to pedal for the entire day. His father had to help him out on the next day. Jeb learned his lesson.

New Style. Dan noticed his pants were becoming looser in the waist. He went to the mall and bought a new pair of pants. Dan was not used to a looser waist. He tried them on and was immediately in love. Dan was excited to experiment with his new pants.
Fight on the Train. Tina was riding a train. There was a fight on the train. Tina was very annoyed. She didn't want to get off the train. So she decided to go back and fight someone else.

No. Gina and her family were driving in the car. Her mom was on the phone. Her dad wanted her to come to his house. Gina hesitated, but she felt it was the best option. She let them go, but then she was forced to get on the highway again.

The Sheets. Janet went shopping for a new bed. She needed a new bed with pillows. She looked through some different ones and couldn't find any she liked. Finally she found some comfortable bedding at the mall. Janet went home with her new bed and slept well that night.

Student's Nightmare. Jane was not looking forward to her English exam. She started to feel nauseous during the exam. Jane vomited throughout the exam. Jane was relieved to have the exam over. She passed the exam.

Stars. The sky was very dark outside. The family hiked in the woods to the starry sky. They loved the beautiful stars. They would always go back out to the telescope. It was their favorite place to visit.

Impatient. Kane was waiting for her parents to pick her up from school. She had been stuck in traffic. A car drove right through her as she was waiting. She tried to run to get to the school. However, she was too late and the car was stuck.
The Run. The children ran from the park. They all went through a tunnel. A policeman was following them. They had to get out of the tunnel. They ran as fast as they could.

Finding Cards on the Street. I saw a large pack of cards in my neighborhood today. I looked them all over, to no avail. I tried calling the number on the card. I found the owner of the card by looking on the card. I drove to the owner, gave the card, and drove off.

Cat Treats. Liz decided to make a treat for her cat. She made a treat for him that she thought he'd like. She put cat treats in his food bowl and left it there. The cat came over and chewed the treats. She fed him the cat treats as a treat.

Presents. We went to the store to buy a gift for our granddaughter. The clerk said they could not afford her presents. We went home sad and sad. She came by, bought our presents, and gave it to us. We were so excited to open it and play with it!

Jean. Amy's sister came over to talk to her about her crush Ray. Amy was really upset that Ray wasn't interested in her. Her sister didn't feel the same way and kept trying to talk to Amy. Finally she said he was too shy to talk to her. Amy sat and sulked as she watched her sister cry quietly.
Lost money. Tom was walking around. He saw a lost wallet. He kept walking. Eventually he couldn't find it. He had to walk back home.
Curtain. Sally was sewing. She got distracted in her work. She ended up not following the pattern. The fabric ripped. Sally spent more time fixing the fabric than sewing.
The Fever. Tom was visiting his mom in the hospital. She had just had a fever. The doctor was concerned. Tom decided to call in sick. His mother was happy to have Tom stay home instead.
Lois gets a scare. Lois is a young girl. One day she sees a ghost. Lois runs out of the house. She tells her mom. Lois is taken to the doctor.
Tacos. The family was having a cook-out. They were going to use some of their leftover chicken. They decided to make tacos. It took a long time to cook everything. When it was ready, they ate them.

Basketball. Tommy loved to play basketball. Tommy played for his team at the park. He practiced shooting for hours. On the day of the big game, Tommy had a bad shooting day. Tommy's team lost the game.

Bad Breath. Tom was at the bar. His friends made fun of him for having bad breath. Tom went to his mother for advice. He bought some mouthwash. He also put a special cream on his breath to make it better.
Speeding. My father drove to work every day. It was a 20 minute commute. One day his speedometer failed. He tried to drive faster on the freeway. He almost hit a car and had to take a taxi back home.

Naughty Nancy. Nancy was trying to be a good sister. She would never say mean things to her siblings. However, her parents were unhappy with her behavior. They had to discipline Nancy. She learned a valuable lesson in manners.

Grocery List. Amy had to buy everything on her list in one trip. She had a few groceries but nothing to carry to school. She decided to make a list of all her grocery items. When she got to the store, she realized she forgot to buy everything. She was upset that she could not go to school until she had everything.

Bad Crash. Tim was out on a hike with friends. Tim's tire hit a rock while he was hiking. Tim's tire popped and he lost control of his car. Tim ended up being able to control the car only for a short while. Tim's friends helped him clear his car and get back on his feet.

A Need to Pee. Lucy was taking a long walk through her neighborhood. She was trying to cool off. The walk passed by a block away from home. Lucy wasn't in her mind at all. She was glad she didn't have to pee.
The magic trick. Trevor saw an ad for magic tricks. He got a bunch together. They had a giant show down the street. He was having fun. When the show was done, Trevor couldn't believe his eyes.

Careless Mistake. My niece's nephew moved to Florida last summer. He lives with his family. He did not drive an automobile when he moved. A drunk driver hit him one day. He will probably be lost in the state if he does not find work.

Shooting Star. The shooting star seemed to be moving across the sky. John watched intently for the shooting star to come across the sky. When it did, John went to get a better looking camera. John began to film the shooting star. John watched the shooting star for many weeks.

Tight On Brandy. Janice's favorite drink was a little cup of liquor called Brandy. She didn't know the brand, so she bought a bottle. She opened the cap and gasped. It was so tightly packed that she couldn't get the cap off! She threw the bottle away and bought a new one, much larger.

Prank. It was a cold February day. Jimmy wanted to play a prank on his dad. He turned on his dad's heat and set it on fire. When he got outside his dad was gone. He was out cold, with a big smile on his face.

The Interview. Gina was a reporter for a local newspaper. She had interviewed with one of the town's leaders. The mayor wanted Gina's story. Gina was told to submit her story by noon. She was supposed to interview the mayor on the weekend.

Football Match. My friend and I were watching a football match. We cheered for our team and threw our hands in the air. Suddenly, my friend made a run towards me. I jumped and hit him in the face. We started arguing after that.
One Car. Kate's car was very dirty. She needed to get a job to pay bills. She decided to fix it herself. She bought a used Ford. She did the work and saved money.
Overtime. Tom had been doing the same job for a while. He was tired and wanted a change. Tom applied to different jobs. Eventually he got an interview. Tom got the new job.
New Lamp. Tim's lamp didn't work. He took it to the store and they said they'd replace it. Tim drove to a lamp store to have it fixed. They replaced it. Tim felt much better about his lamp.

Broken pencil. I was in middle school. I was always running late. One day I got to class and I forgot to put my pencil in my backpack. I left my pencil at school. The teacher got mad and told me to put it back.
Losing battery. My phone went out one day. I put it in my bag and walked to the bus stop. I walked up to the stop. The bus wasn't there. I walked back to my bag.

The new roll recipe. Molly was cooking spaghetti for her boyfriend. He was a bit intimidated by the new roll recipe. Molly insisted they try it out. They both agreed that it was an amazing dish. They ate the whole plate in record time.

Child Support. Cathy was at work. She didn't have time to watch a movie. She decided to go back home. There, her husband showed her the movies he wanted her to watch. Then they watched movies together until it was time to go back.

Gargoyle. Igor was an avid gardener. He spent the whole day with his hands in the dirt, trying to grow flowers. His eyes grew wide, as he began to see the shape of a man. He yelled, and pointed to the sky, as the face of the man made its way across. Igor was so excited, he began to cry.
Not The Best Class. I went to a science class at a community college. We had to work on a project. I did a bad job. The teacher said I could do better. I became an adept writer.

Anne and the Money. Anne was feeling really bored in her free time. She thought she could make some money on Mturk. So she put up an ad and tried to find hits. Soon she was making more than enough to pay for her vacation! Anne was happy she'd found a new way to spend her free time.

Fair visit. My friend had a birthday party at his house. All of his family came to the party. After dinner, there was a barbecue and ice cream. My friend brought me some ice cream. We ate and drank for an hour.

He Can't Photograph. Maddie couldn't find any decent pictures of her. He was on a mission to save the world. He took a picture and saved it on a memory card. When the pictures came back they were terrible. Maddie had to delete the photos and begin again.

Dilemma. My teacher told us there would be a special test on Friday. The class was assigned a quiz to answer after class. The test was two pages long and I got the question wrong. The class ended up answering the quiz with only one page. My teacher was angry and sent us to detention.

Makeup. I was invited to a friends house for the weekend. When I got there she wanted me to wear her makeup. I said yes but I felt weird wearing it. When I tried it on she told me how she liked it. I guess that was just how I feel.

Homework. John's homework was due yesterday. John had to write a story for his English class. John wrote a story about a monster eating his homework. When he got to class, his teacher noticed the story. She gave John a failing grade because of his story.
Exhausted. Gabe came home tired from school. He decided to stay in bed and watch a movie. After a couple hours, he fell asleep. When he woke up, he was disappointed. He couldn't get to sleep.

Scary Movie Night. Liz was feeling lonely this week. She decided to watch a scary movie. She sat in her living room, and closed her eyes. When she awoke, she realized that she was in a hospital. Liz was too scared to watch scary movies anymore.

Tami Joins. Tami thought she had a great idea for a prank. She wanted to embarrass her teacher. She wrote an angry email to the whole class. She sent it to the teacher's office. Tami was happy she could finally embarrass her teacher!

Time Out. Gina was playing on the swings in the house. Her brother came in and pushed her off of the swing. She fell down into the dirt. She crawled around the dirt. She waited for her mother to call her name.
Run. Amy was in the gym. She was running with her friends. When she was about half way up they stopped. Amy had a bad cramp. They were all worried she was injured.

No Address. Toby was looking for a place to go for his upcoming birthday. But when he decided to visit his friend's house, he saw trouble. His friend didn't have an address or phone number. Toby realized he wouldn't have a place to go to on his birthday. So Toby called a friend to see if he could go with.

The King. The king was a man with a dark skin tone. He ruled over a nation of nomads. His people loved him dearly but he didn't love them. His people didn't like him and he hated them. He decided to leave and never return.

Old Lunch. Dan went to lunch with his buddies. Dan realized that he forgot his lunch at home. Dan had to leave for work early that day. Dan went home and grabbed some lunch for himself. Dan was thankful that he had made it to lunch in time.

Assisted Living. Jane was in the assisted living facility. One day, a new patient came into the facility. Jane was afraid and nervous about being around this patient. She decided to take the patient out to lunch. Jane's fear slowly went away.

Big Rain. There was a storm in Tom's area. Tom decided to watch the storm. When the storm passed he went back home. Tom waited a while and heard the storm rumbling. After the storm passed Tom went out to play again.

Mark and the Author. Mark loved to read. He read every day at five o'clock in the morning. One day he was assigned an essay for class. He wrote a poem about his favorite book. His teacher loved the poem and so did everyone in class.

Squirrel. Rory had a lot of trouble in his class. His teacher gave him a small assignment for his paper. It was to write a poem about squirrels. Rory worked on the poem for hours. When he turned it in, it was the best poem he had ever written.

Wrong Recipient. Tom was at a bar with friends. He offered to get someone else's drink. He thought it was okay but he noticed someone else getting it. It was weird so Tom tried to give it back. Unfortunately the person had a negative reaction.
Terry's love. Terry met a cute young man named Mark. Mark became his lover. Terry and Mark got married. Mark got sick. Terry and Mark divorced.
New necklace. Mia wanted a new necklace. She went to the mall to find one. She looked at a lot of necklaces. She found the perfect one. She purchased it and was very happy.
A new movie. The new Star Wars movie came out. John really wanted to see it. He asked his parents to go. They finally agreed to go. John saw the new Star Wars movie.

Ice Cream. I was on a mission to stop the ice cream truck from stopping. I had bought a bunch of cones, and was ready to stop. When the truck stopped I poured myself a cone. As the cone fell, I couldn't stop laughing. The cone fell and I made a face but I enjoyed it.

Getting into the NHS. My niece is having children soon. She was never in shape and was afraid to get into the NHS. Finally her doctor said she could join. She ended up working out and getting into shape in no time. Now she is going into the National Honors Society.
Cat. Sam got a cat last week. It ran away the night before. Sam's parents were very upset. They took him to the shelter. Sam found the right cat and he brought it home.

Please Go Home. The school bus went by a house. The house's yard was littered with dog poop. The school refused to discipline the parents. The parents sued the school for child neglect. The parents won the lawsuit and they were no longer in trouble.
Pool. Today is the big day. Travis has been training for a big race. He needs to get better at swimming. He gets to the pool and practices. He wins the race.

Date. Jenny saw a pretty girl at the grocery store. Jenny walked up to the girl and asked her out. The girl said yes. The two left together and made plans for dinner. They enjoyed dinner and went home to sleep.
The church. The church had been burned down. All the people were killed. People were still trying to find their lost loved ones. They found a man. He was in the church with his wife and kids.

Red. Red was in love with his girlfriend for a very long time. He decided to get her a necklace to commemorate their love. After buying a nice stone, he took it to her door. She gave him one last look before opening the door. Her diamond necklace was the best he had ever seen.

Dog Love. Nancy's dog got bit by another dog. She was horrified. She begged her parents to get rid of the dog. They reluctantly got rid of the dog. Nancy was happy she did not have to be so sad about her dog.
Mailbox. I went out to my mailbox. The mailman was there. I asked him for a package. He was happy to get the package for me. I thanked him for his effort.

All Too Common. We drove to a local thrift store. While walking through the store, I saw a young girl crying. I decided to give the girl my card and she was grateful. As I left the store, I gave the girl $20 and a hug. She ended up buying a pair of jeans for $50.
Drinks. Cora loves to drink coffee. One day she went out for coffee. She walked away and felt terrible. Cora started to throw up. Her friends helped her and she felt better.

Tragic Vacation. Tommy was on vacation in Vegas. He had a huge gambling problem. He was able to make money gambling. He got his gambling paycheck but could not get rid of the cash. He lost all the money he won and had to get another job.

Box of almonds. I was going to the supermarket to get some almonds. I wanted to buy enough for everybody in my family. When I got there, there were a few people there. The people behind me had to pay for my almonds. I had to find a different place to buy the almonds.
The Smoking Gun. Tom's apartment was on fire. He thought it was safe. He heard the fire alarm. He decided to stay put. Tom's apartment quickly got out of control.

The Rancid Ketchup. Beth loved the taste of ketchup on her hamburgers. One day she tried to get it out of her car. She accidentally spilled it all over her car! The ketchup was so rancid it was unusable. Beth was so frustrated she had to drive it back to the store.

Frog on a log. A frog was caught in a log in my yard. I was able to grab the frog from the log with a stick. I brought the frog into the house with me. I released the frog in the pond. My frog eventually died.

No Internet. Janice was trying to watch TV. She tried to connect to the internet. Nothing happened. Janice was furious and yelled at her husband. He didn't stop and he had to call the company to fix the internet.

Albert's Boat. Albert was excited to try out his new boat. His dad took him out on the water. Albert got seasick and decided to take a rest. After resting, he went back out on the water. Albert's new boat sailed beautifully.

Spit When You Talk. Joe's dog had an intense fear of dogs. He decided to take him to a dog park. His friends were all there and they were all playing. Suddenly, his dog bolted across the park towards the fence. Joe's friend chased after him and finally he caught him.
Weather. Sam woke up late. He was upset he woke up so late. He walked to the store to buy a sweater. He got his sweater and headed to work. Sam got to work on time and felt very happy.

Sailing On. Irene loved to sail. Her favorite ship was the marina. She was always looking forward to going on sail. On one particularly busy day, Irene had to get the sail ready. Her marina wasn't running with any engines, but Irene did it anyways.

The Game. Tom was playing a video game with his friends. He kept losing. Tom tried to practice more but he always lost. Tom eventually gave up and walked away. He was sad he lost but knew it was time to get back in.

Aiden and the lost toy. Aiden was in the middle of a road trip. He was lost and needed help! He looked around but no one was helping him. Finally he heard the sound of a car approaching. It was his own father who had found his lost toy!

Play Together. Amy's mother was playing a new song on the radio. She turned the radio on and the song played. Amy ran into the living room and her mother was playing the same song. Amy didn't understand why her mother was playing the song she liked. After a minute she decided to play with her mom.

Marlee was almost late. Marlee was running late for work. Marlee decided to take the bus. Marlee didn't notice the bus stop was right behind her house. She ran right into her neighbor's garbage can. Marlee's neighbor yelled at her and threw a garbage bag at her.

Huge Convenience. I needed to get my groceries. But there was a long line at the grocery store. So I decided to make a list and walk. And I was very happy when I arrived at the store. But when I went inside, I realized the store was closed.

Window. Tim was playing soccer in his house. Tim decided to take a long soccer ball outside. He then kicked the ball over his neighbor's window. Tim's neighbor called the police. Tim was grounded for a week.

Clouds. The sky was dark and dreary. I put on my jacket and hat. I walked to the front door. A huge, beautiful cloud rolled through the window. It looked so different from the clouds I had seen before!

Afraid of Heights. Dan is afraid of heights. Dan has always been the tallest kid in school. After high school, Dan decided to face his fear and face it head on. Dan trained very hard to face his fear. After Dan faced his fear, he felt exhilarated.

darkness. I was standing at the edge of a lake. I had the chance to look at the water before I left. I could see the outline of some large black fish. The fish was swimming in the lake. I decided to leave and never went back.

Flat tire blues. Today I got into my car to go home. My car started making a funny noise. My tire popped in my back of the car. I pulled over to the side of the road and fixed the tire. I went home and went to sleep.

Ice Skating Accident. Jane and Tim were skating across the street. Jane slipped and fell hard on the ice. She hurt her back and her dress broke in several places. Tim helped her up. They returned to the ice skating rink and started skating again.

Magnesium. My wife noticed that she needed extra magnesium in her diet. She researched magnesium and found that it was not always present. She took magnesium citrate tablets at night and day. After taking them for a month, her magnesium levels rose. She is glad that she is getting enough magnesium.

Swim Shorts. Kia was out in the pool. It was summer and very hot. She got out her shorts and went swimming. To her dismay, she got a terrible sunburn. Kia had to quickly towel off and go back to the house.

French Press. I once was in the library at a local college. We had a French Press that we would read every week. One day, the French Press was taken out of our building by fire. They didn't have the old French Press, so we were in a state of panic. It turns out that the French Press was actually the original library.
The first drink. Sally was at a party. She had a few drinks. Then she started feeling sick. It turned out she had a stomach ache. So she went home.
