Over Drinking. My friends invited me to have a drink at their house. When I showed up, they didn't know I was drunk. They made a big scene. I felt so uncomfortable that I ran away. I never saw them again.

Rat-A-Tat-Tat. The raccoon took a lot of time to get to know me. He stared at me, his fur bright red. I walked up to him, and asked what was wrong. He looked at me with a strange expression. He pulled his eyes away from mine.

Eye Drops. My eye doctor suggested I buy prescription eyeglasses. I hated wearing glasses, so I bought a pair of blue contacts. My eye doctor told me my vision was fine without glasses. I didn't like the way I looked in contacts, so I wore contacts instead. After a week, my contacts were ruined by cat hair.

The Lost Puppy. Sophie and Timmy were walking home from school. While walking, Sophie's mom asked where Timmy was. Sophie and Timmy looked around for Timmy. No Timmy was anywhere around! Sophie's mom was very sad.

Drew wants a girlfriend. Drew was at a bar with friends. The bartender noticed this and asked Drew for a date. Drew agreed and went on a date with the bartender. At the end of the night, Drew had to give a reason for wanting a girlfriend. After giving Drew a reason, Drew told his friends he wanted a girlfriend.

Friends for Life. Tina and her boyfriend always went to the same bar. One day her boyfriend convinced her to go somewhere else. When she got there, she was disappointed that he was gone. Instead of going back, she went out with a friend. Tina's friends had a lot to drink, and Tina got a new boyfriend.

Know When to Fold. Kathy liked to tuck her laundry. It was the only way she could keep her clothes clean. One day she was folding a load of laundry. The load was too big so she folded it in her lap. The jeans stayed clean but the load was too big so she had to leave.
Bad dye job. Sue had pink hair. She needed to get a new hair color. She decided to dye her hair pink. The color was bad. Sue decided not to do the color.
Dog Attack. Bobby was walking around outside. A large dog started following him. It ran into his yard. He tried to run as fast as he can. The dog was able to grab him and he got bit.

Training. She was having her first day of training. She was so nervous, she almost dropped the class. Finally the teacher told her everything would be fine. She was relieved and excited. Now she knew she would be fine.
The SUV. We had an old SUV. It was not used that often. We decided to take it to the junkyard. It was a good idea. We took the new SUV home and gave it a name.

Foreclosure. My wife's coworker is Asian. She is an elderly woman with a limp. She is not driving herself, so she drives on a cane. One day her cane broke. Her son, my wife's son, went to the bank and bought her a new cane.
The Truck. The family had just bought a new truck. It was a large, fancy vehicle. The kids all loved to drive it. They would go to the park and play in the mud. It was their new favorite toy!

Started a garden. I wanted to start a garden. I grabbed some soil and dug a small hole. I filled the hole with dirt and a little water. I put the dirt in the hole and planted seeds. After three days, I had a small garden.
Basketball Season. Jed was at summer basketball camp. He had a good time. Jed was trying out for the team. The coach told him he would help the team out. Jed made the team.

The Windy Day. It was a windy day and a very hot day outside. The woman went for a walk and the wind whipped around. She got very hot and sweaty. She stopped and put a hat on so she didn't get more hot. It was a very cool day!

Horatio's Fencing Trip. Horatio had always wanted to be a great fencer. He practiced very hard in his backyard. Finally he had taken up archery. He traveled all over the world learning different ways to defend. After many years, Horatio was proud of his fencery skills.

A New Cat. Benny had just had a cat for 3 weeks. He really liked it but it started acting weird. He tried everything to find out what was wrong. Then he discovered he was pregnant. Benny happily welcomed his new cat.

Mud volleyball. Mud volleyball is a way to play video games in real life. You jump in the pool and throw the ball over a large net. Then you jump in the snow and slide down the slope. You are then able to shoot the ball to the other side of the court. It's the best way to enjoy video games.
Kylie gets famous. Kylie is having a bad day. She is hungry and needs a snack. She decides to go to a food truck. She orders a burger and fries. Kylie is very satisfied with her meal.

Toner. Gina's friend Beth wanted to try the new makeup. Gina didn't think it would work but offered to try it. She put on a new face, lips, and mascara. The girls put the makeup on for an hour before leaving. When they got home they said the makeup looked amazing.

Bidet. Anna wanted to hang some laundry. She hung a lot of clothes up. She thought it would be neat to put the bidets in the washing machine. They didn't dry clean and the clothes got stained. Anna had to replace them and start over.

Online Store. I decided to make a website. I asked a friend of mine to help me. We decided on an online store for candles. She got some equipment and worked on a website. She was able to sell a lot of candles.

Mary Had a Little Lamb. Mary took her new baby to the grocery store. She didn't realize her baby would not stop crying. Mary walked back into the store to find her baby. Mary's little lamb was playing in the checkout lane. She was relieved when the baby stopped crying.

Getting Annoyed. Janie was trying to listen to the radio one morning. She listened as the man next to her talked about a recent storm. Janie became annoyed and began to yell out. The man began to listen to her even more. Janie decided to give up and go back to sleep.

The Lesbian. Tori and her friend Beth were at the movies. Tori's friend Beth wanted to see a new movie with some of their friends. Tori had never been to a lesbian movie. She was interested in seeing the movie with Beth. Tori's friend Beth told Tori she wasn't interested in seeing the movie.

Ant Friends. John's cat had antlers growing out of its head. John got an ant farm for his cat to keep it safe. He put an ant-covered rock in front of the cat's head. He had it stand on the rock and jump up to scratch it. John's cat loved being scratched.

Unhealthy Salad. My sister had some Chinese food for dinner. I suggested we order a salad. I ate a red onion colored cucumber with olive oil dressing. It tasted terrible. I don't make that kind of salad anymore.
The Borrowed Car. Janice was late for work. Her car wouldn't start. Janice called her husband to borrow his car. He said the car wasn't his. Janice's husband left work early.

Amnesia. Lacy woke up in the middle of the night. She was unable to remember her name or where she was. She tried to find her mom but she couldn't remember. Lacy finally remembered that she left her food at the store. She had no way of getting home so she called her mom.

Kate. Kate wanted to take gymnastics lessons. She didn't like the competition but she wanted to give it a shot. She started watching the Olympic team. She realized she was a great athlete and she wanted to learn more. Kate signed up for gymnastics lessons and enjoyed them.
Statistics. Dan is a statistics major. Last semester he was unable to pass his exam. He asked me for help and I told him to seek help. He did seek help and was successful. Now Dan passes his exam!

Serial Killer. In the 1990's I was a fan of Stephen King. He was always writing interesting stories. When I was 12 Years old my cousin was murdered. I never figured out who killed her but I thought it was strange. I never saw any of his work and never heard of Serial killer.

A Very Tired Happening. Gina had a test on Friday. She stayed up late to study for it. The next day she missed the test. She was extremely tired when she got to class. It was only 4 AM when she took her test the next day.
Walk the Dog. Gina wanted to do a lot of exercise this weekend. She called her friend Lisa. Lisa agreed to go walk her dog. They walked to the park together. Gina was happy to be out of the house.

Coin collection. Sam had a lot of coins in his house. His mother took him to a coin dealer to see if they could sell some. He had many good finds. They sold him three different coins. Sam was happy and took them home.

The Tea Cups. The kids liked to play pranks. They put tea cups in the kitchen sink and changed them every day. They were usually green, but one day they were red! They laughed and pretended they were poisoned. It worked and they weren't taken seriously.

Satin robe. I am Indian and I hate going to work. The only place where it is okay is if I wear sari. But I hate dressing up to wear the sari to work. In the middle of the day when i go to work it's okay. But at night it's unbearable.
Salespad. I moved to a new city. I needed to find a new job. I went to the newspaper's salespeople office. I applied for several sales jobs. I finally found a salespad job!

Hidden Box. Kate had a crush on a boy from the office. She didn't tell his wife. One day her crush asked her to come over and surprise him. Kate was hesitant but she was afraid of what would happen. But when she got there, she was surprised and excited to see him.

Workflow. We went to a bar last night. I was drinking a beer and my coworker drank a coke. We had to hurry but I had to be patient. He had to drink it on the side. At the end of the day he had to sleep it out.
Big Brother. My mom told me I could have a pet if I wanted. I asked her to buy me a dog. She said I could have any pet in my room. She bought a dog. I named my dog Jacko.

Felix Lights Candles. Felix notices that the neighborhood isn't very quiet. He decides to buy some candles to make some noise. Felix sets up a few small fires to make more noise. Finally he is able to enjoy a quiet night in his home. Felix is glad that he bought some candles.
Riley gets an A. Riley has a test tomorrow. She studies all week long. When test day comes, Riley is ready. She gets to school and does well. Riley gets an A.

Silver Fox. The fox jumped onto my desk. I picked it up and gave it to my son. He took it home and gave it to his grandson. His grandson had trouble with the fox the next day. His grandson threw it out.

The Scary Hike. James went on a hike in the mountains. He began to climb up a small mountain. All of a sudden, a large moose ran out in front of him. James quickly turned around and ran home. His mother was very mad at him.

record player. Sam's record player broke one day. He didn't have any money to buy another one. He decided to fix his own record player. He bought a really expensive one. He played all records without any problems.

Jury Duty. John is a mail carrier for the state of Indiana. Last month John was summoned for jury duty in Indianapolis. John was very nervous during his first day of jury duty. The other jurors were kind and helped John get his work done. John enjoyed his experience on the jury.

Happy Lifetime. I went on a cruise for my twenties. It was my first time on a cruise. I had no idea what I would do on a cruise. The captain showed us some of the fun activities. I immediately loved cruising!

Dry Dry Dry. John loved to do puzzles. He would create many puzzles at once. One day he tried to use all of his puzzle pieces in a puzzle. He got frustrated and threw away his entire set. Now he is an accomplished puzzle designer.

Like Mommy. Kim was only three but she thought she was a mommy. She didn't even know what a c-section was, though. She always had to cry to go through it, even when she thought she was. But after her baby was born she knew she'd have a lot of support. She knew she'd have a good life with her newborn baby.

Rose and Juliet. Rose was playing Juliet. Her dad made her play the part of Juliet. They played many games, including football. When it was time to move to the school, she left home. Rose never returned to play Juliet in the final game.

Classical and Modern. Rio was an aspiring opera singer. She was a good singer but her voice needed work. One day a friend convinced her to try singing in public. Rio tried to sing in public with the crowd. She found that she was able to sing well and made lots of money!

Pottery. Linda loved to make clay figurines. Her favorite was the frog. Her son begged for her to make him one for his birthday. She looked at the box and smiled. The frog would be ready for her son in no time.

Senior Year. Amy had just turned 21. She wanted to do something to celebrate her accomplishment. She decided to go to the park and see her favorite show. She even bought a ticket to a concert that was playing nearby. The show was great but Amy still wanted to celebrate.

Big Sister. Rita wanted a big sister. Her mom agreed to let her have one if she worked. Rita worked all day at the hospital. When she got home, she told her mom about her big sister. Rita's mom agreed to let her have a big sister.
Boyfriend. Sally was asked to go the prom by her boyfriend. She was thrilled. He picked her up that night. He was excited to take her out. It was a great night.
Stew. I was really hungry. I went out and grabbed a burger. It was delicious. I made it into a stew. It was a great meal.

Poker Game. The kids were bored. They decided to play a poker game. They each picked their favorite numbers. They then shuffled their cards and added them up. It was a close game, but eventually they won.
Hungry. Anna was trying to make cookies. But she was too impatient to wait. She quickly began to make the cookies. But she ended up with a dozen! Anna was so disappointed!
Stomach Virus. Tim was at work. He didn't realize it but his stomach was starting to hurt. He hadn't realized he was eating spicy food. Tim felt sick. He spent the rest of the day in bed.

Miseducation. Amy woke up early for work and got dressed. She left the house for work and stopped by a diner. The waitress saw Amy was wearing her favorite dress. Amy felt embarrassed and felt left out by the nice waitress. Amy left the diner and vowed to dress differently at work.
Weather's Always Wrong. I was running late for class. The weather was bad out. The car was going slow. I tried to keep up with the pace. I accidentally ran into a ditch.
Sick of meat. Fred wanted to eat a hamburger. But he was afraid of it. So he tried to be more creative. But he ended up eating nothing. Fred regret eating the hamburger.

A win for Bob. Bob loved to skateboard. He went to the skate park to skateboard all day. He tried his best to keep up with the other skaters. But Bob fell and hurt his knee. He had to sit out for a while until he healed.

Linda's doughnuts. Linda loved to bake. Her doughnuts were very tasty. One day she decided to try to sell them to her neighbors. She found some neighbors who loved her doughnuts. Now Linda is very good at selling doughnuts.

Special Delivery. Jenna was visiting a doctor. He delivered an infant by C-Section. Jenna became extremely nauseous. She threw up and puked all over the doctor. She vowed to never visit another doctor.
A Night Out. Jodi and her friends went out for a night out. It began to storm. They decided to hide in a dark place. The thunderstorm was loud and scary. The girls ran home as fast as they could.

Future Cat Lady. Amy was tired of cats being so catty. So she decided to become a cat lady. But she felt like her life wasn't complete. She then thought of adopting a cat from the local shelter. Amy adopted a beautiful cat named Fido.

Grandma's Cookies. Grandma had a dozen cookies. She hid them in her kitchen and never forgot. She baked them one day and forgot about them. A storm blew through town and a lot of the cookies fell on the ground. Her grandma never found out but everyone else found some.

Card Game. Toni wanted to learn to play a game. Her dad showed her how to throw a baseball. After a few tries, Toni had hit the baseball. Her dad told her that she was the best at throwing. Toni was proud of herself for learning a new game.

New neighbors. We moved into a new neighborhood. There was a lot of commotion around the neighborhood. The kids started playing baseball in the street. We were trying to get away from the kids. Suddenly, there were two kids playing ball with each other.
20 years and still in love. I met this girl in college. We have been together for 10 years. She is 30 years older than me. We plan to get married. We are in love and have lived a great life.
Sick from a taco. Kelly ate a taco. She got sick. She started coughing. Her mother decided to take her to the hospital. The doctor gave her medicine to help.

Fear of Water. Jake had a fear of water. His friend made him a friend drink a glass of water everyday. Jake never drank a glass of water. One day his friend told him that his fear of water had been erased. Jake is no longer afraid of water.

Dodge This. Kim had a large crush on a boy in her class. So when one day a girl named Charles came to her class, Kim got angry. She told Charles to leave her alone, because Charles wasn't attractive. But Charles was just as attractive as Kim, and didn't give a damn. Kim was angry all day, and Charles never came back to talk to her again.

The Poor Student. Michael was a very smart student. He knew he needed to study more but couldn't. One day he was stuck in a long test. It took him hours to finish the test. Luckily he passed and his grade was the highest in the class.

Baby Aubrey. One day, my mother came home with a new baby. It was a boy, and he was three months old. My mother told us that he was a surprise for us all. He was a healthy boy, and we were excited to play with him. He ended up being a lot of fun, and he is going to grow up into a big brother!

Big Fish. Randy wanted to catch some fish. He called up a few friends. They got together at the river to go fishing. They all got in their gear and headed out on the river. They caught three big fish that day!

Ray. Ray was going to visit his mother one day. He decided to take his coat off and go outside. The weather was cold and windy. Ray was stuck in the cold! Ray had to wait until the weather improved before he went.
Singer. Sarah really wanted to sing. She practiced singing everyday for years. Finally, she had her big performance. Her parents were very proud. They were very proud of Sarah.

Speed Walking. My first day of speed walking was terrifying. I wasn't used to having so much weight. I tripped over my own feet. When I stopped and found I was fine I began to slowly walk. Eventually I was walking so fast that I could make it to my car in no time.

Snow day. It snowed a lot today. Everyone was worried it would snow again. When the morning came the kids were so excited to play. They spent all day shoveling the snow and making snowmen. They slept so well that night they dreamed about snow again.

Trip to animal kingdom. Every year, my family goes on a trip to animal kingdom. We usually go on the Animal Kingdom rides. However this year we're going to see the water park. It's the best water park we've ever been to. We've got tickets for that trip, we're sure we won't disappoint.

She Can't Wait To Stuff It. The kids were having a ball in the living room. Gina and her siblings had been wandering off. Finally, her siblings returned to the room. Gina sat with a sigh of relief. She was finally going to eat her mom's stuffing!

The Long Hike. Jane decided to go on a hike. She packed her bags and started on her hike. When she got to the top of the mountain she stopped to rest. After resting she started on her hike again. After a few hours Jane got home.

Weight. Jane's boyfriend told her she was too fat for him to love. Jane felt really depressed and worthless. She went online and looked up what she can do about it. She started going on diet and exercise. She gained ten pounds and felt much better about herself.

Building a Sand Castle. Dan wanted to build a sand castle. He went to the store to buy supplies. He went home and put the supplies in his castle. After building, Dan started to dig for a hole to fill. Dan filled the hole with water and waited for his sand castle to be built.
Missed Bus. I was running late for work. I hadn't made it on time. I ran through a puddle. I made it to work late. My boss gave me extra time off.

Not as Real as it Seems. I was driving across the country with my family. I was driving to visit my mom in Texas. We stopped at a diner for breakfast. I got a plate of eggs and some hashbrowns. My son's eyes quickly filled with tears as he saw his grandmother in his plate.

Brave Ben. Ben was on the front lines of the battle of Wounded Knee. His platoon was advancing in a fierce charge against enemy forces. A counter attack by an enemy force set off the fire alarm. Ben ran to alert his platoon of the situation. Ben's platoon then evacuated the wounded in time to reach the rescue.
Aging Parent. My mother's birthday was coming up. I didn't have a present for her. I got all my friends together to help me. We got her a card. She loved it.
Rocks. The man threw rocks into a river. A woman saw the rocks. The woman ran over to the rocks. She picked them up. The man thanked the woman.

The Fraud. The mailman walked up to his mailbox. He brought some packages to Jane, a young woman. When Jane opened her mailbox, she gasped. The packages were full of money and not mail. Jane called the police and filed a report.

Antwan's story. Antwan is a middle-aged African American man. His entire life he has struggled with depression. One day he was at the store and he saw a sign for mental health. He was so touched that he walked in to check it out. Now he is doing much better and feels much better.

Simon. Simon was an excellent driver. He was driving with his sister and her family. His father's car was behind them in a slow lane. His father was mad at Simon and refused to help him. Simon had to ask his parents to help him out.
